44017015	Ba' jai' dhɨt jup ma oi mɨt gu Paablo gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam mummɨ juugɨt na pai'r gɇ' kiicham ka' Ateenas tɨ tɨɨgim. Mi' dhɨr ba' giop ba ja joot nam ba jimia' bhammɨ ja'k Bereeya pui' xi ja tɨɨdak nam sap pu tɨɨda' gu Siilas gio gu Timoteo nam mui' xi jiimda' mummɨ na pai' oirɨ gu Paablo.
44017016	Ba' na mu ja'p ka oirɨ gu Paablo na pai' jax jir gɇ' kiicham, bhammɨ dɨr na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Ateenas, na bhai' ja nɨɨra gu Siilas gio gu Timoteo, bhai'x buam ji chu tatdat nat ba ja tɨɨ gu didios jup duiñxim nam mi ja'p pɨx ja'x tuut bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x jir gɇ' kiicham.
44017017	Ba' gammɨjɨ ba ji chu ja a'gidha' gu Israel kam ja'tkam mu ja'p nam pai' tu daanda', gio gui' nam cham jir Israel kam ja'tkam ba pui' ɨp, gui' nam jɨ'k gammɨjɨ pu tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios, gio gui' nam mu ja'p jum jumpa'nda' ɨrban gu gɇ' kiicham.
44017018	Ba' jai' dhɨt bhai' ji ñiokbo mɨt buiñor gu Paablo gui' nam pui' ɨlhii'ñdha' nam bɨɨx aixim xi chu buada' nam ba' dhi' kɨ'n jix bhai'm taat ka', gio ba' gui' nam pui' ja'k jup ɨlhii'ñdha' na dhi' kɨ'n jix bhai' tu ja jimda' no'm cham jax jum aa' sia ku bɨɨx aixim jix buam tu ja jim. Ba'p kai'ch am: ―¿Tu' ba' aagat jup kai'ch dhi maa'nkam jix xopkigɨm? Jai' ba'p kai'ch am ɨp: ―Panaas ku ja a'mkam tu a'ga dhi maa'nkam gu jai' didios nam cham jir ya' kam, nam sap ba' gui' ja bui tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' gɨt gu ja'tkam. Ba' dhi' pu'ñi ja'k kai'ch am, na gu' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na tu ja a'gi'ñ gu Paablo na bhaan tu a'ga gu Jesuus gio nat jax ja'k jum duu nat duadɨk giop bam mi' dhɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr.
44017019	Ba' pui' xi kai'chimɨk ba baidhim am gu Paablo mu ja'p na pai'r Areopago, mu ja'p nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi'm jumpa'ndat tu a'gada' gu tu' na jax jum buada' nai' ja'p. Mu ba' ji aichdhak jup tɨtda am: ―Jich aagi'ñdha' ap jich jaduuñ nar tu'p tu'm da' dhi' nap jax ja'k kia'pɨx ya ja'p tu a'gim.
44017020	Na gu' dhi' pui' nap jɨ'k jax tuch a'gi'ñ, aach cham pai' pui' tɇ kɇɇkɇt, pui' kuch ba' tɨix maachim na jax jir jum duukam.
44017021	Ba' dhi' dhi ja'tkam nam bhammɨ dɨr oi'ñka' Ateenas, gio gu jai' gui' nam mɨk dɨr bhai'p oi'ñka', gammɨjɨ ja ko'raarda' nam jix kaim ka' gu jaroi' no' pu'ñi jax tu a'ga, gio ba' moo na ja ko'raarda' ɨp nam mi' dhɨr pui'p ba tu a'gada' no'm pu'ñi cham pai' jaroi' pui' kɇɇkɇt.
44017022	Ba' gu Paablo dai nat jax jup kɨkbo mi' ja saagi'ñ gu mui' ja'tkam nam mi'p tu'ii' Areopago bhai' ji chu ja a'gi, jup ja tɨtda: ―Dho gu' ea na pim ka xiñ kaaya'ñ jaaduñ na pim ya' oi'dha' Ateenas. Dho gu' aañ pui' jam nɨi'ñ dho na pim giilhim tu' ka'm ja nɨidhat ja daan gu jam didios tuk.
44017023	Ba' maa'n kap na ñich tɨ tɨɨ mu ja'p na pim pai' jax chu daan ja bui gu jam didios tuk, bha tu ua'ñix bhaan gui' na pim mi' tu ja makgɨrxi'ñ, na ja'pnim kai'ch, “Gu Dios na cham jaroi' maat.” Ba' dhi' dhi Dios na pim pui' cham maat na pim daan, aañi' dho jam aagi'ñdha' nar jaroi' dha'.
44017024	’Dho dhi' dhor di' gui' nat jup duu dhi oi'ñga'n gio na jɨ'k tu' ya ja'p jix chu jai'ch bhaan, gui' nax dhaam jir gɇ'kam gio ya ja'p dhi oi'ñga'n, ba' cham tu' ya ja'p pai' kio bhaan gu chichiop gui' na ja'tkam jup jir ja duiñ.
44017025	Ni na cham tu' a'miram jum aa' na mu pai' palhbui'ñdha' gu jaroi' gu tu' no' jax jix dhuñiim, na gu' dhi' pɨx jir di' nach maak gu ii'mda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, pui' na jax gu jɨbɨɨlh nach kɨ'n iibhɨ, gio bɨɨx aixim na tu'ch a'm jum aa'.
44017026	’Gio dai maa'n ɨp gu maa'nkam nat bhaan dɨr ja mui'dhalh mui' gu ja'tkam nam sap ba' bɨɨx kap nai' oi'ñka' na jɨ'x jir oi'ñga'n, gio ba' nat ja daax nam jɨ'x pɨx juugɨt duduaka' gio nam pai' jax oi'ñka',
44017027	nam ba' ba gaaga' gu Dios na pa ja'k jup tu'ii', katti iam tu tattamidhat am pɨx tɨgia' am na pai'p tu'ii', sia ku gu' gu Dios tɨi cham tu' mɨk jup tu'ii' aach jich bui bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n.
44017028	Na gu' gu Dios buiñor jia nach ba' dudua, pui' ku ba'x bhaai' nach joiñ, gio nach ba' ya ja'p jix jai'ch dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, ja'p na mɨt jax ja'k tu ua'nak ɨp gui' nam tu u'uanda' gu ya' kam aapi'm jam bui, na ja'pnim kai'ch: “Aach jir maamra'n gu Dios.”
44017029	Ba' no'ch jir maamra'n gu Dios, cha'ch puich aa'nda' na panaas gu Dios jir pu chu'm na jax gu ja'ppɨx didios jup duiñxim gux u'uam bapaiñum totbikdam, piam gui' na pu chu'm na gux chua baiñum totbikdam, piam gu ja'ppɨx jodaip duiñxim jax ña tu'm jup jix dhuñiim ka' dɨɨlh gu maa'nkam.
44017030	Dho gu' bɨjɨk gu Dios cham tu'p jum buixdhat dho ja bui gu ja'tkam, sia kum bɨɨx aixim pɨx tu jimda' nam jax ɨlhii'ñdha' dɨɨlh, gu' xib pui' kai'ch ji nam sap bɨɨx kap mi' pui' ba jimia' gu ja'tkam na jax jix aa'.
44017031	Nat gu' ba tu dai jia gu Dios na pai' dhuuk ba ja aagi'ñdha' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam jax ja'k tu jimdat bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n. Ba' dhi' bhaankam pui' tu duñia' gui' nat jaroi' pu bɨjɨk dɨr bhaan tɨ tɨɨ, ba' jano' nat pai' dhuuk dua'ñdhak gio mi' dhɨr jup bamii' koi'ñga'n tɨr, bɨɨx ja mattuda gu ja'tkam.
44017032	Ba' na mɨt pu'ñi kai na bhaan tu a'ga gu koi'ñga'n nam giop duduar, bhai' bɨɨx aixim ji ai'chux jamɨt. Jai' ba' siamrip kai'ch am: ―Moo chi jumai tanoolh jach ba' giop jum kaaya' gu dhi' pui' nap jax tu a'ga.
44017033	Ba' gu Paablo mi' dhɨr pu jii ja bui gu ja'tkam.
44017034	Ba' jai' dhɨt siamri pɨx chu'p jum duu mɨt na mɨt ba oi gu Paablo. Maadɨt jir di' gui' nam mi'r gɇ'gɇrkam ka' Areopago na pui' tɨɨ' Doniisio, gio ba' maa'n ja'ppɨx ubii mui'p xi jimchu' Damaaris tɨɨgim, gio ba' jai' jɨ'kchi pup gu ja'tkam. Ba' dhi' bɨɨx tɨ jɨɨ'ñ jamɨt buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
44018001	Ba' gatuuk na bhammɨ dɨr xi oilhimɨk gu Paablo na pai'r gɇ' kiicham Ateenas tɨ tɨɨgim, bhai' dhɨr gammɨjɨ ja'k jup bhɨi na pai' jumaip jir gɇ' kiicham ka' na pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Koriinto.
44018002	Ba' na mi ja'p ka oirɨ gu Paablo, mi ja'p ba tɨɨ maa'n gu Israel kam maa'nkam na pui' tɨɨ' Akiila. Ba' dhi' dhi maa'nkam mu ja'k maaxir na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Ponto dɨbɨɨr, ba' kia'pɨx pa' mu ja'p ai mɨt na pai'r Koriinto bɨɨma'n gu bɨnga'n Prisiila. Bhammɨ dɨr ja'k jam jiim na pai'r Rooma, gui' na bhaan bipio' gu Italia dɨbɨɨr, na gu' gui' na bhai'r gɇ'kam ka' na pui' tɨɨ' Klaudio, bhai' dhɨr mai' ja aadi bɨɨx nam jɨ'k bha ja'p ka oi'ñkat gu Israel kam ja'tkam, pui' ku mɨt ba' mu ja'k ma oi'ñcham. Ba' gu Paablo ma ja paxiaram mu ja'p nam pai' oi'ñka'.
44018003	Ba' na gu' pu chu'm ka'm bhaan jup tu juanda' gu Paablo nam jax chu'm ka'm bhaan tu juanda' gui', nam jup tu buada' gu gɇ'gɇr jajannulh nam ja ga'rada' nam ja ba'kichdha' gu ja'tkam, ba' mi' pu bhai' ji chu jua gu Paablo ja bɨɨm.
44018004	Ba' na pai' dhuuk jum aajidha' na cham tum juanda', ba jimia' gu Paablo mu ja'p nam pai' tu daanda' gu Israel kam ja'tkam. Ba' gammɨjɨ ba ji chu ja a'gidha' na tɨix aa'nda' nam ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' gɨt buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gio gui' nam cham jir Israel kam ja'tkam ba pui' ɨp.
44018005	Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk mummɨ ba ai gu Siilas gio gu Timoteo bhammɨ dɨr ja'k na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Masedoonia dɨbɨɨr, cham tu' ka tu jua gu Paablo, dai nat pɨx bhaan ji bam na gammɨjɨ tu ja a'gi'ñdha' gu Israel kam ja'tkam gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook, na pui' ja tɨtdada' na gu Jesuus jir di' guch Xoi'kam gui' na saak Dios pu'ñi bhai' ba jootsa'.
44018006	Gu' ji na gu' gui' ni jɨ'x kum tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha', dai na mɨt bhai' pɨx ji bhaak, gio na jax aa' kum pu tɨtda na jax cham jir am. Ba' gu Paablo xixiixkak gu jajannulhi'ñ na sap ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na mɨt cham kɨɨgalh gu pui' na jax tɨi pup tu ja a'gidhimɨk, jup ja tɨtda ba': ―Dho gu' aapi'm dho ba' dɨɨlh bar jam kuiñcha ka' na jam tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios, aañ cham tu' kar jiñ kuiñcha ka', nañ gu' aañ ba jam aagi'ñ. Ba' xib dɨr ja'p ja'k dai gu jai' ja'tkam jañ pɨx ba tu ja a'gi'ñmɨra' nam cham jir Israel kam, na pim gu' aapi'm cham kaim.
44018007	Ba' daipu' nat pu'ñi xi ja tɨɨdak gu Paablo, mi' dhɨr pu jii na pai' tum daanda', mu ja'k ba' pɨx ji ai buiñor maa'n gu maa'nkam na pui' tɨɨ' Tiisio Juusto, gui' na gammɨjɨ tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios gio na mi' dhɨr ja'p amuub kioka' bɨɨpgan mi' nam pai' tu daanda' gu Israel kam ja'tkam.
44018008	Ba' maadɨt gui' nam bhai'r gɇ'gɇrkam ka' nam pai' tu daanda' gu Israel kam ja'tkam Krispo tɨɨgim, ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam ja bɨɨm gui' nam jɨ'k jir jum maap oi'dhagɨm ka', gio ba' jai' gui' nam jir mi' kam Koriinto. Pui' mui'p tɨ jɨɨ'ñ jamɨt buiñor guch Xoi'kam moo jano' na mɨt jax kai gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook gio na mɨt pum bopko ɨp.
44018009	Ba' maa'nnim tukaa' ba kai gu Paablo nat bhai' ba ñio guch Xoi'kam jix dhaam dɨr, jup tɨtda: ―Cha'p toodon ka' Paablo. Aap moo xi chu ja a'gi'ñchu'nda' gu ja'tkam gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook, xi oidhidha' ap moo,
44018010	nañ gu' aañ jum a'm tɨ nɨidhim jia. Ba' cham jɨ'xkat jaroi' jax jum dooda', sia ku tɨi xim mu'aam, ja'p dho ji nañ gu' aañ mui' ya' ka ja bia' gu ja'tkam ya' dhi gɇ' kiicham nam ka tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' aañ jiñ bui.
44018011	Ba' mi' pup oirɨ ɨp gu Paablo na pai'r Koriinto, maa'n oi'dha' dho moo daman taak mi' juruuñ, tu ja a'gi'ñdha' ba' gu ja'tkam gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios.
44018012	Gu' ji na gu' jano' na pai' dhuuk jup bar gɇ'kam ka' gu Galion bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x bhaan bipio' gu Akaaya dɨbɨɨr, maap xim daagɨk jamɨt gu Israel kam ja'tkam ba daa gu Paablo, pu bhɨɨk jamɨt dho gu' mu na pai' daaka' gu gɇ'kam.
44018013	Ba' mu ji aichdhak bhai' ji iattulh jamɨt, jup kai'ch am: ―Aach ya' bai'ñchu' dhi maa'nkam na ya ja'p oirɨt pui' ja tɨtda gu ja'tkam nam sap buiñor tu daanda' gu Dios na jax ja'k cham jir am nach pui' ja'k tu daanda' aach, na gu' maakam tu aagix aach jich bui.
44018014	Ba' kia'pɨx mui' bax chu a'gam kat gu Paablo, gu' ji nat gu' mui'p ba ñio gu Galion, jup ja tɨtda gu Israel kam ja'tkam: ―Aa gu' dhi' matgɨm na pim tu' a'gañ jaaduñ, gu' dhi' gu tu' ji no't jax dhuu no' giilhim jir jix buam jum duukam piam no't jaroi' mua nañ ba' dho gi cham jax ji chɨ'ji jam kaaya' gɨt ji na pim jax kai'chdha' aapi'm na pim jir Israel kam ja'tkam.
44018015	Gu' ji na gu' gu tu' ñi'ook kɨ'n pɨx nam jax tu a'ga gu ja'tkam, gio na jax ja'k pui' tu aagix aapi'm jam bui na pim tu jimda', gu' dhi' aañ cham maat ji, dɨɨlh japim mu pui' xi dhui na pim jax ɨlhii'ñdha'.
44018016	Ba' pui' xi ja tɨɨdak mi' dhɨr gammɨjɨ xi joot.
44018017	Ba' gui' palhɨɨp gama ja'k na mɨt ji bhɨi, bhai' ji o'bhai mɨt gu Soostenes gui' na mi'r gɇ'kam ka' nam pai' tu daanda', daagɨk jamɨt gɨbiimɨk. Ba' gu Galion cham tu'p jum buixi'ñ sia ku mi ja'p jax chum bua.
44018018	Ba' mui' tanoolh mi' kapup xi juruuñ gu Paablo na pai'r Koriinto. Gatuuk ba' mi' dhɨr ba jii ja bɨɨm gu Prisiila gio gu Akiila, dai na mɨt jax ja tabuimgi gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Pu jii mɨt ba' mu ja'k na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Siiria dɨbɨɨr, dai na mɨt jax bha tɨɨtɨs bhaan gu gɇ' kanuub. Ba' bɨɨpɨ' dɨr nat chakui bha tɨs gu Paablo bhaan gu gɇ' kanuub, soosnapan xi jiikak gu kuupa'n na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nat ba tu kuugalh gu pui' nat jax ja'k tu dai bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pu tu duñia'.
44018019	Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk bhammɨ dɨr ba ai Eepeso, bhai' pɨx juugɨt oi mɨt gu Paablo gu Prisiila gio gu Akiila. Ba' ma jii gu Paablo mu ja'p nam pai' tu daanda' gu Israel kam ja'tkam, ba' mu ji ɇɇk bhai' ji chu ja a'gi bɨɨx nam jɨ'k mi'm jumpa'nda'.
44018020	Ba' gui' tɨi soi' ba tɨtda am na sap jɨ'k tanoolh pup mi' ka xi juruuñdhai ja bui, gu' ji na gu' cham jup aa'.
44018021	Dai nat ba jii jup xi ja tɨɨdak: ―Gioñ ya ja'p jup ba jam paxiaraidha' jia no' moox aa'nda' gɨt gu Dios. Ba' daipu' xi ja tɨɨdak bhai' dhɨr pu jii Eepeso, dai nat jax bha tɨs bhaan gu gɇ' kanuub.
44018022	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk mummɨ ba ai Sesareeya, mi' dhɨr jup ma jii bhammɨ ja'k Jerusaleen nat ba ja paxiaram gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Ba' na bhammɨ xi oilhimɨk, bhai' dhɨr mu ja'k jup bhɨi na pai'r Antiokiiya.
44018023	Ba' mummɨ dɨr Antiokiiya jɨ'kchi jurni'ñ kɨ'n mi' dhɨr giop ma jii gu Paablo bhammɨ dɨr ja'p na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Galaasia dɨbɨɨr gio ba' gui' na bhaan jup bipio' gu Priijia dɨbɨɨr na ja guguuxdhim gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, na pui' ja tɨtdaim nam sap gammɨjɨ tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
44018024	Ba' jano' bhammɨ dɨr ja'k jup ba ai na pai'r Eepeso maa'n gu Israel kam maa'nkam na pui' tɨɨ' Apoolos na mu ja'k kiokat Alijandriiya. Ba' dhi' dhi maa'nkam joidham jix bhai' xi buada' na pai' dhuuk xi chu a'gada', gio nax bhai'x mat ka' mi' na mɨt pai' tu ua'nak gui' nam bɨjɨk bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios.
44018025	Na mɨt gu'x bhai' tu mamtuxdhak na jax ja'k mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora', pui' ku ba' joidham jix bhai' xi buada' na pai' dhuuk xi chu a'gada' na jax jir tu'm kam gu Jesuus, sia ku gu' daipu' kax mat ka' na jax jir jum duukam ka' na tu bopkonaimɨk gu Juan.
44018026	Ba' bhai' ji chu a'ga gu Apoolos gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook mu ja'p nam pai' tu daanda' gu Israel kam ja'tkam. Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk ba kai gu Prisiila gio gu Akiila, mu ja'p jamɨt dɨlhkob xi baidhak jix bhai' xi aagi'ñ na jax pɨk ja'k jir sɨlhkam gu pui' na jax tu a'ga bhaankam gu Dios.
44018027	Ba' na pai' dhuuk bhai' dhɨr bar jimdam gu Apoolos bhammɨ dɨr ja'k na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Akaaya, jix io'm xi guguux jamɨt gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gio ba' maa'n u'uan jamɨt mui'p xi maa na sap ja makia' gu bhammɨ dɨr kam gui' nam pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Ba' gu u'uan pui'm kai'chim nam sap pɨx jix bhai' tɨɨda' gu Apoolos na pai' dhuuk bhammɨ dɨr ba aaya' ja bui. Ba' nat pai' dhuuk bhammɨ dɨr ba ai na pai'r Akaaya, jix io'm bhai' jim guguux jamɨt gui' nat jɨ'k pu bɨɨpɨ' dɨr ja a'm ba tɨ tɨɨ gu Dios nam tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam,
44018028	na gu' gu Apoolos bhai' pui' xi ja tɨtda gu Israel kam ja'tkam ja kaixdhat bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na sap cham tu'r pui' nam jax ja'k ɨlhii'ñ. Ba' cham bhaai' nam jax tɨɨda', na gu' maaxik jir pui' na jax ja tɨtda. Ba' bhaan tu ja a'gi'ñdha' mi' na mɨt pai' tu ua'nak gui' nam bɨjɨk bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios na pui' ja tɨtdada' na gu Jesuus jir di' guch Xoi'kam gui' na saak Dios pu'ñi bha jootsa' gatuuk.
44019001	Ba' na bhammɨ dɨr ja'k ka oirɨ gu Apoolos na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Koriinto, gu Paablo bɨɨx jukgam ji bhɨɨk bhammɨ dɨr ja'k jup ba ai na pai'r Eepeso. Ba' bhai' ba ja tɨɨ jɨ'kchi gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam,
44019002	ba' ja'pni bhai' ba ja tɨkka: ―¿Aapi'm jam a'm jum tajaa aa gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' na pimɨt pai' dhuuk tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam? Ba' gui'p kai'ch am: ―Aach pu cham maat jia nar tu'p tu'm da' gu tu'x Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda', nach gu' cham pai' jaroi' pu chu'm kɇɇkɇt na pu'ñi ja'k tuch a'gi'ñ.
44019003	Ba' gu Paablo xi ja tɨkka na mɨt sap jax ja'k jum bopko, jup ja tɨtda: ―¿Gu' jax ja'k japimɨt gim bopkoñ jaaduñ? Ba' gui'p kai'ch am: ―Dho pui' na jax ja'k tu bopkonaimɨk gu Juan.
44019004	Ba'p ja tɨtda gu Paablo: ―Dho gu' gu Juan ja bopkonaimɨk dho gui' nam jɨ'k jix aa'nda' nam mi' pui' ba jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios, ku gu' pui' xi ja tɨtdat ji nam sap tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' buiñor gui' na jaroi' gatuuk bha jimda', na dhi' aagɨt jup kai'chdha' gu Jesuus.
44019005	Ba' gui' na mɨt pui' jɨ' ji kɇɇk gu Paablo na pu'ñi tu ja a'gi'ñ, giop mam bopko mɨt buiñor gu Gɇ'kam Jesuus.
44019006	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk bhai' xi ja daa gu Paablo, pu ja a'm jum tajaa gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda', ba' jai' ñiiñio'k kɨ'n bhai' ji chu a'ga mɨt. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai nam ba tu a'ga bhaankamu'n gu Dios, na gu' pui' ja'k ja jujurtu'n.
44019007	Ba' dhi' bɨɨx nat jɨ'k ja a'm jum tajaa gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda', aix am mambhɨɨx daman gook gu chichio'ñ.
44019008	Mi' ba' pu oirɨda' gu Paablo, baik masaa'n dho moo mi' juruuñ. Ba' gammɨjɨ ba ji jimia' mu ja'p nam pai' tu daanda' gu Israel kam ja'tkam na pai' dhuuk jum a'jɨda' na cham tum juanda', ba' gammɨjɨ ba ji chu ja a'gidha' gu ja'tkam cham ji choo'nnɨt na pui' ja tɨtdada' nam sap ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam na sap ba' pu'ñi ja'k gammɨjɨ ja a'm ba tɨ nɨidhidha' gu Dios.
44019009	Gu' ji na gu' jai' ni jɨ'x kum cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' gu dhi' pui', dai na mɨt bhai' pɨx giilhim ji ai'chux guch Xoi'kam gui' na ja'p ji buusan na jax gu xibkam gu boi, na jax aa' kum pu kai'ch na jax cham jir am ja kaixdhat gu mui' ja'tkam nam mi'p tu'ii'. Ba' gu Paablo mi' dhɨr ba jii ja bui xi ja baidhak dai gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Ba' maa'n kap xim taiñbuidhak gu ba'aak mi' na pai' tu ja mamtuxi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam maa'n gu maa'nkam na pui' tɨɨ' Tiraano, mi' ba' pu tu ja mamtuxi'ñdha' gammɨjɨ, dai na jɨ'x juugɨt pɨx gu tanoolh.
44019010	Gook oidha' juugɨt ba' tu ja mamtuxdhak, ba' bɨɨx jup kai mɨt gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Gɨ'kora' gui' nam bha ja'p oi'ñka' na jɨ'x juugɨt bhaan bipio' gu Aasia dɨbɨɨr, pui' na jax gu Israel kam ja'tkam gio gui' nam cham jir Israel kam.
44019011	Ba' joidham jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam jix bhai' xi chu buada' gu Paablo, na gu' palhbui'ñdha' gu Dios, na gu' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha'.
44019012	Sia ji gu' gu papñios ga'n gu Paablo gam jajannulhi'ñ nam ja u'tɨki'ñdhat ja a'm xi ja da'ñxi'ñ gux kako'kkam, pu duduar am. Ba' jai' na ja a'm jup tui'ñgɨt gu cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda', pu bɨɨx ja a'm dɨr bubua mɨt.
44019013	Ba' jai' jɨ'kchi gu Israel kam ja'tkam bha ja'p jup oipoda' am nam pui' mai'p ja jootosda' gu cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda' na ja a'm jup tui'ñgɨda' gu ja'tkam. Ba' tɨi ɨlhdhat am nam bhaankam gu Jesuus mai' xi ja jootsa' gɨt gu cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda' na bhaan jup tui'dhi' maa'n gu maa'nkam. Ba' bhai' ji ja ñiok jamɨt, jup ja tɨtda am: ―¡Aach ya' pu jam tɨtda bhaankamu'n gu Jesuus, gui' na jaroi' Paablo bhaankam tu a'ga, na pim mu ja'k bubuakia' bhai' dhɨr bhaan dhi maa'nkam!
44019014	Ba' dhi' pu'ñi ja'k ja tɨtdadat mai' ja jootosda' am gu cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda' gu xijum gook maamra'n maa'n gu Israel kam maa'nkam na pui' tɨɨ' Esseeba, gui' nar ja gɇ'kam tuk ka' gui' nam ja a'mkam tu daanda' gu ja'tkam mu ja'p na pai' tum daanda'.
44019015	Gu' ji na gu' maa'nnim nam mi' pui' ka tɨtdatu' gu maa'nkam na bhaan jup tui'dhi' gu cham kɨɨ' ii'mda', jotmoda' mui' ji ñio, jup kai'ch: ―Jix maat iñ dho gu Jesuus, gio gu Paablo pui'ñ jup jix maat nar jaroi' dha'. ¿Gu' aapi'm jir jaroo da' ku pim ba' bha ja'k puñ chɨtda?
44019016	Ba' daipu' xi chɨ'ɨɨk, pu mui' jimɨɨ gu maa'nkam na bhaan jup tui'dhi' gu cham kɨɨ' ii'mda'. Mi ja'p dho gu' nai' ji ja gɨbiimɨ na jɨ'x jix oo', pu bɨɨx dho gu' tu ja saasxichulh gu ja jajannulh. Pui'x dha'npak jamɨt pɨx ba jiboi'ññor giox kako'ktulhdhix kam.
44019017	Ba' na mɨt pui' ba tɨ kai gu Israel kam ja'tkam gui' nam mi oi'ñka' Eepeso, giilhim jix chooto'n jamɨt, gio gui' nam cham jir Israel kam ba pui' ɨp. Ba' mui' kap pɨx ja'x pui' tum a'gada' bhaankam gu Gɇ'kam Jesuus.
44019018	Ba' jai' mui' gu ja'tkam gui' na mɨt jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam mi aajidhat ja kaichdhat gu ja'tkam pui' ba tɨtdada' am gu Paablo nam sap cham ka aa' nam pui' ja'k tu jimda' nam jix buam tu buimɨk bɨɨpɨ' dɨr.
44019019	Ba' jai' mui' gui' na mɨt bam mamtuxdhak gu jiboiñ mi ja aichdhak ba ja mɨi'ñ jamɨt gu ja u'uan ja nɨi'ñchudat gu mui' ja'tkam, gui' na mɨt bhaan mi' ba tum mamtuxdhak gu jiboiñ. Ba' nam xi chu ja'kɨlhi'ñ nat jɨ'k ka'm mi' ba tɨ mɨi gu u'uan, jup jum duu gook oo'm daman mambhɨɨx miil gu bapaiñum tuumiñ jix chooto totbikdam.
44019020	Ba' dhi' pu'ñi mui' kap pɨx ja'x pui' tum a'gada' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Gɨ'kora', gio ba' na bɨɨx aixim jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam jup tum buada' na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nar gɇ'kam.
44019021	Ba' gatuuk pui' ba kai'ch gu Paablo na sap giop paxiarmɨra' bhammɨ dɨr ja'p na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Masedoonia dɨbɨɨr, bhai' dhɨr sap ba' mu ja'k jup bhɨɨya' na pai' bhaan jup bipio' gu Akaaya dɨbɨɨr. Mi' dhɨr sap ba' bhammɨ ja'k jup bhɨɨya' Jerusaleen, gio ba' moop kai'ch ɨp na sap bhammɨ na xi ɇɇji Jerusaleen bhai' dhɨr Rooma ja'k jup bhɨɨya'.
44019022	Ba' jai' bɨɨpɨ' gook mui' ba pup xi ja joot gui' nam oi'ñchu'nda' nam palhbuidhidha' tu' na pɨx kɨ'n, nam sap bɨɨpɨ' bhammɨ dɨr ja'p ba' oipoda' na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Masedoonia dɨbɨɨr. Ba' dhi' nat jaroi' mu ja joot, maa'n jir Timoteo, maa'n ba'r Erasto ɨp. Dɨɨlh ba' bhammɨ dɨr pup oirɨ gu Paablo na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Aasia dɨbɨɨr, jɨ'kchi tanoolh bhai' xi juruuñ nat ba' moo ba jii.
44019023	Ba' jano' bhai'p ji bhaak jamɨt gu ja'tkam gui' nam bhai' oi'ñka' Eepeso na mɨt bhaan ji chu a'gak guch Xoi'kam,
44019024	nat gu' maakam ja iatgi maa'n gu maa'nkam na pui' tɨɨ' Demetrio. Na gu' dhi' dhi maa'nkam jup tu buada' gu ɨ'lhich didios jix a'bhar totbikdam pu chuutu'm na jax gu gɇ' ubii dios tugi'ñ na pui' tɨɨ' Artemiisa, gio nam pu'ñi chichiop kɨr jup tuuttuda' gu ɨ'lhich didios. Ba' gui' nam jɨ'k palhbui'ñdha' nam jup tu buada', jix dha'ram ja namki'ñdha'.
44019025	Ba' maa'nnim bɨɨx dhi' jɨ' nam jɨ'k palhbui'ñdha', gio gu jai' nam pu chu'm ka'm jup tu juanda', ba ja bai nam mi'p tui'ka' buiñor. Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk bɨɨx mi' ba ai, jup ja tɨtda: ―Aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ, na pim jax bax maat bo jia na joidham jir am dhi' nach tu' bhaan tu juan.
44019026	Gu' ji na gu' buam pɨx ba tum bua na pim jax ba tɨ nɨi'ñ, gio na buam pɨx ba tum kai'ch na pim jax ba tɇ kɇɇ, na pui' kai'ch gui' na saak jir Paablo nam sap cham tu'r didios gui' nam pu'ñi ja'tkam jup ja bua gu didios. Ba' mui' ja'tkam ba ja iatgi pu'ñi ji ja tɨtdaimɨk, gio gu' bɨɨx kap ɨp na jɨ'x bhaan bipio' gu Aasia dɨbɨɨr, cham tu' dai ya' na pai'r Eepeso.
44019027	Ba' dhi' pui' aañ jiñ bui cham jir am, nam gu' cham ka ja nɨnɨi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam dhi' nach tu' bhaan tu juan, gio gu chiop mi' na pai' kɨɨk guch ñaan Artemiisa, pui' dho cham jup ka nɨnɨi'ñdha' am, nam gu' cham gɇ'kam ka ɨlhii'ñdha'. Ba' cham ya' ka tu daanda' am gui' nam ya' buiñor tu daan bɨɨx kap dɨr na jɨ'x juugɨt bhaan bipio' gu Aasia dɨbɨɨr, gio ba' nai' ja'p bɨɨx kap dɨr na jɨ'x jir oi'ñga'n.
44019028	Ba' na mɨt pu'ñi kai gui' na mi' pui' ja tɨtda, giilhim bhaakuk pɨx jiiñak gɨi mɨt, jup kai'ch am: ―¡Gu' dhi'r gɇ'kam ji dhich ñaan Artemiisa nar jich dios tuk bɨɨx nach jɨ'k jir ya' kam dhi Eepeso!
44019029	Ba' mi' cham bhai' nam jax kam duñia' gu ja'tkam nam jɨ'k mi oi'ñka' na jɨ'x jir gɇ' kiicham, nam gu' cham ka maat na jax pɨk ja'k jir sɨlhkam. Ba' ba daa mɨt gu Gaayo gio gu Aristaarko, gui' nam maap jiim gu Paablo, nam jir bhammɨ dɨr ja'k kam na bhaan bipio' gu Masedoonia dɨbɨɨr. Ja tɨɨbiopak jamɨt gamai' pɨx tu' ja dooda na mɨt ba ja baidhak mu ja'k na pai' mi' pu tum a'gada'.
44019030	Ba' gu Paablo mui' tɨir jimdam nax chu ja a'gi'ñmɨram gu ja'tkam gui' nam jix bhaak, gu' ji nam gu' cham aa' gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
44019031	Gio ba' jai' nam ampɨk mi'p ka oipo gu bhabhai' kai'chdham tugi'ñ gu Paablo mui'p ba tu joot jamɨt nam sap pu tɨɨda' na cham mu ja'k jimda'. Ba' dhi' bhammɨ dɨr ja'k jiim am ja bui gui' nam bɨɨx kap jir gɇ'gɇrkam ka' na jɨ'x bhaan bipio' gu Aasia dɨbɨɨr.
44019032	Ba' gu ja'tkam pɨx jiiñak bɨɨt am mi' ji jumpaxich na pai' tum a'gada'. Jai' maakam jup kai'ch am gio jai' maakam ɨp, nam gu' jai' mui' cham maat na mɨt jax kai'ñkam mi' jim jumpadak giilhim ba kai'ch gui' nam mi'x bhaak.
44019033	Ba' jai' dhɨt gui' nam jix maat na jax jir jum duukam, ba aagi'ñ am gu Alijaanru. Ba' gu Israel kam ja'tkam mui' ji ñu'yasa mɨt mu ja'k nam pai'x bhaak gu ja'tkam, mi ja'p jamɨt ba' xi kɨi bɨɨpɨ' dɨr ja'k na sap ja a'mkam nokia' nam cham ja juanda'. Ba' gu Alijaanru nobii'ñ kɨ'n ja'p xi ja duiñ gui' nam mi' giilhim jix bhaak nam sap alhio ka xi kaaya' na jax tu ja a'gidha'.
44019034	Gu' ji na gu' na mɨt pai' dhuuk ba maat na pui'p jir Israel kam maa'nkam, gio pɨx jiiñak jup gɨi mɨt. Mɨɨkim pa' moo nam mi' pu jiiñak, jup kai'ch am: ―¡Gu' dhi'r gɇ'kam ji dhich ñaan Artemiisa nar jich dios tuk bɨɨx nach jɨ'k jir ya' kam dhi Eepeso!
44019035	Ba' gu gɇ'kam gui' na tu u'uanda' gu mi' dhi gɇ' kiicham siamri dakoo ma ja soo'mchulh nam cham ñiokda' gui' nam mi' giilhim jix bhaak, jup ja tɨtda ba': ―Jiñ jaaduñ na pim jir ya' kam dhi Eepeso, jax dhui nam moo bɨɨx jix maat gu ja'tkam nach aach ya' umua'ñdhix nach jɨ'k jir ya' kam dhi gɇ' kiicham nach nuuka'nda' dhi chiop mi' na pai' kɨɨk guch ñaan Artemiisa, na dhi'r di' gu jodaip duiñxim nat jix dhaam dɨr ya gɨi.
44019036	Ba' cham jɨ'xkat jaroi' jax dhooda', na gu'x bhai' nuukdhix. Ba' aañ pu jam tɨtda na pim cham ñiokda', cha'pim ja'p pɨx pu tu buada' na pim jax ɨlhii'ñdha'.
44019037	Na gu' dhi ja'tkam na pimɨt ya' ja aich, cham pai' buam tu bua am jia mi' nach pai' tu chiopi', ni kum cham pai' giilhim jup a'ga guch dios tuk na jax cham jir am.
44019038	No' gu' dhi Demetrio tu'x a'gam gu jaroi' buiñor gio dhi jai' nam maap tu juan, dho mi'ñi dho daraa am gu gɇ'gɇrkam gui' nam jaroi' tɨ sɨlhka'n, nam ja bui pui' xi chɨ'ya' gu tu' nam pui' kɨ'n jix bhaak, na ba'x maatɨ' ka' na jaroi' sɨlhkam tu a'gada'.
44019039	Piam no'm gu' maakam jup jix chu a'gam, dhox bhai' pɨx jam dhop xi chu a'gai jia pai' na sɨlhkam tu'm a'gada', cham tu' pai' na ja'p pɨx tum a'ga.
44019040	Na gu' dhi' pui' na pim jax ja'k tu bua gu xib, dhi' cham jir am ji, na gu' cham bhaai'n ka' nach jax ja tɨɨda' gux io'm gɇ'gɇrkam no' mɨt jax dhuuk maatɨk bhai' jich chɨkka gu dhi' pui' na pim jax kai'ñkam pui' tu bua. Dho gu' pui' dhoch chɨɨda' am na aach jir jich kuiñcha ka' na chich dɨɨlh jix buam ji chu doodak gu tu' na cham jir am.
44019041	Ba' daipu' xi ja tɨɨdak ba ja joot nam ba jimia' mi' dhɨr.
44020001	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk ampɨx ji chu juu nam tɨi pup mi' xix bhaakut gu ja'tkam, ba ja bai gu Paablo gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Xi ja guguuxdhak ba', xi ja ñio'kdhak ba jii bhammɨ dɨr ja'k na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Masedoonia dɨbɨɨr.
44020002	Ba' bɨɨx kap ai na jɨ'k kap bhaan bipio' gu Masedoonia dɨbɨɨr, ja guguuxdhidha' soi' ja tɨtdaidhat gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Gatuuk ba' bhai' dhɨr mu ja'k jup bhɨi na pai'r Greesia.
44020003	Baik masaa'n ba' mu ja'k jup juruuñ, mi' dhɨr ba'p bar jimdam kat bhammɨ dɨr ja'k na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Siiria dɨbɨɨr. Alhi'ch pɨx ba aagɨt na moo bhai' ba tɨsdia' gɨt bhaan gu gɇ' kanuub, gu' ji nat gu' pui'p ba tɨ kai nam o'bhagi'ñ gu Israel kam ja'tkam gu bhammɨ dɨr kam. Ba' pui' ja'k gɨɨsɨk gio pui' gamai' bhɨi bɨɨx dɨbɨɨr ta'm, gio bhai'p buusnichu' na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Masedoonia dɨbɨɨr.
44020004	Ba' jai'p ma oi mɨt gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, moo gu Soopatir gu Bereeya kam maraa'n gu Piiro, gio ba' gu Aristaarko ɨp, gio ba' moo gu Seguundo ɨp gu Tesaloonika kam, gio ba' gu Gaayo ɨp gu Derbe kam, gio ba' moo gu Timoteo ɨp. Gio ba' moo gu Tiikiko ɨp, gio ba' moo gu Troopimo ɨp, ba' dhi gook jir bhammɨ dɨr ja'k kam am na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Aasia dɨbɨɨr.
44020005	Ba' bɨɨx dhi' jɨ' dhich jaaduñ bɨɨpɨ' gamai' xi jii mɨt, bhammɨ dɨr jam ba' bach ñɨɨra na pai'r Troas.
44020006	Ba' aach gatuuk nat pai' dhuuk xi buus gu piasta jano' na pai' dhuuk jum kua'da' gu paan gakdhi'ñchix kam na cham bɨnka' gui' na kɨ'n jappukar, mi' dhɨr gamai'p ji jii chich na pai'r Piliipos bhaan gu gɇ' kanuub. Bhammɨ dɨr jachich ba' ba ai jix chamaam tanoolh kɨ'n nam pai' oipo gu jai' na mɨt bɨɨpɨ' mu jii. Bhai' chich ba' juruuñ xijum gook tanoolh.
44020007	Ba' nat kia'pɨx mui' ba jim bhɨi gu simaan, maap bach jumaap jachich nach ba tu jugia' gu paan ta'tak xich jaixdhai, ba' bhai' ji chu ja a'gi gu Paablo gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Ba' na gu' buimgidhak bar jimdam ka', mui' pu xi chu ja a'gi'ñchu' ɨraab tukaa' juugɨt.
44020008	Ba' mi' ba'k chɨr nach pai'p tu'ii', jir tɇ'kob, gio na mui' mɨmɨichdhix gui' na kɨ'n jix chu maax.
44020009	Ba' moo maa'n bha ja'p jup daa gu biapma' na pai' dhɨr mu ja'p jix chu maax mi' dhɨr ba'k chɨr, Eutiko tɨɨgim. Ba' bhai' pui' ma koi na jax ka daa, na gu' pɨx cham jum tɨɨmuim na tu a'ga gu Paablo. Ba' ja'xpɨx bhai' dhɨr ma ji gɨi, mɨjɨmmɨ ji dhuu bɨpta'n. Ba' na mɨt tɨɨtmigɨk tɨi xi bamii', attiiro muukix, pu cham jɨ'x joiñ.
44020010	Ba' gu Paablo tɨmnɨk daam dɨr xi bo'ɨɨk mi' xi koom gu biapma', jup ja tɨtda ba' gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam: ―Cha'pim totdon ka'. Dua ji matgɨm dhi biapma'.
44020011	Mi' dhɨr ba' gio mui'p ji chɨs gu Paablo bhammɨ ja'k daam dɨr, gio aach bɨɨx. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai nat ta'tak bach jaix gu paan, ma tu juu chich dho gu'. Gatuuk ba' gio bhai'p ji chu a'ga bɨɨx chukaa', nai' pu ji xia'. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai nat ba jii.
44020012	Gio gu biapma' jix kɨɨ' mi' dhɨr jup ba baidhak jamɨt. Ba' giilhim joidham jix bhai'm taat am na mɨt pui' jɨ' tɨɨ nat cham muu gu biapma', sia kut tɇ'kob dɨr ji gɨi.
44020013	Ba' aach bɨɨpɨ' gamai' xi jii bhaan gu gɇ' kanuub, mɨjɨ dɨr ja'p bɨɨx gakoolh jachich bhɨi bɨɨx suudai' dhaam. Bhammɨ dɨr jachich ba' ba ai na pai' jumaip jir gɇ' kiicham ka' ju'ñdharan gu gɇ' suudai' na pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Aaso. Dai gu Paablo ba' cham jich oi, na gu' pui'x aa' na sɨlh bhɨɨya' bɨɨx dɨbɨɨr ta'm.
44020014	Ba' na chich pai' dhuuk maap bach ñaanam mi' na pai'r Aaso, mi' dhɨr maap ba jii chich, dai na chich jax bha tɨɨtɨs bhaan gu gɇ' kanuub, gamai' pu bhɨi chich bɨɨx suudai' dhaam. Bhammɨ dɨr jachich ba' ba ai na pai' ɨlhi'ch jir dɨbɨɨr na pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Mitileene.
44020015	Mi' dhɨr ba' gio gamai'p ji jii chich gu bɨɨx suudai' dhaam bhaan gu gɇ' kanuub. Na bar buimgidhak nammɨ chich ba bubua amuub mi' dhɨr ja'p na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Kiiyo. Gu jumai buimgidhak ba' nammɨp ba ai chich na pai' jumai ɨlhi'ch jup jir dɨbɨɨr na pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Saamos. Mi' dhɨr ba' na chich gio gamai'p ji jii, bhammɨ dɨr ja'k jup ba ai chich na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Mileeto.
44020016	Ba' dhi' pu'ñi ja'k jich dhuu chich, na gu' cham aa' na mɨk bha ja'p oilhidha' gu Paablo na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Aasia dɨbɨɨr. Pui' ba' cham xi paxiarmɨrak mu Eepeso ja bui gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, na gu' jootom jix aimtu' bhammɨ Jerusaleen, na gu' bhammɨ ja'k jix buusaidham gu piasta bhaan Pentekostees ta'm.
44020017	Ba' nach pui bhammɨ dɨr ka oipo Mileeto, ba tu ja joochxi gu Paablo gui' nam ja guguuxi'ñdha' gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam gu Eepeso kam.
44020018	Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk mi' ba ai, bhai' ji chu ja a'gi, jup ja tɨtda: ―Dho gu' na pim jax bax maat jiañ jaaduñ na ñich jax ja'k tu jii aapi'm jam bui, sia gu pu jano' dɨr na ñich pai' dhuuk ya ja'p ai na pai' bhaan bipio' dhi Aasia dɨbɨɨr,
44020019	nañ gammɨjɨ tu jam a'gi'ñdha' bo bhaankam gu Dios soi'ñ ɨlhdhat bɨɨx jiñ jur kɨ'n, gam nañ xi suakɨt na mɨt gu' giilhim bhai' ji bhaak jiñ bui gu Israel kam ja'tkam, nam tɨi ɨlhdhat nam puñ dhooda' gɨt nam jax tɨi ɨlhdhat.
44020020	Ku gu' cham tu' ji na ñich moo dhi' kɨ'n cham jup ka tu jam a'gidham, gu' ja'pji nañ mui' xi chu jam a'gi'ñchu' ji mi ja'p maaxik ja kaixdhat gu ja'tkam, gio mu ja'p jam kiikia'am ba pui' ɨp, gu pui' na pim jax ja'k jum guguuxdhai mi' pui' jiimda' na ba'x bhai' tu jam jimda' gammɨjɨ.
44020021	Pui' na jax gu Israel kam ja'tkam, sia gui' nam cham jir Israel kam jañ pui' ja tɨtdada' nam mi' pui' ba jimia' na jax jix aa' gu Dios, gio nam ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam gui' nar Gɇ'kam na Jesuus tɨɨ'.
44020022	Ba' gu xib, Jerusaleen ja'k bhɨichu' iñ, na gu' pui' ja'k jiñ jurtu'n gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda'. Dai ji nañ gu' cham maat na tu'ñ dhuñia' bhammɨ,
44020023	na gu' nañ jɨ'k kap oilhidha' gu gɇ'gɇr kikcham, pui' ja'k jiñ jurtudidha' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' na sap kam aajim nam pai' dhuuk jiñ dhaagɨi kañ kuupa' gio nam bɨɨx aixim jiñ chulhiiñchuda'.
44020024	Ku gu' dhi' cham jax bua ji sia mɨt puñ dhooda, gu' aañ nañ jix aa' ji nañ jix bhai'ñ chaatɨt mi' pui' duiñchu'nda' nañ jɨ'x juugɨt duaka' gu pui' nat jax ja'k kai'ñkam jiñ a'm tɨ tɨɨ guch Xoi'kam, nañ pu'ñi nai' tu a'gidha' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na jax joidham jix chu joi'gɨ'n.
44020025	’Ba' pu xib dɨr bax maat iñ na cham jaroi' maadɨt kañ chɨgia' aapi'm na ñich jɨ'k ba tu jam a'gi gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga na jax ja'k jir gɇ'kam gu Dios.
44020026	Ba' aañ cham tu' kar jiñ kuiñcha ka' sia kut jaroi' cham mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa' gu Dios,
44020027	na ñich gu' aañ bɨɨx pui' ba tu jam a'gi na jax ja'k jix aa' na pim tui'ñgɨt mi' pui' jiimda', ni jɨ'x kuñ cham iam xix ɨxchu.
44020028	Ba' xib dɨr ja'p ja'k jam a'm jum aa' na pim mi' pui' xi jiimdat nañ jax ba tu jam a'gi'ñ na pim jix bhai' xi ja guguuxdhat gui' nam pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, nat gu' pu kai'ñkam jam a'm bam tajaa jia gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda'. Ba' ja'p ji buusanda' pim na jax gu bipia'dam, na pim gu' ja guguuxi'ñdha' gui' na pim maap tu daan buiñor gu Dios nam ba' cham maakam pɨx ba jujurtɨka', nat gu' ba ja saba'lh gu ɨ'ra'n kɨ'n guch Xoi'kam nat jum jaax.
44020029	Ba' aañ pu ba jam aagi'ñ nam gatuuk ka jai'chdhɨlhia' gui' nam ja'p ji bubuakia' na jax gu sɨsɨɨ' gux bhaa'mnagɨm nam jix ja jɨ'dɨlhkadam ka' gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
44020030	Sia dho aapi'm na pim jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam jam bui dhɨr jai'chdhɨlhia' am gui' nam bhai' ji ja iatgidha' gu jai' nam pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha', nam jax dhuix aa'nda' pɨx nam jɨ'k jup xi ja kaichgɨda'.
44020031	Moo pim siamri xi chɨ'ñchukat na ñich jax ja'k jam aa'ñdhak bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n jano' na ñich pai' dhuuk baik oidha' jam bui juruuñdhak nañ tu jam a'gidhimɨk nabap tanoolh gio nabap tukaa', siañ jax xi suakɨt.
44020032	’Ba' gu Dios pɨx jam a'm tɨ nɨi'ñdha'ñ jaaduñ na pim moo mi' pui' xi jiimdat na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga na jax ja'k joidham jix chu joi'gɨ'n. Na gu' gui'x ai'chu'n jia na pu tu duñia' na mui' xi jam kaapakada' gu jam i'ii'mda' bhaan na pim ba' gammɨjɨ mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa', na ba' pui'p jam makia' gui' nat tu' ba ja iimchuda gui' nat jɨ'k ja a'm ba tɨ tɨɨ.
44020033	Ba' ja'pniñ ja'k jup xi jam tɨɨdam jiñ jaaduñ na ñich cham jaroi' taanɨk gu tu' nañ a'm jum aa', nich chu' tuumiñ ni gu jajannulh nañ ja tɨ'ya'.
44020034	Gu' ja'pji na ñich dɨɨlh jiñ ñoonob kɨ'n tu juanak tu saba'lh gu tu' nañ a'm jum aagaidha', na pim jax bax maat, sia gui' nam jɨ'k jiñ bɨɨm jiimda' ba pui' ɨp.
44020035	Gio aapi'm jañ bɨɨx pui'p tu jam a'gi'ñdha' na pim pu'ñi tu juanda' gio na pim siamri xi ja maakidhat gui' nam cham bia'ka' nam tu' kɨ'n tu saba'da', pui' pim xim aagɨt nat pɨn jax tɨ'ɨɨk gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam na saak jix io'm jix abhaaruix no'ñ pu'ñi tu' nañ pɨx ja maakim gu ja'tkam, cham pui' na jax no'm ja'kbui' kat tuñ maak.
44020036	Ba' daipu' nat pu'ñi xi ja tɨɨdak gu Paablo, mi ja'p o'lhia'n kɨ'n xi kɨkbok ma tu daanɨ ja bɨɨm gui' nam jɨ'k mi' pu'ñi tu ja a'gi'ñ.
44020037	Mi' dhɨr ba' bɨɨx mui' ji ai mɨt gu Paablo xi suañidhat gio na mɨt xi koomkɨk,
44020038	na mɨt gu'x buam jim ɨlh na pui' ja tɨtda nam cham pai' ka tɨgia'. Mi' dhɨr ba' na chich pai' dhuuk ba jii, jai' bɨɨx dappaam jup mach oi mɨt mummɨ juugɨt nam pai' gu'ngukda' gu gɇ'gɇr kaknub.
44021001	Ba' na chich jax bha tɨɨtɨs bhaan gu gɇ' kanuub na mi ja'p sɇ' suudai' jugii'ñ, pu sɨlh bhɨi chich bhammɨ dɨr ja'k na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Kos. Kabuimuk ba' bhai' dhɨr mu ja'k jup bhɨi chich na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Roodas, mi' dhɨr ba' mu ja'k jup bhɨi chich na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Paatara.
44021002	Ba' mi' Paatara ba tɨɨ chich na maa'n kia'pɨx mi' dhɨr bar jimdam gu gɇ' kanuub na mi ja'p sɇ' suudai' jugii'ñ na sɨlh jim bhammɨ dɨr ja'k na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Piniisia dɨbɨɨr, ba' aach bhaan bhai' pu xi chɨɨtɨs.
44021003	Ba' nammɨ pai' nach ba jiim gu suudai' ɨraab, ba tɨɨ chich na mu ja'p pɨx alhi'ch jir dɨbɨɨr na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Chipre. Ba' aach ja'p gai dhɨr xi bhɨɨk, maa'n nach jiimchu' bhammɨ dɨr ja'k na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Siiria dɨbɨɨr. Ba' sɨlh mu ja'k bhɨichu' ich na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Tiiro, nam gu' mu ja'k tɨ tɨɨpxidha' gu tu' nam bha tu bhiiñor bhaan gu gɇ' kanuub.
44021004	Ba' na chich pai' dhuuk mi' ba ai, ba ja tɨɨ chich gui' nam pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, mi' chich ba' ja bui xi juruuñdhak xijum gook tanoolh. Ba' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' pui' ja'k ba ja jujurtuda nam pu tɨɨda' gu Paablo na cham mu ja'k jimda' bhammɨ Jerusaleen.
44021005	Ba' gatuuk na chich pai' dhuuk mi' dhɨr giop ba jii gu xijum gook jurni'ñ kɨ'n, jai' jɨ'x juugɨt jup mach oi mɨt guch jaaduñ bɨɨx sia dappaam gu ja bɨpna' gio gu ja maamar mi' juugɨt na pai'r ju'ñdharan gu gɇ' suudai', mi' na pai' juugɨt jir gɇ' kiicham ka'. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai na chich mi ja'p jich o'lhia kɨ'n xi gu'kɨk ma tu daanɨ.
44021006	Mi' dhɨr ba' pu jii chich, dai na chich jax xi ja ñio'kdhak guch jaaduñ na chich jax bha tɨɨtɨs bhaan gu gɇ' kanuub na mi ja'p sɇ' suudai' jugii'ñ. Gui' ba' mi' dhɨr ja'k jup ba suulh jamɨt mu ja'k ja kiikia'am.
44021007	Ba' mi' jɨ' dɨr na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Tiiro mu ja'k jup bhɨi chich sɨlh na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Tolimaida. Ba' na chich pai' dhuuk mi' ba ai, mi'p ba ja tɨɨ chich ɨp jai' gui' nam pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, ba' mi'p xi juruuñdhak jachich ja bui maa'n tanoolh.
44021008	Kabuimuk ba' mi' dhɨr giop ba jii chich, mu ja'k jachich jup bhɨi na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Sesareeya. Ba' na chich pai' dhuuk mummɨ ba ai, ma jii chich mu ja'k na pai' kioka' gu Piliip gui' na tu a'gada' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, na maadɨt jir di' gu xijum gook gui' nam ja palhbui'ñdha' gu noonbi'ñ guch Xoi'kam. Ba' mi' buiñor xi chɨbiapuk jachich.
44021009	Ba' dhi' jɨ' na pui' tɨɨ' Piliip, tu maamar ka' maakob gu u'uub dɨ'dɨlhdhɨm, ba' dhi' pui'p tu a'gada' am bhaankamu'n gu Dios.
44021010	Ba' jɨ'kchi jurni'ñ kɨ'n maa'n mummɨp ba ji buus gui' na bhaankam jup tu a'gada' gu Dios na pui' tɨɨ' Agaabo, na bhammɨ dɨr ja'k jim na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Judea dɨbɨɨr.
44021011	Ba' na jax jim, bhai' ji dhaa gu bhiisparu'n gu Paablo, ba' kɨ'n xi buuprak gu dɨɨlh noonbi'ñ gio gu tootna'n jup kai'ch ba': ―Gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' pui' ja'k jiñ jurtuda nam sap gu Israel kam ja'tkam pu'ñi buuplhia' bhammɨ Jerusaleen gui' na jaroi'r bhiisparu'n dhi'ñi. Mi' dhɨr jam sap ba' ja chiñia' nam kuupa' gu jai' ja'tkam nam cham jir Israel kam ka'.
44021012	Ba' aach na chich pu'ñi kai, bhai' tɨi soi' ji chɨɨ'n gu Paablo na gɨt cham mu ja'k jimda' bhammɨ Jerusaleen, gio gu jai'ch jaaduñ gu mi' kam Sesareeya pui' tɨi soi'p tɨtda am.
44021013	Gu' ji na gu' cham jich jɨɨgi'ñ gu Paablo, dai nat jup xich chɨɨdak pɨx: ―¿Jax ku pim ba' moo ja'p dhi' kɨ'n jup ba suan? Aañ ba' jai' pui'x buam jup ba tu tatda', gu' aañ matgɨm cham jax jiñ aa' ji sia ku mɨt jiñ buupra bhammɨ Jerusaleen. Ku gu' cham tu' ji dai no' mɨt jiñ buupra nañ ba' cham jax jiñ aa', gu' ja'pji sia ji no' mɨt jiñ mua nañ cham jax jiñ aa', pɨx ji no' mɨt dhɨ' kɨ'n jiñ bhaamkidhak jiñ mua nañ mi' pui' duiñchu' na jax jix aa' gui' nar Gɇ'kam na Jesuus tɨɨ'.
44021014	Ba' nat gu' cham jich kai nach jax tɨi pup tɨtdaimɨk, aach ba'p kai'ch: ―Dho bak gu' pui' tu tui'ka' ku gi na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora'.
44021015	Ba' gatuuk dai na chich jax jix kɨɨ'ch dhuu, pu jii chich bhammɨ ja'k Jerusaleen.
44021016	Ba' jai' dhɨt jup mach oi mɨt guch jaaduñ gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Ba' nammɨ nat ba jur, mach baidhak jamɨt nach tɨbiappu' mu ja'p na pai' kioka' maa'n guch jaduuñ na pui' tɨɨ' Nasoon. Ba' dhi' bɨjɨk dɨr ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, jir mu ja'k kam ka' na pai' alhi'ch jir dɨbɨɨr na pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Chipre.
44021017	Ba' na chich pai' dhuuk bhammɨ ba ai Jerusaleen, joidham jix bhai'm ɨlh jamɨt guch jaaduñ gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
44021018	Ba' buimgidhak na chich ba paxiaram mu ja'p na pai' kioka' gu Santiago, jai'p mach oi gu Paablo. Ba' ampɨk bɨɨx mi'p daraa am gui' nam ja guguuxi'ñdha' gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
44021019	Ba' gu Paablo xi ja ñio'kdhak ba ja aagi'ñ nat jax ja'k palhbui gu Dios nat jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam jup tu duu ja bui gui' nam cham jir Israel kam ja'tkam.
44021020	Ba' na mɨt pui' jɨ' kai, joidham jix bhai'm ɨlhdhak ma tu daanɨ mɨt buiñor gu Dios. Mi' dhɨr ba' moop tɨtda am gu Paablo: ―Dho gu'ch jaduuñ, nap jax bax maat jia na mɨt mui' ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam gui' nam jir ya' kam dhi Israel, ba' nam gu' pui' ɨlhii'ñ na pui ja a'm jum aa' nam mi' pui' jiimda' gu pui' nat jax ja'k tu ua'nak gu Moisees na tu aagix ka'.
44021021	Gu' ji nam gu' ya' pui' ja tɨtda na sap gui' nam jir ya' kam nam mu ja'p oi'dha' jai' kap na pai' jax cham jir Israel, nap sap aap pui' ja tɨtdaidha' mu ja'p ji oilhidhat na cham kam aa' nam mi' pui' jiimda' gu pui' nat jax ja'k tu ua'nak gu Moisees na tu aagix ka', nam sap cham ka ja matgilhchudidha' gu ja maamar na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nam jir Israel kam ka'.
44021022	¿Jax jap ba' xi ɨlhii'ñ gu dhi' pui'ch jaduuñ? Ja'p dho ji nam gu' pui' ba tɨ kaaya' gu ja'tkam na pich ya' ba ai.
44021023	No' pich gi ja'pni ja'k tu duu nam kapbhai' ya' jai'ch maakob guch jaaduñ na mɨt ba tu dai buiñor gu Dios nam tu makgɨrxidha'.
44021024	Dhi'p xi ja baidhai mu jimia' mu gɇ' chiop nap ba' ja bɨɨm mi' pui' xi chu kuugalhdha' na mɨt jax ja'k ba tu dai buiñor gu Dios. Ba' jano' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' na pim pu'ñi ba tu kuugalhdha', aap ja a'mkam xi chu namkidha' na ba' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k bax bhaai'n ka' nam jiika' gu ja kuup nam ba'm tɨgia' gu ja'tkam nap tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu pui' na jax ja'k tu aagix, nam ba' bax mat ka' na cham tu'r pui' nam jax kai'ch aap jum bui.
44021025	Ba' gui' nam jɨ'k cham jir ya' kam dhi Israel na mɨt pui'p tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, pui' ja'k mui' ba tu ja ua'ñxi chich nam cham ka tu kua'da' gu tu' na ja bui makgɨrxix ka' gup duiñxim didios, sia gu ɨ'ɨɨr nam cham kua'da' gam gu sasoi' gui' nam ja bhiikchudat ja koo'nda', gio ba' nam cham jai'x bhai' ka ja tɨtdada' gu u'uub.
44021026	Ba' gu Paablo pui' tɨip tu buim nam jax tɨtda gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Mui' ma jii xi ja baidhak gu maakob jich jaaduñ, buimgidhak ba' dai na mɨt pɨx pui' ja'k bhaan ji baapam nam ba tu kuugalhdhim gu pui' na mɨt jax ja'k tu dai buiñor gu Dios nam pu tu duñia'. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai nat mu ba baa gu Paablo gɇ' chiop nat ba tu aagam nam pai' dhuuk tu makgɨrxidha' gu Dios bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n.
44021027	Gu' ji na gu' jano' na pai' dhuuk bam aajidhat nam pai' dhuuk ba tu kuugalhdha' gɨt gu pui' na mɨt jax ja'k tu dai buiñor gu Dios, ba tɨɨ mɨt gu Paablo na mi' oirɨ na pai'r gɇ' chiop jɨ'kchi gu Israel kam ja'tkam gui' nam bhammɨ dɨr ja'p oi'ñka' na pai' jax bhaan bipio' gu Aasia dɨbɨɨr. Bhai' ji ja iatgi mɨt gu ja'tkam nam sap ba' bhai' ji bhaaku' buiñor gu Paablo,
44021028	jup ja tɨtda am gɇ' kɨ'n: ―Gor jich palhbui'ñ jich jaaduñ Israel kam kuch daagɨi tulhiiñchuda' dhi maa'nkam na nai' jimdat ja iatgidhidha' guch ja'tkam tuk, na pui' ja tɨtdaidha' na sap pur cham tu' gu pui' nat jax ja'k tu ua'nak gu Moisees na tu aagix ka', gio sap ya' dhi gɇ' chiop sia pur cham tu'. Daman nat ya' ja baapai gu jai' ja'tkam nam cham jir ya' kam dhi Israel, sia ku gu'x io'm tɨix chu xidhuu.
44021029	Ba' dhi' gu Troopimo aagɨt jup kai'ch am, gui' nar bhammɨ dɨr ja'k kam Eepeso, nam gu' bɨɨpɨ' dɨr ka nɨi'ñ nam bha ja'p maap ka jim gu Paablo na pai' jax jir gɇ' kiicham, ba' ja'p jum aa' am nat mu baidhak gɇ' chiop.
44021030	Ba' na mɨt pui' ji ja kɇɇk gu ja'tkam, giilhim bhai' ji bhaak jamɨt, pɨx giilhim ba kai'ch am bɨɨx kap bhai' na jɨ'x juugɨt jir gɇ' kiicham. Ba' jai' dhɨt mu boopok bhai' pu ji dhaa mɨt gu Paablo, tɨɨmɨrak jamɨt gamai' pu bhɨich mu ja'k na pai'r dɨɨrap dɨr bhai' gu gɇ' chiop, ba' xi buusaidhak jotmoda' bhai' pu tu kukpa mɨt gu kiki'ñgob nam gu' giilhim jix bhaaktu'.
44021031	Ba' ja'p pɨk ba ji mu'aak jamɨt, gu' ji nat gu' moo ampɨk pui'p ba tɨ kai gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x gu Rooma kam nam giilhim jix bhaak gu ja'tkam bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x juugɨt jir gɇ' kiicham.
44021032	Ba' nat jax maap ja jumaap gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ mu dai'bus. Ba' na mɨt ba tɨɨ gu ja'tkam na mui' ba mɨlhchu' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x gio gu jai' sandaarui'x chugi'ñ, mi' pui' pup tu'ii' am nam mi' ka gɨbchu' gu Paablo, cham ka juan am.
44021033	Ba' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x mui' xi ɇɇk mia'n xi dhaagɨk gu Paablo xi ja chia gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ nam buuplhia' gook bapaiñum tɨtropiñ kɨ'n. Mi' dhɨr ba' ba ja tɨkka gu ja'tkam nar jaroi' dha' gio nat tu' jax dhuu gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam kum ba' mi' bax mu'aam.
44021034	Gu' ji na gu' cham maatɨt ja kɇɇ, nam gu' giilhim gɇ' kɨ'n bha jiiñak gio nam bɨɨx aixim kai'ch, jai' maakam jup kai'ch am gio jai' maakam ɨp. Ba' pui' ma tu chia nam bhɨika' gu Paablo mu ja'k nam pai' oi'ñka' gu sandaarui'x.
44021035	Ba' na mɨt mu ba aich na pai' dhɨr mu tɨm tɨssa'n mi' na pai' dhɨr jax mui' ji chum bapkɨ mɨjɨ' nam pai' oi'ñka' gu sandaarui'x, tɇ'kob daagɨk ma bhɨɨk jamɨt gu Paablo nam ba' cham daagɨi mu'aa' gu ja'tkam gui' nam mi'x bhaak buiñor,
44021036	nam gu' gatuuk dɨr giilhim mu boopo' jiiñkidhat, jup xi kai'chidhat am: ―¡Mu gor mu'aiñ dhi maa'nkam!
44021037	Ba' na mɨt kia'pɨx ba ji kuu gu Paablo mi' nam pai' oi'ñka' gu sandaarui'x, ba tɨkka gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' jɨ' gu sandaarui'x, jup tɨtda: ―¿Cham jir am aa no' ñich alhio ka xi chum a'giñ jaduuñ? Ba' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x jup kai'ch: ―¿Ja'p aa griago ñi'ook kɨ'n tu ñiok ap jiñ jaaduñ?
44021038	¿Dho bak gu' cham tu' aap jir di' ji jia gu Ejipto kam maa'nkam gui' nat maa'nnim mummɨ ma tɨ jɨgialhchuda gampɨx jix chu gak kɨr ja bɨɨm maakob miil gu sandaarui'x nat ja kokda gu Rooma kam?
44021039	Ba' gu Paablo jup kai'ch: ―Cham, aañ jir jumai ji matgɨm jiñ jaduuñ. Jir ya' kam iñ dhi Israel, mu ja'k jañich maaxir na pai'r gɇ' kiicham na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Tarso gui' na bhaan bipio' gu Siliisia dɨbɨɨr. Ba' aañ ja'p tɨi xim tɨɨdam jiñ jaduuñ nap gɨt alhioñ dho'ñcho' nañ ka xi chu ja a'gidha' dhi ja'tkam nam ya'x bhaak.
44021040	Ba' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x cham jax ji chɨ'ɨɨk jup xi chia na tu ja a'gidha' gu ja'tkam. Ba' bhai' xi kɨkbok gu Paablo na pai' dhɨr mu tɨm tɨssa'n, ja'p xi ja duiñ gu ja'tkam nobii'ñ kɨ'n nam sap cham ñiokda', ba' gui' pɨx cham jup ñio mɨt. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai nat bhai' ji chu ja a'gi ebreo ñi'ook kɨ'n, jup ja tɨtda:
44022001	―Ea na pim alhio ka xiñ kaaya'ñ jaaduñ nañ jax jam tɨɨda'.
44022002	Ba'x io'm pɨx cham ñio mɨt gu ja'tkam na mɨt kai na ebreo ñi'ook kɨ'n tu ja a'gi'ñ. Ba' ja'pni mui' ji kɨi:
44022003	―Dho gu' aañ pui'p jir ya' kam dho dhi Israel jiñ jaaduñ, mu ja'k jañich maaxir na pai' pui' tɨ tɨɨ' Tarso, ya' ja'k jañich ba' gɨ'ɨɨr dhi Jerusaleen. Ba' buiñor tuñ mamtuxdhak jañich gu Gamalial, ba' tu maat jañich gu pui' na mɨt jax ja'k tu ua'nak gux io'm bɨjɨk dɨr kam guch bopxi kat. Pui' kuñ ba' aañ gammɨjɨ buiñor tu daanda' gu Dios ja'p na jax aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ na pim gammɨjɨ tu daanda'.
44022004	Ba' bɨɨpɨ' dɨr giilhim jix ja bhaamki'ñdha' iñ gui' nam jɨ'k pu'ñi tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gui' na ja'p ji buusan nar xibkam gu boi, ja da'ngɨt jañ ja kukpada' gu chichio'ñ gam u'uub.
44022005	Jix maat dho gu dhi' pui' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop ja a'mkam tu daanda' gu Israel kam ja'tkam, sia gux a'aixkam jum aa'ndam jich jaaduñ, na mɨt gu' dhi' muñ joot mu Damaasko jiñ maakak maa'n gu u'uan nañ ja tɨɨ'ñchuda' guch jaaduñ gui' nam mummɨ oi'ñka' gu ya' dɨr ja'p kam Israel, na sap ba' dhi' kɨ'n jix bhaai'n ka' nañ ja da'ngɨi bha ja ui'ka' gɨt guch jaaduñ gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor gu Jesuus Nasareet kam, nach ba' ya' Jerusaleen ja aichdhai ja tulhiiñchuda' gɨt.
44022006	’Gu' ji na gu' gammɨjɨ gu bɨɨx boi nañ mui' ka jim jix dhaam duuk, nañ kia'pɨx ba aajidhat mu Damaasko, ba tɨɨ ñich nat jiñ a'm bɨɨx xikoolh bhai' ba tum ton bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam giilhim jix o'jo' kɨ'n.
44022007	Ba' aañ mi' pu ia nañ jax ka jimdat, ba' ba kai ñich nat bhai' ba tum ñio bhammɨ dɨr na pai' bha tum tanoor, jup tum kai'ch: “Aapi' Saulo, ¿jax kup ba'ñ o'bhagi'ñchu'?”
44022008	Ba' aañ xi chɨkka nar jaroi' dha', ja'p jañ chɨtda: “¿Jir jaroop gi dha' aapi' Gɇ'kam?” Ba' gui'p kai'ch na bhammɨ dɨr bha tuñ a'gi'ñ: “Aa dho aañi' dhor di' gu Jesuus Nasareet kam gui' nap jaroi' o'bhagi'ñchu'.”
44022009	Ba' giilhim jix chotdon am gui' nañ ja bɨɨm jim, nam gu' bɨɨx jup nɨi'ñ na bha tum tanoor bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam, dai nam cham kɇɇ gu jaroi' na bha ñiok bhammɨ dɨr. Dai aañ dɨɨlh nañ ba' kɇɇ.
44022010	Ba' aañ giop xi chɨkka gui' na bhammɨ dɨr bha ñiok, ja'p jañ chɨtda: “¿Tu'p jix aa' nañ jax dhuñia' aapi' Gɇ'kam?” Ba' gui'p kai'ch: “Dho nap bamgɨi giop ba jimda' dho mu ja'k nap pai' ja'k jim Damaasko. Mummɨm ba'm aagi'ñdha' nap tu' jax dhuñia' aañ jiñ a'mkam.”
44022011	Ba' nañ gu' cham ka ñia nat pui'ñ dhooda gui' na bhammɨ dɨr bha tanoordat, pui' mɨt jiñ ñobchɨk mañ baidhak mu ja'k Damaasko gui' nañ ja bɨɨm jim.
44022012	’Ba' maa'n mi'p kioka' guch jaduuñ Ananiiyas tɨɨgim nax io'm tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' gu Dios na mi' pui' jimda' nat jax ja'k tu ua'nak gu Moisees na tu aagix ka', gio nam bɨɨx pɨx joidham jix kɨɨgalhi'ñdha' gui' nam jɨ'k ya' dɨr ja'p Israel mummɨ ja'k oi'ñka' Damaasko .
44022013	Ba' dhi' jɨ' dhich jaduuñ Ananiiyas tɨɨgim mui' ma jii mu na mɨt pai'ñ chɨbiaptuda, jup jiñ chɨtda ba' mu ji ɇɇk: “Aapi'ñ jaduuñ Saulo, bhañ joot guch Gɨ'kora' nap sap giop bax ñia ka' xib dɨr ja'p ja'k.” Ba' mi' jotmoda' bhai' ji ñiata ñich nat jax puñ chɨɨ'n. Jix bhai' giop bax chu maax nañ nai' xi chɨ nɨi'ñ.
44022014	Mi' dhɨr ba' moo ja'pni ja'k bhai'p ji chuñ a'gi, jup jiñ chɨtda: “Jum a'm ba tɨ tɨɨ jiñ jaduuñ gu ja Dios tuk guch bopxi kat nap sap ba'x io'm jix bhai' ba machia' na jax pɨk ja'k jix aa', gio nap ba' tɨgia' maaxik gui' na jaroi'x io'm jir jix bhai'kam, gio nap ba' pu'ñi kɇɇkɇ' na bha tum a'gi'ñdha',
44022015	nap sap gu' aap ba'r di' ka' jia nap nai' tu ja a'gidha' gu ja'tkam na pich jɨ'k jax ba tɨ tɨɨ gio na pich jax ja'k ba tɨ kai.
44022016	Ba' gu xib jum aa' nap xim dɨkoo'ñdha' nap bam bakuanmɨra' mu ja'p pai' na jax suu'nka' gu suudai' soi'm ɨlhdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam na ba' uañchuda' gum ua'tulhdhara'.”
44022017	’Ba' na ñich pai' dhuuk gio ya'p ba ai dhi Jerusaleen, mui' ma jii ñich mu gɇ' chiop na ñich ba tu daañim. Ba' nañ mi' ka tu daan,
44022018	ba tɨɨ ñich gu Gɇ'kam jich Gɨ'kora' nat mi ja'p bam maax, jup jiñ chɨtda ba': “Ba jimia' ap ya' dɨr dhi Jerusaleen, xib moo, nam gu' cham jɨ'xkat jum jɨɨgi'ñdha' sia kup tɨi ja aagi'ñ nañ jir tu'p tu'm da' aañ.”
44022019	Ba' aañ bhai' tɨi soi' ji chɨɨ'n ja'p jañ chɨtda: “Ja'pji nam gu'x maat nañ aañ bɨɨpɨ' dɨr mu ja'p nai' ja da'ngɨt ka ja tulhiiñchu'nda' gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' aap jum bui, na jax aa' kuñ pui' ja gɨbdat ja ko'ktulhi'ñdha'.
44022020	Gio jano' na mɨt pai' dhuuk ma'yasimɨk mua gu Teeban, gui' nam a'mkam ka tu a'gat gu pui' nap jax ja'k jix aa', nam gu' bɨɨx jup jix maat nañ aañ jai' mi ja'p jup xi kɨɨk nañ ja nuukxi'ñ gu daam dɨr kam ja tɨi'dhara' gui' na mɨt mi ja'p xi ja darsak na mɨt mi' ba ji mua. Jai' ja'xbui' pui'p xiñ chaat iñ na sap pɨk ba'r am nam mu'aa'.”
44022021	Ba' maa'n na jax jiñ chɨtda gu Gɇ'kam jich Gɨ'kora', jup kai'ch: “Ja'pji nap ba jimia', nañ gu' aañ jix aa' nap mɨk ja'k bhɨɨya' ja bui gui' nam cham jir Israel kam ja'tkam.”
44022022	Ba' ja'xbui' juugɨt pɨx kai mɨt gu Paablo nat tu ja a'gi, mi' dhɨr gu' gio pɨx jiiñak jup suulh jamɨt ji, jup kai'ch am: ―¡Mu gor mu'aiñ dhi maa'nkam, na gu' cham jir am gu pui' na jax kai'ch!
44022023	Ba' pɨx mɨjɨ dɨr ji kɨksa am nam pui' kai'ch, gio nam mi ja'p nai' xi ja xiixkaim gu ja jajannulh, nam gu' giilhim jix bhaak, gio gu dɨbɨɨr nam jax da'ngɨ nai' tɇ'kob xi buppa am.
44022024	Ba' gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x xi chu chia nam giop baidhika' gu Paablo mu ja'k nam pai' oi'ñka' gu sandaarui'x, gio sap nam xi gɨɨ'bia' na sap ba' tu aaga' nam jax kai'ñkam jix bhaamki'ñ gu ja'tkam.
44022025	Gu' ji na gu' na mɨt pai' dhuuk ba buupra gu Paablo nam ba' moo ba gɨɨ'bia' gɨt, ba tɨkka gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x, jup tɨtda: ―¿Aagix aa na pim ja gɨbda' gui' nam jɨ'k jir ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam, pui' na jax aañ nañ maadɨt jir di', gio no' pu'ñi chakui maatɨ' no' ñich tu' jax dhuu gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam ka' ba' gu' cham?
44022026	Ba' nat pu'ñi kai gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x, xi mɨɨ nat aa'ñdham gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x, jup tɨtda: ―¿Jax jap ba' ɨlhii'ñ gu maa'nkam na pich jich chia nach gɨɨ'bia'? Maadɨt jir di' gu ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam.
44022027	Ba' nat jax pui' tɨ kai gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x, mu dai'bus nat tɨkkam gu Paablo, jup tɨtda: ―¿Jir sɨlhkam aa nap aap maadɨt jir di' gu ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam? Ba' gu Paablo jup kai'ch: ―Jir pui' dho nap jax kai'ch jiñ jaduuñ.
44022028	Ba' gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x jup tɨtda: ―Aañ mui' tuumiñ tu namki nañ ba' maadɨt bar di' gu ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam. Ba' gu Paablo jup kai'ch: ―Ja'pji aañ ɨlhi'chdham dɨr pur pu chu'm ji.
44022029	Ba' pui' cham ka gɨɨ' mɨt gu Paablo, na mɨt gu' dai bax chooto'n na mɨt ba maat na maadɨt jir di' gu ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam, sia ji gu' gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x giilhim jix choo'n nat gan tu chia nam buuplhia' bapaiñum tɨtropiñ kɨ'n.
44022030	Ba' buimgidhak ba tu chia gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x nam sap alhio ka xi dho'ñcho' gu Paablo na buupulh bapaiñum tɨtropiñ kɨ'n. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai nat ba tu ja joochxi gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam gio ba' jai' gui' nam ja'ppɨx jir ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk ka', nax maachim nam jax kai'ñkam buiñor jix bhaak gu Paablo. Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk bɨɨx mi' bam jumaap mi' na pai' tum a'gada', ba tu chia nam mu baidhika' gu Paablo, mi ja'p ba' xi ja kɨɨx ja saagi'ñ gui' nam mi' bax iattulhdham.
44023001	Ba' gu Paablo bha ja'p nai' xi ja tɨɨgɨk gu gɇ'gɇrkam nam mui' mi' ba jumpax nam mi' bax iattulhdham, jup ja tɨtda: ―Aañ gammɨjɨ mi' pui' jim jiñ jaaduñ na jax ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios.
44023002	Ba' gu Ananiiyas gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam, xi ja chia nam bha gɨɨ'bia' chiñi'ran gu Paablo gui' nam jɨ'k mi ja'p amuub jup tu'ii'.
44023003	Gu' ji na gu'p tɨtda gu Paablo: ―Aap dho pui' ja'p jup ji buusnia' nam gɨɨ'bia' gu Dios, na gu'm tulhiiñchuda'. Tɨɨ' nap gu' cham mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa' nap moo mi ja'p daakat bhai'p ba tu chian nam bhañ gɨɨ'bia' dhi ja'tkam jiñ chiñ am, sia ku gu' tɨi cham tu' pui' ja'k tu aagix, gio nap sap pɨk ba' ya' ba xi chuñ a'gidham na jax ja'k jir am nañ mi' pui' jimda' na jax ja'k tu aagix.
44023004	Ba' gu jai' gui' nam mi'p tu'ii' ɨp jup tɨtda am gu Paablo: ―¿Jax ba' kup ba' pui' pɨk jup tɨtda dhi' nat Dios gɇ'kam kɨ'n dai na ba' pu'ñix io'm jir ja gɇ'kam tuk ka' gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam?
44023005	Ba' gu Paablo gio mui'p ji ñio, jup ja tɨtda: ―Dho gu' aañ cham maatɨt jiñ jaaduñ no' moop jir di' gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam. Na gu' gu u'uan ta'm pui'm kai'ch jia gui' na mɨt bhaan mi chu ua'nak gui' nam bɨjɨk bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios na sap pu'ñi cham jir am nañ giilhim tɨtdada' gu jax chu'm gɇ'kam na ja sɨlhka'nda' gu ja'tkam.
44023006	Mi' dhɨr ba' moo ja'pni ja'k bhai'p ji chu ja a'gi nat ba ja tɨɨ nam jai' dhɨt mi'p tu'ii' gui' nam pariseos jum tɨɨtɨ'nda' gio ba' jai' gui' nam saduseos jup jum tɨɨtɨ'nda', jup ja tɨtda gɇ' kɨ'n: ―Aañ dho pui' maadɨt jup jir di'ñ jaaduñ gui' nam pariseos jum tɨɨtɨ'. Ja bui maaxir jañich, ba' pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ iñ nam gio duduardat jup bapmi' gu koi'ñga'n. Pui' ku pim ba' dhi' kɨ'n xiñ bhaamkidhat ya' ba xiñ iattulhdham.
44023007	Ba' nat jax pu'ñi ja tɨɨ'n gu Paablo, ma tu a'ga mɨt gu pariseos jum tɨɨtgɨdam ja bɨɨm gu saduseos. Mi' dho gu' cham maa'n ñi'ook kap duuk am nam tɨi pup xi chu a'gimɨk.
44023008	Nam gu' jai' maakam jup kai'ch, pui' na jax gu saduseos nam gu' pui' kai'chdha' nam sap cham tu' duduardat giop ka bapmi' gu koi'ñga'n, gio sap nam cham tu' jai'ch gui' nam jir noonbi'ñ gu Dios, ni jax chu'm ii'mda' dho sap moo ku mu pai' ka oirɨda'. Gu' ba' gu pariseos pui'p kai'chdha' am ɨp nam sap gu' giop duduardat jup bapmi' ji gu koi'ñga'n, gio sap gui' nam jir noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam jix jai'ch, sia gu jax ña pɨx chu'm ii'mda' sap na mu pai' oirɨda'.
44023009	Gɇ' kɨ'n dho gu' pɨx jiiñak bɨɨt am bɨɨx nam jɨ'k mi'p tu'ii' nam pu'ñi kai'ch, jai' nam pui' kai'ch na cham tu'r pui' na jax kai'ch gu Paablo, jai' ba' nam pui' kai'ch na sɨlhkam jir pui' ji na jax kai'ch. Gio jai' mi' dhɨr ja'p na mɨt jax jup guguu gui' nam sap jix mat ka' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios nam pui' ja'k jup tu jimda' na jax gu pariseos, jai' bhai' bhaankam jup ji ñio mɨt gu Paablo, jup kai'ch am: ―Dho gu' maaxik cham tu' jax bua ji dhich jaduuñ gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam. ¿Jax jach gi bia' nach jup tɨɨda' no' gu' pui' ja'k aagi'ñ maadɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na ba' pui' ja'k tu jim, piam gu jax chu'm ii'mda'? Dho gu' cham jir am dho nach jax dhui moop ba ji soo'mchulhdha'.
44023010	Gu' ji na gu' jai' gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ gu dhi' pui' ja'k, giilhim cham tɨ jɨjɨkgɨr am nam bhax bhaak. Ba' pui' too'nnɨk giop ka xi chu chia gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x nam giop ka xi kuupa' gu Paablo mu ja'p nam pai' oi'ñka' gu sandaarui'x nam sap ba' cham daagɨi gɨbiimɨi ta'tak jup dooda'.
44023011	Ba' moo jano' nat jax gamai' ji chuk, buiñor bam maax guch Xoi'kam mi' na pai' kuup gu Paablo, ba'p tɨtda: ―Aap moo cham jax jum aa'nda' Paablo, nam gu' cham jɨ'xkat jax jum dooda' sia kum jax tɨi ɨlhii'ñ gui' nam xim bhaamki'ñ gu ya' kam dhi Jerusaleen. Na gu' kam aa' nap jiñ a'mkam bhammɨ dɨr ja'k ka tu ja a'gi'ñmɨra' gu ja'tkam na pai'r Rooma ja'p na pich jax ja'k ba tu ja a'gi ya' dhi Jerusaleen.
44023012	Ba' moo jano' buimgidhak nat jumai gamai'p ji chu maaxir, jai' dhɨt maap jim jumpadak ba tu a'ga mɨt gu Israel kam ja'tkam nam pui' kai'ch nam sap mu'aa' gu Paablo. Gio na mɨt pui' tɨi nam sap cham tu' jugia' gio nam cham tu' i'ya', nam pai' dhuuk xi mu'ai sap nam ba' ba tu jugia'. Piam sap no' mɨt gu' moo jax dhuukat cham jax dhooda, dɨɨlh dho sap ba' cham bhai' tu ja jimia'.
44023013	Ba' dhi' na mɨt jɨ'k pu'ñi ja'k maa'n ñi'ook jup duu, aix am gook oo'm damdɨr jɨ'kchi pup.
44023014	Gatuuk ba' na mɨt pu'ñi xi chu a'gak, dai na mɨt ba ja aa'ñdham gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam gio gui' nam ja'ppɨx jir ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk ka' gu Israel ja'tkam, jup ja tɨtdaim am mu ji ɇɇk: ―Aach pui' ba tɨi nach cham tu' jugia' gio nach cham tu' i'ya', nach pai' dhuuk xi mu'ai gu Paablo nach ba' ba tu jugia'. Piam ku chich gu' moo cham jax dhooda, dɨɨlh dho ba' cham bhai' tuch jimia'.
44023015	Ba' gu xib ja'pni ja'k jix bhaai' na pim aapi'm mu jimia' ja bɨɨm gu jai' ja'ppɨx jich gɇ'gɇrkam tuk na pim pu tɨɨ'npu' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x na kabuimuk bha jam bai'ñxidhika' gu Paablo, ja'p japim xi iatgidhai na pim jix bhai'x chɨkkam nat tu' ba' jax dhuu gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam. Aach ba' dai nach gama ja'k pai' boi cha'm ba tɨ nɨɨrda' bɨɨpɨ' dɨr nach ba' mi' pu mu'aa' na bhai' ka bai'ñchu'nda'.
44023016	Gu' ji na gu' moop ja kɇɇ maa'n gu biapma' nar tataalhi'ñ gu Paablo, ba' jotmoda' xi mɨɨ nat aa'ñdham mu na pai' kuup ja bui gu sandaarui'x.
44023017	Ba' gu Paablo nat pui' jɨ' kai, maadɨt ba tu joochxi gu sandaarui'x, ba' pui' ba tɨtda nat pai' dhuuk mi' ba ai na sap mu baidhika' gu biapma' buiñor gu ja gɇ'kam tuk na sap ba'x xɨ'lhim tu a'gidha'.
44023018	Ba' gu sandaarui'x cham jax ji chɨ'ɨɨk mui'p ma baidhak gu biapma' mu ja'k na pai' daaka' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk, jup tɨtda ba' mu ji ɇɇk: ―Aañ ya' bai'ñchu' dhi biapma' nat bhañ joot gu Paablo gui' na mu kuup, na sap jix xɨ'lhim xi chum a'gidham.
44023019	Ba' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x xi ñobchɨk mu ja'p xi baidhak gu biapma' na pai' cham jaroi' xi ja kɇɇkɇ' nam jax kai'chdha', ba tɨkka ba', jup tɨtda: ―¿Jax jap xiñ chɨɨdam jiñ jaduuñ?
44023020	Ba' gu biapma' mui' ji ñio, jup tɨtda: ―Dho gu' na ñich bham aa'ñdham dho na mɨt maa'n ñi'ook bap duu gu Israel kam ja'tkam nam sap pɨk ba' bha jimɨi pum tɨɨda' nap kabuimuk mu ja bai'ñxidhika' gu Paablo nam sap pɨk ba'x bhai'x chɨkkam nat tu' ba' jax dhuu gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam.
44023021	Ku gu' aap cham mi ja jɨɨgi'ñdha' ji no'm moo ya' pai' jiimdat pui' bam tɨtdaim, nam gu' pui' kai'ch jai' dhɨt gu ja ja'tkam tuk nam sap gook oo'm aixkam damdɨr jɨ'kchi pup mi' pai' tɨ nɨɨrda' boi cha'm jix ɨxchuixim, nam sap ba' mi' pu mu'aa' gu Paablo nap mui' ka bai'ñchu'nda', na mɨt gu' sap bɨɨpɨ' dɨr pui' ja'k ba tɨi nam cham tu' jugia' gio nam cham tu' i'ya', nam pai' dhuuk xi mu'ai sap nam ba' ba tu jugia'. Piam sap no' mɨt gu' moo jax dhuukat cham jax dhooda, dɨɨlh dho sap ba' cham bhai' tu ja jimia'. Ba' gu xib dai aap pɨx nam ka xim kaim nap jax chɨ'ya'.
44023022	Ba' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x pɨx cham jax jup tɨi. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai nat xi soo'mchulhdhak ba joot gu biapma' na sap dɨɨlh pɨx pui'x chu mat ka' gu pui' nat jɨ'k jax ba tu a'gi.
44023023	Gatuuk ba' dai nat gook ba ja bai gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ, jup ja tɨtda ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk mi' ba ai nam sap xi ja chiñia' gu jai' sandaarui'x chugi'ñ nam jix kɨɨ' bam duñia' nam ba' ja'xpɨx gamai' ji jimia' na ji chukgia' nam do'ñchopu' gu Paablo mu ja'k na pai'r Sesareeya, jɨ'k gook jix cha'tmam oo'm sap nam jiimda' gui' nam aagix nam pui' ja tooton kɨ'n oipoda', gio ba' jai' baik oo'm daman mambhɨɨx aixkam ɨp sap gui' nam kakbai cha'm jup aagix nam oipoda', gio ba' gook jix cha'tmam oo'm ɨp sap gui' nam jup aagix nam dai laansas ja ua'dat jup oipoda'.
44023024	Gio nat xi ja chia ɨp nam ja ulhña' gu kakbai na ba' maa'n bhaan jup jimda' gu Paablo, gio nap ja tɨtda nam sap jix bhai' bai'ñchu' gɨt mu aichulhdha' gux kai' Peeles.
44023025	Damdɨr maa'n u'uan mui'p xi ja maa na ja'pnim kai'chim na mi chu ua'ñixchu':
44023026	“Aañi' nañ pui' tɨɨ' Klaudio Liisias ya' dɨr jañ mui' xi chum guguuxi'ñ bhaan dhi u'uan nap jax jum ɨlhii'ñ aapi'ñ jaduuñ Peeles nap jir jix kai'.
44023027	Mi' dhɨr jañ ba' moo ja'pni ja'k jup xim tɨɨdam na mɨt gu Israel kam ja'tkam ya' daa dhi maa'nkam gio ba' na mɨt ja'p pɨk ba ji mu'aak, gu' ji na ñich gu' aañ mu dai'ññɨk ma palhbui ja bɨɨm guñ sandaarui'x chuk, na ñich gu' pui' ba tɨ kai na dhi' maadɨt jir di' gu ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam.
44023028	Gatuuk jañich ba' tɨi ma baidhak mu nam pai' tu a'gada' jim jumpadat gu Israel kam ja'tkam gu tu' no'm bax a'gam, nañ gu' tɨix maachim nam tu' ba' kɨ'n jix bhaamki'ñ.
44023029	Ba' bhaan bhai' ji chu a'ga mɨt gu pui' na jax ja'k tu aagix nam tu jimda', gu' ja'p gu tu'x buam jum duukam gu' cham pai' aa' am ji na jax ja'k moor am nam ba' mu'aa', nich chu' palhɨɨp jup jum duukam dho moo na jax ja'k moor am ka' gɨt na ba' mi' pai' pu'ñi ba kuupka' gɨt.
44023030	Gu' ji na ñich gu' ya' pui' ba tɨ kai na mɨt sap maa'n ñi'ook bap duu gu Israel kam ja'tkam nam pui' kai'ch nam mu'aa'. Ba' mu ja'k jañ mui' xi chu jootsa' nam mum bai'ñxidhika', gio ba' gui' nam jaroi'x bhaamki'ñ bɨɨx pui'p ba ja tɨɨ'n jañich nam mummɨ jimɨi aap jum bui mi' pu tɨ'ya' nam jax ba' kai'ñkam pui'x bhaamki'ñ. Ja'pni daipu'.”
44023031	Ba' gu sandaarui'x pui'p tu buim am na jax ja tɨtda gu ja gɇ'kam tuk, ma baidhak jamɨt gu Paablo nat pai' dhuuk gamai' ji chuk mu ja'k na pai' Antiipatris tɨ tɨɨ'.
44023032	Kabuimuk ba' jai' mi' dhɨr ja'k ba suulh jamɨt gu sandaarui'x gui' nam pui' jiim ja tooton kɨ'n, dai gui' nam kakbai cha'm jiim jamɨt ba' pu oi gu Paablo mu ja'k Sesareeya.
44023033	Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk mummɨ ba ai, mi' xi maa mɨt gu u'uan gux kai', gio gu Paablo mɨt bɨɨx mi ja'p jup xi kɨɨx.
44023034	Ba' gux kai' xi jiñkuidhak gu u'uan bhai' ba tɨkka gu Paablo na sap jir pai' kam. Ba' nat ba maat nar mu ja'k kam na pai' Siliisia bhaan bipio' gu dɨbɨɨr,
44023035	jup tɨtda: ―Dho bak gu'r am ji nañ jum kaaya' nap jax ja'k xi buada' nap tu a'ga'da' no' mɨt ya' ba ai gui' nam pui' xim bhaamki'ñ. Ba' daipu' xi chɨ'ɨɨk ba tu chia nam kuupa' gu Paablo pu mi' pui' na pai' jax kio dɨɨlh, na pai' kiokat ɨp bɨɨpɨ' dɨr gu Eroodis kat.
44024001	Ba' gu Ananiiyas gui' nax io'm jir ja gɇ'kam tuk ka' gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam, jix chamaam jurni'ñ kɨ'n mummɨ ba ji buus na pai'r gɇ' kiicham ka' Sesareeya tɨ tɨɨgim ji ja baidhat jɨ'kchi gui' nam ja'ppɨx jir ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk ka' gu Israel kam ja'tkam, damdɨr maa'n jup xi bai'ñchu' gui' nax matda' ka' na tu a'ga buiñor gu jax chu'm gɇ'kam, Tertulo tɨɨgim. Ba' dhi' jɨ' dhi ja'tkam mu ba ai mɨt buiñor gui' na mi'r jix kai' Peeles tɨɨgim nam mi' bax iattulhdham gu Paablo.
44024002	Ba' xi chu joot gux kai' nam bai'ñpu' gu Paablo mu ja'p na pai' kuupka' nam sap ba' mi' ba tu a'ga' maap gui' na mɨt jaroi' mi' ba ai nam jix bhaamki'ñ. Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk mi' ba aich, mui' ji chu a'ga gu Tertulo, jup tɨtda gux kai' Peeles: ―Taxchaab ba'ch jaduuñ, moo pɨk ja'p joidham jix jɨjɨkgɨm jup tu'ii' ich ji. Taxchaab ɨp gum matda' na joidham bɨɨx aixim jix bhai' ji chu buusnichu' aach jich bui nach jir jum ja'tkam tuk.
44024003	Ba' bɨɨx dhi' pui' aach gammɨjɨ bhaan gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai'ch chaat nap ba' moox mat ka' aapi'ch jaduuñ Peeles.
44024004	Ba' na cham jix io'm ba ji mɨɨkidha' nach ya' tum a'gi'ñ, ka xich kaaya' ap nach ja'pni ja'k jum tɨɨda':
44024005	Dho gu' dhi maa'nkam aach pui' nɨi'ñ ji na giilhim nai' jimdat ja kokdhichdhaim gu Israel kam ja'tkam, na ja iatgidhim na jax ja'k cham jir am. Dhi' dhor di' gui' nar ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' nam nasareenos jum tɨɨtɨ'.
44024006	Gio bhammɨ chiop na pai' tɨi giilhim jix chu xidhuu, nat cham tu' ka'm tɨ tɨɨ nat agree'n mu ja baapai gu jai' ja'tkam nam cham jir Israel kam. Ba' aach pu kai'ñkam tɨi daa nach ba' pu tɨɨdai tulhiiñchuda' gɨt na cham tu' ka'm tɨ nɨi'ñ gu pui' na jax ja'k tu aagix aach jich bui.
44024007	Gu' ji nat gu' mu dai'ññɨk jup jich baabui gu Klaudio Liisias gui' nar ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x. Pui' chich dho ba' cham jax dhooda,
44024008	na gu' pui'ch chɨtda nach sap ya' ja'k aap jum bui tu a'ga' gu dhi' pui' nach jax ba kai'ch. Jix maat dho no' pich bhai' xi chɨkka dɨɨlh nap ba' ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' nach sɨlhkam jup kai'ch gu dhi' pui' nach jax ba tum a'gi'ñ.
44024009	Ba' gui' nam mi ja'p jup daraa gu Israel kam ja'tkam bɨɨx pui'p xi kai'ch am na jax kai'ch gu Tertulo na mi' iattulhi'ñ gu Paablo.
44024010	Ba' gux kai' ja'p xi duiñ gu Paablo na sap mui' xi chu a'ga'. Ba' gui' mui'p ji chu a'ga, jup kai'ch: ―Dho gu' aañ jix bhai'ñ chaatɨt ya' pui' xi chɨ'ya' dho nañ jax ja'k jup xiñ maat, nañ gu'x maat nap aap mui' oidha' ya' bar jix kai' na jɨ'x juugɨt bhaan bipio' dhi dɨbɨɨr.
44024011	Dho gu' aañ nat kia'pɨx mambhɨɨx daman gook tanoolh ba juruuñ na ñich bhammɨ ai Jerusaleen na ñich mu tu daañim buiñor gu Dios, kagɨt nap tɨkkada'ñ jaduuñ nar pui' nañ jax kai'ch.
44024012	Ku gu' cham pai' jaroi' buiñor ñiokbo ñich ji, ni mɨjɨ ɨrban dɨr gu gɇ' chiop kuñ cham pai' ja kokdhichu'n gu ja'tkam, ni mu ja'p pai' nam jax jum jumpadat tu daanda' gu Israel kam ja'tkam, ni sia dho moo bhai' dhi gɇ' kiicham.
44024013	Ku gu' dhi' pui' nam jax kai'ch dhi ja'tkam ni jɨ'x ji iam kur pui', cham bia' am dho nam jax tɨ'ya'.
44024014	Na gu' aañ dai jia nañ mi' pui' jim nat jax ja'k tu dai xib gu Dios gui' nam pui'p daanɨt gux io'm bɨjɨk dɨr kam jich bopxi kat, na gu' dai nax aa' nach jix bhai' mi' pui' jiimda' na jax ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ. Dhi' ba'r di' gu xibkam boi nam ja'p ɨlhii'ñ dhi' nam xiñ bhaamki'ñ nach dɨɨlh pɨx pu tu bua nach jax ɨlhii'ñ nach jɨ'k maap jich dhaa'. Gu' matgɨm aañ jix maat ji na jax ja'k tu aagix na mɨt tu ua'nak gui' nam bɨjɨk bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios, ba' mi' pui' tu daa'ñchu' iñ dho.
44024015	Ba' pu'ñip jix biiñak iñ aañ buiñor gu Dios na jax dhi' am nam pui' ja'k jix biiñak nam gatuuk duduadɨi giop baapmigia' bɨɨx gu koi'ñga'n, pui' na jax gui' nam cham u'ua'tulhdhix ka' gio gui' nam jix u'ua'tulhdhix ka'.
44024016	Pui' kuñ ba' aañ jiñ dhɨkoo'ñdhatu' nañ mi' pui' jim na jax ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios gio gu ja'tkam ja bui.
44024017	’Ba' mɨkkat jɨ'kchi oidha' kɨ'n nañ maakam ja'k xi oilhimɨk na pai' jax cham jir Israel, bhai' ma jii ñich ya' ja'k nañ jir pai' kam na ñich bha ja do'ñchidham gu tuumiñ gui' nam cham bia' nam tu' kɨ'n tu saba'da', gio na ñich bha tu makgɨrxidham gu Dios bhammɨ gɇ' chiop.
44024018	Ba' bhai' pui' ka tu kuugalhdhim iñ na jax ja'k tu aagix buiñor gu Dios, bam aajidhat nañ pai' dhuuk pui' tu kuugalhdha' gɨt, gu' ji na mɨt gu' jano' pɨk bhai'ñ chɨɨgɨk gɇ' chiop bhai' puñ dhaa gu Israel kam ja'tkam gui' nam jir bhammɨ dɨr ja'k kam na pai' bhaan bipio' gu Aasia dɨbɨɨr, ku gu' tɨi cham pai' ja kokdhichu'n iñ ji gu ja'tkam.
44024019	Dho gu' gui' ji jia nam ya'ni bha jimɨi pu tɨ'ya' nam jax kai'ñkam ba' pui' xiñ bhaamki'ñ.
44024020	Piam kum gu' dhi' nam ya'p tu'ii', dho ya' pui' xi chɨ'ya' am no' mɨt mooñ chɨɨ nañ jix buam tu bua gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam jano' nañ pai' dhuuk bhammɨ kap tu'ii' ja bui nam pai' tu a'gada'.
44024021	Ja'p jañich pɨx xi chɨi gɇ' kɨ'n jano' nañ pai' dhuuk bhammɨp tu'ii' ja bui: “Pu kai'ñkam ya'ñ iattulhi'ñ japim nañ tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nam gio duduardat jup bapmi' gu koi'ñga'n.”
44024022	Ba' gux kai' Peeles mi' pui' cham ka ja kaim gui' nam mi' tɨi ka iattulhi'ñ gu Paablo, na gu' pui' pu tɇ kɇɇkɇ' na bhaan tum a'ga guch Xoi'kam gui' na pui' ji buusan nar xibkam boi. Ba'p ja tɨtda: ―Moo chi jano' ba' na pai' dhuuk ya' aaya' gux io'm ja gɇ'kam tuk gu sandaarui'x na Liisias tɨɨ' nañ ba' jam aagi'ñdha' na jax ja'k jir am ka' gu dhi' pui' na pim tu' bhaan tu a'ga.
44024023	Ba' daipu' xi chɨ'ɨɨk gux kai' Peeles, ba chia gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ na giop ka xi kuupmɨra' gu Paablo amuub mi' dhɨr ja'p, ku gu' sap cham tu' ji na moop buupulh ka' na ba'x bhaai'n ka' na jɨ'x mi ja'p jup xi oirɨda', gio nam cham ja juanda' gui' nam jɨ'k mi aajidhat jix chɨɨgik ka'.
44024024	Mi' dhɨr ba' gatuuk nat pu'ñi ja'k xi chianɨk gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ, jɨ'kchi jurni'ñ kɨ'n gio mi'p ba ai gux kai' Peeles na pai' tum a'gada', bɨɨx jup xi bai'ñchu' gu bɨnga'n Drusiila tɨɨgim na pui'p jir Israel kam ka'. Mi' dhɨr ba' moo xi chu joot gux kai' Peeles nam bai'ñpu' gu Paablo. Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk mi' ba aich, bhai' ji chu ja a'gi na jax ja'k jix bhai' nam mi' pui' jiimdat jix biiñak ka' buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
44024025	Gatuuk ba' ja'pni ja'k bhai'p ji chu ja a'gi, na sap tu' cham jir am nam pu tu buada', nam gammɨjɨ tu' ka'm tɨ nɨi'ñdha' na ba' cham ja tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios na pai' dhuuk tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n. Ba' giilhim pux choo'nnɨt kai gux kai' Peeles, mi' pui' dho gu' cham ka kaim, dai nat ba soo'mchulh pɨx gu Paablo na ka tu a'ga, jup tɨtda: ―Bax bhai' pɨx tu a'ga ap jiñ jaduuñ. Ba jimia' ap, gatuuk jañ ba' giop bam bai'ñdha' nañ pai' dhuuk cham tu' jax buada'.
44024026	Gu' na ja'p tɨi ɨlhdhat ɨp ji gux kai' Peeles na gɨt tu' tuumiñ ba aagi'ñdha' gu Paablo na ba' ba do'ñcho' gɨt, pui' ku ba' mi'mia'n tɨi bai'ñdha' nam gook dɨt tu a'gada'.
44024027	Gook oidha' dho gu' moop duu na maa'n na bai'ñdha' na jɨ'x juugɨt jir jix kai' kat. Mi' dhɨr nat gu' bam pataasa, jumai ba' bhaankam mi' bar jix kai', Porsio Pesto tɨɨgim. Ba' gu Peeles, na gu'x aa' nam jix kɨɨgalhi'ñdha' gu Israel kam ja'tkam, pui' cham xi dho'ñchok gu Paablo. Dɨɨlh chi sap panaas jix maat na jax dhuñia' gui' na gatuuk mi' bar jix kai'.
44025001	Ba' mi' ba ai gu Pesto na pai'r Sesareeya nam ba' mi'x kai' kɨ'n ba daasa'. Ba' gatuuk baik jurni'ñ kɨ'n mi' dhɨr ma jii bhammɨ ja'k Jerusaleen.
44025002	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk bhammɨ ba ai, bhai' ji iattulh jamɨt gu Paablo gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam ja bɨɨm gui' nam ja'ppɨx jir ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk ka' gu Israel kam ja'tkam,
44025003	nam pui' tɨtda na sap tu chiñia' nam mu baidhika' bhammɨ Jerusaleen. Gu' ja'pji nam tɨi ɨlhdhat ji nam sap bhammɨ pai' boi cha'm mu'aa' gɨt nam mui' ka bai'ñchu'nda'.
44025004	Gu' ji na gu' cham jup aa' gux kai' Pesto, dai nap ja tɨtda pɨx na mi' pɨx kuupka' Sesareeya, na gu' sap cham xiim gio mu ja'k jup bhɨɨya'.
44025005	Jup ja tɨtda: ―Mummɨ ji nam muñ oidha' gu jam gɇ'gɇrkam tuk nañ pai' dhuuk ya' dɨr gamai' ji jimia' mu ja'k Sesareeya. Ba' no' gu' moo sɨlhkam pui'x buam tu dooda gu Paablo, dho gu' mi' dho ba' pui' xi kai'chdha' pim nat jax pui' tu dooda.
44025006	Ba' bhammɨ ka pup xi juruuñ gux kai' Pesto na pai'r Jerusaleen jɨ'k xijum baik tanoolh, gatuuk ba' dai nat ba jii mu ja'k Sesareeya. Ba' nat mu ji ɇɇk buimgidhak bhammɨ ba daibu atooxkor ta'm na pai' daaka' gu gɇ'kam, na pai' dhɨr jix bhaai' na daakat nai' tu ja a'gi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam. Mi' dhɨr ba' moo ba tu joot nam bai'ñpu' gu Paablo.
44025007	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk mi' ba ai gu Paablo, mui' xi ai mɨt jix io'm mia'n gu Israel kam ja'tkam gui' na mɨt Jerusaleen dɨr mu ai. Mi' ba' bɨɨx aixim bhai' ji iattulh jamɨt, panaas kum moox ñɨi'ñdham xi kai'ch gu tu' nat jax dhuu nar jix buam jum duukam. Gu' pɨx ja'p kai'ch am ji, nim maa'n ku iam jir pui', pu cham dho jax dhooda mɨt.
44025008	Ba' gu Paablo na jax jup xim maat mui'p ji chu a'ga, jup kai'ch: ―Aañ nañ jax pɨx jup ba kai'ch dho nañ cham pai' dhuuk tu'x buam jum duukam jax bua, ni nañ pai' dhuuk jax kai'ch na cham tu' kam aa' nach mi' pui' jiimda' na jax chu aagix aach jich bui nach jir Israel kam ja'tkam, ni sia dho moo gu gɇ' chiop kuñ cham pai' dhuuk jax kai'ch na cham tu' bhai', ni buiñor gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam kuñ cham pai' dhuuk buam pɨx tu bua.
44025009	Ba' gux kai' Pesto nax aagɨt nam jix kɨɨgalhi'ñdha' gu Israel kam ja'tkam, xi chɨkka gu Paablo, jup tɨtda: ―¿Ka'ch ji sap mu jimia' aa bhammɨ Jerusaleen nach ba' bhammɨ tu a'ga' gu dhi' pui' na pim tu' bhaan tu a'ga?
44025010	Gu' ji na gu' gu Paablo jup tɨtda pɨx: ―Dho gu' ya'p tu'ii' iñ ji na pai' juugɨt jir gɇ'kam gu Rooma kam na pai' pɨk jix io'm jum aa' na pim pu'ñi tuñ a'gidha'. Gio na gu' nap jax bax maat nañ aañ cham tu'x buam jum duukam jax ja buixi'ñ gu Israel kam ja'tkam.
44025011	Gu' no'ñ gu' moo sɨlhkam pui'x buam tu dooda' gɨt gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam, cham jañ dho jax kai'chɨt sia ku mɨt bañ mua, na gu' pui' ja'k pɨx bar am ka' gɨt. Gu' ji nañ gu' cham tu' pui' tu bua nam jax jiñ iattulhi'ñ, cham bhai' dho ba' moo na jaroi' mui'p bañ bai'ñchu'nda' ja bui. Gu' aañ bhammɨ dɨr ja'k ji nañ jix aa' nañ bhɨɨya' buiñor gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam nach ba' maap tu a'ga' gui' nam jaroi'ñ iattulhi'ñ.
44025012	Ba' gux kai' Pesto nat pu'ñi kai, xi ja tɨkkarak gui' nam aagi'ñdha' na jax ja'k jir am ka' gu tu' no' jax jix dhuñiim. Mi' dhɨr ba' moo gio mi'p ji ɇɇk jup tɨtda gu Paablo: ―Dho bak gu' bhammɨ dɨr ja'k bhɨɨya' ap ku giñ jaduuñ buiñor gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam, nap gu' dɨɨlh pui' ba kai'ch.
44025013	Ba' gui' nar gɇ'kam ka' Agriipa tɨɨgim bɨɨma'n gu bɨnga'n Berniis tɨɨgim mummɨ ba ai mɨt Sesareeya nam paxiartudim gux kai' Pesto.
44025014	Ba' na mɨt gu' mui' tanoolh mi' juruuñ, ba' gux kai' Pesto ba aagi'ñ gu gɇ'kam na jax ja'k tu tu'ii' buiñor gu Paablo, jup tɨtda: ―Maa'n ya' kuup gu maa'nkam nat ya' pu cham xi do'ñchok gu Peeles gui' na bɨɨpɨ' dɨr ya'r jix kai' kat.
44025015	Ba' maa'nnim na ñich ma jii bhammɨ Jerusaleen, bhai' pui' bañ chɨtda am gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam gio gui' nam ja'ppɨx jir ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gu Israel kam ja'tkam nañ sap tu chiñia' nam mu'aa' gu Paablo.
44025016	Gu' ji nañ gu' aañ jup ja tɨtda nach cham tu' pui' ja'k tu jim aach nach jɨ'k jir ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam nach moop ba ji mu'aa' gu jaroi' no' mɨt pu'ñi chakui tu a'ga gu jaroi' bɨɨma'n nam xim bhabhaakui'ñdha' na ba'x maatɨ' ka' na jax ja'k jix chu buusnia'.
44025017	Ba' moo jano' na mɨt pai' dhuuk ya' ai, pu buimgidhak ba tu chia chich nam bha baidha' gu Paablo mi' na pai' tum a'gada' nam ba' mi' tu a'ga' maap.
44025018	Ku gu' na mɨt pai' dhuuk bhai' ji chu a'ga, cham tu' pui' ja'k ji chɨi mɨt ji nañ aañ jax ja'k ɨlhii'ñ nam tɨ'ya' gɨt, nim maa'n dho moo ku mɨt bhaan tu a'ga gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam.
44025019	Dai nam jax ja'k tu jim dɨɨlh jamɨt pɨx bhaan bhai' ji chu a'ga na sap cham mi' pui' jim gu Paablo, gio sap na pui' kai'ch nat giop dua gu jaroi' na pui' tɨɨ' Jesuus na mɨt tɨi mua.
44025020	Gu' ba' aañ nañ gu' cham maat na jax ja'k jir am gu dhi' pui' nam jax kai'ch, aañ xi chɨkka gu Paablo no' moox bhai' nach mu jimia' bhammɨ Jerusaleen nañ ba' bhammɨ ja kaaya' gu dhi' pui' nam jax kai'ch.
44025021	Gu' ji na gu'p kai'ch na sap bhammɨ dɨr ja'k buiñor gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam jix aa' nam maap tu a'ga' gui' nam jaroi'x bhaamki'ñ. Ba' aañ ya' pɨx ka xi chu chia nam kuupka' nañ ba' mi' dhɨr gatuuk mui' ba tu jootsa' nam mu baidhika' pai' na duuk jir am ka'.
44025022	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk tɨɨmu na pui' xi chu a'gimɨk gux kai' Pesto, mui' ji ñio gu Agriipa, jup tɨtda: ―Aañ dho pui'p jix kaim gu jaduuñ nap jaroi' aa' na jax ba' ja'k moo xi bua na tu a'gada'. Ba' gu Pesto gio mui'p ji ñio, jup tɨtda: ―Jir am dho jia nach kabuimuk kaipu'. Kagɨt na jax xi buada' nap kaaya'.
44025023	Ba' na bar buimgidhak, mui' ma jii gu Agriipa bɨɨma'n gu bɨnga'n Berniis na mɨt ba kaim gu Paablo na jax ja'k xi buada' na tu a'ga' mi' na pai' jax ba tum a'gada'. Dai na mɨt jai' xi chɨm tɨi'dhak gu jajannulh gui' nam jax chu'm gɇ'gɇrkam ja tɨ'ka' na sap ba'x maatɨ' ka' nam jir gɇ'gɇrkam. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai na mɨt mui' ba baap mi' na pai' tum a'gada' ja bɨɨm gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gu sandaarui'x gio gui' nam jɨ'k jir a'aixkam mi' dhi gɇ' kiicham. Mi' dhɨr ba' xi chu joot gux kai' Pesto nam bai'ñpu' gu Paablo.
44025024	Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk mi' ba aich, mui' ji chu a'ga gux kai' Pesto, jup kai'ch: ―Dho ya' dho bap tu'ii' dhich jaduuñ nap saak jix kaim aapi'ñ jaduuñ Agriipa gio aapi'm na pim jɨ'k ya'p tu'ii'. Ba' dhi' gu Israel kam ja'tkam maa'n nam ya' iattulhi'ñ aañ jiñ bui, sia bhammɨ Jerusaleen na ñich mu jimɨɨk maa'nnim pu'ñip jiñ chɨtda am, gio na pɨx cham jɨ'x ɨɨkix nam bhañ chian nañ sap tu chiñia' nam mu'aa'.
44025025	Gu' ji na gu' aañ nañ pui' xiñ aa', panaas cham tu' jax bua gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam na jax ja'k moox bhaigɨt nañ tu chiñia' nam mu'aa'. Gu' ji nat gu' dɨɨlh pui' ja'k jup tɨi na sap buiñor ja'k gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam maap tu a'ga' am gui' nam jaroi'x bhaamki'ñ, ba' mui' tɨip jix chu jootsam ka' iñ nam mu baidhika'.
44025026	Gu' ji na gu' cham bhai' nañ jax ja'k mui' xi chu ua'ñxidha' gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam, nañ gu' cham maat nat tu' jax dhuu dhich jaduuñ Paablo. Ba' aañ pu kai'ñkam bha jam bai'ñxi xib aapi'm na pim jɨ'k ya'p tu'ii' gio aap gɇ'kam jiñ jaduuñ Agriipa, na pim ba' kaaya' na jax ja'k tu a'ga' na ba' gu' aañ jup jix bhaai'n ka' nañ jax ja'k mu tu ua'ñxidha' gu gɇ'kam Rooma kam.
44025027	Ja'p dho ji na gu' cham jir am aañ jiñ bui nañ moo ja'p pɨx mui'p ba tu jootsa' gu jaroi' nam mu baidhika' no' ñich cham bɨɨx mu tu joot gu u'uan na pui'm kai'chidha' nat tu' jax dhuu.
44026001	Ba' gu Agriipa xi chia gu Paablo na mui' xi chu a'ga', jup tɨtda: ―Eap xi chu a'gañ jaduuñ nap jax ja'k ɨlhii'ñ. Ba' gu Paablo nobii'ñ kɨ'n ja'p xi ja duiñ gu ja'tkam nam sap cham ñiokda', ba' mui' ji chu a'ga, jup kai'ch:
44026002	―Moox bhai'ñ chaat iñ na ñich ya' ba ji chu a'ga aap jum bui gɇ'kam jiñ jaduuñ Agriipa, nañ gu'x maat nañ aap jum buiñ palhbuidha' gu dhi' pui' nam jax ja'k jiñ iattulhi'ñ gu Israel kam ja'tkam.
44026003	Nap gu' aap jix bhai'x maat jiañ jaduuñ gu dhi' pui' nach jɨ'k jax ja'k tu jim aach nach jir Israel kam ja'tkam gio nach jax ja'k tu a'gada' gu tu' no'ch bax a'gak. Ba' gu xib aañ pum tɨtda nap jix bhai' ka xiñ kaaya' gɨt no'p moo pui'p ɨlhii'ñdha' gɨt nañ jax jum tɨɨda'.
44026004	’Bɨɨx jam dhox maat gu Israel kam ja'tkam nañ jax ja'k tu jimdat jano' nañ pai' dhuuk ja bui kiokat bhammɨ Jerusaleen, sia gu pu ɨlhi'chdham dɨr.
44026005	Pui'p jix maat am dho nañ gammɨjɨ pui' ja'k tu jimda' na jax gui' nam pariseos jum tɨɨtɨ', gui' nam tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ bɨɨx na jɨ'k jax ja'k tu aagix. Jum aagi'ñdha' am dho no'm moo pui'p ɨlhii'ñdha' gɨt nam bha jimɨi ya' pum tɨɨda'.
44026006	Ba' gu xib dhi' kɨ'n pɨx ya'ñ chulhiiñchu'n am nañ mi' pui' tu daa'ñchu' gu pui' nat jax ja'k tu ja daaxdhak gu Dios gu bɨjɨk dɨr kam jich bopxi kat na gatuuk pu tu duñia'.
44026007	Ba' aach nach jɨ'k jir bopxi'ñ gu mambhɨɨx gook maamra'n gu Jakob, tɨ nɨɨr ich na pai' dhuuk pui' ji chu buusnia' gu dhi' pui' nat jax ja'k tu ja daaxdhak, pui' kuch ba' aach gammɨjɨ tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios nabap tanoolh gio nabap tukaa'. Ba' gu xib dhi' jɨ' kɨ'n pɨx ya'ñ iattulhi'ñ am gu Israel kam ja'tkam, nap ba' moox mat ka'ñ jaduuñ,
44026008	nam gu' cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ jia na gu Dios jir gɇ'kam, nax ai'chu'n na pu tu duñia' nam gio duduadɨip baapmigia' gu koi'ñga'n.
44026009	’Aañ dho bɨɨpɨ' dɨr nañ chakui tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor gu Jesuus Nasareet kam, pui'ñ aa'nda' iñ nañ bɨɨx aixim tu dooda' na jax ja'k dui cham jaroi' bhaan ka tɨtɨɨ'ñchuka' gɨt buiñor.
44026010	Pui' ñich dho gu' tu dooda' maa'nnim bhammɨ Jerusaleen kɨ'n gu u'uan na mɨt jiñ maa gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu daanda' ja a'mkam gu Israel kam ja'tkam. Mui' ñich dho gu' ja da'ngɨk ja kuu nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor gu Jesuus, gio ba' nam pai' dhuuk ba ji ja kooda', aañ jai' bɨɨx pui'p xiñ aa'nda' nar am gu pui' nam jax ja buada'.
