46014037	No' jaroi' pui'm aa' na dhi'r a'mkamu'n na ja aagi'ñdha' gu jai'ch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios, piam ku jaroi' pui'm aa' na mi' pui' jim na jax jurtudim gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda', dhi' bhaan matgilhia' na sɨlhkam jir pui' no' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na Dios pɨx pui' ja'k jix aa' dhi' nañ jɨ'k jax mu tu jam ua'ñi'ñ.
46014038	Ba' no' gu' cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ, dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na cham tu'r pui' ka', ba' guch Xoi'kam cham tu'p kam buixdha' ɨp buiñor.
46014039	Ba' aañ pu jam tɨtda aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, na pim dhi' pɨk bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka' na gɨt jir jam a'mkam ka', na pim ja aagi'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios. Gio cham tu'ñ ja'p kai'ñkam jup kai'ch ɨp na pim cham ja do'ñchoka' jai' dhɨt no'm jix chu daañik jai' ñiiñio'k kɨ'n. Jir am ji no'm jix chu daañik,
46014040	dai pɨx ji na pim mi' pui' tu duiñchu'nda' na jax ja'k jix bhai' ji chu buusnichgɨda' jam bui bɨɨx.
46015001	Jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, xib jañ ba' giop xi jam tɨ'ñchoixdha' na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam dhi' na ñich jax chu'm tu jam a'gi, dhi' na pim bhaan tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat mi' pui' jiim sia gu xib.
46015002	Dhi' pɨx jix bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam cham mu ja'k jam bhɨichdha' na pim pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha' no' pim gammɨjɨ mi' pui' xi jiim na jɨ'k jax jum kai'ch na pimɨt kai jano' na ñich tu jam a'gi. Na gu' no' pim cham mi' pui' jiim, jir ja'p pɨx sia ku pim tɨi tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ.
46015003	Jano' na ñich jax kia'pɨx bhammɨ tu jam a'gi aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ, dhi' pɨx jañich jup jam aa'ñ na ñich aañ jax chu'm jup tu maat. Ja'pniñ jam tɨtda nat guch Xoi'kam jich a'mkam muu kɨ'n guch ua'tulhdhara'. Ba' ja'pni tu ua'ñix maa'n kap na mɨt pai' tu ua'nak gu bɨjɨk dɨr kam
46015004	nat baik tanoolh mi' juruuñ na mɨt pai' tɨɨ gu tukga'n, mi' dhɨr ba' gio dua'ñdhak jup buusai' gu Dios. Gio ja'p iam ja'pnip tu ua'ñix
46015005	nat mi' dhɨr maa'n kap bam maax buiñor gu Peegro, mɨkkat bɨɨx ja bui bam maax gu noonbi'ñ.
46015006	Jix io'm mɨkkat ja bui bam maax jix chamaam sianto gui' nam buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ. Mui' pui dudua am xib gui' na mɨt maaxik tɨɨ, sia ku mɨt gu' jai' dhɨt ba koi.
46015007	Mɨkkat buiñor bam maax ɨp gu Santiago, mɨkkat gio bɨɨx ja bui bam maax ɨp gu noonbi'ñ.
46015008	Mɨkkat dai aañ pɨx jiñ bui bam maax, cham tu' jumai buiñor kam maax, ja'p ji buusan nañ bar jigɨɨx ga'n pɨx.
46015009	Pui' kuñ ba' cham tu' ka'm jiñ ɨlhii'ñ ja bui gui' nam bɨɨpɨ' dɨr pu bar noonbi'ñ guch Xoi'kam, ni ku iam xiñ ñamɨɨk nañ pui'ñ chɨɨtɨ'nda' nañ pui'p jir nobii'ñ guch Xoi'kam, nañ gu'x ja bhaamkidhat gui' nam kaichgɨda', jir ja'tkam tugi'ñ ka' gu' tɨi gu Dios.
46015010	Gu' ji nat gu' xiñ joi'mdak jiñ chɨɨgɨk dɨɨlh gu Dios pu chu'm kɨ'n jiñ dhai nañ jir nobii'ñ ka' guch Xoi'kam, pui' nañ jax bar nobii'ñ ba' pui xib. Ba' cham tu'r tu' kub buiñor gu Dios nat xiñ joi'mdak pu chu'm kɨ'n jiñ dhai, na ñich gu' gɇ' bhaankam ba tu jua, cham tu' pui' na jax gu jai' nam jup jir noonbi'ñ guch Xoi'kam. Sia ku gu' cham tu' moo aañ dɨɨlh nax bhaai' nañ tu juan, gu' ja'pji gu Dios pɨx na xiñ joi'mdat jiñ palhbui'ñchu'.
46015011	Ku gu' cham jax bua ji sia ku ñich aañ tu jam a'gi piam sia kum gu jai' noonbi'ñ guch Xoi'kam tu jam a'gidha' gɨt, na gu' maa'n nam jax pɨx pu chu'm jup tu jam a'gidha' gɨt na pim jax chu'm bhaan tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat mi' pui' ba jiim xib.
46015012	Ba' aach pu chu'm nai' tu a'gim nat guch Xoi'kam duadɨk giop buus mi' dhɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr, gu' ji na gu' jai' dhɨt aapi'm sap pui' kai'ch nam gu koi'ñga'n cham jɨ'xdha' duduadɨi giop ka baapmigia'. ¿Jax japim ba' duukat pui' kai'ch?
46015013	No'r sɨlhkam ka' gɨt nam gu koi'ñga'n cham jɨ'xdha' duduadɨi giop ka baapmigia', dho bak pui mi' pai' kaat gu tukga'n guch Xoi'kam na mɨt pai' tɨɨ.
46015014	Gio no'r sɨlhkam ka' gɨt nat guch Xoi'kam cham tu' duadɨk giop buus mi' dhɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr, dho bak pur cham tu' ɨp nach nai' pu chu'm tu a'gim, ni ku pu cham tu' bhaai' sia ku pim aapi'm pui' ja'k tɨi ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ.
46015015	Gio bhaankam iatda'ch pɨx gɨt gu Dios nach pui' kai'ch nat gui' dua'ñdhak buusai' mi' dhɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr guch Xoi'kam sia kuch gu' tɨix maat na cham tu'r sɨlhkam, no' gu' pui' cham jɨ'xdha' giop duduadɨi ka baapmigia' am gu koi'ñga'n.
46015016	No' pim aapi'm pui' ja'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nam gu koi'ñga'n cham jɨ'xdha' duduadɨi giop ka baapmigia' nañ jax ba kai'ch, dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' na pim sia pui' ja'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nat guch Xoi'kam cham tu' duadɨk giop bam.
46015017	Gio pu cham tu' bhaai' sia ku pim aapi'm tɨi tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam no't gu' pui' cham duadɨk giop buus guch Xoi'kam mu dɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr, maa'n na jax jam a'm jup tu'ii' ba' gu ua'tulhdhara'.
46015018	Gio gui' na mɨt ba koi tɨi xi chɨ jɨɨ'ñdhak buiñor guch Xoi'kam, pu mai' ba suulh jamɨt ɨp bak.
46015019	Ja'p moox buam aach nach jɨ'k tɨi ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam no' gu' dai ya'ch chutku' bhaan nach ka dudua nax bhai' tuch jimda', mi' dhɨr nach pai' ko'ya', pu cham maat ich no'x bhai' tuch jimia' ka' ba' cham.
46015020	Gu' ji na gu' maaxik jir sɨlhkam nat guch Xoi'kam duduadɨk giop buus mi' dhɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr. Ja'p ji buus na jax gu bhaidha' na maa'n bɨɨpɨ' bhaaya' na ba' gu jai'p ba bhaaya', nach gu' aach mi' pui'p bhɨichu' nat pai' bhɨi guch Xoi'kam.
46015021	Pui' nat jax chum duu bɨjɨk nat maa'n pɨx bhaan dɨr gu maa'nkam jai'chdhɨr gu muuki', xib pu'ñi ɨp, maa'n pɨx jup jai'chdhɨr gu maa'nkam nat pui' ja'k jup tu duu nam duduadɨi baapmigia' gu koi'ñga'n.
46015022	Piam ja'pni ɨp, jax ña pim ja'k jix maatɨt kaaya': Gu Adaan pui' ja'k jich boi'ñxi nach jir tu ko'dam ka', ba' guch Xoi'kam pui' ja'k jup jich boi'ñxi nach duduadɨi giop baapmigia' nach ka ko'iix ka'.
46015023	Gu' ji na gu' dhi' aagix na pai' dhuuk pui' tum duñia', pui' na jax guch Xoi'kam nat bɨɨpɨ' duadɨk ba buus mi' dhɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr, aach ba' nach jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor gatuuk duduadɨip baapmigia' na pai' dhuuk gio bhai'p jimda'.
46015024	Jano' ba' bam aaya' nam tɨɨmo' dhi oi'ñga'n, ba' guch Xoi'kam gampai' ja iabu' gui' nam kar gɇ'gɇrkam ka' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, gampai' pɨx ji bi'ya' am, sia gui' na kax bhaai'n ka' nam bɨɨx aixim pu tu duñia' na jax chu'm cham jɨ'xdha' jaroi' ja'p pɨx pu tu duñia'. Ba' dai gu Dios, Gɨ'korga'n guch Xoi'kam pɨx bax jai'ch ka' nar gɇ'kam ka', na gu' guch Xoi'kam pɨx pui' ba tu duñia'.
46015025	Gɇ'kam kɨ'n ya aaya' gu' guch Xoi'kam dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, ba' bɨɨx pui' ja duñia' nam cham tu' kɨ'n ji bi'ya' gu gɇ'gɇrkam gui' nam cham kɨɨgalhdha'.
46015026	Jix io'm gatuuk am jup xi chɨbaañdha' gu muuki' na ya' kar gɇ'kam ka' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, pu cham tu' kɨ'n ji bi'ya' ɨp, pu cham ba' pai' ka jai'ch ka' gu muuki'.
46015027	Gu Dios pɨx dɨɨlh pui' ja'k tɨi na bɨɨx bɨtaa'n bap tu tui'ka' guch Xoi'kam na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch. Ba' na pui' kai'ch gu Dios na bɨɨx bɨtaa'n bap tu tui'ka' guch Xoi'kam na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch, cham tu' na bɨɨx jum aagɨt jup kai'ch gu Dios na bɨtaa'n bap tui'ka' guch Xoi'kam. Jax dhui na gu' gui' pɨx ba' pui' tu duiñchu' na bɨtaa'n bap tu tui'ka' guch Xoi'kam bɨɨx na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch.
46015028	Ba' na pai' dhuuk bɨɨx bɨtaa'n bap tu tui'ka' guch Xoi'kam, guch Xoi'kam dɨɨlh pui'p jum duñia' na bɨtaa'n jup tui'ka' gu Dios, na gu'r Gɨ'korga'n. Na gu' gu Gɨ'korga'n pui' ba tu duñia' na bɨɨx bɨtaa'n bap tu tui'ka' na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch, bɨɨx ba' bhaan jup tu tui'ka' gu Dios na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch.
46015029	Jai' dhɨt sap ja a'mkam jup jum bopkon japim gui' na mɨt ba koi cham jim bopkonak suudai' kɨ'n sia ku mɨt tɨi ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhak buiñor guch Xoi'kam, na pim sap ja'p jim aagɨt nam pu'ñi dhui jimia' buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Gu' ji no'm gu' pui' cham jɨ'xkat duduadɨi giop baapmigia' gu koi'ñga'n, ¿jax ku pim ba' ja a'mkam jup jum bopkon?
46015030	Gio aach nach tu a'ga gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam, ¿jax kuch ba'p jich dhɨkoo'ñdhatu' nach nai' tu a'gim sia pui'ch chulhiiñat gammɨjɨ?
46015031	Jix maat japim dhoñ jaaduñ nam gammɨjɨ pɨx xiñ mu'aak ka' gu ja'tkam nabap tanoolh, ku gu' aañ jix bhai'ñ chaat ji na pim aapi'm ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
46015032	Gio bhammɨ dɨr Eepeso ñich jup tu daa ja bui gu ja'tkam jix bhaa'mnagɨm nam ja'p tu jim na gu gampɨx kam nam jix chu bhaa'mna'. Pur ja'p pɨx bak ba' sia kuñ jax jiñ bua, nam gu' pui' cham jɨ'xdha' giop duduadɨi baapmigia' gu koi'ñga'n, dai ba' pui' pɨx bax bhaai' nam jax kai'chdha' gu ja'tkam nach pui' xi chu buimɨi nach jax ɨlhii'ñ na kapbhai' kam kɨɨ' dhi a'oo. Na gu' no't bam kajaa, cham tu' ka bhaai'n ka' gu tu' nach jax dhuñia'.
46015033	Chaam tu' ji nar pui'ñ jaaduñ, cha'pim nai' pɨx ja jɨɨgi'ñdha' gu jai' jax nam kai'chdha'. Na gu' maaxik jir pui' na saak jax kai'ch maa'nnim gu jaroi', na cham jir kɨɨ' no'ch ja bɨɨm jiim gui' nam maakam ɨlhii'ñdha' gu tu', no'ñ gu' aañ tɨi pui' ja'k ɨlhii'ñ na jax jir mi' pui', cham tu' ba' pui' ji chu buusnia' nañ jax tɨi ɨlhii'ñdha'.
46015034	Cha'pim kam ua'tulhi'ñdha'ñ jaaduñ. Jix bhai' pim xim ga'ngidhat mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jir am, pui' pim ja'k mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax ja'k bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na pim jix bhai' jam jur bia'. Ja'p tu jim japim gu' jai' dhɨt na pim panaas pu cham maat gu Dios, pui' kuñ ba' pui' jam tɨtda na pim ba' iam jix xi'ɨrai mi' pui' ba jimia'.
46015035	No' maadɨt jaroi' tɨ tɨkka nam jax ba' ja'k ba jim duñia' gu koi'ñga'n nam pai' dhuuk duduadɨi ba ji baapmigia', no' gu' jax kai'ch na jax ba'r tu'm ka', no' maaxik gio tuuku' bɨnkam jup bamgia' ka' ba' cham,
46015036	jix ñaanbim kai'chdha' gu jaroi' no' pui' kai'ch, maaxik jix maatɨ' gu' sia tu' na pɨx. Pui' na jax gu jaroi' no't ba ɨi gu jax chu'm kaichuk, bɨɨpɨ' dɨbaa' gu kaichuk na ba' mi' dhɨr takchai bhai' ba buusnia'.
46015037	Gio bar jaagam ka' na bhai' ba buusnia', cham tu' kar kaichuk ka'. Na gu' gu kaichuk nax jai'ch, jai'r ka'kbulhik, jai'r gai chɇ'tɇb ja'p na jax gu tiriik.
46015038	Na gu' gu Dios pɨx pu chu'm jup duñia' jax ña tu'm jix aa'nda' na buusnia', sia moo nar jax chu'm kaichuk ka' gɨt, dai na pu chu'm tu jaa'nka' na jax chu'm aagix na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na dhi'r di' gu jax chu'm na mim ɨxia'.
46015039	Gio pui' na jax gu tu' nam jix chu jai'ch ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, na gu' cham tu' maa'n nam jax chu'm bɨɨx. Aach nach jir ja'tkam, cham tu' pu chu'm ich nam jax chu'm gu sasoi' gio gu gampɨx kam nam jix chu jai'ch. Sia gu boptop jir maakam tu'm am gio gu u'ji'.
46015040	Ba'x dhaam ja'k pu chu'm jup jix chu jai'ch am nam jax chu'm jix chu jai'ch ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, dai nam pu chu'm kɨ'n a'bhartudhix na jax chu'm jix aa' gu Dios nam jix jai'ch ka' gux dhaam kam, ja'p nam jax chu'm kɨ'n jup a'bhartudhix gui' nam ya' dhi oi'ñga'n jix chu jai'ch.
46015041	Gio bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n jir maakam tu'm am, pui' na jax gu tanoolh na gu' cham tu' pu chu'm jup tu tonni'ñ na jax chu'm tu tonni'ñ gu masaa'n, gio gu chiichia' maakam tu'm jup mɨmɨimda' am, sia ji gu' dɨɨlh dai chiichia' bɨɨx aixim tu'm xi mɨmɨimda' am jai'.
46015042	Pu'ñi ba'm duñia' am gu koi'ñga'n jano' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' nam gio duduadɨip baapmigia'. Dɨbaa' dho dhich chutku' nam pai' dhuuk jich yaaspa'. Gu' ji na gu' nach pai' dhuuk duduadɨi giop baapmigia', cham tu' ka tɨ dɨ'nbarda' ich, nach gu' cham tu' kar tu ko'dam ka'.
46015043	Gio gu' na pai' dhuuk dɨbaa' guch chutku', jix buam tu'm jup jum duñia', gu' ji nam gu'x a'bhar jup jim dui ba bubuakia' jano' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' nam giop duduadhia', ba' cham jɨ'xkat ka ko'ya' am.
46015044	Jir bakaax ka' dhich chutku' nam pai' dhuuk jich yaaspa', gu' ji nach gu' dai ii'mda' pɨx ba bubuakia' jano' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' nach gio duduadɨip baapmigia'. Jix jai'ch am gu' gu tutku' ii'mda' bhaan, ja'p na jax ya' bakaax bhaan nam jix jai'ch.
46015045	Jup jum kai'ch gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios maa'n kap na mɨt pai' tu ua'nak gu bɨjɨk dɨr kam nat sap bhai' ji dhua gu bɨɨpɨ' kam maa'nkam nat ba jai'chdhɨr na ba' mi' dhɨr ya' bar kiokam ka' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, ba' dhi' gu jano' kam Adaan na aagɨt jup kai'ch. Ba' gu jumai Adaan nat xib ya'p ai, nar dhi' pɨx guch Xoi'kam, ii'mda'p jum duu nach ba' aach pu chu'm jup jich dhuñia' ɨp.
46015046	Ba' dhi' ja'pnir jum duukam: Bɨɨpɨ'ch ya' xi oipimɨi bakaax bhaan nach ba' gatuuk ii'mda' bap jich dhuñia'.
46015047	Na gu' gu bɨɨpɨ' kam maa'nkam dɨbɨɨr pɨx jup duñiix, gu' gu jumai nat ya'p ai gatuuk, jir jix dhaam kam.
46015048	Gio bɨɨx na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan jir tu pu chu'm na jax chu'm gu maa'nkam gui' nat bɨɨpɨ' jai'chdhɨr ya' dhi oi'ñga'n. Gio gui' na jɨ'k tu'p jix chu jai'ch jix dhaam ja'k, jir tu pu chu'm ɨp na jax chu'm gui' nax dhaam dɨr jim.
46015049	Ba' pui' nach jax jir tu'm xib na jax gu maa'nkam gui' nat bɨɨpɨ' jai'chdhɨr, gatuuk jach pu chu'm jup jich dhuñia' ɨp na jax chu'm gui' nat jix dhaam dɨr ya' ai.
46015050	Ja'pniñ kai'ñkam jup jam tɨtdañ jaaduñ nach cham tu' pu chu'm jimia' buiñor gu Dios na pai' dhɨr jir gɇ'kam nach jax chu'm ya' oipo xib, cham tu' bɨnkam dhich bakxi' ni dhich a'oo.
46015051	Kani nañ xi jam aa'ñdha' na jax ja'k tu duñia' gu Dios gatuuk, gui' pɨx pui'ñ jurtu'n nañ ba' aañ ya' dɨr jup jam aagi'ñdha', cham jaroi' jumaix maat gu dhi' pui': Na aach nach jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, cham tu' bɨɨx ko'iix ka' ich jano' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' nam gio duduadɨip baapmigia' gu koi'ñga'n, kuch ji gu' bɨɨx maa'n jimdam maakam tu'm jup jich dhuñia' ji,
46015052	ja'p na jax nach maa'nnim kupiogia'. Jano' na maa'nnim pɨx ba tum kuichdha'x dhaam dɨr, duduadɨi bhai' ji baapmigia' am bɨɨx gui' nam ko'iix ka', ba' dai gui' nach jɨ'k duduaka' nach tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, jotmoda' maakam tu'm jup jich dhuñia' ich.
46015053	Gu Dios pɨx dɨɨlh jai'p ja duñia' dhich chutku' nam xib kar tu ko'dam, gio nam kar tɨ dɨ'nbadam, pu chu'm jup ja duñia' nam jax chu'm cham jɨ'xkat ka ko'ya', nam pu gammɨjɨ pu ba duduaka'.
46015054	Ba' jano' nach pai' dhuuk pui' bach dhuñia', bam aaya' gu tanoolh na pai' dhuuk tu aagɨt jup kai'ch maadɨt gu bɨjɨk dɨr kam maa'n kap nat pai' ja'pni tu ua'nak: “Ampɨx ma'iich jamɨt gu muuki', pu cham pai' ka matgir ba'.
46015055	¿Paa pich ba' ja'k jax jum duu xib Muuki' nap kar gɇ'kam kat? ¿Jum ɨɨkchulh jamɨt aa gui' nap kɨ'n ka tu koo'ndat?”
46015056	Gu ua'tulhdhara' pɨx kɨ'n tu koo'n gu muuki', ba' gu ua'tulhdhara' dhi' bhaan jup tu da'ngɨ na jɨ'k jax tu aagix nam tui'ñgɨt mi' pui' jiimda' gu ja'tkam.
46015057	Gu' ji na gu' gu Dios jir jix bhai'kam jich bui, aañ taxchaabgi'ñ, nat gu' gui' pɨx pui' tu duu nach bhaankam guch Xoi'kam tu' pɨx bia' gu muuki'.
46015058	Ba' mi' pim pui' xi jiimda' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam. Jix io'm japim bhaankam xi chu juanda', cham tu'r ja'ppɨx ka' gu' buiñor gu Dios gu tu' na pim jax buada'.
46016001	Ba' ja'p jañ jup xi jam tɨɨdam jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, na pim jumpada' gu tuumiñ na pim ja makia' gu jai' nam pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam gui' nam Jerusaleen oi'dha'. Pui' pim ja'k duñia' nañ jax ja aagi'ñ gu jai' nam pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam nam jɨ'kchi kap jum jumpadat jup tu daan na jɨ'x Galaasia bhaan bipio' gu dɨbɨɨr.
46016002	Nabap tumiiñku ta'm japim jɨ'k bi'aidha' gu jam mai'chɨk na pim ba' ampɨk mui' ba jumpada' na pim ba' cham kia'pɨx bha ja'p bam tataanda' jano' nañ pai' dhuuk bhammɨ aaya' nañ mu jam tɨɨ'mɨra'.
46016003	Aañ ba' dɨɨlh bhai' dhɨr tu ja ua'ñdhai ja makia' gu jaroi' na pim ja aa'nda' nam mu jimia' Jerusaleen nam ja do'ñchi'ñpu'.
46016004	Piam ku pim gu' jax kai'ch nañ aañ mu jimia', aañ dho mui'p jimia', dai nañ gu' pui' pɨx jup jix aa' nam jɨ'k jiñ oidha' bhai' dhɨr nach ba' maap. Dɨɨlh japim xi ja aa'nda' gu jaroi' nam jiñ oidha'.
46016005	Nañ pai' dhuuk mui' ji jimia' nañ mu jam tɨɨ'mɨra', bhai' dhɨr ja'p jañ bhɨɨya' na pai' Masedoonia bhaan bipio' gu dɨbɨɨr nañ ba' bhai' dhɨr ja'k ba aaya'.
46016006	Cham maat iñ no'ñ bhai' dhɨr jam bui buusaidha' gux jɨɨp na ba miamlhim, ka'ñ ji ba' gu' jotmoda' pɨx bhai' xi ɇɇji jam bui maakam ja'k jup bhɨɨya'. Ba' aañ pui'p jam tɨtda na pim pui'p jiñ palhbuidha' gu tu' nañ kɨ'n bhai' dhɨr jimia' pai' na ja'k jum aa'nda'.
46016007	Tɨi dho cham aa' iñ nañ xib bhai' pɨx jup ba buusnichgɨda', gu' ji na gu' dɨɨlh jix maat gu Dios, iam gɨt pui' tɨ'ya' nañ jɨ'k bhai' xi jam juruuñxidhai.
46016008	Dai ya' Eepesoñ ya' ka xi juruuñdha', ya' buusaidha' iñ bhaan Pentekostees ta'm.
46016009	Ya'ñ ka xi chu a'ga ya' oirɨt gu ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam na kapbhai' kar joidham. Jix chaat iñ jiñ jur am bhaan nam mui' ka tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha', sia kum gu' jai' dhɨt xiñ bhaamki'ñ.
46016010	No't bhai' ba ji buus jam bui gu Timoteo, jix bhai' pim duñia' na ba' cham tu' bhaan jax jum aa'nda', pui' bhaankam jup tu juan gu' guch Xoi'kam ja'p na jax aañ.
46016011	Bɨɨx pɨx japim jix bhai' duñia' aapi'm na pim bhai' oi'dha' na pim tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Xi palhbuidha' pim ɨp gu tu' na kɨ'n bhañ chɨɨ'mɨra' ja bɨɨm gu jai'ch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham, aañ gu' ya' dɨr nɨɨra.
46016012	Tɨiñ soi' tɨtda gu Apoolos na pui'p jir jich jaduuñ guch Xoi'kam bhaan na jɨ'k ja baidhai guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham mui'p jam tɨɨ'mɨra', gu' ji na gu' sap cham jax jix bhaai', ku gu' sap mu jimia' ji pai' na duuk jix bhaai'n ka'.
46016013	Mi' pim pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam, gammɨjɨ pim tu' sɨlhkam buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat. Cha'pim jum o'jolhi'ñdha', ni ku pim cham tu' bhaan jum tukgi'ñka' gu tu' na pu cham tu' mi nɨnɨi'ñ.
46016014	Gio na pim pai' dhuuk jix bhai' ja buada' gu jai', tu' sɨlhkam kɨ'n japim jix ja joi'mdat jix bhai' ja buada'.
46016015	Jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, aapi'm jix maat nat gu Esteepanas ja bɨɨm gui' nam maap jir jum oi'dhagɨm bɨɨpɨ' tɨ jɨɨ'ñ jamɨt na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam, pu cham jai'x jai'ch ka' am jano' nam pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam na jɨ'x Akaaya bhaan bipio' gu dɨbɨɨr. Xib ba' dai nam bɨxchu' pɨx kɨ'n ja palhbui'ñ gu jai' nam pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
46016016	Pu'ñi pim jup xi chu duñia' aapi'm na jax gui' am, gam na pim jax ja nɨi'ñ sia gu jai' nam pu'ñi bhaankam tu juan gu Dios.
46016017	Jix bhai'ñ ɨlh jañich na mɨt ya' xiñ ɇɇk gu Esteepanas gio gu Portunaatu gio gu Akaiku, na mɨt gu' jam a'mkam jiñ gu'ngux.
46016018	Bɨɨx aixim bhaan jiñ gu'ngux jamɨt, ja'p na pim jax ja'k jiñ gu'nguxdha' gɨt no' pim dɨɨlh bha jimia'. Jix io'm japim jix bhai' ja buada' gui' nam pu'ñi tu gu'nguxi'ñdha'.
46016019	Ya' dɨr mu jam ñio'ki'ñ am guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham nam jɨ'kchi kap maap jum jumpadat tu daan ya' na jɨ'x Aasia dɨbɨɨr bhaan bipio'. Sia mu jam ñio'ki'ñ gu Akiila gio gu Priiska, gam gui' nam jɨ'k ja bɨɨm maap tu daan ja ki'aam.
46016020	Bɨɨx jam ya' dɨr mu jam ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham. Gammɨjɨ pim xim ñiñio'kdhat ɨp aapi'm dɨɨlh, pui' pim ja'k jum ñiñio'ki'ñdha' na jax ja'k bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na pim xim ja joi'gɨ'n.
46016021	Ba' dɨɨlh jiñ ñob kɨ'n jañ palhɨɨp ya'p xi chu jam ua'ñxidha' aañ Paablo nañ bhaan jam tabuimgidha'.
46016022	No' jaroi' maadɨt cham soi'm ɨlhdhat daan guch Xoi'kam, aañ pu kai'ch na cham bhai' tu jimia' dhi' dhi jaduuñ, gamɨmmɨ tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios. Ba' aañ ya' dɨr pum tɨtda aapi' Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam nap jootom gio bhai'p xi jimda' gɨt.
46016023	Ba' guch Xoi'kam pɨx gammɨjɨ jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n.
46016024	Aañ pu gammɨjɨ xi jam joi'gɨ'nda' bhaankam guch Xoi'kam, sia pɨk nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt. Ja'pni daipu'.
47001001	Aañ Paablo nañ jir nobii'ñ guch Xoi'kam, nat gu Dios pɨx pu chu'm kɨ'n jiñ dhai, jam ñio'ki'ñ iñ bɨɨma'n gu Timoteo nar jiñ jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan. Aapi'm jach jam ñio'ki'ñ na pim bhai' dhɨr oi'dha' Koriinto na pim pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gam sia gu jai'ch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham nam nai' ja'p jup tu'ii' bɨɨx na jɨ'x Akaaya bhaan bipio' gu dɨbɨɨr.
47001002	Ba' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' gio gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam xi jam joi'mdat jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' am na ba'x bhai' tu jam jimda'.
47001003	Gammɨjɨch taxchaabgi'ñdha' gu Dios gui' nar Gɨ'korga'n gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam, na gu' gammɨjɨ xich joi'mdat jich gu'nguxi'ñ.
47001004	Jich gu'nguxi'ñdha' no'ch tu' bhaan jich chulhiiñ nach ba' ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k pui'p ja gu'nguxi'ñdha' gui' nam pui'p jum tulhiiñdha'. Ja'xbui'ch jup ja gu'nguxi'ñdha' na jɨ'x jich gu'nguxi'ñdha' aach gu Dios.
47001005	Ja'xbui'x io'm jich chulhiiñ ich gu' nat jɨ'x jum tulhii guch Xoi'kam ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, gio ja'xbui'p jich gu'nguxi'ñ ɨp gu Dios nat jɨ'x gu'nguxdhimɨk guch Xoi'kam jano'.
47001006	Gu' ba' aach nach jich chulhiiñ, pu kai'ñkam jich chulhiiñ ich na ba'x bhai' tu jam jimia' aapi'm, na pim gu' cham mu ja'k ka bhɨɨya' na pim pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'. Jam gu'nguxdhatu' gu Dios ja'p na jax jich gu'nguxdhatu' aach na pim ba' cham jum o'jolhdhat mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' sia ku pim jup jum tulhiiñ.
47001007	Jix bhai'x maat ich ba' na pim mi' pui' pu jiimda' na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam, nach gu'x maat na jam gu'nguxdhatu'nda'.
47001008	Aañ jam aagi'ñdha'ñ jaaduñ na chich jax jich chulhii maa'nnim ya ja'p dhi Aasia dɨbɨɨr bhaan, nañ gu'x aa' na pim jix mat ka'. Jix io'm tuch ma'iich, cham ka bhaai' nach jax jich dhuñia'. Ni jɨ'x kuch cham ka ɨlhii'ñ no'ch duduakam jup ka bubuakia' ya' dɨr,
47001009	jup jich aa' ich gu' nam jich gɨbiimɨich kooda'. Ba' dhi' bhaan maat jachich na cham tu'r sɨlhkam ka' jax ñach ɨlhii'ñdha' dɨɨlh, gu' ja'pji dai gu Dios nach tɨ'ñchoka' na gui'ch palhbui'ñdha' sia tu' na pɨx kɨ'n, sia koi'ñga'n ja duduadhi'ñ gu'.
47001010	Gui' pɨx Dios gu' nat jich palhbui, jix maat ich ba' na gammɨjɨ pui' puch palhbui'ñchu'nda',
47001011	gam no' pim gu' aapi'm jai'ch a'mkam xi chu daan nax bhai' tuch jimda'. No' pimɨt mui' dhɨt tu daanɨch a'mkam nax bhai' tuch jimda', mui'p jai'chdhɨlhia' am gu ja'tkam nam taxchaabgidha' gu Dios, nam gu'x bhai'm taat ka' na bɨxchu' kɨ'n jich palhbui'ñchu'nda' nach tu a'gim gu ñio'ki'ñ.
47001012	Aach cham tu'x buam jum duukam jup tu duñiim jiñ jaaduñ nach xich ga'nga, jix bhai'ch chaat ich ba'. Mi' pui' jiim ich gu' na jax ja'k jum aa' nach mi' pui' jiimda' nach ya' ka oipo dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, pui' na jax aapi'm nach gu' cham tu' tu' bhaan jax jam tɨtda ku pim gu' bhaan jix buam jup bam aa'. Gio nach gu' cham tu' pui' ja'k jujurtɨk na jax gu ja'tkam ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n, gu' ja'pji na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios na jaroi' xich joi'mdat jich ñɨidhim.
47001013	Gui' na chich mu tu jam ua'ñxi, dai pui' pɨx ja'k jum aa' na pim duñia' na jax pɨx jum kai'ch na pimɨt jiñkai, cham tu' na bɨɨx aixim jir jum duukam. Tɨiñ tu jam daañxi'ñ na pim gɨt iam mi' pui'x maatɨt kaaya' na jax pɨx kai'ñkam jup jum kai'ch.
47001014	Gio gu'ch ñɨi'ñ japim aach nach jax ja'k mi' pui' jiim, jɨ'x bax maat japim ba' na jax ja'k jum aa' nach mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam. Gu' ba' no' pimɨt gu' mi' pui' jii na jax aach, jix bhai'm ɨlhdha' pim jich bui jano' na guch Xoi'kam gio bhai'p jimda', na pim gu' ba machia' nar sɨlhkam ka'. Aach ba' pui'x bhai'p jich ɨlhdha' jam bui.
47001015	Ba' nañ pui' jiñ aagɨt bɨɨx dhi' nañ jax jam tɨtda, pui bañ aagɨk jañich nañ mu jam guguuxdhara', gookim jañ sap gɨt bhai' ji aaya'.
47001016	Nañ gu' sap bɨɨpɨ' bhai' xi jam ɇɇji gɨt nañ Masedoonia ja'k bhɨɨya', gioñ sap ba' bhai'p bhɨɨya' gɨt nañ ja'k gɨxia'. Ja'p jañ sap ba' jam tɨɨda' gɨt na pim bhai' dhɨr jiñ palhbuidha' gu tu' nañ kɨ'n aaya' Judea ja'k.
47001017	Jix maat gu Dios nañ tɨi pui' bañ aagɨt, gu' ji na pim gu' chi aapi'm pui'm aa' nañ jir gook ñiokdam. Jax dhui nañ gu' aañ dai pui' ja'k tu ñiok na jɇɇ', cham jɨ'xkat jax kai'ch iñ na cham.
47001018	Siax maat gu Dios nach cham tu'r gook ñiokdam, jax dhui nach gu' gammɨjɨ pui' pu jam tɨtdada' na maaxik jir sɨlhkam ka' jax nach kai'chdha'.
47001019	Jano' na chich bhaan tu jam a'gi guch Xoi'kam gui' nar Maraa'n gu Dios, jano' nach maap jiim gu Silbaano gio gu Timoteo, cham tu' chich gio pui'p jam tɨɨ'n mɨkkat na cham jir sɨlhkam pui' na chich jax chu jam a'gi, pu pui' ja'k bii na chich jax ja'k tu jam a'gi, na gu' maaxik pui' ja'k jir sɨlhkam. Na gu' gu Dios pɨx dɨɨlh na pui' ja'k tu ñiok, tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhidhat pui' kai'chdha' na pui' tu tui'ka', nat gu' guch Xoi'kam pɨx pui' ba tu duu na mi' pui' tu tui'ñgɨda' na jax jir sɨlhkam.
47001020	Nat gu' gu Dios dhi' pɨx jich Xoi'kam bhaan pui' tu duu nat tu' ja aa'ñdhak guch bopxi kat bɨjɨk, pui' kuch ba'p kai'chdha' nach pai' dhuuk tɨɨmoidha' nach tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios: “Ee ku pui' tu tui'ka' bhaankam guch Xoi'kam.”
47001021	Bɨɨx ba' maap jup tu'ii' ich buiñor guch Xoi'kam, aapi'm gio aach. Gu Dios pɨx dɨɨlh pui' kai'ch nach pui' ja'k tu'ii', nat gu'ch a'm tɨ tɨɨ nach aach jir ja'tkam tugi'ñ ka'.
47001022	Ba' na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nach aach jir ja'tkam tugi'ñ, jich chajaañ gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n, gam nach ba' dhi' bhaan machia' na gatuuk gɇ'p jum duukam tuch makia'.
47001023	Ba' na ñich jax kai'ñkam chakui mu jam tɨɨgim na ñich jax bañ aagɨk, nañ tɨi mi' pɨx ka xi jam nɨi'ñ dho no' pimɨt moo mi' pui' ba ji jii nañ jax jam tɨtda bɨɨpɨ' dɨr. Dios dhox maat nañ pui' kai'ñkam cham mu jimmɨ, gui'ñ baabuidha' guñ ii'mda' no'ñ jam iatgi'ñ.
47001024	Cham jir am gu' nach moop jam chian na pim mi' pui' jimia', gu' ja'pji dɨɨlh na pim mi' pui' xi dhuñia' cham jax ji kai'chɨt, na pim gu' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Aach dai nach mu jam palhbui'ñ pɨx na pim jax ja'k jix io'm jix bhai'm taatɨt buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam.
47002001	Pu kai'ñkam jañich cham mu jam tɨɨgim na pim ba' cham jix io'm jix buam jum ɨlhdha' na pim bañ chɨgia'.
47002002	Na gu' no' pimɨt dai bhai'x buam jim ɨlh no' ñich tɨi bhammɨ dɨr ba ai, cham jaroi' jai'ch ka' nañ gu'nguxdha' aañ, na pim gu' daix buam jum aa'nda' aapi'm.
47002003	Ja'p pɨx jañ ba' mu tu jam ua'ñi'ñ ɨp gio xib ja'p na jax bɨɨpɨ' dɨr, nañ gu' cham mu jimiim nañ cham jai'x buam jup bañ aa'nda' ji jam nɨidhat, cham tu'ñ gu'nguxdha' pim gu' gu pui' ja'k. Na gu' bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na ñich mu tu jam ua'ñ, jam aagi'ñ iñ nañ jɨ'x jix bhai'ñ chaat jam bui nañ ja'p jiñ aagɨt na pim aapi'm ja'xbui'x bhai'p jum ɨlhdha' gɨt.
47002004	Gu' pɨx ji nat gu' cham tu' pui' ji chu buus na pimɨt pai' dhuuk tɨi ba jiñkai guñ u'uan, dai na pimɨt bhai'x buam jim ɨlh sap. Aañ ba' bhai'x buam jup jiñ ɨlh, bhai' ji susua ñich dho gu', na ñich gu' tɨi cham tu' pu kai'ñkam mu tu jam ua'ñ na pim bhaan jix buam jum ɨlhdha', gu' ja'pji na pim dhi' pɨx bhaan machia' gɨt nañ joidham xi jam joi'gɨ'n.
47002005	Ba' gu jaroi' na pui' bhai' dhɨr oirɨt jix buam jiñ a'ga, cha'pim jax jum aa'nda' na dai aañ jiñ a'ga, gu' ja'pji sia aapi'm na jam ia'dhi'ñ sia gu palhɨɨp. Aañ pui' kai'ch na sia gu palhɨɨp jam ia'dhi'ñ, na gu' cham tu' ja'xbui' jam ia'dhi'ñ na jɨ'x aañ.
47002006	Ku gu'x bhai' ba tu tatdat ji na pimɨt tu' kɨ'n tulhiiñchuda mui' maap jim jumpadak.
47002007	Dai ba' na pim ba tu uañdha' pɨx nat bach a'ga, cha'pim ka juanda'. Jix bhai' pim pɨx ba tɨtdada' na cham jix buam jum aa'nda'.
47002008	Pui' pim ja'k jix bhai' buada' na jax ja'k bhaan jix mat ka' na pim jix joi'gɨ'n, soi'ñ jam tɨtda na pim pui' ja'k duñia'.
47002009	Bɨɨpɨ' dɨr jañich bo pu pui' ja'k mu tu jam ua'ñ na pim tulhiiñchuda' gu jaroi' no't tu' bhaan cham am bua, xib jañ ba' machia' no' pim mi' pui' jimia' pui' na ñich jax jam tɨɨ'n piam ku gu' cham.
47002010	Ba' aañ jup tu uañdha' ya' dɨr dhi' na pim jaroi' tu uañdha', gui' dho ji no'm aa' ɨp nañ bɨɨx jai'p tu uañdha' aañ piam ku gu' cham. Aañ gu' pui' pɨx duiñchu' na pim ba' mi' pui'p tu daa'ñchu'nda' na pim jax jiñ ñɨidhat, na gu' pu'ñi ja'k jich a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' guch Xoi'kam.
47002011	Gio cham tu' bhaan jich mai'chia' gu ja'ook, nach gu'x maat na dhi' bhaan tu da'ngɨ gam bɨɨx aixim gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam.
47002012	Jano' na ñich Trooas ai, sɨlh jañich bhai' ai na pai' gɇ'r kiicham nañ ba' bhai' tu a'ga' gɨt gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam. Ba' joidham tɨi cham tu' jax jum kai'ch nañ nai' xi chɇ kɇɇ, tɨir am kat nañ mui' ji chu ja a'gidha' gɨt gu ja'tkam.
47002013	Gu' ji na gu' cham tu' pui' tu tatda'ñ jur am bhaan, na ñich gu' cham tu' bha tɨɨ gu Tiito nar jiñ jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan. Cham jañich ba' tu ja a'gi, ba jii ñich Masedoonia ja'k xi ja tabuimgidhak gu bha oi'ñkam.
47002014	Ku gu' aañ taxchaabgi'ñ ji gu Dios na gammɨjɨch palhbui'ñchu' bhaankam guch Xoi'kam nach ba' ja'kbui' kat ja mai'chim gux buam tum duu'nkam, nach gu' bhaankam nai' tu a'gim gu ñio'ki'ñ, bɨɨx kap ba' ja aajim gu ja'tkam nam pai' jax oi'dha'. Ja'p ji buusan gu' dhi ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na jax gux xuu'ngi nap jum bua na joidham uub, bɨɨx kap ba' ɨ'bhim am gu ja'tkam.
47002015	Aach ba'r di' pɨx nam jich ɨ'bhɨ gu ja'tkam, ja'p ji buusan nach a'm juulhix gui' na joidham uub, gui' nat jax chu'm jich Xoi'kam kɨ'n tu kubhioñ gu Dios. Bɨɨx ɨ'bhia' am ba' gu ja'tkam sia pɨk nar jax ka' gɨt, sia gui' nam mu ja'k bhɨiya' nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha', gio gui' nam jɨ'k buiñor ja'k jup bhɨɨya' guch Xoi'kam.
47002016	Gui' nam mu ja'k bhɨɨya' nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha', pui' ja'k ɨ'bhia' am nar maimda' kam, ba' gui' nam jɨ'k buiñor jimia' guch Xoi'kam, pui' ja'k ɨ'bhia' am na dhi' ja'kbui' kat ja dudua'ñdha'. Ba' cham pɨk jaroi' xim gu'nguxi'ñ na pu'ñi nai' tu a'ga' ja'p na jax aach.
47002017	Gio gu' aach cham tu' pu kai'ñkam tu a'gim gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios nach jax dhui ja tañiim gu ja'tkam gu tuumiñ, ja'p nam jax ja'k tu jim jai' dhɨt. Jax dhui nat gu' pu kai'ñkam nai'ch joot gu Dios nach bhaankam nai' tu a'ga' gu ñio'ki'ñ na jax jir sɨlhkam. Gio nach gu' maa'n tuuku' bap duiñchu' bɨɨma'n guch Xoi'kam, jich a'm jum aa' ba' nach bhaankam tu a'ga'.
47003001	Ba' dhi' nach jɨ'k jax jam tɨtda, cha'pim jax jum aa'nda'ñ jaaduñ nach dhi' bhaan pɨx jam aagi'ñ nach aach jir jix kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam. Jax dhui na gu' cham tu'm aa' nach jam aagi'ñdha' nach jax jir tu'm kam, ni ku cham jum aa' nach ua'kat gu jax chu'm u'uan jam tɨɨ'ñchoda' na mi' pui'm kai'chdha', ni aapi'm kuch cham jɨ'xdhat jam tañia' na pim tu ua'naich makia' nach ba'p ja nɨnɨi'ñchudidha' jai' kap nach sɨlhkam jir jix kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam, ja'p nam jax bua jai' dhɨt.
47003002	Jax dhui na gu' ja'p ji buusan na aapi'm dɨɨlh pɨx jir jich u'uan, pu chu'm ya'p tu ua'ñix gu' aach jich jujur am na jax chu'm jam jujur am tu ua'ñix aapi'm, bɨɨx dhɨt jich a'm tu jiñkui'ñ am ba' gu ja'tkam.
47003003	Jix bhai' xim kaima pui' na jɨ'k jax tu ua'ñix jam jujur am, gio aach jich jujur am pui' ɨp. Ja'p ji buus nat guch Xoi'kam pɨx bhammɨ dɨr jam a'm pu chu'm ya'p tu ua'nach jujur am nach ba' kɨ'n nai' ja aa'ñdhidha' gu ja'tkam nach sɨlhkam jir jix kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam. Gio gu' guch Xoi'kam cham tu' gu jax chu'm na ja'p pɨx tu mamxi'ñ nat kɨ'n ya' tu ua'nach jujur am, gu' ja'pji gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n kɨ'n gu Dios. Ni kut cham bhaan tu ua'na gu jax chu'm ja'ppɨx u'uan nax jai'ch, gu' ja'pjich a'm aach sia kuch jir ja'tkam, jich jujur am sɨlh nat tu ua'na.
47003004	Jix maat gu Dios na sɨlhkam jir pui' nañ jax jam tɨtda, nach gu' buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam.
47003005	Gio gu' cham tu' dɨɨlh pɨx nax bhaai' nach pu tu buim na pim jax jich ñɨi'ñ, gu' ja'pji gu Dios pɨx nap tu buim.
47003006	Nat gu' gui' pɨx pu chu'm jup jich dhuu nax maat na jax ja'k tu'm jum aa' gui' nam pu'ñi bhaankam nai' ja aagi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam na xib maakam tu't jum aa' nam mi' pui' jiimdat buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha', nam cham tu' mi' pai' bhaan ka tu daa'ñchu'nda' gu jax chu'm u'uan na jax ja'k tu aagix, gu' ja'pji dai na jax pɨx ja jurtudidha' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda'. Na gu' jaroi' maadɨt no't cham am bua pui' na jax tu ua'ñix ka' nam jax ja'k tu't mi' pui' jiimda' gu ja'tkam, dhi' mu ja'k bhɨichdha' na pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'. Gu' ba' no'm gu' bhaan pɨx tu daa'ñchugɨt mi' pui' ba jiim na jax pɨx ja jurtudidha' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n gu Dios, cham tu' mu ja'k bhɨɨya' am, bhai' ja'k ja bhɨichdha' gu' na pai' gammɨjɨx bhai' pu ba tu ja jimda'.
47003007	Kani na gu' jano' nat tu ua'na gu Dios bhaan gu ja'ppɨx joodaix ko'kmalhik na jax ja'k tu aagix ka' nam tui'ñgɨda' bɨɨx gu Israel kam, sia ku gu' mu ja'k tɨ bhɨbhɨichu'n nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha', joidham jix a'bhar kɨ'n ja bui ai gu Israel kam ja'tkam. Na gu' nat pai' dhuuk mu ba ja aichulh gu Moisees, joidham jix abhaar mɨimtu' gu buibsa'n, ba' cham bhaai' nam jax dhui bha tɨgia' sɨlh buibsaram gu Israel kam ja'tkam. Gu' ba' nax abhaar mɨimtu' gu buibsa'n gu Moisees, dhi' nam bhaan jix mat ka' nar gɇ'p jum duukam gui' na tu' ja ua'tulhi'ñ, gu' ji nat gu' jɨ'k pɨx jur nat nai' ji tuu gu buibsa'n.
47003008	Gu' ba' no't gu' dhi' gɇ'kam kɨ'n ja bui ai gu Israel kam ja'tkam na mu ja'k bhɨichdha' gu jaroi' no't cham am bua na pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha', dho bak jix io'm ji nar gɇ'p jum duukam dhi' nax Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda'ch aagi'ñ na maakam tu't bam aa' xib nach mi' pui' jiimdat buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' gu Dios, na gu' ja'p ji buusan na gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' bhaan tu ua'ñix.
47003009	Piam ja'pni ɨp, jax ña pim ja'k jix maatɨt kaaya': No't gu' dhi' gɇ'kam kɨ'n ja bui ai gu Israel kam ja'tkam na mu ja'k jich bhɨichdha' nach pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jich chulhiiñdha' no' chich cham am bua tu' bhaan mi' pai', jix io'm jir gɇ'p jum duukam bak na bach aagi'ñ gu Dios na jax ja'k jix bhai' ba tuch jimda' ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k.
47003010	Ba' dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' na cham tu'r gɇ'p jum duukam gui' nat jax chu'm ja bui ai jano' gu Israel kam ja'tkam, gu' matgɨm jix io'm ji nar gɇ'p jum duukam dhi' nat xib jich bui ai nañ jax ba kai'ch.
47003011	Gam nat gatuuk nai' ji jaa nat tɨix abhaar tonnichgɨt ja bui ai, ¿gu' dhi' gi ba' nat xib jich bui ba ai na pu gammɨjɨx abhaar mɨimda'? Jix io'm dho bak jir gɇ'p jum duukam.
47003012	Dhi' pu kai'ñkam jach ba' aach cham tu' bhaan ji chotdonɨt tu a'ga dhi' nat gɇ'p jum duukam jich bui ba ai.
47003013	Cham jach tu' pui' ja'k jich dhuuk na jax jum duuka' jano' gu Moisees na iiñka' gu buibsa'n maa'n jix xuu'ngi' jannulh kɨ'n, nam ba' cham nɨi'ñdha' gu Israel kam ja'tkam na jax ja'k jagia' na joidham jix abhaar ka mɨimda'.
47003014	Gu' ji nam gu' pu cham maatɨt nɨi'ñdha' gu Israel kam ja'tkam na jax jir tum duukam ka' dhi' nam jɨ'k jax tɨ nɨi'ñdha', sia xib jam pui cham maatɨt nɨi'ñ. Na gu' ja'p ji buusan na pui ja soobhi'ñ gu jannulh gui' na jax chu'm kɨ'n jum iiñka' jano' gu Moisees, nam gu' cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, na gu' dai guch Xoi'kam jix bhaai' na ja'k ja bhɨidha' dhi jannulh na ja iiñ.
47003015	Cham maatɨt kɇɇ am na jax kai'ñkam jup jum kai'ch sia kum tɨi tu jiñkai'ñ gui' nat jɨ'k Moisees tu ua'nak, na gu' ja'p ji buusan na gui' pɨx jannulh ja soobhi'ñ gu ja moom nam ba' cham maatɨt kaaya'.
47003016	Jɨɨ' ji no' mɨt buiñor ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñ guch Xoi'kam na ba' ja'k ba ja bhɨidha', jix maatɨt bhai' ji kaaya'm ba'.
47003017	Dhi' pɨx jir Dios gu' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda'. Ba' no' jaroi' bhaan bap tui'dhi' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda', ba palhbuidha' sia tu' na pɨx kɨ'n.
47003018	Pui' na jax aach na gu' cham tu' tu' kach iiñ guch buibas, pui' pɨx ba' maaxik gɇ' tanoor ich, na gu'ch a'm jum maaxi'ñ gu Dios na jax jir tu'm kam. Gammɨjɨch jix io'm pui'ch dhuñiim na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios, na gu'ch Xoi'kam pɨx nap tu duiñchu', na gu'r dhi' pɨx gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda'.
47004001	Ba' aach cham tu' bhaan jich o'jolhdhat xi chu a'gichu' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, nat gu' gui' pɨx xich joi'mdak dhi' bhaan jich chuttu nach bhaankam tu juana'.
47004002	Cham tu'ch pui' ja'k tu jim na jax gu jaroi' na am jix xi'ɨraam jum ɨlhii'ñdha' no'ch am mamtɨ na tu' bhaan jich iatgi'ñ, nach gu' aach maaxik sɨlhkam tu a'ga gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, cham tu' nach aach ya' dɨr maakam duñiim na jax cham jir sɨlhkam. Kani na pim jix bhai' xim ga'ngada' na maaxik jir sɨlhkam pui' nach jɨ'k jax tu a'ga bhaankam gu Dios.
47004003	Jix bhai'x maatɨt kɇɇ pim gu' aapi'm dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam, cham tu' pui' na jax gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na ja'p pɨx ji buusan na iiñ gu ja buibas.
47004004	Na gu' pui' ja duuk gux buam jum duukam ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n nam ba' cham maatɨt kaaya' ni kum jix maatɨt tɨgia', sia ku tɨix abhaar mɨim na bhaan jum maaxi'ñ gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam na jax jir tu'm kam, gio guch Xoi'kam na pui' bhaan jup jum maaxi'ñ gu Dios duakam na jax jup jir tu'm kam.
47004005	Cham tu'ch ja aa'ñdhim gu' gu ja'tkam nach jax jir tu'm kam dɨɨlh, gu' ja'pji nach pui' ja tɨtdaim na guch Xoi'kam bɨɨx jir jich Gɇ'kam tuk. Gio gu' pui' pɨx jich ɨlhii'ñ ich jam bui nach jir tu jam juandam tuk, nach gu' xi jam joi'gɨ'n bhaankam guch Xoi'kam.
47004006	Nat gu' gu Dios gui' nat tu chia bɨjɨk na mi' dhɨr jai'chdhɨlhia' gux chu maax na pai'x chu tukgam, mɨmɨich guch jujur nach ba' pu'ñi ja bɨ'ñxidha' gu ja'tkam, nañ ja'pni kai'ñkam jup kai'ch nach ja aagi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x jir gɇ'kam gu Dios, gio na dhi' pɨx bhaan jum maaxi'ñ guch Xoi'kam na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios.
47004007	Jano' nat pai' dhuuk jich maa gu Dios gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ, ja'p ji buus nat bhi'ñ jaja' ta'm gaam gux bii bapaiñum gui' nax dha'ram namɨɨk ya' dhi oi'ñga'n. Nach gu' aach ja'p pɨx ji buan na jax gu bhi'ñ jaja', pui' ku ba'x bhai'x maatɨ' na Dios pɨx jir ñio'ki'ñ dhi' nach tu a'ga, gio gu'ch a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jich palhbui'ñchu' nach bɨɨx aixim pu tu buim na jaroi' cham jɨ'xdha' pu tu duñia', sia kuch gu' aach jir ja'ppɨx jaja'x jaikgam.
47004008	Cham tu'ch ba' bhaan jich o'jolhdhat nai' xi chu a'gichu' sia pui' jich chulhiiñat bɨɨx aixim, nach gu'x maat nach cham tu' gammɨjɨ puch chulhiiñdha'. Pui' na jax xib sia kuch jix buam jich aa' na cham bhai' tuch jim, cham tu'ch xi' kam jix aa' nax bhai' ba tuch jimda'.
47004009	Piam jai' dhɨt nam xich bhaamkidhat jich gaagim nam jax pɨk xich dhooda' gɨt, aach cham jax jich aa', nach gu' bia' gui' na jaroi'ch palhbui'ñchu'. Gio gu' chakuich koi mɨt sia kum tɨi xich koodak.
47004010	Ba' sia pai' na pɨx ja'k nach jup tui'ñgɨda', jich chulhiiñaidha' ich ja'p nat jax jum tulhii guch Xoi'kam na ya' xi oilhimɨk, gu' ji na gu' ja'xbui'p jich palhbuidha' gu Dios nat jɨ'x jup palhbui guch Xoi'kam jano'.
47004011	Na gu' aach nach buiñor tu juan guch Xoi'kam, jich chulhiiñdha' ich sia pɨk nar jax ka' gɨt, nam ba' xich ñɨi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam nach jax ja'k nakgat maa'n nach jax mi' pui' jiim, na gu'ch gu'nguxi'ñ gu Dios.
47004012	Ba' pu'ñi pɨx kai'ñkam jich chulhiiñ ich aach xib, jich a'm jup tui'dhi' gu muuki', aapi'm ba' dai nax bhai' tu jam jim.
47004013	Maa'n kap na mɨt pai' tu ua'nak gu bɨjɨk dɨr kam jup jum kai'ch: “Aañ jum a'mkam tu a'ga, nañ gu' tu' sɨlhkam jum bui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ.” Aach ba' pu'ñi ɨp xib, tu' sɨlhkam jach buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ gu Dios nach ba' bhaankam tu a'ga.
47004014	Jix maat ich gu' na jax chu'm tanoolh jich dhudua'ñdhaich baapmi'ñdha' nach ba' mi' dhɨr buiñor bap tui'ka' gammɨjɨ, ja'p nat jax dua'ñdhak giop buusai' guch Xoi'kam na ka muukix kat. Bɨɨx maap jich dhudua'ñdhaich baapmi'ñdha' sia aapi'm.
47004015	Gu' ba' dhi' nach jich chulhiiñ, dhi' na jax dhuix bhai' tu jam jimda' aapi'm. Na gu' no' mui'x ja joi'mdat ja a'm tɨ nɨidhim gu Dios, dhi' bɨɨx dhɨt taxchaabgidhat jix bhai'm taat ka' am, gɇ'kamtu'nda' am.
47004016	Cham tu'ch dho ba' bhaan jich o'jolhi'ñ, na gu' sia ku ja gɨ'gɨrtaim dhich chutku', jich ii'mda' bhaan jich xixiibkamtaim ich gammɨjɨ nabap tanoolh.
47004017	Gio gu' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan nach jich chulhiiñ pur cham tu', jootom ya' dɨr ba bubuakia' ich gu'. Ba' dai nach ba tu mai'chia' gɇ'gɇr jup tum duu'nkam na pu cham ja'kbui' namɨɨk iam nach jɨ'x jich chulhiiña' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n.
47004018	Ba' aañ pu jam tɨtda aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ nach dai bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka' gui' nach tu' cham nɨi'ñ xib, cham tu'ch bhaan jup jich buixi'ñdha' gu tu' nax maax. Na gu' gui' na tu'x maax ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, gatuuk cham pai' ka maatɨ' ka', gu' matgɨm gui' nach tu' cham nɨi'ñ xib, gammɨjɨ ji na pux jai'ch ka', pu cham tu ju'ngɨ, na gu'r jix dhaam kam.
47005001	Dhich chutku' pui'p ji buusan na jax gu ba'bhak gui' nam jup ja bua gu ja'tkam ya' dhi oi'ñga'n na cham tu' mui' juruuxi'ñ. No't jax chu'm tanoolh ma kɨklhii'ñchak nai' jim kajaa, cham jach jax jich aa'nda', nach gu'x maat nach jai' ba tu ba'bhak jix dhaam buiñor gu Dios na cham jɨ'xkat kɨklhi'ñcha', dai nach bhai' pɨx ji baapkia' nach pai' dhuuk mu jiimda'. Cham tu'r jup ja duiñ gu jax chu'm ja'tkam ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n.
47005002	Tɨi aa'nda'ch gɨt nach bhai' ba oi'ñka' bhaan dhich ba'bhak jix dhaam kam, gu' ji nach gu' ya' ka dudua bhaan dhi jai'ch ba'bhak nar ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n. Pui' pɨx jach ba'ch ii'mda' ka xi buppa nach tɨix aa' nach gɨt gui' bhaan ba oi'ñka'.
47005003	Gio ja'pnip ji buusan dhich chutku' na jax guch tɨi'dhara'. No't jax chu'm tanoolh am xi kɨklhi'ñchak nai' ji dhɨbaa dhich tɨi'dhara', cham tu'ch pui'x dha'npak pup oipoda', jai' tɨch chɨi'dha' gu' gu Dios kɨ'n gu tɨi'dhara'x dhaam kam.
47005004	Ba' ka xi tu nakoo' ich sia kux buam tu tatda' nach ya' kap tu'ii' bhaan dhich ba'bhak na jax chu'm tanoolh kɨklhi'ñcha', na gu' kam aajim nach pai' dhuuk jai' xixiibkam ba'bhak bhaan aaya'. Gio cham aa' ich nach pui'x dha'npak pup oipoda' na pai' dhuuk kɨklhi'ñchai nai' ji ii'ñxia' dhich tɨi'dhara' nach ya' ka ja tɨ' xib, gu' ja'pji nach jix aa' nach jai' tɨ tɨ'ya' na cham jɨ'xkat ka kɨklhi'ñcha', jumai ii'mda' bap jich dhuñia' ich gu'.
47005005	Gu Dios pɨx dɨɨlh gu' nat pui' ja'k tu duu nach pu'ñi jai'p jich dhuñia', maaxik ba' pui' ji chu buusnia', nat gu' pu kai'ñkam jich tajaañ gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' na ba' dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka'.
47005006	Tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ ich na pui' ji chu buusnia' sia pɨk nar jax ka' gɨt. Gio gu' xib nach ya' kap tu'ii' dhi tutku' bhaan, mɨk jup tu'ii' ich, cham tu' amuub na pai'p tu'ii' guch Xoi'kam.
47005007	Pu cham nɨi'ñ ich maaxik, sɨlh pɨx jach buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ jich jujur am bhaan
47005008	cham tu' bhaan jax jich aagɨt, dai nach tɨi bax aa' pɨx na gɨt ja'bsunɨi dhich chutku' jai' bap jum duñia' nach ba' buiñor ba jimia' guch Xoi'kam.
47005009	Pui' kuch ba' gammɨjɨ pui' tɨi tu duiñchu' nach jax ja'k jix bhai' ji bubuakia' buiñor guch Xoi'kam nach ya' ka oipo dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, gammɨjɨch sia mi' pui' pu tu duiñchu'nda' na jax jix aa' sia kuch buiñor bap tu'ii'.
47005010	Na gu' bɨɨx buiñor gu'kia' ich nach jɨ'k ja'tkam ka' na pai' daaka' nar gɇ'kam ka', gui' ba' dɨɨlh pu tɨ'ya' na tu'r jich mai'chɨk ka' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n tu' nach jax dhuñia' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, piam ku gu' nach jich chulhiiña' pɨx jir jich mai'chɨk.
47005011	Ba' kapbhai' nach aach bax maat na dai gu Dios jum aa' nach tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa', aach ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k pui'p ja gu'nguxi'ñ gu ja'tkam nam pui' tu' ka'm jup tɨɨgɨi mi' pui'p ba jimia' na jax jix aa'. Jix maat gu Dios nach pu kai'ñkam pɨx ya ja'p oipot pu chu'm tu a'ga, aapi'm gɨt jup xim ga'ngada'ñ jaaduñ na maaxik jir sɨlhkam.
47005012	Cham tu' pim jax jum aa'nda'ñ jaaduñ nach dhi' bhaan gɇ'gɇrkam jich chaatɨt pɨx am jam aagi'ñ nach jax jir tu'm kam, gu' ja'pji nach mi' pɨx jam aagi'ñ na pim ba' dhi' bhaan xim ga'ngada' nam jaroi' sɨlhkam bhaankam tu a'ga gu Dios, nam cham jam iatgi'ñdha' gui' nam pui' xi kai'chdha' nam bhaankam tu a'ga gu Dios, sia kum gu' cham tu' sɨlhkam bhaankam tu a'ga.
47005013	Ba' no' pim gu' jai' dhɨt jix ñanaanbim pɨx jich kɇɇ pui' nach jax kai'ch, cham dho jax bua, na gu' gu Dios cham tu' pui' ɨlhii'ñ. Piam ku pim gu'x maatɨt jich kɇɇ, jix bhai' ji chu buusnia' dho ɨp jam bui.
47005014	Jano' dɨr xich joi'mdat jich a'm tɨ nɨidhim guch Xoi'kam na chich dhɨr maat nat gui' pɨx jich a'mkam muu bɨɨx, ja'p ji buus ba' na chich pu bɨɨx maa'n jimdam koi.
47005015	Ba' pu kai'ñkam pɨx bɨɨx jich a'mkam muu gio nat bɨɨx jich a'mkam giop dua, nach ba' aach mi' dhɨr pui' pɨx ja'k ba tu duiñchu'nda' na jax jix aa'nda', cham tu' nach dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñdha'.
47005016	Gio gu' cham tu'ch pui'p ka ɨlhii'ñ nam jax ɨlhii'ñ gu ja'tkam ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n, bɨɨx aixim ɨlhdhat kɇɇ am gu' nam bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam, sia kuch gu' aach pui' bɨɨx aixim jup ɨlhdhat nach chakui tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat.
47005017	Pui' ku ba' gu jaroi' no't ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, bar maakam tu'm ka' ii'mdagaram bhaan, cham tu' pui' kia' na jax bɨɨpɨ' dɨr. Ja'p ji buusnia' na jumai maa'nkam xibkam jup jum duñia'.
47005018	Ba' dhi' gu Dios pɨx dɨɨlh nat pui' tɨi na pui' ja'k tum duñia'. Na gu' guch Xoi'kam nat jich a'mkam muu, pui' ja'k tu duu nach jix bhai' ba bi'ya' buiñor gu Dios. Dhi' pu chu'm ba' aach jup jich chia gu Dios nach nai' ja aagi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam.
47005019	Piam ja'pni ja'k, jax na pim ja'k jix maatɨt kaaya': Gu Dios pɨx dɨɨlh pui' ja'k tu duu na guch Xoi'kam bhaankam pui' ja'k tu duñia' nam jix bhai' bi'ya' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam buiñor dɨɨlh gu Dios, cham jax bua sia kum jax jix u'ua'tulhdhix. Dhi' jɨ' pu chu'm jich chia aach gu Dios nach nai' tu a'ga'.
47005020	Bhaankam pɨx nai' tu a'gim ich ba' aach guch Xoi'kam, ja'p ji buusan na gu Dios pɨx dɨɨlh soi' ja tɨtda gu ja'tkam nam tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Ba' aach xib bhaankam guch Xoi'kam soi' jam tɨtda aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ na pim mi' pui' xi jiimda' na pim ba'x bhai' ji bubuakia' buiñor gu Dios.
47005021	Guch Xoi'kam dho tɨi cham tu' tu' bhaan jum ua'tulhdhak na ya' xi oilhimɨk dhi oi'ñga'n, gu' ji nat gu' gu Dios jich a'mkam tu bhiiñolh, ba' pui' ji buus nat giilhim gɇ'm ua'tulh. Jix bhai' ji bii chich ba' aach buiñor gu Dios, nat gu' guch Xoi'kam jix bhai' ba duu.
47006001	Ba' aach nach jir tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios, soi'ch jam tɨtda na pim mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' nat kapbhai' xi jam joi'mdak jam a'm ba tɨ tɨɨ, bɨɨx aixim bhaan bax maat japim gu' na sɨlhkam xi jam joi'mdat jam a'm tɨ nɨi'ñ.
47006002	Jup jum kai'ch gu' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios maa'n kap nat pai' tu ua'nak maadɨt gu bɨjɨk dɨr kam: Aañ jum kai jano' nat pai' dhuuk jum ai gu tanoolh nañ jum kaaya', gio jano' ñich jix bhai'm duu ɨp nat pai' dhuuk jup jum ai nañ jum palhbuidha'. Ba' dhi' xib tu aagɨt jup kai'ch, jam kɇɇk gu Dios ja'p ja'k ba jam tuttu na pim mu ja'k ba jiimɨt na pim pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'.
47006003	Gio gu' aach cham tu' maakam tu buim na jax cham jir mi' pui', maa'n nach jax pɨx jam boi'ñxi'ñchu' na jax jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, nach gu'x maat na pim cham kach jɨɨgi'ñdha' no'ch aach dɨɨlh cham mi' pui' duiñchu' nach jax kai'chdha'.
47006004	Bɨɨx na jɨ'k jax tuch jim, dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' nach sɨlhkam jir tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios, pui' na jax nach bɨɨx aixim tu'm kɨ'n nai'ch chulhiiñaim, gu' ji nach gu' aach tu nakgatu'. Ya' bɨɨx aixim tu'm jich a'm tum aa'nda' tɨi, gio bɨɨx aixim jix chu xijai ka' panaas.
47006005	Gio nam nai'ch gɨbiidha', gam nam nai'ch kukpaidha'. Gio nax oodam tu tatda' ka' nam giilhim kai'chdha' gu ja'tkam nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' nach jax tɨi ja tɨtdada'. Gam nach gammɨjɨ tu juanda' nach ba' mai'chɨi gu tu' kɨ'n jumaip ba xia'ñdha', pai'jɨch ua'maidha', gam nach cham koksoda'.
47006006	Sia bɨɨx aixim bhaan jup jix maatɨ' nach jax jich aa'ch jujur am, pui' na jax nach mi' pui' tu a'ga na jax jir sɨlhkam, gio nach tu nakoo'nda' sia kuch jich chulhiiñ, gio nach jix ja joi'mdat jix bhai' ja buidha' gu ja'tkam tu' sɨlhkam kɨ'n, gio gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' nach a'm jup tui'dhi'.
47006007	Gio nach tu' sɨlhkam tu a'ga gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam na jax jir pui', gam na bɨɨx aixim jix bhaai' nach pu tu duñia', ba' dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' nach a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jich palhbui'ñchu' gu Dios. Dhi'ch kɨ'n bɨɨx aixim jich palhbui'ñ nach mi' pui' jiim na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam, gio dhi'ch kɨ'n jup tu kokda.
47006008	Pai'jɨch ja buip tui'ka' gu ja'tkam gui' nam jix bhai' kai'chdha'ch bui, pai'jɨ ba' ja bui gui' nam xich bhaamki'ñdha'. Gio pai'jɨ tu' pɨx jich ɨlhii'ñdha' am jai', jai' ba' nam tu' ka'm jup jich ɨlhii'ñdha' pai'jɨ. Gio pai'jɨm pui'ch chɨɨda' gu ja'tkam nach ja iatgi'ñ no'ch tɨi tu ja a'gi'ñ gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, sia kuch gu' aach tɨi mi' pui' tu ja a'gi'ñ na jax jir sɨlhkam.
47006009	Gio jai' kap gui' nam tɨix bhai' xich mat ka', mi' pɨx ja'p gai tɨ nɨidhidha' am nam chi sap panaas pu cham jich mat ka'. Gio nam tɨi pup jich koodaidha' nai' ja'p, ji nach gu' xi dhuduatu'. Cham jax jich aa' ich ba', nam gu' cham jich kooda' sia kum bɨxchu' kɨ'n jich chulhiiñchu'n.
47006010	Gio gu' aach pu gammɨjɨx bhai'ch chaat ka', sia kuch gu' panaas pui' tu'ii' nach jix buam jich aa'. Gio mui' pui' ba ja duu chich nam jir jix chutumñigam ka' ii'mda' bhaan, sia kuch gu' aach cham tu'r jix chutumñigam ya' maaxik. Gio gu' bɨɨx jup jir tu aach ga'n nach jɨ'k tu' tɨ nɨi'ñ, sia kuch gu' cham tu' bia' panaas na pim jax jich ñɨi'ñ.
47006011	Jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim Koriinto oi'dha', bɨɨx jir sɨlhkam dhi' nach jɨ'k jax jam tɨtda, giox bhai' jam aagi'ñ ich na pim jax ja'k jix bhai'x maatɨt jich kaaya', gio bɨɨx jach jam aagi'ñ nach jɨ'k jax jix chu maat, nach gu' xi jam joi'gɨ'n.
47006012	Pu cham pai' palhɨɨp am cham jam kɨɨgalhi'ñ ich iam, aapi'm ji na pim jɨ'x am cham jich kɨɨgalhi'ñ.
47006013	Ba' aañ soi' jam tɨtda na pim xiñ joi'gɨ'nda' ja'p nañ jax xi jam joi'gɨ'n aapi'm. Soi'ñ jam tɨtda, nañ gu' ja'p jam ɨlhii'ñ na pim jir jiñ maamar.
47006014	Cha'pim ja bɨɨm jum tɨtmoda' gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Jix maat japim gu' nar jumai gux kɨɨ'p jum duukam, gio gux buam jum duukam jir jumai ɨp. Gio pui' na jax na pai' dhuuk jix chu maax ka', na gu' cham tu' pu chu'm jup tum maaxi'ñdha' na pai' dhuuk jix chukgam ka'.
47006015	Jix maat japim sia na guch Xoi'kam cham kɨɨgalhi'ñ gu ja'ook. Gio gu jaroi' na buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam, na gu' cham tu' pui' ja'k jup tu jimda' na jax gu jaroi' na cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha'.
47006016	Gio gu chiop gui' na sɨlhkam Dios duakam bhaan tɨ nɨi'ñdha', na gu' cham tu'p jir pu chu'm ka' nam jax chu'm kɨr ja tuttuka' gu ja'tkam gu didios jup duiñxim. Ja'p ji buusan gu' nach aach jir chiop ga'n gu Dios duakam nach tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Jup kai'ch gu' dɨɨlh gu Dios mi' na mɨt pai' tu ua'nak gu bɨjɨk dɨr kam: Aañ ja bɨɨm oirɨda' dhi Israel kam ja'tkam, nañ gu' ja bɨɨm kioka'. Jir jiñ ja'tkam tuk ka' am, aañ ba'r ja Dios tuk ka'.
47006017	Gio ja'p iam nap tu ua'ñix ja'pnip kai'ch ɨp dɨɨlh gu Dios: Cha'pim mi ja bɨɨm oipoda' gui' nam jix buam tu jim, bubuakia' pim mi' dhɨr. Cha'pim gan da'ngɨda' gui' na cham jir kɨɨ' aañ jiñ bui. No' pimɨt pui' duu dhi' nañ jax jam tɨtda nañ ba' ba xi jam kɨɨgalhi'ñdha' ɨp gio.
47006018	Gammɨjɨñ ba' pui' ba jam ɨlhii'ñdha' na pim aapi'm sɨlhkam jir jiñ maamar na pim jɨ'k jir u'uub gio na pim jɨ'k jir chichio'ñ, nañ gu' aañ ba'r jam Gɨ'kora' ka'. Aañi' pui' kai'ch nañ bɨxchu' pu tu bua na tu' jaroi' cham jɨ'xdha' pu duñia', nañ gu'x io'm jir gɇ'kam.
47007001	Jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, aapi'm nañ xi jam joi'gɨ'n, dhi'r di' nat xib ya' pui' ba tu duuch bui gu Dios nat jax ja tɨɨdak bɨjɨk guch bopxi kat, pui' ji chu buus nat jax tɨi. Xib ba' aach pɨx bam aa' nach mi' pui' jimia' na jax jix aa' nach ba' cham tu' bhaan jix u'ua'tulhdhix ka'ch ii'mda' bhaan gioch chutku' bhaan. Jix ɨɨbhidhat jach mi' pui' ba jiimda' gu Dios na jax jix aa', gammɨjɨch pɨx jix u'uañ bap tui'ñgɨda' gui' buiñor.
47007002	Cha'pim kach bhaamki'ñdha'ñ jaaduñ, nach gu' cham tu' jax jam buixi'ñ, ni kuch jaroi' mu pai' ba gɨbiim, ni ku chich jaroi' tu' ba ɨɨx.
47007003	Cha'pim jix buam jum aa'nda' pui' nañ jax jam tɨtda, nañ gu' xi jam joi'mdat mi' pɨx jam aagi'ñ. Tu' sɨlhkam xi jam joi'gɨ'n iñ gu' nañ jax pu ba jam tɨtda bɨɨpɨ' dɨr, pu gammɨjɨñ xi jam joi'gɨ'nda' nach jɨ'x ya duduaka' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, sia chich chi pu gan ji koi.
47007004	Joidham jix bhai' tu tatda' gu' na pim aapi'm pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, cham tu' tu' bhaan jax jiñ aa' iñ jam bui. Gio sia kuñ gu' aañ xiñ chulhiiñat bɨɨx aixim, cham tu' bhaan jiñ o'jolhi'ñ iñ, jix bhai'ñ chaatɨt jañ pɨx mi' pui' xi jim na jax jix aa' gu Dios.
47007005	Jano' dɨr na chich jax bhai' dhɨr ja'p ai na Masedoonia bhaan bipio' gu dɨbɨɨr, jano' dɨr jam nai' pup xich bhaamki'ñchu' gu ja'tkam, cham pai' dhuuk maa'nnim joidham cham jich juan am. Bɨɨx aixim jach ba' tɨich palhbui'ñchu'nda'x chotdontugɨt.
47007006	Gu' ji na chich gu' xib bach gu'ngux nat ya' ba ji buus gu Tiito, gu Dios pɨx jich gu'ngux gu' na jaroi' tu gu'nguxi'ñ no' jaroi' bam o'jolhi'ñ.
47007007	Gio gu' cham tu' dai nat ya ai pɨx gu Tiito na chich kɨ'n jich gu'ngux, gu' ja'pji sia na bach aagi'ñ na joidham jix bhai'm taat jam bui, na pim gu' sap mi' pui' tu duiñchu' na jax jix aa' gu Dios. Jich aagi'ñ ɨp na pim sap tɨi xich chɨɨgik, gam sap na pim jiñ a'mkam jix buam jum aa' na jax tuñ jim, dhi' bhaan jañich jix io'm jix bhai'ñ ɨlh aañ.
47007008	Na ñich jax ja'k mu tu jam ua'ñ bɨɨpɨ' dɨr jiñ jaaduñ, cham tu'ñ bhaan jix buam kañ aa' xib, moo jano' ji na ñich jix buam jiñ ɨlh, na pimɨt gu' sap jix buam jum ɨlh aapi'm. Jɨ'k tanoolh japim sap jix buam jum aa'nda' pɨx.
47007009	Xib jañ jix bhai'ñ chaat na ñich jax ja'k mu tu jam ua'ñ, ku gu' cham tu' ji nañ dhi' bhaan jix bhai'ñ chaat na pimɨt jix buam jum ɨlh, gu' ja'pji na pimɨt jix buam jum ɨlhdhak gio mi' pui'p ba jii na jax jix aa' gu Dios. Dios pɨx jup jir duñii'ñ bak gu' nach pui' ja'k mu tu jam ua'ñdha', cham tu' ba'r jich kuiñcha aach.
47007010	Pu'ñi ja'k tu aagi'ñ gu' gu Dios no' jaroi' cham mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa', tu' jax xi dhuiñdha' na bhaan jix io'm jix buam jum ɨlhdha' na ba' katti juraa'n bhɨɨji mi' pui' ba jimia' na jax jix aa'nda'. Mi' pɨx jix bhai' buada' gu' na ba' cham mu ja'k bhɨɨya' na pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'. Jix io'm jir jix buam gu' gu jaroi' no't mu ja'k pu bhɨi, dhi' mu ja'k tɨ bhɨbhɨichu'n no'ñ bhaan jurtɨkat jix buam jiñ aa' gu tu' na ya' dhi oi'ñga'n jix chu jai'ch.
47007011	Am gɨi ba' dhi' nat jax ja'k jam aa'ñ gu Dios, na pimɨt gu'x buam jum ɨlhdhak gio mi' pui'p ba jii na jax jix aa'. Sia ba maat japimɨt gu' na maaxik cham tu'ñ a'm jup tu tu'ii' pui' na ñich jax ja'k mu tu jam ua'ñ, sia ku pimɨt gu' jɨ'x ma bhaak jiñ bui. Giop ma tooto'n japimɨt gu' na pim jix bhai' xim ga'nga na jax jum kai'ch, giop ba xiñ chɨɨgik japim ba'. Maaxik ba maat japimɨt gu' nat am gɨi pui' na ñich jax mu tu jam ua'ñ.
47007012	Na ñich pai' dhuuk mu tu jam ua'ñ, cham pai' jax jiñ aa' iñ no'p bar jiñ kuiñcha ka' gatuuk, nañ gu' pu cham maat no' pim dhi' kɨ'n jix buam jup jum ɨlhdha'. Pui' ñich pɨx jiñ aagɨk mu tu jam ua'ñ Dios buiñor na gɨt iam dhi' bhaan matgilhia' no' pim tu' sɨlhkam jix buam jum aagɨt jich chɨ'ñcho piam ku gu' cham.
47007013	Jix bhai'ñ chaat iñ ba' aañ xib na pim gio mi' pui'p ba jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios. Ba' na chich tu' pɨk bhaan jix io'm jix bhai'ch ɨlh, gu Tiito nat jix io'm jix bhai'm taattugɨt ya' ba ai, bɨɨx aixim bhaan gu'ngux japimɨt gu' sap ɨp gio.
47007014	Gio gu' aañ pui' pu ba tɨɨ'n bɨɨpɨ' dɨr gu Tiito nañ jix bhai'ñ chaat ɨp aañ jam bui, maa'n ba' nañ jax jix bhai'ñ chaat jam bui sia gu xib. Tu' sɨlhkam jañ jix bhai'ñ chaat jam bui, cham tu' nañ pui' pɨx kai'ch, gio dhi' nach jɨ'k jax jam tɨtda, jir sɨlhkam ɨp.
47007015	Jix io'm dhi' bhaan jix bhai'm taat gu Tiito na pimɨt sap cham jax ji chɨ'ɨɨk mi' pui' jii nat jax jam tɨɨ'n, tu' ka'm tɨɨgɨk japimɨt sap mi' pui' jii.
47007016	Pui' kuñ ba' cham tu' tu' bhaan jax kañ aa' aapi'm jam bui, na pim gu'r jix kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam.
47008001	Jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, xib jañ ba'p xi jam aagi'ñdha' nat jax ja'k matgir nax ja joi'mdat ja a'm tɨ nɨi'ñ gu Dios gui' nam pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam bɨɨx nam jɨ'k kap maap jum jumpadat tu daan na jɨ'x Masedoonia dɨbɨɨr bhaan bipio'.
47008002	Jix bhai'm taat am dhi' dhich jaaduñ sia kut bɨɨx aixim tu'm bhaan tu ja ma'iich. Gam sia kum cham tu' bia', mui' tu maakda' am gu tuumiñ buiñor gu Dios, ja'p na tu'x chutumñigam panaas.
47008003	Dɨɨlh jiñ buupui kɨ'n jañ ja nɨi'ñ aañ nam mui' tu maak gu tuumiñ buiñor gu Dios, jix io'm mui' xi chu makia' am sia kum gu' cham tu' bia' nañ jax ba kai'ch. Dɨɨlh ɨp ja jujur kɨ'n nam tu maakda', cham tu' na jaroi' ja chianda'.
47008004	Maa'nnim jamɨt pu'ñi mui' maap xi jumpadak gu tuumiñ soi'ch chɨɨ'n nach aach ja ui'dhika' gu jai'ch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham nam cham tu' bia' ni jɨ'x.
47008005	Gio gu' tu' sɨlhkam soi'm ɨlhdhak tu maa mɨt. Bɨɨpɨ' mɨt soi'm ɨlhdhak tu maa buiñor gu Dios, mi' dhɨr ba' aach jich bui soi'p bam ɨlhii'ñ am nam pui'ch chɨtda nach ja ui'dhika' gu jai'ch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham nam cham tu' bia' ni jɨ'x. Gu Dios pɨx gu' na pui' ja'k tu buim.
47008006	Ba' aach xib ya' dɨr pui' soi'p tɨɨ'n gu Tiito na mu jimɨi jumpada' gu tuumiñ na pim pai' maap jum jumpadat tu daan, kat japim chi ba' iam jix ja joi'mdai gu jai' tu makia' jɨ'k na pim pui' pup jum duuk. Nat gu' dhi Tiito pu ba tu jumpai bɨɨpɨ' dɨr gu tuumiñ bhai' jam bui, dhi' ba' gio mui'p jimia' xib.
47008007	Jix bhai' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ japim gu' aapi'm buiñor guch Xoi'kam, giox bhaai' na pim jax chɨ'ya', gio bɨxchu'x chu maat japim na jax ja'k tu tu'ii'. Pu'ñi chu'm pɨx jum aa' am guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham gui' nam ja palhbui'ñdha' gu jai'. Gio gu' bax maat japim nach jax ja'k jix chu joi'gɨ'nda', nach gu' jam aagi'ñ. Dai dhi' pɨx ba' bam aa' na pim machia' na pim ja palhbui'ñdha' tuumiñ kɨ'n gu jai'ch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham.
47008008	Cham tu' nañ jam chianɨt jup kai'ch dhi' nañ jax jam tɨtda no' pim gu' aapi'm cham aa', ja'pji nañ mi' pɨx jam mamtɨ no' pim ja'xbui' pui'p jix chu joi'gɨ'n nam jax jix chu joi'gɨ'n jai' kap guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham.
47008009	Gio gu'x maat japim gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam nat gampai' xim duuk ya' xi oilhimɨk dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan. Nat xich joi'mdak jich chɨɨ kut ba' pui'm duu nach ba' aach jix chutumñigam kɨ'n ji bi'ya' ii'mda' bhaan, cham tu' na jax pɨk jir jum duukam.
47008010	Aañ jix maat na pimɨt aapi'm maakɨ'n bɨɨpɨ' tu maa gu tuumiñ jɨ'k maap xi jumpadak, joidham japimɨt cham da'dat tu maa.
47008011	Aañ ba' xib pui'p ɨlhii'ñ na pim maa'n na pim jax cham da'dat tu maakda' na pimɨt jax ba duu maakɨ'n, sia jax ña pim pui' pup jum duuka' pim xi chu makia'.
47008012	Gio gu' gu Dios jix kɨɨ' kam tɨgia' gu tuumiñ no' pimɨt cham da'dat tu maa, gio dai gui' nam bia'ka' nax aa'nda' nam tu makia', cham tu' gui' nam cham bia'ka'.
47008013	Gio gu' no' pim pu'ñi tu' kɨ'n ja palhbui'ñ gu jai', cham tu' nam moo kɨ'n jup bam tutumñigamta', aapi'm ba' gampai' pɨx ji bi'ya',
47008014	gu' ja'pji nañ ja'pni kai'ñkam pui' ja'k bua nam gui' pui'p tu bia'ka' na pim aapi'm tu' tu bia' xib. Gio gu' jax chu'm tanoolh pui'p ba duñia' am no'm pui'p ba bia' gu tu', sia kum gu' xib cham tu' bia'. Kani no' pim aapi'm buimok gu maaxdhi' cham ka bia' gu tu' na pim xib bia', gui' dhop ba jam onbai'ñdha' am no'm gu'p ba bia', maa'n ba' na pim jax pɨx jum papalhbui'ñdha'.
47008015	Ja'pnim kai'ch gu' maa'n kap nat pai' tu ua'nak maadɨt gu bɨjɨk dɨr kam: “Gui' na mɨt mui' tu jumaap, ampɨx ja ai bɨɨx, cham tu' pai' palhɨɨp tu' bii. Gio gui' na mɨt gook alh tu jumaap, pui' ampɨx jup ja ai ɨp, cham pai' jax tɨi mɨt nat cham ja ai.”
47008016	Aañ taxchaabgi'ñ gu Dios nat pui' ja'k jup jurtuda gu Tiito nat jax chu'm jiñ jurtuda aañ, xi jam joi'mdat jam tɨ'ñcho ɨp gu' sia ja'p na jax aañ.
47008017	Jix aa' ba' nañ a'mkam pu duñia' nañ jax ka tu duñia' gɨt aañ, dɨɨlh pui' kai'ch na dhi' mu jam tɨɨ'mɨra', na gu' sap xi jam tɨɨgim.
47008018	Jumai bɨɨma'n mui'p jimda' gu Tiito na pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Jir jix bhai'kam dhi' dhich jaduuñ, bɨɨx pɨx pui' kai'ch am gu jai'ch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham nam jai' kap jup tu'ii'. Jix bhai' sap mi' pui' tu duiñchu' na jax ja'k jum aa' na ba'x bhai' ji buusnichgɨda' dhix bhai'm kai'chdam ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam nach tu a'ga.
47008019	Gio dɨɨlh guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham jamɨt bhaan tɨ tɨɨgɨk pui' tɨi na dhi' jai'p jich oi'ñdha' nai' ja'p, na ba' jai'ch palhbuidhidha' nach tu jumpada' gu tuumiñ nach tu' bhaan ba tu a'ga. Gio gu' dhi' nach bhaan pɨx gɇ'kamtu'n guch Xoi'kam nach ba' pui' ja'k duiñchu' nach ja palhbuidha' gu jai', gam nach jix aa' nax bhai' tu ja jimda' ɨp dɨɨlh.
47008020	Gio gu'x maat ich nam bɨɨx aixim bhai' ji chɨ'ya' gu ja'tkam no' chich cham mi' pu duu nach jax kai'ñkam jumpada',
47008021	pui' kuch ba' mi' pui' tu duñiim na ba'x bhai' ji chu buusnichgɨda'. Gio gu' cham tu' dai buiñor gu Dios nach jix bhai' ji bubuakidha', gu' ja'pji sia ja bui gu ja'tkam nam xich ñɨi'ñdha'.
47008022	Jumai pup bɨɨma'n xi jimda' gu Tiito, pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gook ba' bap jum duñia' am gu jumai kɨ'n na pui' bɨɨma'n mui'p jimda'. Dhi' sia pui'p jir jix kɨɨ' maa'nkam ya' nach xi ñɨi'ñ na jax ja'k tu jim, gam na pui'x bhai'p jum taat jam bui na pim tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
47008023	Gu Tiito aañ jiñ buir jix kɨɨ' maa'nkam, jam a'mkam maap tu juan ich na ba'x bhai' tu jam jimda'. Ba' dhi jai' gook nam bɨɨma'n mu jiimda' gu Tiito, gu jai'ch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham jamɨt dhi' kɨ'n ja darai, mi' pɨx ba' pui'p tu duiñchu' am na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam.
47008024	Aapi'm ba' iam mi' dhɨr cham tu' bhaan jax ji chɨ'jix bhai'p ja aichdha' nam pai' dhuuk bhammɨ dɨr ba aaya'. Pui' pim ja'k jix bhai' ja duñia' na jax ja'k bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na pim tu' sɨlhkam jix ja joi'gɨ'n, nam ba'x bhai'm ɨlhdha' jai' kap dɨr guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham nam pui' ba tɨ kaaya', gio na ba' dhi' bhaan matgilhia' na sɨlhkam jir pui' nach jup kai'ch nach jix bhai'ch chaat jam bui na pim mi' pui' tu duñiim na jax jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios.
47009001	Aañ ya' pɨx juugɨt pu chu'm tu jam ua'ñdha' dhi' nañ bhaan tu a'ga na pim tu makia' gu tuumiñ nach ba'p ja makia' gu jai'ch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham. Cham tu'm aa' gu' nañ gɇ' mui'p tu jam ua'ñi'ñdha' gu pui' ja'k,
47009002	ba xi jam maat iñ gu' na pim jir jix bhabhai'kam. Jix bhai'ñ chaatɨt jañ ja aagi'ñ guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham gui' nam Masedoonia oi'dha' na pim aapi'm Akaaya kam cham tu' bhaan jax ji chɨ'ji tu makia' na pai' dhuuk pu'ñi ba tum aagidha', na pimɨt gu' maakɨ'n cham jax ji chɨ'ɨɨk tu maa. Ba' na ñich pu'ñi ja tɨɨ'n, mui' mɨt jum gu'nguxdhak tu maa jɨ'k nam pui' pup jum duuk.
47009003	Mɨjɨñ ba' xi jam joochxidha' dhiñ jaaduñ nañ ja aa', na ba' gɨt iam pui' ji chu buusnia' nañ jax ja tɨtda jai' kap guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham na pim aapi'm bɨxchu' kɨ'n pɨx jir jix bhabhai'kam.
47009004	Jir jix xi'ɨraam gu' no' mɨt jax dhuuk jɨ'k maap jim daagɨk guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham muñ baidhak nam jix maachik no' moor pui' nañ jax jam aa'. Jaiñ no' pim gu' cham pui' ɨlhii'ñ na chich bhammɨ dɨr ji bubua, bhai' bach xi'ɨrbo chich dho gu' jam bɨɨm.
47009005	Pu'ñi kai'ñkam jañ ba' bɨɨpɨ' mui' ba ja jootos dhiñ jaaduñ nam ba' bhammɨ dɨr ɇɇji jai' jam palhbuidha' na pim jumpada' gui' na pim jɨ'k pui' tu makia' ɨp gio na pimɨt jax tɨi maakɨ'n. Dhi'm ba' bhaan bach jɨɨgi'ñdha' gu jai'ch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham nar sɨlhkam pui' nach jax kai'ch, na pim gu' joidham jix chu joi'mdat ba tu makia' cham da'dat.
47009006	Jup kai'chdha' am gu ja'tkam na saak gu jaroi' no' gɇ' tɨ ɨs, gɇ'p tu orda', ba' gu jaroi' na palhɨɨp tɨ ɨsda', palhɨɨp tu orda' ɨp.
47009007	Ba' aapi'm pu'ñi na pim tu makia' gu tuumiñ, ja'kbui' pim tu makia' na pim jɨ'k ɨlhii'ñ nar am na pim ba'x bhai'm taatɨt tu makia', ni ku cham jaroi' jam chianda' ɨp. Jix joi'gɨ'nda' gu' gu Dios gu jaroi' nax bhai'm taatɨt tu maakda'.
47009008	Gio gu' gu Dios pɨx bɨɨx tu jam maak tu' nam aa', jai' pup xi jam bipio' na pim ba' pu'ñi mi' dhɨr ja makia' gu jai' nam cham tu' bia', piam gu tu' na kɨ'n jax jum duñia' na jax jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios.
47009009	Na gu' ja'pnim kai'ch maa'n kap nat pai' tu ua'nak maadɨt gu bɨjɨk dɨr kam: Xi ja makia' ap gu tu' nap bia' gui' nam cham tu' bia' ni jɨ'x, gammɨjɨ ba'x bhai' ba tum jimda' sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt no' pich pui' duu.
47009010	Ba' gu Dios pɨx bɨɨx aixim tu'm jam makia' gu kaichuk na pim ba' tɨ ɨsdat tu kua'da', jir gui' ga'n gu' gu kaichuk dhi' na bɨɨx aixim tu'm jix jai'ch. Gio gu Dios pɨx dɨɨlh jup tu duiñchu'nda' nax kɨɨ' gɨgɨ'rdat gɇ'gɇr iibhai'ñcharda' gu jam gaa, gam na pim gɇ' tu orda'. Dhi' pɨx ba'r jam mai'chɨk ka' na pim ba tu makia' gu tuumiñ.
47009011	Gammɨjɨ bɨɨx aixim tu jam maakidha' gu Dios tu' nam aa'nda', mui' nammɨ ji chu jam kɨɨxdhidha' na pim ba' aapi'm mi' dhɨr jup ja maakda' gui' nam pu'ñi cham tu' bia'. Gio gu' gui' na pim xib jumpadai bhach joochxidha', pu kai'ñkam ja makia' ich gu jai'ch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham nam ba' mi' dhɨr jam a'mkam taxchaabgidha' gu Dios na tu jam maak.
47009012	Nach gu' cham tu' dai pu kai'ñkam pɨx ja maak gu tuumiñ guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham nam ba' ba bia'ka' nam kɨ'n saba'da' gu tu', gu' ja'pji dhi' kɨ'n jup jum gu'nguxi'ñ am nam jam a'mkam taxchaabgi'ñ gu Dios.
47009013	Pu kai'ñkam jix bhai'm ɨlhdhai taxchaabgidha'm ɨp gu Dios, na pim mi' pui' jiim na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam dhi' na pim pui' bhaan jup tu a'ga ɨp aapi'm, dhi' bhaan machia' am gu' na pim mui' ba ja joochxidha' gu tuumiñ. Sia dhi' bhaan taxchaabgidha'm ɨp gu Dios no' pimɨt mui' maap jumpadak mui' xi ja joochxi.
47009014	Gio gu' xi jam joi'mdat jam a'mkam tu daan am, nam gu'x bhai'm taat na pim jir jix bhabhai'kam, nam gu'x maat nat gu Dios pɨx dɨɨlh pui' ja'k jam jurtuda na pim jix ja joi'mdat ja palhbui'ñdha' gu jai'.
47009015	Aach pui'x bhai'ch chaatɨt jup taxchaabgi'ñ gu Dios nat pu chu'm kɨ'n jich dharai nach tu' bhaan ba tu juan xib, cham bhaai' nach jax pɨk ja'k xi taxchaabgi'ñdha' gɨt.
47010001	Aañi' Paablo soi' jam tɨtdat tu jam a'gi'ñ, nañ gu' buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam gui' nax chu joi'gɨ'n, sia ku pim gu' pui' kai'ch nañ mɨk dɨr jix bhaamut tu jam a'gi'ñdha', no'ñ jam buip tu'ii' sap ba' xi jam ɨɨbhi'ñdha' iñ panaas.
47010002	Ba' aañ xib dɨr soi' jam tɨtda na pim cham tu'ñ chianda' nañ pai' dhuuk bhammɨ dɨr aaya', nañ ja ñiokdha' gui' nam saak bhai' dhɨr pui'ch a'ga nach aach pui' ja'k tu jim, nam jax ja'k tu jim gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ. Cham tu' ja ɨɨbhi'ñ iñ gu' no' ba xim aagim.
47010003	Jir ja'tkam ich dho pɨx ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n aach nach jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gu' ji nach gu' cham tu' pui' ja'k tu kokda nam jax chu kokda gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ.
47010004	Gui' nam jax chu'm kɨ'n tu kokda gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ, aach cham tu' pu chu'm kɨ'n tu kokda, gu' ja'pji gui' kɨ'n nat Dios jich chajaañ, na cham maax, dhi' kɨ'n jix bhaai' nach cham pai' matgilhdha' gux buam jum duukam sia kur gɇ'p jum duukam panaas. Pu'ñich jup ja dooda' gui' nam pui' bhai' pai' oipot buam jich a'ga na jax cham jir pui', ii'mda' bhaan jach cham pai' ja matgilhdha'.
47010005	Sia jax ña pɨx chu'm gux buam jum duukam no' tu sosbhi'ñ nam cham machia' gu ja'tkam gu sɨlhkam ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam, dhi' kɨ'n jach cham pai' matgilhdha'. Na gu' dhi' pɨx nach a'm tajaañix na ba' pui' tu duiñchu' nam gu ja'tkam jix maatɨt kɇɇjidhat gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios mi' pui' jimiim na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam.
47010006	Jix bhaai' ɨp ba' nach tulhiiñchuda' gu jaroi' no' cham mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam no' gu' tɨi tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, aapi'm jam bui dhɨr jach bhai' ji kɨɨsa' no' pim cham mi' pui' jiim.
47010007	Aañ jix maat na pim aapi'm cham tu' tuukab xim ga'nga na jax ja'k jir tu'm kam ka' gui' na sɨlhkam mi' pui' jimda' na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam. Kani no' pim aapi'm tu' sɨlhkam buiñor jup tui'dhi' guch Xoi'kam, jix mat ka' pim nach aach tu' sɨlhkam buiñor jup tui'dhi' ɨp.
47010008	Ba' sia kuñ jɨ'x am bhabhai'bchu'n nañ jax ja'k tu jam a'gi'ñdha' pai'jɨ, aañ cham tu' dhi' bhaan jup bax xi'ɨr, nat gu' gu Dios pɨx jich chajaañ gui' nach kɨ'n jam sɨlhka'nda' no' pim cham mi' pui' ka jiim na jax jix aa', cham tu' nach kɨ'n cham pai' jam matgilhdha' ja'p nach jax dhooda' gux buam jum duukam.
47010009	Cham tu' pim jax jum aa'nda' nañ dhi' bhaan pɨx jam ɨ'nkiat mɨk dɨr mui' ji chu jam ua'ñdhat.
47010010	Jai' dhɨt saak jup kai'chdha' pim nañ mɨk dɨr jix bhaamut mu tu jam ua'ñi'ñdha', nañ jam buip tui'ka' sap ba' cham tu' bhaan jax jam tɨtdada' iñ, daman jañ sap cham pɨk bhai' maatɨt tu a'ga.
47010011	Ba' aañ xib dhi u'uan bhaan pu ja tɨtda gui' nam pui' kai'chdha' nach jix bhaamut tu ja a'gidha' nach pai' dhuuk bhammɨ dɨr aaya' jam bui no'm cham mi' pui' jiim na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam. Ja'xbui'x bhaakut jach jup tu ja a'gidha' nach jɨ'x jix bhaakut pui' mu tu jam ua'ñi'ñ.
47010012	Gui' nam nai' jiimɨt pui' kai'chidha' nam jir jix kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam, aach cham tu' pui' ja'k bhaan jup tu daa'ñchu', ni kuch jix aa' nam jich bɨpna'nda' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam. Ja'p ji buusanda' gu' nañ jir jix ñaanbigɨm no'ñ bɨɨx aixim bhaan gɇ'kam jiñ chaat.
47010013	Aañ daipu' dhi' bhaan gɇ'kam jiñ chaatɨt jix bhai'ñ chaat nañ jir tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios, gio daipu'ñ dhi' bhaan gɇ'kam jup jiñ chaat na ñich jɨ'k kap ba tu jua, ja'p na jax na chich bhai' ɇɇk jam bui tu jam a'gi gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam, tɨ jɨɨ'ñ japimɨt ɨp cham jax ji chɨ'ɨɨk.
47010014	Aach bɨɨpɨ' bhammɨ dɨr ɇɇk tu jam a'gi gu' Koriinto gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam, dhi' bhaan jañ ba' pui' kai'ch nach sia aapi'm jam buix bhai'ch chaatɨt gɇ'gɇrkam jich chaat.
47010015	Cham tu'ch bhaan gɇ'gɇrkam jich chaat ja bui gu jai' na chich cham aach tu ja a'gi gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam, dai aapi'm jam bui pɨx. Jix io'm jach jam bui tu juana' no' pim aapi'm xim gɨ'lhdhim na pim buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam.
47010016	Gio gu' ka tu ja a'gidha' ich jai' gu ja'tkam gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam gammɨjɨ ja'k iam na pim pai' oi'dha' aapi'm, nach ba' dai dhi' ja buix bhai'ch chaatɨt gɇ'gɇrkam jich chaat ka', cham tu' ja bui gui' na mɨt jai' ba tu ja a'gi.
47010017	Gu jaroi' ba' no' gɇ'kam xim ɨlhdham, dhi' bhaan gɇ'kam jum taat ka' no' mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa' gu Dios.
47010018	Na gu' gu jaroi' nam tu' ka'm ɨlhii'ñdha' gu ja'tkam, no' pui' kai'ch gu Dios nam ba' tu' ka'm ɨlhii'ñdha'. No' gu' cham pui' kai'ch gu Dios, dho cham tu' ka'm ɨlhii'ñdha'm ɨp gu ja'tkam, pur ja'ppɨx maa'nkam ka' sia ku jax kai'ch mi ja'p oirɨt.
47011001	Ea na pim ka xiñ kɇɇñ jaaduñ nañ jai' pup ka xi chu jam a'gidha' dhi u'uan bhaan, sia ku pim gu'x ñaanbim pɨx jiñ kɇɇ.
47011002	Aañ jix buam jiñ aagɨt jam tɨ'ñchoka' gammɨjɨ, jix maat iñ na gu Dios pɨx jup tu duiñchu' nañ ba' pui'ñ aa', ja'p ji buan japim gu' bɨɨx na jax maa'n gu tɨyaa no' buiñor ba xim tɨɨmom maa'n gu biapma'. Ba' gu biapma'r di' guch Xoi'kam na ñich aañ jam iimchuda na pim buiñor jum tɨɨmo'. Jix aa' iñ na pim tu' sɨlhkam jir tɨtɨɨya ka' jano' na pim pai' dhuuk bɨɨma'n jum tɨɨmo'.
47011003	Pui' kuñ ba'x buam jiñ aa'nda', nañ gu' cham maat no' pim moo gammɨjɨm nuukdat oipoda', ka' ba' gu' pui' ma tu jam dooda' nat jax chu dooda bɨjɨk gu Eeba nat bɨɨx aixim iatgidhak ma'iich gu ko'. Na pim gu' cham tu' kar pu chu'm ka' na jax chu'm jix aa' guch Xoi'kam na pim buiñor jum tɨɨmo' no't pui' tu jam dooda.
47011004	Ja'pniñ kai'ñkam pui' jam tɨtda na pim ja'p xi bubuakia' no' jaroi' maakam tu jam a'gidhim na jax cham pui'm kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam, no' cham tu'r pu chu'm na chich jax chu'm tu jam a'gi aach. Aapi'm gu' sap kɇɇkɇ' jaroi' na jimda' sia ku cham mi' pui' tu a'gim na jax jir sɨlhkam. Cham tu' dhi' pɨx bhaan jup tui'ñgɨda' gu' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' na jax chu'm jich a'm jup tui'dhi' aach, jumai pɨx jam a'm jam tajaañdha' na jax chu'm cham kɨɨ'.
47011005	Gio gu' aañ cham tu'ñ dho'ñcho' nam tu' pɨx jiñ ɨlhdha' gui' na mɨt gatuuk bha ja'p ai nam saak pui' kai'chim nam jix io'm jir jix kɨkɨɨ' tujuandam tugi'ñ guch Xoi'kam, cham tu' pui' na jax aañ.
47011006	Cham tu'r jiñ jupaabkam am gu' sia kuñ cham pui'x bhai' xi bua nañ tu a'ga na jax gui' am, na gu' nañ jɨ'k tu'x chu maat aañ, cham tu' ja'xbui' pui' tu maat am gui'. Jix maat japim dho aapi'm jano' nach bhammɨ dɨr oipimɨk nach bɨɨx aixim tu buada' nam tu' cham pu bua gui' xib.
47011007	Gio gu' cham tu' kɨ'n jiñ ua'tulh jañich jam bui. Pui' pɨx jañich tu jam a'gi gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam, cham pai' jam taa ñich tu' tuumiñ. Gampai' ñich jiñ dhuuk tu jam a'gi na pim ba' aapi'm tɇ'kob iam ji bi'ya'. ¿Ka'ñ chi gu' dhi' kɨ'n aa mañ ua'tulh jam buiñ jaaduñ?
47011008	Jai' kap dɨr jiñ palhbui mɨt gu' guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham tuumiñ kɨ'n na ñich ba' kɨ'n bhai' dhɨr ja'p ɇɇk jam bui ba tu jam a'gi gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam.
47011009	Cham tu' tu' jam taa ñich na pim kɨ'n jiñ palhbuidha' na ñich jɨ'k tanoolh bhai' juruuñ jam bui, na mɨt gu'ñ palhbui guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham Masedoonia kam na mɨt bha ɇɇk na ñich ba' kɨ'n bhai' buusai'. Jix maat iñ gu' nax xijai jam bui no' ñich bɨɨx aixim bhai'p ba ji chu jam taa, sia xib jañ cham tu' tu' jam taan.
47011010	Jix bhai' tu tatda' gu' aañ jiñ bui nañ cham tu' tu' jam taan, sia ku jaroi' pui' kai'ch na cham jir am bha ja'p ji oirɨt na jɨ'x jir Akaaya. Ja'xbui'ñ jiñ jur kɨ'n jix maat nar am nañ jɨ'x tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nar sɨlhkam na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam.
47011011	Cham tu'ñ ja'p kai'ñkam pui' jam tɨtda nañ cham ka jam joi'gɨ'n, xi jam joi'gɨ'n iñ ji matgɨm, jix maat do gu Dios.
47011012	Aañ gammɨjɨ mi' pui' pu jimda' nañ jax ba jim nam ba' cham tu' bhaan jiñ mai'chia' gu jai' nam tɨi dhi' bhaan gɇ'gɇrkam xim ɨlhdhak nat jax chu'm kɨ'n jich dharai aach gu Dios.
47011013	Cham tu' sɨlhkam jir noonbi'ñ am gu' guch Xoi'kam sia kum pui' kai'ch, pui' pɨx ja'k jam tɨi xi chu jim nam jax dhui bhaan ja iatgi'ñ gu jai'ch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham.
47011014	Gio gu'x maat ich gu ja'ook na bɨxchu'x aichu'n na jax ja'k bhaan ja iatgidha' gu ja'tkam, sia pui' xim dui na panaas jir nobii'ñ ka' gu Dios.
47011015	Mi' pui'p tu daa'ñchu' am ba' gui' nam jir noonbi'ñ gu ja'ook ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, pui'm ja'k xi chu jimda' nam panaas jir jix kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam, gu' ji na gu' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' nam jum tulhiiña', mu ja'k pu bhɨɨya' am, na gu' pu'ñi pɨx ja'k jir ja mai'chɨk ka'.
47011016	Jix gɨ'm jañ ya' tu jam a'gi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ, sia ku pim gu' aapi'm pui' pɨx ja'k jiñ kɇɇ na jax gux ñaanbigɨm nañ jax ba jam tɨtda, piam ku pim gu' pui'm aa' nañ sɨlhkam jix ñaanbi'. Sia pim ka xiñ kɇɇ nañ jam aagi'ñdha' nañ jax jir tu'm kam aañ dɨɨlh, sia ku gu' dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' nañ am gɇ'kam jiñ chaat.
47011017	Cham tu' pui' ja'k jix aa' gu' gu Dios nañ gɇ'kam jiñ chaatɨt am ja aagi'ñdha' gu jai' nañ aañ jix io'm jir jix kɨɨ' maa'nkam, jix ñaanbigɨm pɨx jiñ ɨlhii'ñdha' gu' no'ñ pui' kai'ch.
47011018	Gu' ji na gu' kapbhai' nam mui'x jai'ch gui' nam gɇ'gɇrkam jum taatɨt pui' kai'ch nam jix bhai' tu jim, aañ jai' pui'p xi chɨ'ya' gɇ'kam jiñ chaatɨt sia gu palhɨɨp nañ jax ja'k jix bhai'p tu jim.
47011019	Jix bhai' jam jur bia' pim dho tɨi aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ, gu' pɨx ji na pim gu' joidham ja kɇɇ gui' nam pu'ñix ñanaanbim kai'chdha'.
47011020	Cham jax ɨlhii'ñ japim panaas sia chi jaroi' tu jam juantu'n, piam sia kum jam bui dhɨr jum tutumñigamtaim bɨɨx aixim xi jam iatgidhat, gam chi siam gampai' xi jam ɨlhdhat, jɨ'x jam xi jam kakpiasat na jax aa'.
47011021	Aach gu' gampai' tui'ñgɨt bhammɨ dɨr jam bui ai jano', jix xi'ɨraam tu tatda' xib nañ mui' xiñ ga'nga. Ba' kapbhai' nam jai' gɇ'gɇrkam jim ɨlhdhat pui' kai'ch nam jax jir tu'm kam, aañ dho pui'p xi chɨ'ya' xib, sia ku gu' buiñor gu Dios ja'p ji buusan nañ jix ñaanbi'.
47011022	Ja'pniñ kai'ch nañ aañ ja'xbui'p jir pu chu'm nam jax chu'm gui', ebreo ñi'ook kɨ'n jañ tu a'ga ja'p nam jax chu'm kɨ'n tu a'ga gui', gior Israel kam maa'nkam iñ ɨp ja'p na jax gui' nam jir Israel kam, jir jiñ boxii ɨp gu Abraam ja'p na jax gui' na pui'p jir ja boxii.
47011023	Gior tujuandam tugi'ñ iñ guch Xoi'kam ja'p na jax gui' nam sap pɨk ba' jai'p jir tujuandam tugi'ñ. Jix io'm jir jix kɨɨ' tujuandam tugi'ñ iñ aañ guch Xoi'kam, pui' xi chɨi ñich sia kuñ buiñor gu Dios jix ñaanbim kai'ch. Gɇ' ba tu jua ñich gu' bhaankam guch Xoi'kam, gui' cham pai' pui' tu juan am. Gio mui'kim jamɨt ba jiñ gɨɨ' jo' kɨ'n, gui' cham pai' ja gɨb am, pai'jɨ tɨip jiñ mumua'da' am.
47011024	Jix chamaamim jamɨt jix io'm ba jiñ gɨɨ' jo' kɨ'n gu Israel kam ja'tkam, aichdha' am maa'n oo'm daman mambhɨɨx damdɨr jix jum maakob nam miñ chɨtkidha' gu jo' gu maa'nnim nam jiñ gɨɨ'bia'.
47011025	Baikim jamɨt jup ba jiñ gɨɨ' uux jix kabaak kɨ'n, gio maa'nnim joodai kɨ'n jamɨt jup jiñ ma'yasa. Gio baik suudai' chɨr jup ba baap gu kaknub gui' nañ bhaan ka jimda'. Maa'nnim jañ suudai' dhaam pu sɇ' ji bhabhai'mukdat, ɨrban gu gɇ' suudai' nañ pu sɇ' maa'n tukaa' gio maa'n tanoolh.
47011026	Gio nai' ja'p nañ jax jimda', tɨip jiñ bhɨbhɨ'ntɨkidha' gu suudai' na gɇ' jimda' nai' a'kkɨ'n. Pai'jɨ gux ɨ'xkum jam tɨip jiñ mumua'da' nam mia'n mañ bhɨɨya'. Gam dɨɨlh gu Israel kam ja'tkam nam xiñ mu'aak ka' sia kuñ tɨip jir pu chu'm, gam jai' kap dɨr nam cham jir Israel kam ja'tkam. Pai' nañ ja'k jimda'ñ muuki' chɨr jup tui'ñgɨda', sia kuñ gɇ' kiicham oirɨ, piam mu ja'p gampɨx, piam kuñ suudai' dhaam ka jim kanuub ta'm, gam sia ja bui gui' nam sap pɨk ba' tɨi tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
47011027	Gio nañ jix io'm tu juanda', bhaan pɨx jiñ chulhiiñdha' iñ, pai'jɨñ cham koksoda' gu', gam pai'jɨ nañ uamaidha', pui'x bhiogɨt juruuxi'ñdha' iñ. Gam nañ tonmoidha' pai'jɨ, gam nañ gɨbkaidha' nañ cham kɨkɨɨ' tu jajannulh.
47011028	Bɨɨx aixim jañ bhaan nai'ñ chulhiiñaidha', gam nañ jix ja joi'mdat ja tɨ'ñchoka' nabap tanoolh bɨɨx guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham nam jɨ'k nai' maap jum jumpadat tu daan.
47011029	No'ñ ja bui kap tu'ii' mu pai' no't jano' pɨk tu' bhaan ma tu ai maadɨt, aañ ja'xbui'x ko'kkam jup xiñ dhuñia' na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nañ jix joi'mdat nɨi'ñ. Piam no' mɨt jaroi' tu' bhaan gai bua nam ua'tulhdha', jix buam jiñ ɨlhdhaiñ gampai' pup tui'ka'.
47011030	Aañ dhi' pɨx bhaan gɇ'kam jiñ chaat nañ gampai' pɨx jiñ ɨlhii'ñ, cham tu' jumai tu' bhaan pup gɇ'kam jiñ chaat iñ.
47011031	Jix maat do gu Gɨ'korga'n gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam nañ sɨlhkam jup kai'ch, dhi' na gammɨjɨm aa' nach gɇ'kamtu'nda' sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt.
47011032	Jano' nañ Damaasko xip tu't, gux kai' gui' nat jix io'm gɇ'kam Areetas mi dai, tu chia nam mi gɇ' ki'ñgob gu'kuya' gu sandaarui'x nam tu nuukda' nañ pai' dhuuk mu buusnia' nam ba'ñ dhaagɨiñ kuupa'.
47011033	Gu' ji na mɨt gu' jai' dhɨt jix bhai' duu nam jix chu joi'gɨ'n, maa'n kap dɨr jamɨt jiñ buusai' na pai' dhɨr mu ja'p tum joojoi'ñ na ɨlhi'ch tɨ dɨ', ampɨx jiñ aixim. Baalh cha'm jamɨt xiñ dhaasak xi gia'rgidhak tɨrbiñ kɨ'n muñ tɨbaañ mɨjɨmmɨ dɨɨrap. Pu'ñi tu't jañich ba' ja nakoo gui' nam ka xiñ kuupak kat.
47012001	Ba' pui' nañ jax ba jam tɨtda, pur cham tu' sia kuñ tɨi gɇ'kam jiñ chaatɨt bɨɨx aixim tu a'ga, gu' ji na gu' dhi' nañ tu' bhaan tu jam a'gidha' xib, jum aa' nañ jam aagi'ñdha' sia kuñ panaas dhi' bhaan pɨx gɇ'kam jiñ chaat. Jam aagi'ñdha' iñ nat jax tɨñ chɨɨ'ñchuda gu Dios maa'nnim jiñ ii'mda' bhaan.
47012002	Aañ maa'n jix maat gu jaduuñ na pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, ba' tɨɨ ñich ii'mda' bhaan na mɨt baidhak bhɨjɨmmɨ baik jix dhaam bhaan. Mambhɨɨx daman maakob oidha' bap duu jano' na mɨt baidhak, dai nañ cham maatɨt nɨi'ñ no' bɨɨx tukga'n bɨnkam jim, ka' ba' dai ii'mdaga'n pɨx, gu Dios dɨɨlh jix maat.
47012004	Maa'n kap aich jamɨt na pai' joidham tu tu'ii', bhai' ba' tɨ kai na tum a'ga kɨ'n gu ñi'ook nax xi dhuu ya' dhi oi'ñga'n na jaroi' kɨ'n tu a'ga'.
47012005	Ba' aañ pu jam tɨtda na dai dhi' dhi jaduuñ jir am na gɇ'kam jum taatɨt pɨx am tuch a'gi'ñdha' gui' na tu'r jumai oi'ñga'n kam na cham tu ju'ngɨ. Aañ gu' no' ñich tɨi bhai'p ji chu a'ga gu tu' nañ jix maat ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, dhi' pɨx bhaan tu a'gada' iñ nañ tu' bhaan jiñ chulhiiñ.
47012006	Gio gu' aañ jiñ bui tɨi cham tu' nañ gɇ'kam jiñ chaat ka' no'ñ tu a'ga nañ tu'x maat, nañ gu' sɨlhkam maaxik jix maatɨt jup kai'chdha'. Gu' ji nañ gu' aañ ja'xchudhix kam pɨx tu a'gada' nam ba' cham jax jum aa'nda' gu ja'tkam nañ ja'p pɨx gɇ'kam jiñ chaat.
47012007	Pui' na jax nat tɨñ chɨɨ'ñchuda ii'mda' bhaan gu Dios, nañ gu' cham tu' bɨɨx tu aa' na ñich jax tɨ tɨɨ, dɨɨlh pɨx jañ pui'x chu maat. Tu nakoo' iñ sia kuñ jax tɨi bhaan gɇ'kam xiñ ɨlhdham gui' nañ tu'x maat, bhai' pɨx ji chuñ ai ba'ñ chuuku' bhaan, ja'p tu tatda' na panaas joi' kɨ'n jiñ xɨssɨ gu ja'ook bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x jir jiñ chuuku'.
47012008	Aañ ba' tɨi baikim pui' ba tɨɨ'n gu Dios nañ cham ka aa' nañ dhi' kɨ'n jiñ chulhiiñdha'.
47012009	Gu' ji na gu' gu Dios jup jiñ chɨtda na dhi' bhaan xiñ joi'mdat jiñ a'm tɨ nɨidhim, gio sap dhi' bhaan mamtɨ am gu ja'tkam na bɨɨx aixim jix bhaai' na pu tu duñia' sia ku cham jax jix bhaai' panaas gu tu'. Pui' kuñ ba' aañ jix aa' na cham bhai' tuñ jimda' na ba' dhi' bhaan matgilhdha' na bɨxchu'x bhaai' na pu tu duñia' guch Xoi'kam sia ku jax jix chu xijai panaas.
47012010	Gam ba' nañ gammɨjɨ pux bhai'ñ chaat ka' sia ku cham bhai' tuñ jim, siam chi giilhim jiñ chɨtda gu ja'tkam, gam sia kuñ cham tu' bia', gam sia kum jai' xiñ bhaamkidhat xiñ mu'aak, gam sia ku jax jix xijai nañ mi' pui' jimda' na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam. Gio gu' aañ jiñ bui no' tu' bhaan jix buam tu tatda', dhi' kɨ'n jañ jix io'm bhaan xiñ gu'nguxdhai mi' pui' ba xi jimda'.
47012011	Ja'p pɨx kai'ch iñ dho gu' na tu'x ñaanbigɨm nañ jax chu jam a'gi'ñ, nañ gu' panaas dhi' pɨx bhaan gɇ'kam jiñ chaat, gu' ji na gu'm aa' nañ dhi' bhaan tu jam a'gidha' na pim ba' aapi'm tu' ka'm jiñ ɨlhdha', cham tu' nañ aañ dɨɨlh gɇ'kam jiñ chaatɨt jam aagi'ñ nañ jax ja'k tu jim.
