49005006	Xim gaagidha' pim nam jax ja'k cham jam iatgidha' gui' nam nai' oipot maakam tu iatgi'ñ, na pu cham tu' mim nɨnɨi'ñ buiñor gu Dios. Jix io'm ja tulhiiñchuda' gu' gu Dios gui' nam nai' pui' tu iatgidhidha', nam gu' dhi' cham tu' mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa'nda'.
49005007	Jam aagi'ñ iñ ba' na pim cham tu' mi ja jɨɨgi'ñdha' dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam, ni ku pim am ja bɨpnatda'.
49005008	Gu jaroi' no' cham maat na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios, ja'p ji buusanda' nax chu tukgam kɨr oirɨda', pui' na jax aapi'm na pim jix chu tukgam kɨr oipot bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pim chakui maatɨt na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios. Ba' xib na pim bax maat, jix chu maax kɨr ja'k ba oipo pim, jum aa' ba' na pim mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios na ba' dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na pim bax maat na jax jir tu'm kam.
49005009	Gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n pɨx gu' dɨɨlh gu Dios jich mattudidha' nach jax ja'k mi' pui' jiimda', nach jax ja'k jix chu joi'gɨ'nda', gio nach jax ja'k mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gio na jax jir sɨlhkam. Gu' ba' no'ch gu' dhi' bɨɨx mi' pui' tu duiñchu', dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nach jix chu maax kɨr jiimchu'.
49005010	Xi gaagidha' pim na pim jax ja'k tɨi gɨt mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios.
49005011	Cha'pim jai' ja palhbui'ñdha' gu tu' nam jax buada' gui' nam cham maat ni jɨ'x na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios, na gu' nam jɨ'k tu' jax buada', pu cham tu' mi nɨnɨi'ñ am. Ja'kbui' kat ji na pim ja aagi'ñdha' na cham jir am pui' nam jax ja'k tu bua.
49005012	Jix xi'ɨraam gu' sia no'ch am jai' pu chu'm jup tu a'ga aach nach jɨ'k jix chu maax kɨr bap tu'ii', nam gu'x chu tukgam kɨr jup tu't pui' tu bua gui'.
49005013	Ba' no'm gu' iam mi' ja'k xi baapkia' gɨt na pai'x chu maax, jix bhai' bhai' ji machia' am gɨt na maaxik cham tu'r pui' nam jax tu bua, giox bhai' ba machia' am na jax ja'k jir sɨlhkam.
49005014	Pui' ku ba'p jum kai'ch maa'n kap na mɨt pai' tu ua'nak gu bɨjɨk dɨr kam: Gor xi ñiññia, cha'pim ka kookos ka'. Xi baapmigia' pim mi' dhɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr na ba' jam bɨ'ñxidha' guch Xoi'kam.
49005015	Ba' xi gaagidha' pim ɨp na pim jax ja'k tu jimda' aapi'm dɨɨlh. Pui' pim ja'k tu jimda' na jax ja'k bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na pim jix bhai' jam jur bia', na pim gu'r jix chu mamatda'. Cha'pim ja'p pɨx tu jimda' na jax gui' nam cham ja jur bia' ni jɨ'x.
49005016	Gammɨjɨ pim tu' jax xi buada' na tu'r jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam, cha'pim gam ɨrdat darka', na gu' cham tu' gammɨjɨr jix kɨɨ' tanoolh ka'.
49005017	Cha'pim pui'm ɨlhii'ñdha' na pim panaas pu cham jɨ'xdha' machia' na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios, na gu' dhi' pui' ji buusanda' na pim pu cham jum jur bia'ka' no' pim pui'm aa', gu' ja'pji na pim xi gaaga' na pim jax ja'k jix bhai' mi' pui' jiimda'.
49005018	Gio na pim cham tu' maikkorda', na pim gu' bɨɨx aixim jix buam tu buada' no' pim cham jam jur ka bia', gu' ja'pji ja'kbui' kat na pim xi baidha' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' na gɇ' jam a'm jum tajaana' na ba' dhi' jam jurtudidha' na pim jax ja'k tu duñiidha' gu tu'.
49005019	Gio na pim pai' dhuuk tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios, kɨ'n japim xim guguuxdhat xi chu jiñkaidhat bhaan Saalmos ta'm, gio mi' dhɨr japim xi boosgat na pim laala'nda', piam sia jax ña pim ja'k jix mat ka' na pim laala'nda', dai nax dhaam kam bhaan tu a'gada'. Dhi' pu'ñi ja'k japim bhaan gɇ'kamtu'nda' gu Dios bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n.
49005020	Gammɨjɨ pim taxchaabgi'ñdha' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' na bɨxchu' pɨx kɨ'n jix bhai'ch bua, bhaankam japim taxchaabgi'ñdha' gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam.
49005021	Tu' ka'm japim xim nɨnɨidhat bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, cham tu' na pim gɇ'gɇrkam jum taat ka', na gu' pu'ñi ja'k bhaan jup jix maatɨ' ka' ba' na pim tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ guch Xoi'kam.
49005022	Gu u'uub gui' nam tɨ bɨpna', jum aa' nam tu' ka'm ja nɨi'ñdha' gu ja bɨpna', pui' nam jax tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ guch Xoi'kam.
49005023	Na gu' gu chio'ñ pɨk bhaan jup tu tu'ii', cham tu' gu ubii. Ja'p na jax guch Xoi'kam na gui' pɨk bhaan jup tu tu'ii' bɨɨx nach jɨ'k buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ. Gio gu' dhi' pɨx jich Xoi'kam gammɨjɨch palhbui'ñchu'nda' sia tu' na pɨx bhaan, na gu' nañ jax ba kai'ch nach jir tukga'n pɨx.
49005024	Jum aa' ba' na gu ubii tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' gu bɨnga'n sia pɨk nar jax ka' gɨt, ja'p na jax aach nach jɨ'k buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam nach gu' tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ.
49005025	Gio gu chichio'ñ gui' nam tɨ bɨpna', pui' tu' ka'm jam jup ja nɨidhat jix ja joi'gɨ'nda', ja'xbui' pui'p jix ja joi'gɨ'nda' am nat jɨ'x xich joi'gɨlh guch Xoi'kam aach bɨɨx nach jɨ'k buiñor ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ xib. Gɇ'kam kɨ'n xich joi'mdak jich a'mkam muu gu'.
49005026	Ba' nat xich joi'mdak jich a'mkam muu, dhi' pu chu'm nai' pup tum a'ga, dhi' nat ba' aach jax chu'm kɨ'n uana guch ua'tulhdhara' bɨnkam na chich jich bopko suudai' kɨ'n. Gui' dɨɨlh pui' ja'k tu duu nach ba' bar ja'tkam tugi'ñ ka',
49005027	dɨɨlh jich kɨɨ'mpi nach ba' joidham jix kɨkɨɨ' buiñor jup tui'ka' na xich nɨi'ñdha', na ni jɨ'x ku iam palhɨɨp jich a'm jup tui'ka' gux buam jum duukam. Ja'p pɨx jach tui'ka' na jax gu ipuur gui' nax io'm jix chua ka', na pu cham pai' pɨx am jix ikoora' ka', ni ku cham pai' pɨx am jix xo'solhik ka', ni palhɨɨp ku pɨx am jax tui'ka'.
49005028	Gu chio'ñ ja'pni ja'k jup jix joi'gɨ'nda' gu bɨnga'n na jax gu dɨɨlh tukga'n. Na gu' gu jax chu'm chio'ñ no'x joi'gɨ'n gu bɨnga'n, ja'p ji buusanda' na dɨɨlh xim joi'gɨ'nda'.
49005029	Na gu' cham jaroi' jai'ch gu maa'nkam na gampai' pɨx ɨlhii'ñdha' gu tukga'n, gu' ja'pji gammɨjɨ nam jix ja joi'mdat jix bhai' ja buada' gu ja tutku', tu ja maakda' am gio bɨɨx aixim nam jix bhai' ja buada'. Ba' pu'ñi xich joi'mdat gammɨjɨx bhai'ch bua guch Xoi'kam aach nach jɨ'k buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ.
49005030	Na gu' pui' nañ jax ba kai'ch, bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n nach jɨ'k buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ, ja'p ji buusan nach jir tukga'n.
49005031	Pui' ku ba'p jum kai'ch maa'n kap na mɨt pai' tu ua'nak gu bɨjɨk dɨr kam: “Gu chio'ñ no't maa'n ba bhɨi gu ubii, mi' dhɨr ba jimia' ja bui gu gɨ'korga'n, na gu' dɨlhkob ja'k ba tu kiicha' bɨɨma'n gu bɨnga'n. Ja'p ji buusnia' ba' nam maa'n maa'nkam pɨx jup jum duñia' gook dɨt.”
49005032	Ba'r gɇ'p jum duukam dhi' pui' na jax ja'k tu tu'ii' nam tu' chakui maat mui' gu ja'tkam. Guch Xoi'kam gio gui' nam jɨ'k buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ jañ ja aagɨt jup kai'ch.
49005033	Bɨɨx dho ba' na pim jɨ'k jir chichio'ñ na pim tɨ bɨpna', jum aa' na pim jix ja joi'gɨ'nda' gu jam bɨpna'. Gio bɨɨx na pim jɨ'k jir u'uub na pim jup tɨ bɨpna', jum aa' ɨp na pim tu' ka'm ja nɨi'ñdha' gu jam bɨpna' chichio'ñ.
49006001	Ba' aapi'm na pim tɨ gɨgɨ'kora', tu' ka'm japim jup xi ja nɨidhat, na pim gu' aapi'm buiñor bap tui'dhi' guch Xoi'kam, pui' ja'k jam a'm jum aa' ba' na pim duiñchu'nda'.
49006002	Dhi' bɨɨpɨ'm aa' nach pui' duñia' na ba'x bhai' tuch jimda' nat jax tu daasak gu Dios na tu aagix ka', nat ba' mi' dhɨr jup tu ua'na gu Moisees, ja'pnim kai'ch: “Tu' ka'm jap nɨidhat mi' pui' jimda' na jax jum tɨɨdaidha' gum taat gio gum naan
49006003	na ba'x bhai' tum jimda' gio nap ba' mɨk duaka' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan.”
49006004	Ba' aapi'm na pim tu maamar, cha'pim tu' bhaan ja bhakkutu'nda' gu jam maamar, cha'pim buam pɨx ja tɨtdada'. Ja'kbui' kat japim xi ja mamtuxdha' nam jax ja'k jir jix kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam ka', xi ja aagi'ñdha' pim na jax ja'k jix aa' guch Xoi'kam.
49006005	Gio aapi'm na pim pui' pɨx jir tujuandam nam cham jam namki'ñ, tu' ka'm japim ja nɨidhat mi' pui' xi chu duñiidha' jax ñam jam tɨɨdaidha' gui' nam jir jam gɇ'gɇrkam tuk ya' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, jix ja ɨɨbhidhat japim mi' pui' tu duñiidha' gu tu' nam jam chiñiidha'. Gio cham tu' na pim jix oodat parban pu buada' gu tu', gu' ja'pjix bhai', panaas ku pim guch Xoi'kam pɨx tujuañxi'ñdha'.
49006006	Gammɨjɨ pim jix bhai' tu ja juañxi'ñdha' sia no'm cham jam nɨi'ñ, cham tu' na dai no'm jam nɨi'ñ na pim ba'x bhai' mi' pu duñia' gu tu', na pim gu' aapi'm jir tujuandam tugi'ñ guch Xoi'kam, jum aa' ba' na pim mi' pui' tu duñiidha' na jax jix aa' gu Dios.
49006007	Cha'pim o'jodat mi ja'p pui' xi chu duñiidhat nañ jax ba kai'ch. Pui' pim pɨx xim aagat na pim gu Dios pɨx tu juañxi'ñ, cham tu' gu jam gɇ'gɇrkam tuk ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n.
49006008	Bax maat japim gu' na gu Dios tu ja makia' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam gui' nam jɨ'k buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam na tu'r ja mai'chɨk ka', ja'xbui' tu ja makia' nam jɨ'x tu'x bhai'm duukam jup tu duñia' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, cham jax bua sia kum jai' dhɨt pu'ñir tujuandam kat pui' cham ja namkidhat piam ku gu' cham, na gu' gu Dios maa'n na jax pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñ.
49006009	Ba' aapi'm na pim jir gɇ'gɇrkam, cha'pim buam pɨx ja buada' gu jam tujuandam tuk nam pui' pɨx tu jam juañxi'ñ cham ji ja namkidhat, jir jix bhabhai'kam ka' pim ja bui. Tɨ'ñchokat japim na jumaip jix jai'ch gui' nax io'm jir gɇ'kam, jir jam gɇ'kam tuk aapi'm gio gu jam tujuandam tuk, na pim gu' buiñor jup tui'dhi'. Gu Dios jañ dho aagɨt jup kai'ch nax dhaam jup tu'ii', gui' na maa'n na jax pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñ bɨɨx gu ja'tkam.
49006010	Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, xi chañia' pim guch Xoi'kam na jam makia' gui' na kɨ'n bɨɨx aixim jix bhaai'n ka' na pim pu duñia' gu tu'.
49006011	Gio dhi' kɨ'n japim jum palhbui'ñka' nat tu' ba tu jam maa gu Dios, dhi' kɨ'n cham jax jam dooda' gu ja'ook sia kut tɨi ba ji jam oi.
49006012	Nach gu' aach cham tu' tu kokda' ja bui gu ja'tkam gu ya' kam nam jix maax, gu' gui' ji nam i'ii'mda' bhaan jix chu jai'ch nam cham maax, nam jix dhaam ja'p oipo, nam jir jix buam jum duu'nkam. Pui' bɨxchu'x bhaai' ɨp nam pu tu duñia' nam jax ɨlhii'ñdha', gu' pɨx ji na gu' dai ya' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, na gu' dai ya' pɨx nam gɇ'gɇrkam jum ɨlhii'ñ.
49006013	Pui' ku ba'm aa' na pim xi ja da'ngia' bɨɨx dhi' nat Dios ba tu jam maa na pim kɨ'n jum palhbuidha' na pai' dhuuk tɨi ji jam mai'chia' gux buam jum duukam. Maa'n ba' na pim jax mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios, na gu' cham jɨ'xdha' jax jam dooda' sia pɨk jax ka' gɨt no' pim aapi'm xi gu'ki'.
49006014	Ba' gammɨjɨ pim mi' pui' xi jiimɨt na jax jix aa' gu Dios, dai dhi' pim bhaan tu daa'ñchu'nda' na jax jir sɨlhkam, na jax jir mi' pui'. Dhi' ba' ja'p ji buusanda' na pim jum tɨ'ii'ñka' gu baiñum kutuun na pim kɨ'n jum taa'bi'ñka' na cham jam jur am jam aaya' gux buam jum duukam na bhai' ji jam mumuuya'.
49006015	Gammɨjɨ pim jix kɨɨ'm duuka' na pim ba' cham xijaichdha' na pim nai' tu a'ga' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam na bhaan tu a'ga nach jax ja'k jix bhai'ch chaatɨt tu oi'ñka'. Ba' dhi' ja'p ji buusanda' na pim aa'nka' gu sussak gui' nam jax chu'm sandaarui'x ja a'da.
49006016	Ba' na pim tu' sɨlhkam soi'm ɨlhdhat tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' gu Dios, dhi' ja'p ji buusanda' na pim daa'nka' gu baiñum komaarak na pim kɨ'n sosbhidha' gu u'uu'n gu ja'ook na pai' dhuuk mui' ji jam mumuuya' xi mɨmɨichdhai na pai' dhɨr jix mu'muk.
49006017	Gu' ba' na pim cham tu' mu ja'k ka jiim na pim pai' gammɨjɨ gɨt mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha', dhi' ja'p ji buusan na pim jam moom am ja baapas gu bapaiñum bopnam na pim kɨ'n taa'bi'ñ, na ba' cham bhai' ja'k jam aaya' gux buam jum duukam na bhai' ji jam mumuuya'. Ba' na pim jix mat ka' na jɨ'k jax tu ua'ñix gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, dhi' ja'p ji buusnia' na jax no' pim daa' maa'n gu tɇb kuxiir na pim kɨ'n jup jum palhbui'ñka', gui' nat jam maa gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda'.
49006018	Gammɨjɨ pim jup tɨ'ñchokat na pim tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios, pui' pim ja'k tu daanda' na jax ja'k jam jurtudidha' gux Dhuudua' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda', sia gu tu' na pim taanda'. Gio soi' pim jum ɨlhdhat, gio na pim cham tu'm o'jolhi'ñdha', ja'pji na pim xi bua'tgɨda' na pim mi' pui' xi jiimda'. Ja a'mkam japim tu daanda' ɨp sia bɨɨx gui' nam jɨ'k jir ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu Dios.
49006019	Sia aañ japim jiñ a'mkam xi chu daanda', pui' pim xi chɨtdada' gu Dios na gui' pɨx jiñ guguuxdhatgɨda' nañ nai' tu a'ga dhi' bhaan nat jax ɨlhdhak bɨjɨk xib ya' pui' ba tu duu, na dɨɨlh pɨx pui'x chu maatɨt.
49006020	Gu Dios pɨx gu' dɨɨlh nai'ñ joot nañ pu'ñi nai' tu a'ga' dhi' pui' nat jax ɨlh pu bɨjɨk nat xib ba' ya' pui' ba tu duu, dhi' nañ ba' kɨ'n ya' kuup xib. Pui' pim soi' xi chɨtdada' gu Dios nañ aañ cham tu' bhaan too'nnɨt nai' xi chu a'gidha' dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam.
49006021	Ba' gu Tiikiko nach joidham jix kɨɨgalhi'ñ nar jich jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, gam na joidham jir jix kɨɨ' tujuandam tugi'ñ guch Xoi'kam, dhi' mu jimia' jam bui na ba' jam aagi'ñdha' nañ jax jiñ ɨlhii'ñ aañ gio nañ jɨ'k tu' jax bua.
49006022	Mui'ñ xi jam joochxidha' na jam aagi'ñdha' nach jax jich ɨlhii'ñ na pim ba' bhaan jum guguuxdha'.
49006023	Ba' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' gio gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam pɨx jam tajaañdha' am gui' na pim kɨ'n joidham jix bhai'm taatɨt tu oi'ñka',
49006024	gio ba' nam gammɨjɨ gɨt pɨx ba' moo xi jam joi'mdat jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' bɨɨx na pim jɨ'k buiñor jup tui'dhi' gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam.
50001001	Aañ Paablo bɨɨma'n gu Timoteo nach gook dɨt jir tujuandam tugi'ñ guch Xoi'kam, mu tu jam ua'ñi'ñ ich aapi'm na pim mi' oi'dha' Piliipos na gɇ' daa'ñxim jir kiicham, na pim gu'r ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu Dios na pim buiñor bap tui'dhi' guch Xoi'kam Jesuus. Bɨɨx jañ jam aagɨt jup kai'ch na pim jɨ'k maap jum jumpadat daan gu Dios, sia gui' nam bɨɨpɨ' dɨr gu'kat tu jam a'gi'ñ gu ñio'ki'ñ, gam gui' nam ja'ppɨx jir tujuandam mi' jam bui.
50001002	Ba' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' gio guch Xoi'kam Jesuus nar gɇ'kam pɨx jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' am gammɨjɨ na pim ba'x bhai'm taatɨt tu oi'ñka' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n aapi'm.
50001003	Aañ gammɨjɨ taxchaabgi'ñdha' gu Dios nañ ba jam tɨ'ñcho',
50001004	gio nañ pai' dhuuk tu daanda', jix bhai'ñ chaatɨt jañ jai' jam a'mkam jup xi chu dañia' bɨɨx aapi'm.
50001005	Nañ gu'x maat nach maap tu a'gichu' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam, jano' dɨr jach maap puch dhaa'ñchu' na pimɨt dɨr tɨ jɨɨ'ñ, sia pui xib.
50001006	Tu' sɨlhkam kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ iñ aañ na gu Dios pɨx dɨɨlh gammɨjɨ jam palhbui'ñchu'nda' na pim ba'x bhai'm duukam jup tu duiñxidhidha' dai gui', nat gu' pu chu'm kɨ'n jam a'm ba tɨ tɨɨ, pui' pu jam palhbui'ñchu'nda' jano' juugɨt na pai' dhuuk gio bhai'p jimda' guch Xoi'kam Jesuus ya' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan.
50001007	Cham tu'r ja'p ja'k dhi' pui' nañ jɨ'k jax jiñ aa' jam bui bɨɨx aapi'm, nañ gu' joidham xi jam joi'gɨ'n, ja'xbui' pui' jam a'm jup tɨ nɨidhim gu' gu Dios na jax aañ sia kuñ ya' kuup. Jiñ a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' sia ja bui gu gɇ'gɇrkam no' mɨt jiñ aich, nañ gu' mi' bhaankam nokia' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam, jix bhai'ñ xi ja aagi'ñdha' na jax pɨk jir jum duukam.
50001008	Jix maat gu Dios nañ tɨi xi jam tɨɨgim bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n aapi'm, nañ gu' xi jam joi'gɨ'n bhaankam guch Xoi'kam.
50001009	Jam a'mkam tu daan iñ ɨp na pim ba'x bhai' machia' na pim jax ja'k joidham jix chu joi'gɨ'nda', cham tu' ja'xbui' na pim jɨ'x jix chu joi'gɨ'n xib, gio na pim jix chɨ bhɨbhɨi'ñ ka' na pim ba'x mat ka' gu tu' na pim jax jix dhuñiik ka',
50001010	na pim dai gux kɨɨ'p jum duukam jup tu duñiidha' na ba'x u'uañ ka' gu jam i'ii'mda' na pim ya' ka xip tu'ii' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, ba' cham tu'x buam jum duukam jam tɨɨ'ñxidha' guch Xoi'kam na gio bhai'p jimda'.
50001011	Na gu' dhi' xib ja'p ji buusan na pim oraim bɨɨx aixim tu'm gux bhai'm duukam na pim jup tu bua, jano' pim ba' ba tɨɨ'ñchuda' guch Xoi'kam na gio bhai'p jim. Gui' pɨx jam palhbuidha' na ba' pui' ji chu buusnia', ba' bhaan gɇ'kamtuda' pim gu Dios nax io'm jir gɇ'kam.
50001012	Jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, aañ jam aagi'ñ na pim cham jax jum aa'nda', nat gu'x bhai'm duu na mɨt jiñ kuu, nat gu' ya' ba' bhai'p ji chum a'ga gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga nam jax ja'k dui cham jimia' gu ja'tkam nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'.
50001013	Bɨɨx nam jɨ'k ya'r tujuandam ja bui gu gɇ'gɇrkam gam jai' gu ja'ppɨx ja'tkam, bɨɨx jix maat am nañ pu kai'ñkam ya' kuup nañ buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam.
50001014	Ba' mui' guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham nam jiñ ñɨidhat nañ aañ kuup, bhaan jum gu'nguxdhak nai' ji chu a'ga mɨt gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam cham tu' bhaan ji chotdonɨt, jix io'm jamɨt pɨx buiñor xim biiñkadak guch Xoi'kam nar gɇ'kam.
50001015	Ji nam gu' jɨ'ma'n jup tu a'ga bhaankam guch Xoi'kam nam jix chɨ jɨɨ'mut, gam jai' nam ja'p jum aa' nam jix io'm jix bhai' xi bua. Ba' jai' jix bhai'p tu a'ga am na jax jir mi' pui',
50001016	nam gu' sɨlhkam jix ja joi'mdat gu ja'tkam tu a'ga ja'p na jax aañ, nam gu'x maat nat dhi' kɨ'n jiñ dhai gu Dios nañ bhaan tu a'ga'da' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam nach aagi'ñ nach jax ja'k cham jich chulhiiña' gatuuk. Gui' nam tu a'ga bhaankam guch Xoi'kam nam dɨɨlh jax jup ɨlhii'ñ, dhi' na sap ba'x bhai' tu ja jimda' dai gu maaxik bhaan, sia ku gu' ja i'ii'mda' bhaan xiñ jɨɨgak kat tu a'ga am. Jix io'm jiñ chulhiiñchu'n am ba' dhi' pui' nam jax ja'k tu jim, daman pup nañ jiñ chulhiiñ nañ ya' kuup.
50001018	Ba' cham jax bua sia jax ñam kai'ñkam tu a'gada', ku gu' aañ jix bhai'ñ chaat ji nam tu a'ga bhaankam guch Xoi'kam, nam gu' kɇɇjim gu ja'tkam gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ. Jix io'm jañ jix bhai' kañ ɨlhdha' gatuuk,
50001019	nañ gu'x bhai'x maat pui' na jɨ'k jax tuñ dhuiñchu', dhi' na jax dhui pɨx jix bhai' tuñ jimia', na gu'ñ guguuxdhatu' gux Dhuudu'kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n guch Xoi'kam, gio aapi'm na pim jiñ a'mkam tu daan.
50001020	Gio gu' bɨɨx jiñ jur kɨ'n jup tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ iñ nañ mi' pui' tu kuugalhdha' na jax jix aa' gu Dios, na gu'ñ palhbui'ñchu', ba' dai nañ jix io'm xi chu ja a'gidha' gu ja'tkam sia nam jir jaroi' cham tu' bhaan jax jiñ aagɨt. Ba' dhi' bhaan jiñ a'm matgilhidha' gammɨjɨ nax io'm jir gɇ'kam guch Xoi'kam, na pim jax pu bax maat bɨɨpɨ' dɨr nañ a'm pu matgilhim. Ba' sia no' ñich ba muu, piam kuñ pui dua, puñ a'm jix maatɨ' ka'.
50001021	Nañ gu' aañ dai guch Xoi'kam tu juañxi'ñdha' nañ jɨ'x duaka' dhi tuuku' bhaan. Ba' no' ñich ba muu, dai nañ ba tu mai'chia' na tu'ñ a'm bipio' na tuñ makia' guch Gɨ'kora'.
50001022	Gio gu' no'ñ jax dhuukat duatgɨt dhi tuuku' bhaan maa'n nañ jax tu juantu' bhaankam guch Xoi'kam, maa'n na jax jix bhai' tuñ jimda'. Ba'x xijai nañ machia'.
50001023	Cham maat iñ no'ñ mukia' piam kuñ gu' duaka'. Na gu' no' ñich ba muu, dai nañ ba jimia' nañ buiñor bap tui'ka' guch Xoi'kam. Jix io'm jix bhai' ji chu buusnia' gu pui' ja'k aañ jiñ bui.
50001024	Gu' ji nañ gu' pui'p xiñ aa' nax io'm jix bhai' ji chu buusnia' aapi'm jam bui nañ duatgɨt jam palhbui'ñchu'nda' tu' na pɨx bhaan.
50001025	Ku gu'x bhai'x maat iñ ji aañ nañ pui ka xi dhuatu' dhi tuuku' bhaan, ba' mu ja'k jiñ chɨ'ñcho iñ jam bui nañ jam guguuxdhara' na pim xi gu'ki'nda' na pim mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam, gio na pim ba'x io'm jix bhai'm taatɨt jix biiñak ka' buiñor.
50001026	Ba' aapi'm joidham jix bhai'm ɨlhdha' nañ gio mup ba aaya' jam bui, nañ gu' mi oirɨt ba jam guguuxi'ñdha' bhaankam guch Xoi'kam.
50001027	Ba' ja'p jañ jup xi jam tɨɨdam jiñ jaaduñ, xim ga'ngada' pim no' pim mi' pui' jiim na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam. Na gu' no' ñich moo mui' ma jii piam ku gu' cham, pui'x chu maachim ka' iñ sia nar jax ka' gɨt no' pim mi' pui' jiim, gio no' pim dɨɨlh xim gu'nguxdhat na pim jax ja'k jix io'm jum biiñkadim buiñor guch Xoi'kam, pui' na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook nach aagi'ñ nach jax dhuñia' nach ba' cham jich chulhiiña' gatuuk.
50001028	Gam na pim cham tu' ji ja ɨɨbhidhat gui' nam xi jam bhaamki'ñ, na gu' dhi' bhaan jix bhai'x maatɨ' ba' na pim aapi'm cham mu ja'k ka jiim na pim pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha' gɨt, gio gui' nam xi jam bhaamki'ñ jix bhai'x maatɨ' ɨp nam mu ja'k jiim nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha', nat gu' gu Dios pui' ja'k duu na tu tui'ka'.
50001029	Na gu' no' pim tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, cham tu' dai jam a'm jum aa' na pim ja'p pɨx tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor, gu' ja'pji sia na jam a'm jum aa' na pim bhaankam jum tulhiiñdha'.
50001030	Maa'n na jax pɨx chu'm jich a'm jum aa' nach nakga' aañ gio aapi'm, sia ku gu' jax jix xijai. Na pim jax bax maat na ñich jiñ chulhiiñaimɨk nakoo maa'nnim, sia xib japim jix maat nañ jax jiñ chulhiiñ, gu' pɨx ji nañ gu' nakoo'.
50002001	Aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ, no' pim bax maat na guch Xoi'kam pɨx jam guguuxi'ñ bɨɨx aixim bhaan, gio no' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' jam a'm tajaañix, gio no' pim jix maat na jax ja'k jum bua no' pim nɨi'ñ na maadɨt mi' pai'm tulhiiñ,
50002002	jam a'm jum aa' ɨp na pim jix bhai' kai'chɨt tu oi'ñka'. Bɨɨx na pim xim ja joi'gɨ'nda' maa'n na jɨ'x. Gio jax ña pim jum aa'nda', bɨɨx maap na pim pui' ja'k jum aa'nda', cham tu' na maadɨt maakam jum aa'nda', sia gu tu' na pim jax jix dhuñiik ka'. Aañ joidham jix bhai'ñ chaat ka' no' pim bɨɨx pu'ñi tu duiñchu'.
50002003	Cha'pim gɇ'gɇrkam jum taatɨt bɨɨx aixim tu buada' na pim dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñ, na gu' dhi' dai na pim jax dhui bhaan pɨx jix bhaak ka', gu' ja'pji na pim soi'm ɨlhdhat tu' jax buada' nar jix bhai'm duukam. Pui' pim ja bia'ka' gu jai' nam jix io'm mui' namɨɨk, cham tu' pui' na aapi'm.
50002004	Na gu' cham jir am no' jaroi' gan gaagim na ja'p jim aagɨt na dɨɨlh joidham jix bhai' tu jimda', gu' ja'pji bɨɨx maa'n jimdam na pim maap gaa'ñchu'nda' na jax ja'k jix bhai' tu jam jimda'.
50002005	Pui' pim ja'k jup jum aagɨt tu jimda' na jax guch Xoi'kam na ya' xi oilhimɨk.
50002006	Ja'pni ja'k bo nat tu jii: Sia ku gu' ja'xbui'p jir gɇ'kam na gu Dios, cham jɨ'xdha' ja'xbui' gɇ'kam jum ɨlh.
50002007	Ja'p xi dhuuk na dɨɨlh jax jir tu'm nat ba' mi' dhɨr tujuandam kɨ'n ji bii nat maa'nkam jup jim duuk maaxir ya' aach jich bui.
50002008	Ba' soi' pɨx jum ɨlhii'ñdha' na jɨ'x ya' oilhimɨk tuuku' bhaan, mi' dhɨr ba' dɨɨlh maaxik xim kɨi na mɨt mua, na gu' tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora'. Pui' ja'k tɨɨ mɨt na giilhim jix buam tu jim, bhaankam jix xi'ɨ'rak mua mɨt bhaan gu u'uux na gai bɨɨt.
50002009	Pu'ñi dhuuk ba' gu Dios dɨɨlh jix io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n dai nat pai' dhuuk giop tɨs jix dhaam, cham jax chu'm jumai ja'xbui' joidham kaidha' na jax gui'.
50002010	Ba' na pai' dhuuk tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, ja o'lhia kɨ'n gu'kuya' am buiñor gu Jesuus bɨɨx gui' nam jɨ'k jix dhaam jup tu'ii', sia gui' nam ya'p tui'ka' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, sia gui' nam ka ko'iix ka'.
50002011	Bɨɨx bhai' ji machia' am na dai gu Jesuus jich Xoi'kam jix io'm jir gɇ'kam, pu'ñi dhuuk ba' gɇ'kamtuda' am gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora'.
50002012	Ja'p jañ ba' xi jam tɨɨdam jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan. Tɨ'ñcho iñ na pim tu' ka'm jiñ ñɨidhat mi' pui' duñiidha' jax ñañ jam tɨtdada' jano' nañ mup tu't jam bui. Aañ ba' xib jup jix aa' na pim jix io'm tu' ka'm jiñ chɨɨgɨi mi' pui'p xi dhuñia' nañ jax jam tɨtda, nañ gu' mɨk jup tu'ii'. Dɨɨlh japim mi' pui' xi jiimɨt na pim jax ja'k cham mu ja'k bhɨɨya' na pim pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha', tu' ka'm japim xi chɨ nɨidhat sia tu' na pɨx bhaan na ba'x bhai' tu jam jimda'.
50002013	Na gu' gu Dios dɨɨlh pui' jam jurtudidha' na pim ba' dai gux kɨɨ'p jum duukam bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñchot pui' tu duiñchu'nda', na gu' gui'x aa' na pim jix bhai' ji bubuakia' buiñor.
50002014	Bɨɨx na pim jɨ'k jix bhai'm duukam jup tu buada', cha'pim bhaan ñiokboda', ni ku pim pɨx am bhaan tu a'gada'
50002015	na ba' cham tu'x buam jum duukam jam a'm jup tui'ka' nam xi jam nɨi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam gui' nam cham tu' ka'm tɨ nɨi'ñ. Pui' pim ja'k tu jimda' nam jax ja'k jix maatɨt jam nɨi'ñdha' na pim jir maamra'n gu Dios. Na gu' aapi'm ja'p ji buan na pim mɨmɨim ya' dhi oi'ñga'n ja bui gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, ja'p na jax gu chiichia' nam mɨmɨimda' tukaa' ja'k bha ja'p jix dhaam.
50002016	Ba' dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nar jix bhai'm duukam gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook dhi' na sia jaroi'x kɨɨ' ii'mda' tɨgia' no't bhaan tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhak mi' pui' ba jii na jax jum kai'ch. Aañ ba' cham pai' jax jiñ aa'nda' jano' na guch Xoi'kam gio ya'p aaya' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan no' pimɨt pu'ñi mi' pui' jii nañ jax jam tɨtda, na gu' cham tu'r ja'p pɨx ka' ba' nañ jɨ'x nai' oilhia' nañ bhaankam tu juana' guch Xoi'kam.
50002017	Ba' cham jax bua sia mɨt mañ mua, na gu' dhi' ja'p ji buusnia' nañ aañ ba' bɨɨx mui' xi chɨ tɨkia' na jɨ'x ka jam bi'iix na pim tɨ tɨkiim, na gu' pu'ñi ja'k ji buusan na pim jum tulhiiñat mi' pui' jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios tu' sɨlhkam tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor. Aañ joidham jix bhai'ñ chaat dhi' bhaan, tɨi pui'p jix aa' iñ na pim gɨt aapi'm ja'xbui' pui'x bhai'p jum taat ka' na jax aañ.
50002018	Gi no' pimɨt moo aapi'm jix bhai'p xim ɨlh pui' na jax aañ, pui' pim ja'k xim ɨlhdha' na panaas aañ pɨx jir aapi'm ka'.
50002019	Aañ mu jam joochxidha' gu Timoteo na mu jam tɨɨ'mɨra' na ba'ñ ua'pdha' na pim jax jum ɨlhii'ñ nañ ba' bhaan jix bhai'ñ ɨlhdha', ku gu' no'x aa'nda' gɨt ji guch Xoi'kam nar gɇ'kam. Aañ gui' pɨx buiñor jix biiñak.
50002020	Na gu' cham jaroi'x jai'ch na jax gu Timoteo na pui'x buam jup jum aa' jam a'mkam ja'p na jax aañ. Cham jaroi' jax xim aa' iam no'x bhai' tu jam jim ka' ba' cham.
50002021	Na gu' jai' dhɨt nam pui' tɨip tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, dɨɨlh pɨx nam jax ɨlhii'ñ nam mi' pui' jiim, cham tu' na jax ɨlhii'ñ guch Xoi'kam.
50002022	Dai gu Timoteo nax bhai' mi' pui' jim. Jix maat japim sia aapi'm na jax ja'k tu jim jano' na puñ oi'ñchu' na chich bhammɨ dɨr tu jam a'gi gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook, bɨɨx aixim tu'm kɨ'n jiñ palhbuidhim ja'p na jax maa'n gu alhii no' joidham jix jɨɨgi'ñ gu taata'n.
50002023	Dhi'ñ ba' mɨjɨ xi jam joochxidha' nañ jax pɨx xi machia' na jax ja'k tuñ jimia' nañ ya' kuup,
50002024	sia kuñ gu' aañ dɨɨlh buiñor jix biiñak kat tɨ nɨɨra na dɨɨlh pɨx pu tɨ'ya' guch Xoi'kam nañ jootom dɨɨlh mu jimɨi jam tɨgia' na pim jax jum ɨlhii'ñ.
50002025	Gu' ba' xib nañ mui' xiñ ga'nga, bɨɨx jup jum aa' nañ mu jam joochxidha' gu Epafrodito na pui'p jir jich jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, sia ku pimɨt gu' aapi'm bhammɨ dɨr bhañ joochxi nach ba' pu'ñi ya' maap ba tu juan bhaan gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook dhi' nach kɨ'n jich chulhiiñat xi ñakoo'.
50002026	Tɨi xi jam tɨɨgim sap bɨɨx aapi'm na pim jax jum ɨlhii'ñ, gio sap nax buam jum aa' na pimɨt pui' tɨ kai nat tu ai.
50002027	Maaxik jup tu ai dho, tɨip muu, gu' ji nat gu' siamri dɨɨlh gu Dios jix joi'mdak ma tɨɨ, sia aañ xiñ joi'mdak jiñ chɨɨ nañ ba' cham jumai pup bhaan jix buam jiñ aa'nda', daipu' nañ tu' pɨx pu bhaan jix buam bañ aa'.
50002028	Mɨjɨñ ba' moo xi jam joochxidha' na pim ba' cham jax kam aa'nda' na pimɨt giop ba tɨɨ, dai na pim joidham jix bhai' bam taat ka', jootom moo bhammɨ dɨr ba ji buusnia'.
50002029	Joidham japim jix bhai'm ɨlhdhai aichdha' na bhammɨ ba aaya', ja'p japim ɨlhdha' na jax gu mia'n jam jaduuñ, na gu' pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Jix io'm japim tu' ka'm ja nɨidhat jix ja joi'gɨ'nda' gui' nam pu'ñi ja'k tu jimda' na jax dhi'.
50002030	Tɨɨ' na gu' dhi' tɨip mumkim, pu kai'ñkam pɨx na jai'p jir tujuandam tugi'ñ guch Xoi'kam. Cham jaroi' maadɨt aapi'm iam bha jimɨɨk jax kai'ch gu' na pim tu' bhaan xiñ palhbuidha' nañ a'm tum aagim ya' nañ pai'p tu'ii', dai dhi' na ya' ja'k gɨɨxchu'nda'.
50003001	Aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, jix bhai' pim jum taat ka' buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Maa'n nañ jax jam tɨtda xib, na gu' aañ jiñ bui cham jax bua siañ pɨx mɨjɨ dɨr bhai' ji kɨksa, pui' na ñich jax tu jam ua'ñxi bɨɨpɨ' dɨr, na gu' aapi'm bhaan maachim na pim jax ja'k mi' pui' jiimda' na ba'x bhai' tu jam jimda'.
50003002	Cha'pim mi ja kɇkɇɇdat gu ja'tkam nam buam pɨx tu jim, nam gu' ja jikiakkichulhi'ñdhat ja ɨ'kɨ a'lhich gu ja tutku' gu ja'tkam nam sap ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nam jir Israel kam.
50003003	Jax dhui na gu' gui' nam sɨlhkam matgilhdhix ka' nam jir Israel kam ja'tkam, jum aa' nam pui' ja'k tu jimda' na jax aach nach tu daan buiñor gu Dios, pui' na jax pɨx jich jurtu'n gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda', jix bhai'ch chaat ich ba' nach buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam. Dhi' bhaan tu daa'ñchu' ich aach, cham tu' gu tu' na daam dɨr jich chutku' bhaan jix maax ka'.
50003004	Maaxik dho aañ pui' ja'k jup jir tu'm kat bɨjɨk nañ chakui tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Cham jaroi' pui' ja'k jup tu jii jano' na jax aañ.
50003005	Na gu' na ñich jax maaxir, jix jum baik tanoolh kɨ'n jiñ matgilh jamɨt na ba' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nañ jir Israel kam maa'nkam, nam gu'r Israel kam guñ gɨ'kora', gio mi' dhɨr ja'k jim iñ na pai' gu bopxi'ñ gu Benjamiin, ba' aañ jai'p jir jiñ boxii. Gu' ba' nañ jax ja'k jix maatɨt kɇɇkɇ' na jɨ'k jax tu aagix ja bui gu Israel kam ja'tkam, mu ja'k jañich maa'n ñi'ook jup duu ja bui gui' nam pariseos jum tɨɨtɨ'nda'.
50003006	Ba'x io'm jix joojoidhat mi' pui' jimda' iñ nam jax ja'k tu jimda', cham jaroi' jai'ch ka' na tu' bhaan jax jiñ chɨɨda', nam gu' bɨɨx pɨx jix mat ka' nañ mi' pui' jimda'. Ba' dhi' bhaan gɇ'kam jiñ chaatɨt bhai' ji ja tulhiiñchuda ñich gui' nam ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
50003007	Jix io'm gu' nañ tu' ka'm ɨlhii'ñdha' pui' nañ jɨ'k jax tu jimda'. Ba' xib nañ buiñor ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam, ja'p xi dhuuk jañich, na gu' pu cham tu' bhai' na ñich ba maat.
50003008	Ja'p pɨx gu' nañ mi' pui' jimda' bak sia kuñ cham tu' mi chɨɨgim jiñ ii'mda' bhaan, gu' guch Xoi'kam ji nar gɇ'kam nax io'm jum aa' nañ machia' nar tu'p tu'm da'. Dhi' bhaan jañ ba' gampai' pɨx ba ɨlhii'ñ nañ jɨ'k jax tu jimdat bɨɨpɨ' dɨr, dai guch Xoi'kam jañ pɨx bax dhaan gio nañ buiñor bax biiñak, na gu'ñ a'm tɨ nɨidhim,
50003009	ba' gammɨjɨñ buiñor jup tui'ñgɨda'. Na gu' cham jɨ'xdha'x bhai' bi'ya' iñ gɨt buiñor gu Dios no'ñ gɨt maa'n nañ jax mi' pui' jimda' na jax pɨx tu aagix ja bui gu Israel kam ja'tkam, gu' ja'pji na ñich buiñor tu' sɨlhkam tɨ jɨɨ'ñ na ñich ba'x bhai' ji bii.
50003010	Ba' xib dai nañ jix io'm jix maachim na jax pɨk ja'k tu jim guch Xoi'kam. Jix aa' iñ nañ ja'xbui' pui' bɨxchu'p jix chu aichu'nda' na jax gui' nat dɨɨlh duadɨk giop buus mu dɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr na mɨt tɨi yaas. Ja'xbui' pui'p jix aa' iñ nañ jiñ chulhiiña' nat jax jum tulhii gui', gio pu chu'm kɨ'n jup jix aa' iñ nam jiñ bhaamkidhaiñ mu'aa' na mɨt jax chu'm kɨ'n bhaamkidhak mua,
50003011	nañ gu' pui'p jix aa' nañ duadɨi giop bamgia' mi' dhɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr nat jax jum duu gui'.
50003012	Ku gu' cham tu' ji nañ pui' kai'ñkam jup kai'ch nañ bar pu chu'm nañ jax chu'm bhaan tu a'ga, ni kuñ cham pui' ja'k kai'ch nañ jix uañ kɨ'n ba kɨɨk. Jax dhui na ñich gu' chakui ai na pai' juugɨt tu daaxix nañ aaya', ba'ñ a'm jum aa' nañ pui mi' ka pup xi jimda' cham jiñ o'jolhdhat nañ ba' pu chu'm ba mai'chia', nat gu' pu chu'm kɨ'n jiñ a'm tɨ tɨɨ guch Xoi'kam nañ a'm jum aa' nañ aaya' sia nar jax ka' gɨt.
50003013	Cha'pim pui' ja'k jum aa'nda' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan nañ moo pui' bar tu'm. Chakui ji matgam. Ku gu' cham tu' bhaan ka tɨtɨɨ'ñcho iñ ji nañ jax jir tu'm kat bɨɨpɨ' dɨr, ja'p xi dhuuk jañich bɨɨx. Ba' dai nañ bɨɨx jiñ jur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam.
50003014	Bhaan jurchichu iñ nañ tu mai'chia' buiñor gu Dios na tuñ makia' na tu'ñ a'm bipio', na gu'ch bai'ñ na tuch makia' bɨɨx nach jɨ'k jich chulhiiñat mi' pui' jiim nach tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam Jesuus.
50003015	Bɨɨx nach jɨ'k bhaan ba xich maat nach tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, bɨɨx dhɨt jach mi' pui' duiñchu'nda' na jax ja'k jum aa'. Ba' no' maadɨt cham maatɨt maakam jum aa' na jax cham jir mi' pui', gu Dios dɨɨlh pui' ja'k jurtuda' na jax jir mi' pui'.
50003016	Ba' pu'ñi ja'k bɨɨx maap mi' pui' ba duiñchu'nda' ich nach jɨ'k tu' bax maat nach a'm jum aa' nach mi' pui' duñiidha' gammɨjɨ.
50003017	Mi' pim pui' tu daa'ñchugɨt mi' pui' jiimda' na pim jax jiñ ñɨi'ñ aañ nañ mi' pui' jim, piam gui' pim xi ja nɨidhat nam jɨ'k mi' pui' ba jiim na chich jax ja'k jam aa'ñdhak jano' nach bhammɨp tu't jam bui. Aañ pu jam tɨtda aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan.
50003018	Nam gu' mui'x jai'ch gu ja'tkam nam tɨi pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, dai ji nam gu' pui' ja'k tu jim na jax ja'k bhaan jix maatɨ' nam cham jɨ'x nɨidham gu u'uux na gai bɨɨt nat bhaan muu guch Xoi'kam. Mui' kim jañich bhaan ba tu jam a'gi dhi' bhaan jiñ jaaduñ, ba' gioñ pui'p xi jam tɨtdax buam jiñ aagɨt.
50003019	Ja'p ɨlhii'ñdha' am gu ja boopok na jax gu Dios nam ba' dai gu tu' gaa'ñchu'nda' nam gaamdha'. Gio gu tu' nam gɨt bhaan jix xi'ɨrda', ja'kbui' kat dhi' bhaan gɇ'gɇrkam jum taat ka' am, gio nam dai bhaan jujurtɨka' gu tu' na ya' dhi oi'ñga'n jix chu jai'ch. Ku gu' dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam mu ja'k bhɨɨya' am ji gatuuk nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'.
50003020	Aach ba' dai nach ba iimchudhix nach buiñor aaya' gu Dios. Ba' jix dhaam dɨr pɨx jup nɨɨra' ich na bha jimda' gu gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam nax bhaai' na jaroi' na pɨx baabu' mi' dhɨr bhaan gu boi na mu ja'k bhɨix na pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'.
50003021	Ba' ya'ch pataaxdhai guch chutku' na cham kɨɨ', pui' ja'k duñia' na jax dɨɨlh gu tukga'n na joidham tanoor, na gu' bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia', sia tu' na pɨx cham xijai kam ɨlhii'ñ, na gu'x io'm jir gɇ'kam.
50004001	Ba' ja'p jañ xi jam tɨɨdam ɨp jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan aapi'm nañ jix io'm xi jam joi'mdat xi jam da', gam nañ tɨi xi jam tɨɨgim. Na gu' aapi'm jir jiñ mai'chɨk, jix bhai'ñ chaat iñ ba' jam bui. Mi' pim pui' xi jiimda' na pim jax mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam nar gɇ'kam.
50004002	Gu Eboodia gio gu Siintike, aañ soi' ja tɨtda nam iam maa'n ñi'ook xip duñia', nam gu' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
50004003	Ba' aap Siisigo nap jir jiñ jaduuñ guch Xoi'kam bhaan, iam jap mi' dhɨr xi ja palhbuidha' nam jax ja'k maap maa'n ñi'ook jup duñia', aañ pum tɨtda, nap gu' dai aap mi' pui' duiñchu' gɨt tu juan ja'p na jax aañ. Jum guguuxdhak jiñ palhbui mɨt gu' dhi gook u'uub jano' na ñich bhammɨ dɨr tu a'ga gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga nam jax ja'k dui cham mu ja'k bhɨɨya' gu ja'tkam nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'. Sia bɨɨx gu Klemeente gio jai' jɨ'kchi pup na mɨt jup jiñ palhbui, ba' aañ jix maat nam dhi' bɨɨx ba ua'ñix jix dhaam bhaan gu u'uan nam pai' ja daasaim gui' nam jɨ'k gammɨjɨ buiñor bap tui'ka' gu Dios.
50004004	Ba'x bhai' pim jum taat ka' gammɨjɨ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Gioñ moo pui'p xi chɨ'ya': Jix bhai' pim jum taat ka'.
50004005	Cha'pim ja bhaamkidhat gu ja'tkam, jir jix bhabhai'kam ka' pim pɨx ja bui. Na gu' guch Xoi'kam bar mia'n na gio ya'p aaya', ba' cham jir am no'm jax jam a'ga gu ja'tkam na pim cham jir jix bhabhai'kam.
50004006	Cha'pim bɨxchu'x buam jum aagɨt bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka', gu' ja'pji na pim xi aagi'ñdha' pɨx gu Dios buiñor ji chu daanɨt na tu' jam a'm jum aa'nda'. Xi taxchaabgidhai pim ba' na pim pai' dhuuk pu'ñi xi aa'ñdhai.
50004007	Ba' dɨɨlh jam tajaañdha' gui' na pim kɨ'n jix bhai'm taatɨt tu oi'ñka' gammɨjɨ, na gu' dɨɨlh jix bhai'x maat na jax ja'k jich guguuxdhatu'nda', sia kuch gu' aach dɨɨlh cham maat. Ba' gui' pɨx pui' jam jurtudidha' na pim ba' dai bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka' na tu'r jix bhai'm duukam, ba' bhaan jix bhai'm taat ka' pim, na pim gu' maap maa'n ñi'ook jup duuk guch Xoi'kam Jesuus.
50004008	Ja'pniñ ba' moop xi jam tɨɨdam jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan. Dai gu tu' nar jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam japim bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñchot mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios. Pui' pim ja'k tu jimda' nam jax ja'k pɨx jix bhai' jam aa'nda' gu ja'tkam na pim jir jix kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam. Bɨɨx aixim japim tu' ka'm xi chɨ nɨidhat.
50004009	Pui' pim ja'k mi' pui' xi jimia' na ñich jax jam aa'ñ gio na pimɨt jax ja'k jiñ chɨɨ na ñich mi' pui' jii jano' nañ bhammɨ dɨr jup tu't jam bui, pui' nañ jax ja'k tu a'gada' na pim jiñ kɇɇkɇ', gio na ñich jɨ'k tu' jax dhuu. Na gu' no' pim bɨɨx pui' tu duiñchu', jam a'm jam tajaañdhidha' gu Dios gui' na pim kɨ'n gammɨjɨx bhai'm taatɨt tu oi'ñka'.
50004010	Aañ jix bhai'ñ chaat buiñor guch Xoi'kam na pimɨt giop mañ chɨ'ñcho. Ku gu' cham tu' ji nañ ja'p kai'ñkam jup kai'ch na pim moo pu cham jɨ'x jiñ chɨ'ñchokat, ja'pji nañ ja'p kai'ñkam jup kai'ch na pimɨt siamrix bhai' ma duu na pimɨt mañ palhbui kɨ'n gui' na pim tu' ɨlhii'ñ nañ a'm jum aa'.
50004011	Dhi' sia cham pui' kai'ñkam jup kai'ch iñ na moox io'm jiñ a'm bam aagɨt dhi' na pimɨt tu' kɨ'n bañ palhbui. Jax dhui nañ aañ cham jax kar jiñ aa'ndam sia kuñ palhɨɨp pɨx bia' gu tu', nañ gu' bhaan ba xiñ maat.
50004012	Siax maat iñ nañ jax ja'k tu jimda' no'ñ pu cham tu' bia' ni jɨ'x, gio no'ñ gɇ' bia' gu tu', pui'p jix maat iñ nañ jax ja'k jup tu jimda'. Sia tu' na pɨx nañ dhaam jimiidha' bhaan ba xiñ maat iñ. Pui' na jax no'ñ uamaim, bhaan ba xiñ maat iñ nañ jax ja'k nakga'. Gio no'ñ bia' nañ tu' jugia', jix maat iñ ɨp nañ jax ja'k jup tu jimda'.
50004013	Bɨɨx aixim cham tu' bhaan jax jir jiñ aa'ndam iñ kia', na gu' guch Xoi'kam pɨx nañ a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jiñ palhbui'ñchu' nañ ba' bɨɨx aixim bhaan jix chu nakoo'nda'.
50004014	Ku pim ti gu' siamrix bhai' duu ji na pimɨt bhai' bañ joochxi na pim pui' jim aagɨt na bɨxchu'ñ a'm tum aa' nañ ya'ñ chulhiiñ.
50004015	Jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, aapi'm na pim bhai' oi'dha' Piliipos na pim jɨ'k maap jum jumpadat daan guch Xoi'kam, dai aapi'm jix bhai' duu na pimɨt bhañ joochxi gu tuumiñ na pimɨt maap xi jumpadak jɨ'k na cham jam a'm kam aa', na pim gu'x bhai'm taat na ñich jam ua'p gux kɨɨ'p jum duukam jam i'ii'mda' ɨr bhaan na ba'x bhai' ba tu jam jim. Jano' bhai' bañ aichulh jamɨt na ñich kia'pɨx bhai' dhɨr ba ji jii Masedoonia na ñich maakam ja'k ba ji chu a'gam gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga nam jax ja'k dui cham kam tulhiiña' gu ja'tkam.
50004016	Gio gama ja'k Tesaloonika nañ bap tu'ii', gio pimɨt bhai'p xiñ joochxi jɨ'kchi kim pup gu tuumiñ na jɨ'k cham jam a'm kam aa' maap ji jumpadak, nañ ba' kɨ'n tu saba'da' tu' nañ a'm jum aa'.
50004017	Ku gu' cham tu' ji nañ moo dai dhi' bhaan jurtɨkat jix aa' na pim pɨx bhai' jiñ joochxi'ñdha' gu tuumiñ, gu' ja'pji nañ tu' pɨk jix aa' aañ, ja'pji na pim aapi'm jix io'm gɇ'p jum duukam tu mai'chia' buiñor gu Dios gatuuk.
50004018	Aañ xib cham tu'ñ a'm jum aa' gu', kapup bia' iñ aixim na jɨ'k jiñ a'm tum aa', jai' pup xiñ bipio'. Pui dhi' pɨx jir di' na pimɨt bhañ joochxi buiñor gu Epafrodito. Ba' dhi' ja'p ji buus na pimɨt tu kubhio kɨ'n gui' na joidham uub, gio na pimɨt tɨ tɨɨ buiñor gu Dios nat ba'x kɨɨ'p jum duukam kɨ'n tɨɨ.
50004019	Gui' pɨx ba' gammɨjɨ xi jam joi'mdat tu jam maakidha' na jɨ'k tu' jam a'm jum aagidha', na pim gu' buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam. Na gu' guch Gɨ'kora' bɨxchu' bhaan jix io'm jir tu bia' kam,
50004020	ba' dai gui' pɨx jix bhai' nach gɇ'kamtu'nda' gammɨjɨ. Pu'ñi ba' moo tu tui'ka'.
50004021	Mi' dhɨr japim bɨɨx jiñ a'mkam xi ja ñio'kdha' gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Ya' dɨr mui'p jam ñio'ki'ñ am guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham nam ya'ñ bɨɨm jup tu'ii'.
50004022	Sia bɨɨx mu jam ñio'ki'ñ am guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham gui' nam jɨ'k ya ja'p maap jum jumpadat daan guch Gɨ'kora', gui' pɨk nam jir tujuandam tugi'ñ gux io'm gɇ'kam Rooma kam.
50004023	Ja'pni tu tui'ka' ku ba' moo guch Xoi'kam nar gɇ'kam pɨx gammɨjɨ jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n aapi'm.
51001001	Aañ jir Paablo, jir nobii'ñ iñ guch Xoi'kam, nat gu' gu Dios pui' ja'k jix aagak pu chu'm kɨ'n jiñ dhai. Ba' tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ ich gook dɨt guñ jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na Timoteo tɨɨ'.
51001002	Tu jam ua'ñxidha' ich aapi'm na pim pui'p jir jich jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim bhammɨ dɨr oi'dha' Koloosas, Dios buiñor jup tui'dhi' pim. Ba' gui' pɨx jich Gɨ'kora' Dios gɨt jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' na pim ba'x bhai'm taatɨt tu oi'ñka'.
51001003	Aañ gammɨjɨ jam a'mkam tu daan buiñor gu Dios gui' nar Gɨ'korga'n gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam, taxchaabgi'ñdha' iñ gammɨjɨ,
51001004	nach gu' pui' tɇ kɇɇ na pim sap tu' sɨlhkam bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam, xim jajoi'gɨ'n japim sap bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n na pim Dios buiñor jup tui'dhi'.
51001005	Ba' xib dai na pim tɨ nɨɨra na pim maa'n kap aaya'x dhaam nat pai' gu Dios ba tu jam bi' na pim aaya'. Ba' dhi' na pim ba tɨ nɨɨra na pim maa'n kap aaya' buiñor gu Dios, gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam nat pui' jam duu, na pimɨt gu' cham jax ji chɨ'ɨɨk kɇɇk mi' pui' ba jii na jax jum kai'ch, na pimɨt gu' maat nar sɨlhkam, cham tu' nar iatda'.
51001006	Dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam na mɨt tu jam a'gi, jum gɨ'lhdhim bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, pɨx ja'x ji tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhim am mui' gu ja'tkam, ja'p na jax aapi'm bhai' dhɨr na pimɨt ba mui'dha, sia ku mɨt gu' tɨi jɨ'k pɨx kɇɇk tɨ jɨɨ'ñ na jax jix chu joi'gɨ'n gu Dios, maat japimɨt na tu' sɨlhkam jix chu joi'gɨ'n, cham tu' na pui' pɨx jum kai'ch.
51001007	Guch jaduuñ Epaapras pui' tu jam a'gi na pu chu'm ka'm jup tu juan ja'p na jax aach, na pim aapi'm jaroi' pui' bia' nar jix kɨɨ' tujuandam tugi'ñ guch Xoi'kam. Gio aach pui'p jix kɨɨgalhi'ñ dhi' dhich jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan,
51001008	nat gu' dhi' ba' yach aichulh gu ñi'ook na pim jax tu jim bhammɨ dɨr, pu'ñi sap xim ja joi'gɨ'n japim bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n na jax jam jurtu'n gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda'.
51001009	Ba' aach moo jano' na chich jax pui' tɨ kai, jam a'mkam jachich pu tu daanɨ buiñor gu Dios, jano' dɨr jach cham jɨ'x mɨk ka buppa nach jam a'mkam tu daan. Pui' soi' tɨtdatu'nda' ich gu Dios na jam makia' gu matda' na pim ba'x bhai' machia' na jax pɨk ja'k jix aa' na pim mi' pui' jimia', sia gu ii'mda' bhaan na pim tu machia' na jax ja'k tu tu'ii'.
51001010	Na gu' mi' dhɨr ba' no' pim pu'ñix bhai' bax maat, mi' pui' ba duiñchu'nda' pim na jax ja'k jum aa' no'ñ pu'ñi buiñor bap tui'dhi' guch Xoi'kam, dai gux kɨɨ'p jum duukam japim bap tu duñiidha' gu' na jax pɨx jix aa' gui'. Saalh japim pu'ñix kɨɨ'p jum duukam bhai' jip tu duñia', mɨkkat jix io'm, na pim gu'x bhai' ba machia' na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios na pim mi' pui' jiimda'.
51001011	Gio pui' soi'p tɨtdatu'nda' ich gu Dios na gui' pɨx pui' jam duñia' na pim bɨɨx aapi'm jix chu nakoo'nda', na pim cham tu' jax jir jum aa'ndam ka', na gu' gu Dios joidham bɨxchu'x bhaai' na pu tu duñia'.
51001012	Dai ba' na pim taxchaabgi'ñdha' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' joidham jix bhai'm taatɨt nat ba tu jam bi' na pim pai' buiñor aaya', na pai' joidham jix chu maax, nat gu' gu Dios dɨɨlh pui' pu ja tɨɨdak guch bopxi kat na pu'ñi maa'n kap ja aichdha' nam buiñor aaya' gui' nam jir ja'tkam tugi'ñ ka'.
51001013	Gu Dios mi' dhɨr jich boosolh na pai'ch dhaam kap tu't gux chukgam, mi' ja'k ba'ch chuttu na pai'r gɇ'kam gu dɨɨlh Maraa'n, gui' nax io'm jix dha'.
51001014	Dhi' dhi Maraa'n bhaankam xich joi'gɨlh ɨp aach nat ba'ch boosolh mi' dhɨr nach pai' mu ja'k ba jiimɨt nach pai' gammɨjɨ gɨt mi' pup jich chulhiiñdha', dhi' bhaankam jich uañ bɨɨx guch ua'tulhdhara'.
51001015	Guch Xoi'kam jir di' pɨx gu Dios nat maa'nkam jup jim duuk ya' xi oilhimɨk jich bui. Na gu' gu Dios tɨi cham maax, jir ii'mda' pɨx. Pu bɨɨpɨ' dɨr bap tui'dhi' dhi Maraa'n nar jich Xoi'kam nat ba' mi' dhɨr bap tu duu bɨɨx nach jɨ'k tu' tɨ nɨi'ñ.
51001016	Gu Maraa'n pɨx bhaankam jup tu duu gu Dios bɨɨx na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch jix dhaam ja'k gio dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, pui' na jax gui' na tu' cham maax. Jup ja duu gui' nam i'ii'mda' bhaan tu dudua na bɨɨx aixim jix bhaai' nam pu tu duñia' nam jax ɨlhii'ñdha'. Dhi' bɨɨx jup tu duu gu Dios bhaankam guch Xoi'kam, pu kai'ñkam pɨx jup tu duu na ba' guch Xoi'kam pɨx bhaan tu bi'ya'.
51001017	Gu' ba' na gu' guch Xoi'kam jix io'm bɨjɨk dɨr pu bax jai'ch nat ba'p ba tu jai'chdhɨr bɨɨx aixim, gui' pɨx bhaan jup tu tu'ii' na ba' pui' tu tui'dhi' na jax jir joidham dhi' na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch.
51001018	Gio gu' guch Xoi'kam pui'p ji buusan nar jich mo' aach nach jɨ'k buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ. Gio bɨɨpɨ' duadɨk jup bam koi'ñga'n tɨr dɨr ja'p na jax nax io'm bɨjɨk dɨr pu bax jai'ch nat ba'p ba tu jai'chdhɨr bɨɨx aixim, pu kai'ñkam bɨɨpɨ' duadɨk bam na ba' pu'ñi bɨɨx bhaan ji chu bi'ya' na jɨ'x tu'x chu jai'ch.
51001019	Na gu' guch Xoi'kam pu bɨjɨk dɨr dhi' pɨx jir di' gux Uañ Ii'mdaga'n gu Dios,
51001020	bhaankam ba' guch Xoi'kam pui' tu duu nax bhai' tu bi'ya' buiñor na cham mi' pui' ka tu tui'ñgɨt na jax jix aa' bɨɨx nat jɨ'k tu'p tu duu na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch, pui' na jax na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch jix dhaam ja'k gio na jɨ'k tu'p jix chu jai'ch ya' dhi oi'ñga'n. Jix bhai' tu bii bɨɨx buiñor gu Dios nat jaax pɨx gu ɨ'ra'n guch Xoi'kam bhaan gu u'uux na gai bɨɨt.
51001021	Aapi'm cham tu' jam kɨɨgalhdhat bɨɨpɨ' dɨr gu Dios, na pim gu' cham tu'r Israel kam ja'tkam ka' jam jujur am bhaan, daix buam jum duukam japim jup tu buada' na tu' cham jir kɨɨ'.
51001022	Gu' ji na gu' xib gu Dios pɨx dɨɨlh pui' jam duu na pim jix bhai' bi'ya' buiñor na ba' xi jam joi'mdat jam a'm ba tɨ nɨidhim, pui' jam duu bhaankam guch Xoi'kam nat jum tulhii tuuku' bhaan na ya' xi oilhimɨk. Pu kai'ñkam pui' duu gu Dios nax aa' na pim buiñor aaya' cham tu' bhaan u'ua'tulhdhix kam, dappaam jix u'uañ pɨx na pim buiñor aaya'.
51001023	Ba' no' pim gu' aapi'm jix aa' na pim buiñor aaya', dai na pim mi' pui' xi jiimda' tu' sɨlhkam tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam, maa'n na pim jax mi' pui' tu daa'ñchu'nda' na pimɨt jax ja'k kai gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam, na mɨt tu jam a'gi na bhaan tu a'ga na pim jax ja'k dui cham mu ja'k bhɨɨya' na pim pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'. Dhi' jɨ' ji pu chu'm dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam na bɨɨx kap nai' tum a'ga na jɨ'x jir oi'ñga'n. Ba' aañi' Paablo dhi' pu chu'm kɨ'n jup ja palhbui'ñ gu jai' nam nai' tu a'ga, aañ pui'p tu a'gichu'.
51001024	Ba' aañ xib jam a'mkam pɨx jiñ chulhiiñ. Jix bhai'ñ chaat iñ nañ jam a'mkam jiñ chulhiiñ, jam a'mkam ba tɨɨmuim iñ ɨp sia na jɨ'x tɨi ka bi'iix nam jum tulhiiña' bɨɨx gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Dɨɨlh guñ chuuku' kɨ'n jañ ja a'mkam ba tɨɨmuim, katti ba' iam jix bhai' tu ja jimia' dɨɨlh, pui' nat jax jup jum tulhii guch Xoi'kam jich a'mkam aach nach jɨ'k buiñor ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ.
51001025	Gu Dios pu chu'm kɨ'n jiñ a'm tɨ tɨɨ nañ jix bhai' ja duñia' gui' nam jɨ'k pu'ñi buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam na ba'x bhai' tu ja jimia', nañ jix bhai' ja aa'ñdhidha' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam na jax pɨk jir jum duukam.
51001026	Gui'ñ aagɨt jup kai'ch nañ jix bhai' jam aagi'ñdha' nat dɨɨlh gu Dios jax ja'k tu dai na tu duñia' pu'ñi gatuuk. Jix io'm mui' oidha'p duu nat dɨr pui' ja'k tu daasak, pu cham jaroi' maatɨt kɇɇkɇ' na jax jir jum duukam ka'. Xib ba'x bhai' ka matgir na jax jir jum duukam, nat gu' dɨɨlh gu Dios pɨx jich aa'ñ nach jɨ'k jir ja'tkam tugi'ñ.
51001027	Gu Dios dɨɨlh jix aa na pu'ñich aagi'ñdha' aach nach jɨ'k jir ja'tkam tugi'ñ nat jax ja'k tu daasak bɨjɨk na pu cham jaroi' maatɨt kɇɇkɇ', nach ba' mi' dhɨr bhaan machia' nax aa' gu Dios na joidham jix bhai' tu ja jimia' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam, pui' na jax sia gui' nam pu'ñi cham jir Israel kam. Ba' dhi' nat jax ja'k tu daasak gu Dios na pu cham jaroi' maatɨt kɇɇkɇ', guch Xoi'kam tɨi pu aagɨt jup kai'ch na pu'ñi gatuuk ya' aaya', dhi' na jam a'm tɨ nɨidhim xib, gam dhi' na pim jaroi' buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat jix aik na pai' joidham jix chu abhaar.
51001028	Ba' aach bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n jix bhai' xich ga'ngidhat tu a'gim na jax ja'k tu tu'ii' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, nach ba'x bhai' bi'ya' buiñor jano' nach pai' dhuuk buiñor aaya'.
51001029	Dhi' bhaan jañ gammɨjɨ tu juantu' aañ, cham jañ pai'ñ o'jolhi'ñ, na gu'ñ a'm tɨ nɨidhim guch Xoi'kam na ba' bɨxchu'x bhaai' nañ pu tu duñia'.
51002001	Tɨ'ñchoka' pim jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan nañ aañ jix io'm jiñ dhɨkoo'ñdhatu' jam a'mkam aapi'm na pim jɨ'k Laodiisea oi'dha', bɨɨx sia gui' nam cham jiñ maat, nam pu cham pai' dhuuk jiñ ñɨi'ñ maaxik.
51002002	Jiñ dhɨkoo'ñdhatu' iñ ja a'mkam nam ba'm guguuxdhai ja jujur am bhaan gammɨjɨ xim jajoi'gɨ'nda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n. Jiñ dhɨkoo'ñdhatu' iñ ɨp nam ba'x bhai' machia' nat jax ja'k tɨi gu Dios bɨjɨk na tu' jax dhuñia'. Gu Dios jir dhi' pɨx guch Xoi'kam.
51002003	Ba' guch Xoi'kam pɨx bhaan jix jai'ch gu matda', dhi' buiñor bhaan jup tu tu'ii' sia pɨk nar jax ka' gɨt.
51002004	Aañ jam aagi'ñ na pim ba' cham jaroi' jɨɨgi'ñdha' sia chi moo tɨi joidham jix bhai' xi bua na xi chu a'ga. Na gu' dhi' na mi' pɨx jam iatgi'ñdha', jix mamatdagɨm xi kai'chdha' am gu' gui' nam iatda'.
51002005	Gammɨjɨ jam tɨ'ñcho iñ gu' aañ sia kuñ gu' cham jam buip tu'ii' gu maaxik, ba' aañ jix bhai'ñ chaat nañ jix maat na pim aapi'm mi' pui' jiim na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam, na pim gu' sap tu' sɨlhkam buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ.
51002006	Ba' gammɨjɨ pim mi' pui' xi jiimɨt na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam, na pimɨt gu' pu kai'ñkam buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñ. Jir jam gɇ'kam tuk ba' xib.
51002007	Mi' pim pui' tu daa'ñchu'nda' nam jax ja'k jam aagi'ñ nax aa' guch Xoi'kam, maa'n na pim jax mi' pui' tu duñiidha' na pim ba' pu dhi' bhaan jix io'm kaapaka'. Gammɨjɨ pim taxchaabgi'ñdha' gu Dios.
51002008	Cha'pim mi ja kɇkɇɇda' gui' nam jix mamatdagɨm xi kai'chdha', nam gu' jam iatgi'ñdha' pɨx. Jir pui' ka' dho panaas nam jax kai'chdha', gu' pɨx ji na gu' cham tu'r sɨlhkam ka'. Na gu' dɨɨlh pɨx nam jax ɨlhii'ñdha' nam pu kai'chdha' na jax ja jurtu'nka' gux buam jum duukam ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n, cham tu' nam mi' pui' tu daa'ñchu'nda' na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam.
51002009	Guch Xoi'kam maa'n na jax pɨx jir di' gu Dios.
51002010	Ba' guch Xoi'kam jir gɇ'kam ja bui gux buam jum duu'nkam nam jix chu jai'ch ii'mda' bhaan, cham tu'r jupaabkamu'n am. Jix bhai' tu jam jim ba' aapi'm na pim jɨ'k buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ.
51002011	Gu Israel kam ja'tkam jum matgilhi'ñ am na ba' dhi' bhaan bax maatɨ' ka' nam dhi'r di' gu ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu Dios. Ba' aapi'm sia ku pimɨt cham pui' ja'k duu, na pimɨt buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñ guch Xoi'kam, gu Dios pui' ja'k ba jam duu na pim pui'p bar ja'tkam tugi'ñ ka' ja'p na jax gu Israel kam ja'tkam. Mɨk ba' jam bui'ñchulh na pim ba' cham ua'tulhdhara' bhaan ka tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka', ba' dhi' pu'ñi ja'k ja'p ji buus na pimɨt jum matgilh ja'p na jax gu Israel kam ja'tkam na pim ba' bar ja'tkam tugi'ñ gu Dios.
51002012	Na pimɨt pai' dhuuk jum bopko suudai' kɨ'n, dhi' ja'p jir jum duukam na pimɨt bɨɨma'n jum yaas guch Xoi'kam jano' na mɨt pai' dhuuk yaas na mɨt xi mu'aak. Ba' nat pai' dhuuk duadɨk giop buus mi' dhɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr, aapi'm pui' bɨɨma'n duduadɨk jup baapam, na pimɨt gu' tɨ jɨɨ'ñ na dai gu Dios bɨxchu'x bhaai' na pu tu duñia'.
51002013	Na gu' bɨɨpɨ' dɨr ja'p ji buusandat na pim ko'iix kat, na pim dai ua'tulhdhara' bhaan jum tukgi'ñka', cham tu'r ja'tkam tugi'ñ ka' pim gu Dios. Ba' xib ba bubua pimɨt bɨɨma'n guch Xoi'kam, gu Dios pɨx dɨɨlh bɨɨma'n jam dudua'ñ, ba uañchudhix xib gu jam ua'tulhdhara'.
51002014	Bɨɨx na jɨ'k jax tu aagix nat tu ua'nak gu Moisees, cham tu'ch palhbuidhat nach jɨ'k jax tɨi chu buada', dai na mu ja'k jich bhɨichdhatu'ndat nach pai' gammɨjɨ gɨt mi' pup jich chulhiiñdha', gu' pɨx ji nat gu' guch Xoi'kam tu soo'm nat muu bhaan gu u'uux na gai bɨɨt.
51002015	Ba' bhaankam guch Xoi'kam, gu Dios ja xi'ɨrbo bɨɨx gui' na bɨxchu'x bhaai' nam pu tu duñia', nam i'ii'mda' bhaan jix chu jai'ch. Cham tu' kɨ'n ji bii mɨt nam xi ja nɨi'ñ gu jai' nam jup jix chu jai'ch, nat gu' xi ja u'uuk ja saagi'ñ ja tuttuk bɨɨx pu tɨi nam cham tu' ka bhaai', guch Xoi'kam pɨx nat muu bhaan gu u'uux na gai bɨɨt.
51002016	Cham jir am no' jaroi' cham jam kɨɨgalhi'ñ na pim kua' gu tu', piam gu tu' na pim io', piam no' pim cham tu piastat gu jax chu'm tanoolh na pai' dhuuk jum aa'nda', pui' na jax na kia'pɨx bhai' dhɨr ja'p ba gɨxia' gu masaa'n, piam na pai' dhuuk cham tum juanda'.
51002017	Jax dhui na gu' dhi' ja'p pɨx ji buusan nar ɨkgiga'n guch Xoi'kam, dhi' bhaan pɨx jum ua'rgi'ñ nam jax ja'k tu jimda' gu ja'tkam. Gu' ba' guch Xoi'kam pɨk bhaan jup tu tu'ii' dhi' bɨɨx.
51002018	Ba' cha'pim jaroi' jɨɨgi'ñdha' sia ku jaroi' jax kai'ch na pim jum ua'tulhi'ñ, sia chi moo soi'm ɨlhdhat tɨi tu daan panaas ja bui gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios. Pui' xi kai'chdha' am moo nam jix dhuduu'nkam ja nɨi'ñ jix dhaam kam, gu' ji nam gu' iatda' nam jax dhui pɨx bhaan gɇ'gɇrkam jum taat ka', dai gux buam jum duukam nam bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka' gu' na tu' cham jir kɨɨ'.
51002019	Cham tu' buiñor jup tui'ka' am gu' guch Xoi'kam dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam, guch Xoi'kam pɨx gu' nar gɇ'kam ja bui dhi' nam buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha', dhi' ba' ja guguuxdha' nam jix io'm mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa'. Guch Xoi'kam pɨx sia ja maak na tu' ja a'm jum aa'nda' gui' nam buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha', sia guch Xoi'kam pɨx dɨɨlh mi' ja tuttu' gui' nam buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na pai' jax jix aa' gu Dios nam tuutka'.
51002020	Ba' aapi'm buiñor bap tui'dhi' guch Xoi'kam xib, na pim gu' ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nat jich a'mkam muu, cham tu' pim ja bui kap tui'dhi' gui' nam ii'mda' bhaan ya'r gɇ'gɇrkam dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan. Gu ba' no' pim gu' cham ja bui kap tui'dhi' dhi', ¿jax ku pim ba' pui pui' ja'k tu jim ja'p na jax no' pim panaas ja buip tui'dhi'? Pui pim ja jɨɨgi'ñ gui' nam jup jam tɨtdada':
51002021	“Ja'p tu'm jir ua'tulhdhara' no' pim gan da'ngɨ. Ja'p tu'm jir ua'tulhdhara' no' pim gan kua'. Ja'p tu'm jir ua'tulhdhara' no' pim gan dɨ'nka.”
51002022	Dhi' ya' pɨx gu' nam dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñdha' gui' nam pui' kai'chdha', na gu' dhi' saalh pui' ja'k tɨi pup xi chu jimdat am gu ja'tkam mɨkkat maakam jup ba tu duiñchu'nda', cham tu' nam gammɨjɨ pui' pu tu jimda'.
51002023	Tɨi dhor am ɨp pui' nam jax kai'chdha', nam gu' tu ja aagi'ñdha' nam jax ja'k soi'm ɨlhii'ñdha' gu ja'tkam gio nam jax ja'k jix bhai' tu jimda'. Ja aagi'ñdha' am nam tulhiiñchuda' gu ja tutku' na ba'x bhai' tu ja jimia', gu' pɨx ji na gu' dhi' pui' ja'k cham jɨ'xkat jich palhbuidha' nach jax ja'k dui nakga' nach bɨɨx aixim jix buam jix chu duñiik ka'ch chutku' bhaan.
51003001	Gu' ba' na pimɨt gu' aapi'm ko'ɨɨk giop ba dudua bɨɨma'n guch Xoi'kam, jum aa' na pim gaa'ñchu'nda' na pim jax ja'k daix dhaam ja'k tu mai'chia', na gu' guch Xoi'kam jix dhaam daa, kɨɨ'n dɨr ja'k daa na pai' gu Dios.
51003002	Dai gux dhaam kam japim bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka', cham tu' gu tu' na ya' dhi oi'ñga'n jix jai'ch.
51003003	Na pimɨt gu' aapi'm ja'p ji bubua na pimɨt koi buiñor gux buam jum duukam, ba' xib ja'p ji buusan na pim buiñor ba ulhñix gu Dios bɨɨma'n guch Xoi'kam.
51003004	Guch Xoi'kam pɨx jir jam ii'mda' aapi'm, na gu' na pai' dhuuk maaxik jam buim maaxdha', aapi'm pui' buiñor jup jum maaxdha', ba' dai na pim buiñor ja'k ji aaya', gammɨjɨ pim ba' pu buiñor bap tui'ka' na pai' dhɨr jix io'm jir gɇ'kam.
51003005	Ba' kapbhai' nat ja'p ji buus na pim ba ko'iix buiñor gux buam jum duukam, cha'pim ka kɨɨsaidha' na pim jix buam jum duukam jup tu buada'. Cha'pim nai' pɨx ja bɨɨm ka boppoda' gu u'uub no'm cham jir jam bɨpna'. Cha'pim pui' ja'k jix buam tu jimda'. Xi ñakoo'nda' pim sia ku jax jix buam tu tatda' na pim jix buam jix chu duñiik. Cha'pim jix aa'nda' sia na pim gɨt ja'p pɨx mui' xi bia'ka' gu tuumiñ, na gu' dhi' pui' pɨx jup ji buusan na jax no'ch ja bui tu daan gui' nam didios jir jum tɨɨtgɨdam jup duiñxim.
51003006	Na gu' dhi' pu chu'm kɨ'n ba' ja tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios gu ja'tkam gui' nam cham jɨ'x kɨɨgalhdha'. Na gu' gui' nam cham kɨɨgalhi'ñdha' gu Dios, dai pu'ñi ja'k nam tu buada', cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' am.
51003007	Aapi'm pu'ñi ja'k jup tu jimdat gu' bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pim chakui tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
51003008	Ba' xib cha'pim kam bhabhaakui'ñdha'. Cha'pim ka ga'ngada' na pim jax ja'k jix buam ja dooda' gu jai' ja'tkam, cha'pim giilhim ka ja tɨtdada'. Cha'pim jix buam jum duukam kap tu buada' na ba' cham giop bhaamu' gu Dios jam bui. Cha'pim tu' kap jum buixi'ñdha' bɨɨx dhi' pui'.
51003009	Cha'pim kam i'iatgi'ñdha' tu' na pɨx bhaan. Ba do'ñcho pimɨt gu' aapi'm na pim jax ka tu jimdat bɨɨpɨ' dɨr, cham tu' pim pui' ja'k ka tu jim. Kam ua'tulhi'ñdha' pim gu' bɨɨpɨ' dɨr,
51003010	xib maakam japim ba tu jim, mi' pui' ba jiim japim na jax jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios. Saalh japim pɨx mi' pui' ji jimiim na jax ja'k tu jim gu Dios nat jaroi'p tu duu bɨɨx na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch, na pim gu' saalh pɨx jix bhai' maachim na jax ja'k tu jim gu Dios.
51003011	Cham tu' ba'm aa' kia' sia ku jaroi'r Israel kam maa'nkam piam ku gu' cham. Piam sia ku matgilhdhix nar Israel kam maa'nkam piam ku gu' cham. Piam sia kur mi' pai' kam gu jaroi' nam pai' oi'dha' gux chutumñigam, piam ku gu' maakam ja'k kam nam pai' oi'dha' gui' nam cham tu tumñi'. Piam ku gu'r tujuandam pui' cham namkidhat, piam ku gu' namkidhix kam jir tujuandam. Jax dhui na gu' bɨɨx pɨx ja a'm ba tɨ nɨidhidha' guch Xoi'kam, dai no'm soi'm ɨlhdhat buiñor ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ. Ba' dai guch Xoi'kam jix bhaai' na ja palhbuidha' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam sia nar jaroi' ka' gɨt.
51003012	Jix io'm xi jam joi'gɨ'n aapi'm gu Dios, ba' mi' jam tuttu ja bui gui' nam jir ja'tkam tugi'ñ na pim ba' aapi'm pui'p bar ja'tkam tugi'ñ ka'. Dai ba' na pim mi' pui' ba jiimda' na jax ja'k jum aa' na pim mi' pui' jiimda' na pim bar ja'tkam tugi'ñ. Xix jajoi'mdat japim gu jai', jir jix bhabhai'kam ka' pim. Soi' pim jum ɨlhii'ñdha', cha'pim nai' tu kokdada'.
51003013	Xi ñakoo'nda' pim no't jaroi' maadɨt tu' cham am bua jam bui, cham tu' na pim tukgɨi pui'p dooda'. Tu uañi'ñka' pim pɨx, ja'p na jax guch Xoi'kam nat tu jam uañ na pim buiñor jix u'ua'tulhdhix kat.
51003014	Dhi' pɨk jix io'm jum aa' na pim jix io'm xim jajoi'gɨ'nda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, na gu' no' pim xim jajoi'gɨ'n, bɨɨx maa'n ñi'ook jup duiñchu'nda' pim.
51003015	Pu kai'ñkam jam a'm tɨ tɨɨ gu' gu Dios na pim maa'n tuuku' pɨx buiñor bap tui'ñgɨda' bhaan gu tukga'n guch Xoi'kam. Jix bhai' pim jum taatɨt tu oi'ñka', na gu' dhi' guch Xoi'kam pui' ja'k jix aa', pui' ja'k jam jujurtu'nka' na pim jix bhai'm taat ka'. Jix bhai'm taat ka' pim ɨp ba' buiñor guch Xoi'kam nax bhai' jam bua.
51003016	Cha'pim mɨk buppada' na pimɨt tu' ba maat nat jam aa'ñ guch Xoi'kam, na gu' dhi' joidham jir jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam. Gio na pim pai' dhuuk tum a'aagi'ñdha' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam, piam na pim pai' dhuuk jum sɨsɨlhka'nda' sia tu' na pɨx bhaan, bɨɨpɨ' pim xim ga'ngimɨi na pim jax ja'k tɨ'ya' na pim ba'x bhai' ja aagi'ñdha'. Xi laala'ñxidhat japim gu Dios, bhaan japim dɨr xi boosgat Saalmos ta'm, piam sia jax ña pɨx chu'm, dai nax dhaam kam bhaan tu a'gada'. Dhi' pim ba' bhaan taxchaabgi'ñdha' gu Dios gio na pim bhaan gɇ'kamtu'nda' bɨɨx na jɨ'x jam jujur kɨ'n.
51003017	Gio bɨɨx na pim jɨ'k jax kai'chdha', piam na pim jɨ'k tu' jax buada', pui' pim ja'k buada' na jax ja'k bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na pim aapi'm sɨlhkam kaichu' guch Xoi'kam nar Gɇ'kam. Xi taxchaabgidhat japim ɨp ba' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' nat jix bhai' ba duu jam a'mkam guch Xoi'kam.
51003018	Aapi'm u'uub na pim tɨ bɨpna', tu' ka'm japim xi ja nɨidhat gu jam bɨpna'. Jum aa' na pim pu'ñi ja'k duiñchu'nda' na pim buiñor ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam.
51003019	Gio aapi'm chichio'ñ na pim jup tɨ bɨpna', xix jajoi'mdat japim ɨp gu jam bɨpna', cha'pim giilhim ja tɨtdat.
51003020	Ba' aapi'm na pim tɨ gɨgɨ'kora', tu' ka'm japim xi ja nɨidhat gu jam tataat gio gu jam nanaan, sia na pim jir a'aalh, piam ku pim jir biipibop, piam ku pim jir gɇ'gɇr ja'tkam, na gu' pui' ja'k jix aa' guch Xoi'kam.
51003021	Ba' aapi'm na pim jir ja gɨ'kora', cha'pim ja bhakkutu'nda' gu jam maamar nam ba' cham tu' bhaan jum o'jolhi'ñdha'.
51003022	Gio aapi'm na pim pui' pɨx jir tujuandam cham ji jam namkidhat, pui' pim tu' ka'm jup ja nɨidhat gui' na pim tu ja juañxi'ñ. Gammɨjɨ pim mi' pui' ja duiñxidhidha' gu tu', cham tu' dai nam pai' dhuuk xi jam nɨi'ñdha' no' pim mi' pui' tu duñiim.
51003023	Bɨɨx na pim jɨ'k tu' jax buada', cha'pim jum o'jolhdhat pu buada', gu' ja'pji bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n, panaas ku pim guch Xoi'kam pɨx pu buixi'ñdha' gu tu', cham tu' gu ja'tkam ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n.
51003024	Bax maat japim gu' na gu Dios jam makia' gui' nat tu' bɨjɨk pu ja iimchux na ja makia' gui' nam pu'ñir ja'tkam tugi'ñ ka'. Bhaankam tu juan japim gu' guch Xoi'kam dhi' na pɨk jir jaroi' ga'n bɨɨx na jɨ'k jix chu jai'ch.
51003025	Na gu' gui' nam jix buam tu duñia' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, cham tu' pu chu'm tu mai'chia' am, ja'xbui' ka'm jum tulhiiña' am nam jɨ'k tu'x buam tu duñia', na gu' gu Dios cham tu' jai' ja'p pɨx jix ja kɨɨgalhdhai ja aichdha' buiñor, gu' ja'pji gui' nam mi' pui' jimia' na jax jix aa'.
51004001	Ba' aapi'm na pim jɨ'k ja bia' gu tujuandam pui' cham ji ja namkidhat, jix bhai' pim ja bua't, jix bhai' pim ja tɨtdat, cham tu' na pim buam pɨx ja buada'. Tɨ'ñchot japim na jumaip jix jai'ch gu ja gɇ'kam tuk nax dhaam jup tu'ii', jam tɨkka' ba' na pimɨt jax ja'k tu jii ja bui. Jich Xoi'kam dhor di' gu ja gɇ'kam tuk.
51004002	Gammɨjɨ pim tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios, taxchaabgi'ñdha' pim sia tu' na pɨx bhaan, cha'pim dai gam ɨrdat darka'.
51004003	Jich a'mkam japim sia tu daanda', pui' pim xi chɨtdada' gu Dios na cham tu' tu'x buam jum duukam tu sosbhi'ñdha' nach nai' tu a'ga gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam, nach jix bhai' ja aagi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam nat jax pɨk kai'ñkam bha jii ya' dhi oi'ñga'n. Dhi' kɨ'n ya' kuup iñ aañ nañ tu a'ga pɨx dhi' pu chu'm.
51004004	Pui' pim xi chɨtdada' gu Dios na gui' pɨx jiñ palhbui'ñchu'nda' nañ ba'x bhai' ja aa'ñdhidha' gu ja'tkam gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam na jax jir mi' pui'.
51004005	Dɨɨlh japim xim ga'ngada' ɨp na pim jax ja'k tu jimda' ja bui gui' nam cham buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam. Gammɨjɨ pim tu ja a'gi'ñdha' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam, cham tu' na pim jax chu'm tanoolh gam ɨrdat darka'.
51004006	Dai gux kɨɨ'p jum duukam ɨp na pim tu ja a'gi'ñdha' gammɨjɨ na tu' joidham jum kai'ch. Gio bɨɨpɨ' dɨr japim pu bam ga'ngada' na pim jax ja'k tɨɨda' maa'n gu tu' na ba jam tɨkkada', cham tu' na pim ja'p pɨx mui' ba nokia' cham bhai' ji kɇɇji na tu' pɨk jix maachim ka'.
51004007	Gu Tiikiko nar jich jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, joidham jir jix kɨɨ' tujuandam tugi'ñ guch Xoi'kam, gammɨjɨ puñ palhbui'ñchu' nañ jɨ'k tu' jax bua. Dhi'ñ a'mkam mummɨ tu jam a'gidha'.
51004008	Mu jam joochxidha' iñ na ba'x bhai' jam aagi'ñdha' nach jax jich ɨlhii'ñ aach ya', gio na jam guguuxdha' na pim cham tu' bhaan jum o'jolhdhat mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam.
51004009	Bɨɨx mui'p jimda' bɨɨma'n gu Oneesimo na pui'p jir jich jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan. Jix kɨɨgalhi'ñ ich dhi' dhich jaduuñ, na gu' mi' pui' xi jim na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam ja'p na jax aapi'm. Bax maat japim nar jaroi' dha', na gu'r mi' kam jam bui. Dhi'm ba' jam aagi'ñdha' na jɨ'k tu' jax jum bua ya ja'p.
51004010	Mu jam ñio'ki'ñ dhi u'uan ta'm bhaan guñ jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan Aristaarko, nach maap ya' kuup. Gio gu Maarkos pui' mui'p jam ñio'ki'ñ, nam iampɨx mia'n jir jum jajaa'nim gu Bernabee. Bax maat japim na pim joidham jix bhai' tɨɨdai aichdha' dhi Maarkos no't jax dhuuk mummɨ ja'p ba ji buus jam bui.
51004011	Bɨɨx gu Jesuus mui'p jam ñio'ki'ñ, nam Juusto kɨ'n jup jix maat ka' jai' dhɨt gu ja'tkam. Dai dhi baik gammɨjɨñ bɨɨm jup tui'ñgɨda' am nam jiñ palhbuidhidha' bɨɨx aixim nañ tu a'ga na jax ja'k duix joi'mdat ja a'm ba tɨ nɨidhidha' gu Dios gu ja'tkam. Daipu' dhi'ñ palhbui'ñchu'nda' am sia kum gu' tɨi jai'p jix jai'ch gui' nam pui' buiñor jup tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam nam pui'p jir Israel kam ja'tkam. Ba' dhi'ñ ja a'm jiñ guguuxi'ñ.
51004012	Sia gu Epaapras mu jam ñio'ki'ñ, dhi' na pui'p jir tujuandam tugi'ñ guch Xoi'kam. Dhi' pui'p jix maat japim, na gu'r mu kam jam bui. Gammɨjɨ soi'm ɨlhdhat tu daanda' jam a'mkam aapi'm na ba' gu Dios jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' na pim mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa', na pim cham tu' bhaan jum o'jolhdhat sia nar jax ka' gɨt.
51004013	Nɨi'ñ iñ aañ na tu' sɨlhkam jix buam jum aa' jam a'mkam guch jaduuñ Epaapras, sia ja a'mkam jix buam jum aa' guch jaaduñ gui' nam Iaraapolis oi'dha' gio gui' nam Laodiisia oi'dha'.
51004014	Sia gu Deemas ya' dɨr mu jam ñio'ki'ñ, gio gu Luukas, dhi' nax maatɨt tu ja julhii'ñ gux kako'kkam. Joidham jix kɨɨgalhi'ñ ich aach dhi Luukas.
51004015	Aapi'm ba'ñ a'mkam jup xi ja ñio'kdha' bɨɨx gui' nam jɨ'k buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam nam Laodiisia maap jum jumpadat tu daan. Bɨɨx japim jiñ a'mkam xi ñio'kdha' gu Ninpas, gam bɨɨx gui' nam jɨ'k buiñor jum jumpadat maap tu daan buiñor gu Dios.
51004016	Ba' na pim pai' dhuuk tɨɨmo' na pim jiñkuidha' dhi'ñi u'uan nañ mu tu jam ua'ni'ñ, ja do'ñchi'ñpu' pim gui' nam Laodiisia maap jum jumpadat tu daan buiñor gu Dios nam ba'p jiñkuidha'. Aapi'm ba'p xi jiñkuidha' gu u'uan gui' nam bhai'p jam joochxidha', gui' na ñich mui'p tu ja ua'ñ bɨɨpɨ' dɨr.
51004017	Ja'p japim tɨɨda' gu Arkiipo nax bhai' mi' pui' xi dhuñiidha' nat jax kai'ñkam bhaan tɨ tɨɨ gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam, jix bhai' na xi chu juañxidhidha'.
51004018	Ba' aañ Paablo, dɨɨlh jiñ ñob kɨ'n jañ ya' xi chu ua'na', ja'p jañ ya' xi chu jam ua'ñdha'. Xiñ chɨ'ñchokat japim nañ ya' kuup. Bɨɨx jiñ jur kɨ'n jañ aañ pui'ñ aa' na gɨt gu Dios pɨx jam tajaañdha' gui' na pim kɨ'n jix io'm xim jajoi'gɨ'nda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n.
52001001	Aañ Paablo bɨɨma'n gu Silbaano gio gu Timoteo, mu tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ ich aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim Tesaloonika dɨbɨɨr bhaan jup tu'ii' na pai' mui' pa' daa'ñxim jir kikcham, bhai' na pim pai'm jumpadat daan gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' gio guch Xoi'kam nar Gɇ'kam, na pim gu' buiñor bap tui'dhi'. Ba' gui'm pɨx jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n aapi'm na pim ba'x bhai'm taatɨt tu oi'ñka' gammɨjɨ.
52001002	Aach gammɨjɨ jam tɨ'ñchot taxchaabgi'ñdha' gu Dios na pim xi gu'ki' na pim buiñor tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ guch Xoi'kam, tu jam daañxi'ñ ich na ba' cham tu' jam a'm jum aa'nda' jam i'ii'mda' bhaan gio jam tutku' bhaan.
52001003	Pui'ch jich aagɨt taxchaabgi'ñdha' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' na pimɨt jɨ'x xim biiñkadak buiñor guch Xoi'kam pu duu na jax jix aa', gio na pimɨt jɨ'x jix kɨɨgalhdhak tu juañxi sia pui' jim tulhiiñaimɨk, na pim gu'x io'm buiñor jix biiñak. Cham jax jum aa' pim ba' na pim pui' jim aagɨt na gui' pɨx jam palhbui'ñchu'.
52001004	Aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, gu Dios xi jam joi'mdat jam a'm tɨ nɨi'ñ. Jix maat ich nat gui' pɨx jam a'm tɨ tɨɨgɨk pui' jam duu na pim dai gui' pɨx ba daanda'.
52001005	Na gu' na chich pai' dhuuk tu jam a'gi gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Xoi'kam nax bhaai' na mi' dhɨr baabu' gu jaroi' na mu ja'k ka jimda' na pai' gammɨjɨ gɨt mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha', cham tu' dai aach dɨɨlh pɨx nach jax kai'ch, gu' ja'pji gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' nach a'm jup tui'dhi' nat jich guguux na chich ba'x gɨ'm jix oo' kɨ'n pu jam tɨɨ'n na maaxik jir sɨlhkam pui' na jax jum kai'ch. Gaa chich nach jax ja'k tu jimia' jam bui na pim ba'ch chɨɨgɨi pui' ja'k jup ba tu jimda' jai' ja bui. Jix bhai'x maat japim dho na chich pui'ch dhuu.
52001006	Ba' na pimɨt jax ja'k jich chɨɨgɨk nach tui'dhi', pui' ja'k jup ji chu jii pimɨt, na gu' pui' ja'k jix aa' guch Xoi'kam. Cham jax ji chɨ'ɨɨk joidham jix bhai'm taatɨt kai pimɨt gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam, na gu' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' na pui' jam jurtu'n, sia ku pimɨt gu' mi' dhɨr giilhim bam tulhii.
52001007	Ba' aapi'm jir ja booi'chu' bɨɨx guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham gui' nam Masedoonia dɨbɨɨr bhaan oi'dha' gio gui' nam Akaaya dɨbɨɨr bhaan jup oi'dha', nam gu' mi' pui'p ba tu daa'ñchu' nam jax ji chɇ kɇɇkɇt na pim tu jim.
52001008	Ba' cham tu' dai Masedoonia gio Akaaya nam pui' tɇ kɇɇ na pim jax ja'k tu jim, gu' ja'pji sia jai' kap mui' kap nam pai' jax cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, bax maat am na pim buiñor jix biiñak gu Dios. Ba' aach cham tu'ch a'm kam aa' nach jax kai'chdha',
52001009	ja'kbui' kat dɨɨlh pui' tu a'ga am na chich aach pu chu'm tu jam a'gi bha ja'p ji jam paxiarak. Sia pui' tu a'ga am na pimɨt joidham jix bhai'ch aich cham jax ji chɨ'ɨɨk. Bɨɨx pui'p xi kai'ch am na pimɨt cham tu' kap jum buix ja bui gu didios nar jup ja duiñ gu ja'tkam, dai gu sɨlhkam Dios duakam japimɨt bhaan ba jujurtɨ, dai gui' pim pɨx bar tujuandam tugi'ñ.
52001010	Gio nam pui'p xi kai'ch na pim jax ja'k tu't nɨɨra na gio bhai'p jimda' guch Xoi'kam, Maraa'n gu Dios, nat Dios pɨx dɨɨlh dua'ñdhak mi' dhɨr buusai' koi'ñga'n tɨr. Gu Jesuus jir di' nach palhbui'ñ nach ba' cham jich chulhiiña' na cham xiim jum aaya' nam jix io'm jum tulhiiña' gui' nam cham mi' pui' jimia' na jax jix aa'.
52002001	Aapi'm jix maat jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na chich cham tu' tu' kub pɨx tu a'ga gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios jano' nach bha ja'p tu jam a'gidhim,
52002002	sia kuch gu' bɨɨpɨ' dɨr jup xich chulhiiñaimɨk bhammɨ Piliipos na pim jax jup bax maat. Giilhim jamɨt bɨɨx aixim jich chɨtdaimɨk jich gɨbiimɨk, gu' ji nat gu' gu Dios jich palhbui nach ba' aapi'm jup jam aagi'ñdha' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga na jax ja'k jix bhai' na pim duñia', na pim ba' cham mu ja'k ka jiimda' na pim pai' gammɨjɨ gɨt mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'. Cham jax jich aagɨk jachich tu jam a'gi sia kum mui' dhɨt tɨich o'bhagi'ñ nam cham jich kɨɨgalhdhat.
52002003	Nach gu' aach maaxik jix maat nach mi' pui' tu a'gim na jax jir sɨlhkam, cham tu'r gama ja'k. Ni kuch cham iam maakam ja iatgidhat gu ja'tkam tu' mi' tɨɨgim na ba' aach dɨɨlh jich a'm ji chu bi'iidha'.
52002004	Jax dhui na gu' gu Dios pux maatɨt jich ñɨi'ñ nach jax jir tuutu'm. Jix kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam jich chɨɨgɨk pu chu'm kɨ'n jich dharai nach nai' tu a'ga' gu ñio'ki'ñ na bhaan tu a'ga nam jax ja'k duñia' gu ja'tkam, nam ba' cham mu ja'k ka bhɨɨya' nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'. Dai ba' pu'ñi pɨx jach tu a'gim, cham tu' jumai tu' pup kui'mgi'ñ ich, ni ku chich cham aa ɨp nam pɨx jix bhai'm taatɨt joidham jich aa'nda' gu ja'tkam, nach gu' aach jix aa' na dai gu Dios jix bhai'm taat ka' aach jich bui, gui' nax bhai'x maat nach jax jich aa' jich jujur am bhaan.
52002005	Gio cham pai' dhuuk mu pai' giilhim bɨɨx aixim xi bua ich nach tu jam a'gi'ñ na pim jax ja'k joidham jich kɇɇji pɨx jix bhai'ch aa'nda' gɨt, jix maat japim dho. Ni ku chich cham pai' dhuuk mu pai' bɨxchu' bhaan tu a'gimɨk ma'iich gu tuumiñ. Jix bhai'x maat sia gu Dios na chich cham tu' pui' tu jii.
52002006	Pu cham jich ko'raaro gu' na jaroi' gɇ'gɇrkam jich bia'kat pɨx jix bhai'ch aa'nda', ni jaroi' dho moo, ni aapi'm.
52002007	Jix bhaigɨt ɨp dho nach pui' ja'k tu jimia' na jax gu gɇ'gɇrkam, nach gu' bhaankam tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam nach jir noonbi'ñ. Gu' ji na chich gu' ja'p pɨx tu jii jam bui na jax gu a'aalh, gio ja'p na jax maa'n gu ubii nax ja da'dat jix bhai' ja buada' gu maamra'n.
52002008	Pu'ñich jup jam ɨlhii'ñ aach na pim panaas jir jich maamar. Joidham xi jam da'dat xi jam joi'gɨ'n ich, cham tu' na chich dai gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios pɨx xi chu jam a'gidhak, gu' ja'pji sia guch i'ii'mda' na jam a'm jup tu'ii'. ¡Joidham tu' sɨlhkam kɨ'n xi jam da' ich gu'!
52002009	Jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, sia tɨ'ñcho pim dho chi nach jix io'm tu juanaimɨk nach ba' mai'chɨkda' gu tu' nach a'm jum aa'nda'. Tu juanda' ich nabap tanoolh gio nabap tukaa', nach gu'x mat ka' nax xijai ka' aapi'm jam bui na pim tu' kɨ'n jich xiispa' nach bha ja'p tu jam a'gi'ñ gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios.
52002010	Aapi'm dhox bhai'x maat gam sia gu Dios na chich mi' pui' tu jii na pimɨt jax ja'k joidham jix kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam jich chɨɨ. Jix bhai' nɨidhix kam jachich pu tu duu jam bui aapi'm na pim tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
52002011	Gam na chich jam gu'nguxdhimɨk na pim jax bax maat ɨp, jam aa'ñdhimɨk ich bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n na pim jax ja'k tui'ñgɨda', ja'p na jax maa'n gu maa'nkam no' tu ja aagi'ñ gu maamra'n.
52002012	Jup xi jam tɨɨdak jachich na pim pui' ja'k duñia' na jax ja'k bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na pim Dios bar ja'tkam tugi'ñ, na gu' aapi'm bar dhi' na pim ba iimchudhix na pim buiñor aaya' na pai' dhɨr jix io'm jir gɇ'kam na joidham jix chu abhaar.
52002013	Pui'ch jup taxchaabgi'ñ gammɨjɨ gu Dios na pimɨt cham jax ji chɨ'ɨɨk kɇɇk mi' pui' jii na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ na chich tu jam a'gi. Tɨ jɨɨ'ñ japimɨt na maaxik Dios jir ñio'ki'ñ, cham tu' gu ja'tkam. Na gu' maaxik Dios bhaan tu a'ga gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook nach bhaan tu a'ga. Aapi'm jam a'm jix maatɨ' na tu'p jir tu'm da' na pim jɨ'k dhi' bhaan tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ.
52002014	Aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, jano' na mɨt gu bhai' kam ja'tkam jam tulhiiñchuda sia ku pim tɨi bhai' maap oi'dha' bhaan gu dɨbɨɨr, pu'ñip tu ja dooda guch jaaduñ Judea kam nam pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam nam tɨi mi ja'p maap jum jumpadat jup tu daanda'. Gu mi' kam ja'tkam nam jup ja bua, jir Judea kam am ɨp pui', gu' ji nam gu' gui' cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
52002015	Dhi Judea kam ja'tkam jir dhi' am na mɨt mua gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam, pui'x maat am gu' na mɨt mui' ba ja koi gui' nam bhaankam tɨi tu a'gada' gu Dios. Sia aach mi' dhɨr mai' bach aadi mɨt. Ni jɨ'x ba' kum xim ga'ngada' no'x bhai'm taat gu Dios ja bui ka' ba' cham. Giox bhaak ka' am tu' na pɨx kɨ'n,
52002016	na gu' no'ch tɨi xix chu ja a'gidham gui' nam cham jir Israel kam ja'tkam nam ba' cham jup jum tulhiiña', gui' cham aa'nda' am nach gan tu ja a'gi'ñdha'. Pu'ñi dhuuk jamɨt ba' bam ua'tulh ja'p gɇ'kam kɨ'n, ba suuda' ja i'ii'mda' bhaan. Ba' dai na cham xiim jix io'm ja tulhiiñchuda' cham ja joi'mdat gu Dios.
52002017	Jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, aach gammɨjɨ jam tɨ'ñcho bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n, sia kuch gu' mɨk cham pai' ka jam nɨi'ñ maaxik. Tɨich jich ga'ngada' nach jax dhui mu jam tɨɨ'mpo' gɨt ɨp gio.
52002018	Maa'nnim jachich tɨi mui' ma ji jam tɨɨgim, aañi' Paablo tɨi mui'kim ji tu dai nach mu jam tɨɨ'mpo' gɨt, gu' ji na gu' gu ja'ook mi' gaim tɨtka.
52002019	Na gu' aapi'm ba'r di' nach ji jam nɨidhat jich gu'nguxi'ñ nach jix bhai'ch chaat. Jix bhai' tu tatda' ka' nach xi jam tɨ'ñchoka', na gu' jano' na pai' dhuuk gio bhai'p jimda' guch Xoi'kam, aapi'm pɨx jir di' ka' na pim bɨɨpɨ'ch chuttu'.
52002020	Pui' kuñ ba'p kai'ch nach aapi'm ji jam nɨidhat jix bhai'ch chaat, cham tu' bhaan jax jich aa' ich ba'.
52003001	Ba' nañ gu' cham nakgaim nañ jix maachim na pim jax tu'ii', pui' ma tɨi ñich nañ aañ mi' pɨx ka oirɨda' Ateenas,
52003002	gu Timoteo ñich ba' mɨjɨ xi joot nañ a'mkam mu jam tɨɨ'mɨra' na pui'p jir jich jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, gio na pui' bhaankam jup tu juan gu Dios, na tu a'ga gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam. Jup xi chɨɨdak jañich na bhammɨ jam guguuxdha' na pim ba' mi' pui' tu daa'ñchugɨt tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' dhi' na pimɨt tu' ba maat nar joidham.
52003003	Gio na pim ba' bɨɨx cham jum o'jolhdhat xi gukgɨda' sia pui' bɨɨx aixim bhaan jim tulhiiñaidhat, na gu' dhi'm aa' nach pu'ñi bɨɨx aixim jich chulhiiña' na pim jax bax maat.
52003004	Pu jam aagi'ñ ich jano' nach bhammɨ xip tu't jam bui na pu'ñi bɨxchu' bhaan bhai' jim tulhiiña' pim ɨp aapi'm na pimɨt ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, ba' pui'p ji chu buus. Tɨ'ñcho pim dho chi nach pui' jam tɨtda.
52003005	Pu'jani nañ jiñ aagɨt ba' cham nakgaim nañ jix maachim na pim jax tui'dhi'. Pui' ku ñich ba' mɨjɨ tu joot nam jam tɨkka' no' pim pui mi' pui' tu daa'ñchu' na pimɨt tu' maatɨk tɨ jɨɨ'ñ jano' na chich bhammɨ tu jam a'gi. Nañ gu'x choo'nnɨt jam tɨ'ñchoka' tɨi no't jax dhuuk tu' bhaan ji jam mai'chɨk gu ja'ook mu ja'k jam iabu ɨp gio ua'tulhdhara' tɨr, nañ gu' cham aa' nar tu' kub ka' guch magooñi' na chich bhammɨ ja'p ba bhɨi.
52003006	Ba' xib bhammɨ dɨr ja'k ba gɨi gu Timoteo Tesaloonika na pim pai' oi'dha', joidham jix chu guguuxdham kai'chim. Mi' pui' tu daa'ñchugɨt jix biiñak japim sap na pimɨt tu' tu maat, jix chu joi'gɨ'n japim sap sia tu' na pɨx bhaan kɨ'n. Sia aach japim sap tɨich chɨ'ñchoka', xich chɨɨgik ka' pim sap tɨi maaxik ja'p na jax aach ya' dɨr mu ja'k nach pui' tɨi joidham jup xi jam tɨɨgik.
52003007	Ba' dhi' bhaan aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, gɇ'kam kɨ'n jachich jix bhai'ch ɨlh nam pui' bach chɨtda na pim mi' pui' jiimɨt jix biiñak buiñor guch Xoi'kam, sia kuch gu' aach bɨɨx aixim bhaan jich chulhiiñ.
52003008	Panaas ku chich mi' pai' dhɨr kia'pɨx bhai' ji dhudua ko'iix kat nam pui' bach chɨtda na pim mi' pui' jiim na jax jix aa' gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam.
52003009	Cham bhaai' dho nach jax pɨk ja'k moox bhai'ch chaatɨt xi taxchaabgi'ñdha' gɨt gu Dios na pim mi' pui' tui'dhi' na jax jix aa',
52003010	dai nach soi' tɨtdatu' nabap tanoolh gio nabap tukaa' na iam pu tɨ'ya' nach mu jimia' nach ba' maaxik jam tɨgia' ɨp gio, gio nach ba'x io'm jix bhai' xi jam aagi'ñdha' na jax ja'k tu tu'ii' dhi' nach jax ja'k tu jim na pim ba' cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt jix bhai' bhaan tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha'.
52003011	Jix aa' ich tɨi na gɨt gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' gio gu Jesuus jich Gɇ'kam tuk jich palhbuidha' nach jax dhui mu jimia' nach jam tɨɨ'mpo'.
52003012	Gio ba' na gui' pɨx Dios jam maakidha' matda' na pim jax ja'k jix io'm maachidha' na pim xim jajoi'gɨ'nda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, ja'p na jax aach nach xi jam joi'mdat tɨi jam tɨ'ñcho.
52003013	Gio gu Dios pɨx gɨt ɨp ba' moo pui' ja'k duiñchu'nda' gu jam jujur na pim jax ja'k mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa', na pim jix u'uañ jup tui'ñgɨda', na ni jax chu'm ua'tulhdhara' ku jam tɨɨ'ñxidha' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' jano' na pai' dhuuk gio bhai'p jim gu Jesuus jich Gɇ'kam tuk ja bɨɨm bɨɨx gui' nam jɨ'k buiñor jum biiñkada'. Moo gɨt pui' tu tui'ka'.
52004001	Ba' xib aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, soi'ñ jam tɨtda bhaankam gu Jesuus jich Gɇ'kam tuk na pim gammɨjɨ mi' pui' jiimda' na chich jax jam aa'ñdhak na pim duiñchu'nda' na ba'x bhai'm taat ka' gu Dios jam bui, pui' na pim jax ja'k ba duiñchu' xib.
52004002	Jix bhai'x maat japim gu' na jax ja'k jum aa' na pim duñia', na chich gu' xi jam aa'ñdhak bhaankam guch Xoi'kam gui' nax io'm jir gɇ'kam.
52004003	Dai pui' pɨx ja'k jix aa' gu' gu Dios na pim jix u'uañ jup tui'ka' gui' buiñor gammɨjɨ. Cha'pim nai' pɨx ja bɨɨm boppoda' gu u'uub no'm cham jir jam bɨpna',
52004004	daipu' ji gui' nam jir jam bɨpna' ka' na pim jix ja da'dat. Tu' ka'm japim ja nɨi'ñdha', cham tu' na pim jax ña pim pɨx ja alhiosda' na jax cham jir am.
52004005	Ni ku pim cham bɨɨx aixim jix buam jum aagɨt ja nɨi'ñdha' ja'p nam jax ja'k tu jim gui' nam cham maat gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios.
52004006	Ni ku pim cham jix joidhat nɨi'ñdha' gu jax chu'm jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham gu bɨnga'n, ni jaroi' jax chu'm jumai. No' jax dhuukat jaroi' pui' ja'k tu jim, Dios dhox io'm tulhiiñchuda' cham joi'mdai, nach gu' tɨi pu ba jam aagi'ñdha'.
52004007	Nat gu' gu Dios pu kai'ñkam jich a'm tɨ tɨɨ nach ba' mi' pui' ba jiimda' na jax jix aa', nach jix u'uañ jup tui'ka' gui' buiñor, cham tu' nach bɨɨx aixim tu buada' na tu' cham jir kɨɨ'.
52004008	Pu'jani nax abhaaruix. Gu jaroi' na tu' pɨx ɨlhii'ñdha' dhi' nañ jɨ'k jax kai'ch na jax jim aagɨt na maa'nkam jup jir dunii'ñ, cham tu' gu jax chu'm maa'nkam na cham kɨɨgalhi'ñdha', gu' ja'pji gu Dios nat jam a'm tajaa gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda'.
52004009	Ba' na pim jax ja'k xim jajoi'mdat jix bhai'm buada' dɨɨlh daich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham, cham jum aa' nañ pui' ja'k tu jam ua'ñi'ñdha' bhaan dhi u'uan, nat gu' dɨɨlh gu Dios ba jam aa'ñ na pim jax ja'k xim jajoi'gɨ'nda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n.
52004010	Pui' ja'k tu jim japim sap gu' ja bui guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham bɨɨx gui' nam jɨ'k Masedoonia dɨbɨɨr bhaan oi'dha', ku gu' aach jam aagi'ñ ji soi'ch ɨlhdhat na pim jix io'm xim gɨ'lhdhidha' na pim xim jajoi'gɨ'nda'.
52004011	Ba' dai dhi' bhaan japim jup jum tukgi'ñka' gu tu'x bhai'm duukam na pim jup tu buada', cham tu' na pim bɨɨx aixim jum aa'nda' gu tu' na cham jum aa'. Dɨɨlh jam boorda' kɨ'n japim tu bia'ka' gu tu', na chich jax pui' pu xi jam tɨɨdak moo ba pui',
52004012	nam ba' pu'ñi ja'k pɨx jix bhai' jam aa'nda' gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gio na ba' cham tu' jam a'm jum aa'nda' aapi'm dɨɨlh.
52004013	Jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, xi jam aagi'ñdha'ch ɨp nam jax jum duñiim jai' dhɨt nam ko'iim ja tutku' bhaan guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham, nach gu'x aa' na pim jix mat ka' na pim ba' cham bhaan jix buam jum aa'nda' ja'p na jax gui' nam pu cham maat ni jɨ'x nam jax jum duñia' nam pai' dhuuk ko'ya'.
52004014	Pui' nach jax tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ xib nat muukɨk giop dua guch Xoi'kam, pu'ñip tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ ich na gu Dios pɨx dɨɨlh ja dudua'ñdhai ja baapmi'ñdha' nam jimia' buiñor guch Xoi'kam jɨ'k nam buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhai ko'ya'.
52004015	Ja'pni ja'k tu tu'ii' na pim ba'x mat ka', guch Xoi'kam jich Gɇ'kam tuk pɨx ya'ch aagi'ñ dhi'. Aach nach jɨ'k duduaka' tutku' bhaan jano' na pai' dhuuk gio bhai'p jimda' guch Xoi'kam, cham tu'ch bɨɨpɨ' kat baasɨ'n namkia'.
52004016	Na gu' jano' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' gu tanoolh, bhammɨ dɨr pui' ba tɨm tɨ'ya'x gɨ'm kɨ'n gio gɇ' kɨ'n. Sia gu ja gɇ'kam tuk bɨɨx gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios gɇ' kɨ'n pui'p ba tɨ'ya', gio gu Dios gu kuichdhakaru'n bam kuichdha'. Ba' guch Xoi'kam nar Gɇ'kam bhammɨ dɨr bhai' ji jimia' jix dhaam, ba' gui' nam jɨ'k buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhai ko'iix ka', bɨɨpɨ' duduadɨi bhai' ji baapmigia' am.
52004017	Ba' gui' nach jɨ'k duduaka' nach pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor, maap jach bhai' ba bhɨɨya' nach ba namkipu' bhammɨ tɨbaa'ñ cha'm gui' na bhaan bha jimda', gammɨjɨch ba' buiñor pu bap tui'ka' guch Xoi'kam.
52004018	Pu'ñi pim xi kai'chɨt bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n cham jax jum aagɨt mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam.
52005001	Ba' na jax ja'k ba tum buidha', piam na tu' tanoolh ba' pɨk gio bhai'p jimda' guch Xoi'kam, cham jum aa'ñ jaaduñ nañ pu chu'm ya'p jam aagi'ñdha',
52005002	na pim gu' bax maat na guch Xoi'kam gio bhai'p jim na cham jaroi' pum aa'nda'. Ya' pɨx ba aaya' ja'p na jax maa'n gux ɨxkum na mu pai' aaya' ba'k chɨr jax ña pɨx chu'm tukaa'.
