58011017	Gio jano' nap tɨtda gu Dios gu Abraam na sap mua'ji makgɨrxidha' gu maraa'n Isaak na mi' pɨx bhaan machia' no' sap moo sɨlhkam jix biiñak buiñor piam ku gu' cham, gu Abraam cham jax ji chɨ'ɨɨk pui'p tu duu na jax tɨtda gu Dios, na gu' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat jix biiñak ka' buiñor. Pui' ku ba' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n jix aa' na makgɨrxidha' gu Dios gu maraa'n Isaak, cham jax bua sia ku daipu' maa'n tu mar,
58011018	sia ku gu'p tɨtda bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na saak bhaan dhi' dhi maraa'n Isaak mui' tu bopxicha' cham daaxix kam.
58011019	Na gu' pux bhai'x maat gu Abraam na gu Dios jix io'm jir gɇ'kam, bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia', sia koi'ñga'n jix bhaai' na ja dudua'ñdhai giop ja baapmi'ñdha'. Ba' pui' pɨx jum aa' na cham jax bua siat mu'aak makgɨrxi gu maraa'n Isaak, na gu' gui' giop dua'ñdha'. Gu Dios pux bhai'x maat ɨp na gu Abraam tu' sɨlhkam bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n jix biiñak buiñor, ba'p tɨtda na sap cham ka mumua'da' gu maraa'n na bax mu'aam. Ku gu' pui' ji buus ji nat tɨi mua gu Abraam gu maraa'n Isaak, gu' ji nat gu' gu Dios giop dua'ñ.
58011020	Gio mi' dhɨr gu Isaak nat pai' dhuuk gɨ'ɨɨr, bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat jup jix biiñak kat buiñor gu Dios, pui' ku ba'p ja tɨtda gu gook maamra'n, Jakob gio Esauu, na sap joidham jix bhai' tu ja jimia'.
58011021	Gio pui' na jax gu Jakob, pui' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n jup jix biiñak kat buiñor gu Dios, mi' pui'p jimdat na jax jix aa'. Pui' ku ba' jano' na pux io'm bar jagɨ', na pu bar mia'n na mukia', pui' ja'k xi chu ja daaxdhak gu gook maamra'n gu Josee na sap jix bhai' tu ja jimia'. Gio sia ku cham ka oo' na kɨɨka' nax io'm bar jagɨ', gu oxia'n bhaan xim siispak nat tu daanɨ buiñor gu Dios, na gu' kai'ñkam tu' sɨlhkam jix biiñak kat buiñor.
58011022	Gio gu Josee pui' ɨp, bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n jix biiñak kat buiñor gu Dios. Pui' ku ba' jano' nat pu ba ji muu, na pu palhɨɨp pɨx ba ñiok, jup xi ja tɨɨdak gu jajaa'nni'ñ na sap jɨ'kchi oidha' kɨ'n gu Dios ja palhbuidha' nam bubuakia' mi' dhɨr Ejipto. Ba'p xi ja tɨɨdak nam sap xi bhɨɨji gu tukga'n no' mɨt ba jii mi' dhɨr, na gu' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' na pui' tu kuugalhdha' gu Dios jax no't ba tɨi.
58011023	Gio ja'pni ɨp na jax gu gɨ'korga'n gu Moisees nam pui' bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n jup jix biiñak kat buiñor gu Dios. Pui' ku mɨt ba' cham tu' bhaan ji chotdonɨk ɨxchu baik masaa'n gu Moisees nat jax maaxir, sia kum gu'x maat nat pui' ja'k tu dai gu gɇ'kam mi' kam Ejipto nam pu bɨɨx ja koodaidha' gu a'aalh Israel kam nam jax maaxilhidha' no'm jir chichio'ñ. Na gu' nam xi ñɨi'ñ, joi'mdam tu'm gu alhii, gio nam gu' pui' pɨx xim aa' na ja palhbuidha' gu Dios, nam gu' buiñor jix biiñak ka'.
58011024	Gio mi' dhɨr nat gɨ'ɨɨr gu Moisees, pui'p jum biiñkai buiñor gu Dios, bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat mi' pui' jimda' na jax jix aa'. Pui' ku ba' cham ka aa' na pui pui'm tɨɨtɨ'nda' nar gɨ'lhga'n gu maraa'n gui' na mi'r gɇ'kam Ejipto.
58011025	Na gu' cham aa' na pui' ja'k jup tu jimda' nam jax tu jim gu mi' kam Ejipto nam bɨɨx aixim tu buada' na jax cham jir am, sia gui' nar dɨ'ɨɨ'n tu'm, pui' ku ba' cham ka aa' na kaichgɨda'. Pui'm aa' ba' nar am na mu ja'k ba ja bɨnta' gu Israel kam ja'tkam na mia'n jir jajaa'nni'ñ, cham jax bua sia ku mɨt pui' bhai'p ji chulhiiñchuda nam jax ja tulhiiñchu'nda' gu Israel kam ja'tkam.
58011026	Pui'm duu ba', buus gu Moisees mi' dhɨr ja bui gu Ejipto kam ja'tkam, na gu'x aa' na ja bɨɨm jum tulhiiña' gu Israel kam ja'tkam, cham tu'p jum buixdhak sia chi jax kar jix chumñigam kat. Jix aa' gu' na ja'xbui'p xim tulhiiña' na jɨ'x jum tulhiiña' guch Xoi'kam no't pu'ñi ya' ba ai, na gu' pux maat na gɇ'p jum duukam makia' gu Dios jix dhaam no't ba ai, na gu' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n jix biiñak ka' buiñor.
58011027	Pu mai' mɨɨ ba' mi' dhɨr Ejipto cham tu' bhaan ji choo'nnɨk sia ku jax giilhim jix bhaam gu gɇ'kam mi' kam, na gu'x maat na gɇ'kam kɨ'n bhaan tɨ nɨidhim gu Dios sia ku cham pai' nɨi'ñ maaxik.
58011028	Mi' dhɨr ba' dai nat ba tu juu gu paan gakdhi'ñchix kam bhaan Paaskua ta'm ja bɨɨm gu Israel kam ja'tkam, na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nam jix io'm jix biiñak kat buiñor gu Dios tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na gui' ja palhbuidha' nam bubuakia' mi' dhɨr Ejipto. Gio ba' nat ja chia bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n nam sap ɨ'ɨɨr kɨ'n mamxidha' gu kiki'ñgob mu ja'p nam pai' jax chu ba'bhak, na sap ba' cham mi' aaya' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na pai' dhuuk bɨɨx kap ja kooda' gu bɨɨpɨ' kam ja maamar gu Ejipto kam ja'tkam.
58011029	Ba' buimgidhak na mɨt ba jii mi' dhɨr Ejipto, ja palhbui gu Dios nam jax dhui mi' bhɨɨya' ɨrban gux Bɨ' Suudai', nam gu' bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n jix biiñaktu'nda' buiñor. Joidham jix chu gak kɨr bhɨi mɨt, nat gu' joidham ɨrban nai' ji ɨɨ gu suudai'. Gu' ba' gu Ejipto kam ja'tkam nam mui' tɨi ja ardim gu Israel kam ja'tkam, mi' pu koi mɨt na mɨt pai' dhuuk mui' tɨip ji bubua, nat gu' jotmoda' am xim kuu ɨp gio gu suudai' na mɨt mu ji bhɨi ɨrban.
58011030	Gio gatuuk nam mummu ja'k jup ba tu kokda na pai' Jerikoo tɨ tɨɨ', dɨɨlh pɨx nai' ji ia'rɨ gu bhibhii'ñbak, dai na mɨt bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr pɨx xi jii sakaalh gu Israel kam ja'tkam xijum gook tanoolh juugɨt, nam gu' bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n jix biiñaktu'nda' buiñor gu Dios, pui' kut ba' gui' pɨx jup tu duu.
58011031	Gio pui' na jax gui' na Raab tɨɨgich bɨjɨk, pui'p tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat jix biiñak kat buiñor gu Dios, sia ku gu' bɨɨpɨ' dɨr jir ganai' pɨx kat. Pui' kut ba' cham muu ja bɨɨm gu mi' oi'ñkam nat pai' dhuuk ja koi gu Dios, nat gu'x joi'gɨlh nat ja palhbuidhak ja tɨbiaptuda gu gook ja'tkam na mɨt mu ja joot gu Israel kam ja'tkam nam tɨ tɨɨ'mpu' nam jax tu't tu oi'dha' mi' Jerikoo.
58011032	¿Jax jañ pɨk ja'k moop xi jam tɨɨda' gɨt na pim ba'x maatɨt kaaya'? Tɨi mui' ka bi'iix am ji gu' na ñich chakui ja aa nam pui'p jix biiñak kat buiñor guch Gɨ'kora', dai ji na gu' chix io'm tɇb jup jum bua no' ñich bɨɨx mui' ji jam aa'ñ nam jɨ'k jax tu buimɨk na bhaan jix maatɨ' nam jix biiñak kat buiñor gu Dios. Dai nam jax tɨɨgich jañ pɨx mui' xi jam aa'ñdha', pui' na jax gui' na Gedeon tɨɨgich, gio ba' gu Barak, gio ba' gu Sansoon, gio ba' pui' na jax gu Jepte nam pui'p jix biiñak kat buiñor gu Dios. Gio gu Dabii gui' na bɨjɨk jir gɇ'kam kat, gio ba' gu Samuel, gam gui' nam bɨjɨk ya ja'p bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios.
58011033	Bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat jix biiñak kat am buiñor gu Dios dhi' dhi ja'tkam, pui' kum ba' jai' dhɨt ja daam kɨɨkat gu jai' ja'tkam, jai' dhɨt ba' nam jix bhai' ja sɨlhkadimɨk gu ja'tkam nam pai' dhuuk jir gɇ'gɇrkam kat na jax jix aa' gu Dios. Jai' dhɨt ba' nat ja a'm tu bii gui' nat tu' tu ja iimchuda gu Dios. Gam jai' dhɨt nat cham jɨ'xdhat ja jugiokak gu maapi'ñ sia ku mɨt mɨjɨ tɨi ja iabo nam pai' kuup, nat gu' ja palhbui gu Dios nam buiñor jix biiñak ka'.
58011034	Gio ba' jai' dhɨt na mɨt tɨi tai chɨr ja iabok, cham jɨ'xdhat ja mɨidhak sia ku giilhim jix choiñ, nat gu' ja palhbui gu Dios na ja buip tui'ñgɨt. Gio gam jai' dhɨt na mɨt cham jɨ'xdha' mia'n ja bhɨi na mɨt jiboi'ññor nam tɨi bax ja koodak tɇ'tɇb kukxir kɨ'n. Ku ba' gu' gatuuk na mɨt gio mui'p ji chu kokda, pu tu ma'iich jamɨt ji, nat gu' ja palhbui gu Dios nam buiñor jix biiñak ka'. Cham jɨ'xdha' ba' jax ja dooda mɨt gui' nam jix ja bhaamki'ñdha'.
58011035	Jai' dhɨt dhi' nañ jaroi' ja aa', jix bhai'm duukam jup tu duuk jamɨt ja bui gu dɨ'dɨlhdhɨm u'uub, ja dudua'ñdhak bhaankamu'n gu Dios giop ja baapmi' mɨt gu ja maamar nam ba ko'iix kat. Jai' dhɨt moo xi'x io'm jix biiñak kat am buiñor guch Gɨ'kora', pui' ku mɨt ba' cham jax ɨlh na mɨt giilhim ja tulhiiñchudaimɨk ja koi nam xi chuut nam gammɨjɨ pu kaichgɨda' gu Dios sia kum tɨi ja chian nam sap cham ka kaichgɨda', nam gu'x aa' nam ba jimia' nam pai' cham tu' bhaan kam tulhiiña'.
58011036	Jai' dhɨt nam ja gɨbiimɨk giilhim bɨɨx aixim xi ja ai'chuxdhimɨk, gio jai' dhɨt na mɨt ja buuprak bapaiñum tɨtropiñ kɨ'n ja kuu nam tɨi xi chu ja a'gi'ñdha' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios.
58011037	Jai' dhɨt jamɨt joodai kɨ'n ja ma'yasimɨk ja koi, jai' dhɨt ba' na mɨt ɨ'rapan ja ɨ'kɨ sirruuch kɨ'n, gam jai' dhɨt nam ja sɨxximɨk kukxir kɨ'n. Bɨɨx dhi' nañ jɨ'k ja aa', jai' dhɨt cham pai' tu oi'ñkat am, mui' kap oipimɨk am, kakasnir jajo' tɨm tɨ'ii'ñka' am gam kakarbax jajoo', nam gu' cham tu'r jix chutumñigam kat, gampai' tuutu'm kat am. Bɨxchu' bhaan jum tulhiiñaimɨk am, gam na mɨt ja ko'ktulhdhimɨk.
58011038	Bɨɨx pɨx gu ja'tkam jix ja bhaamki'ñdha' am sia kum tɨi mi ja'p jix chu oi'ñchak ja bɨɨm. Ba jimia' am ba' mu ja'p gampɨx jix chu gak kɨr na pai' cham jaroi' oirɨ, gam bha ja'p gɇ'gɇr oi'dha' ta'm. Mu ja'p jam ba tɨbiapka' jɨ'x na pai' chiichio' gio na pai' jax gɇgɇr tɨ dɨɨdɨ'.
58011039	Ku ba' gu' siam jix io'm jix biiñak kat buiñor gu Dios, cham tu' pui' tu kuugalh ji nat jax tu ja daaxdhak,
58011040	na gu' pui' pum aa' gu Dios na xib ba' pui' ka tu kuugalhdha' nat jax tu ja daaxdhak gui' nach pai' dhuuk aach ya' ba oipoda' pu'ñi, na ba' bɨɨx maap maa'n jimdam tuch uañdha' guch ua'tulhdhara', na ba' mɨ' dhɨr bax bhaai'n ka' na sia aach jich a'm tu bi'ya' gu gɇ'gɇr jup tum duu'nkam nat ja iimchuda gui'.
58012001	Dho jaiñ nam jax pɨk joidham bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat jix biiñak kat buiñor gu Dios gu bɨjɨk dɨr kam jich bopxi kat. Aach dho pu'ñi ɨp jiñ jaaduñ, ja'p jach xi dhui bɨɨx nach jɨ'k tu' bhaan jich chukgi'ñ, ba' dai nach bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n bach biiñkada' buiñor gu Dios. Cham jach bhaan ka tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka' gu tu' nar ua'tulhdhara', dai ji nach pɨx bhaan ji baapmigia' nach mi' pui' ba tu kuugalhdhidha' na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora'.
58012002	Mi'ch pui' ba jimia' nat jax xi chɨ'ɨɨk guch Xoi'kam jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk, gui'ch pɨx buiñor jix biiñak ka' gammɨjɨ. Gui' dɨɨlh jich palhbuidha' no't tu' ba jich dhuu, gio nach guguuxi'ñdha' nach ba' cham jax jich aa'nda', gam na tuch uañi'ñka' no' chich tu' bhaan cham am bua, nat gu' gui' pui'p jum tulhiiñak jano' na mɨt gɨbiimɨk sissapa kuruus ta'm. Ku gu' cham pai'x xi'ɨraam jum ɨlh ji nam pui' bax dhoodak, ni ku pai'x buam jum aa', na gu' pux bhai'x maat na alhio pɨx ya' xim tulhiiñai mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨx jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', pui' na jax xib na gu'x jɨkgɨm bhammɨ pɨx daa sonpan gu Dios kɨɨ'n dɨr ja'k.
58012003	Aapi'm pu'ñi ɨp jiñ jaaduñ, mi' pim pui'p xi chu daa'ñchu'nda' nat jɨ'k jax tu duu guch Xoi'kam nam pai' dhuuk tulhiiñchudimɨk gu ja'tkam jix u'ua'tulhdhix kam. Cham tu' na pim moo maa'n jimdam totdonɨi pu ja'k suulhgia' no'm jax ba xi jam doodak gu ja'tkam na pim ba kaichu' guch Xoi'kam, piam ku gu' na cham bhai' tu jam jim, gu' ja'pji na pim jix bhai' pɨx jum taat ka' ji.
58012004	Na gu' dhi' cham pɨk jir tu' no' pim tu' bhaan jum tulhiiñ, piam no'm pu'ñi jax ba xi jam doodak gu ja'tkam, no' mɨt gu' chakui jam koi na mɨt jax dhooda guch Xoi'kam.
58012005	Ba' aapi'm cham tu' dhi' bhaan kuu' jimmɨda' no' pimɨt ba jim tulhii, na gu' pai' jɨ' Dios pɨx jir jup dunii'ñ ka'. Tɨ'ñchokat japim gu ñio'ki'ñ mi' na pai'p jum kai'ch na saak ja tulhiiñchudat ja sɨlhka'nda' gui' nam jɨ'k moo tu' sɨlhkam ba kaichu', nam bar maamra'n, na ja'pnim kai'ch: Moop cham jix buam jum aa'nda' ni nap jix bhaam ka' no'm tulhiiñchudat jum sɨlhka'n gu Dios, piam kut jum ñiok no'p mi' pai' cham pu duiñchu' na jax jix aa', na gu' xim joi'ndat pɨx jup jum buada'. Cham tu' nap moo dhi' bhaan pu ja'k gɨxia'.
58012006	Na gu' gu Dios sɨlhka'nda' gu jax chu'm maraa'n no'x dha', tulhiiñchuda' ɨp no' cham mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa'.
58012007	Aapi'm pu'ñi ɨp jiñ jaaduñ, cha'pim jax jum aa'nda' no' pimɨt tu' bhaan ba jim tulhii, na gu' xi jam joi'ndat pɨx jup jam buada' gu Dios na pim jir maamra'n, na pim ba' pu'ñi duujir maa'n na pim jax jix biiñak kat buiñor mi' pui' bhɨichgɨda' na jax jix aa'. Na gu' dhi' ja'pni jia na jax ya ja'p gu ja'tkam, nam gu' ja gɨbdat ja sɨlhka'nda' gu ja maamar no'm buam pɨx tu bua.
58012008	Na gu' no' cham jam tulhiiñchudat jam sɨlhka'n gu Dios no' pim buam pɨx tu bua, dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na cham tu' maamra'n jam ɨlhii'ñ, na gu' na jɨ'k tu' sɨlhkam maamra'n ja ɨlhii'ñ, ja sɨlhka'nda' na jax ja'k jix aa'.
58012009	Ja'p na jax aach bɨjɨk nach jir a'aalh kat, nam gu'ch chulhiiñchudat jich xɨlhkadimɨk guch gɨ'kora', tu' ka'm ja nɨi'ñdhat ja kɇɇkɇ' ich ɨp ba' no'm jax jich chɨtda nach cham pu buada' gu tu'. Gu' gi ba' gu Dios nax io'm jir gɇ'kam nax dhaam jup tu'ii', ¿cham aa gu'x io'm jum aa' nach tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa'? Nach ba' gu' pu'ñi duuji bhammɨ aaya' gatuuk na pai'p tu'ii'.
58012010	Mi' pɨx jich xɨlhka'nda' jia gu Dios na ba'ch chulhiiñchu'nda' no'ch cham mi' pui' jiim na jax jix aa', nach ba' cham pɨk moo ja'p xi' pɨk xich ua'tulhi'ñdha'. Na gu' no' mi' pɨx xich ñɨi'ñ nach jich ua'tulhi'ñ, dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na cham jich joi'gɨ'n, na gu' cham bhai' tuch jimia' ba' gatuuk. Pui' ku ba' tɨich xɨlhka'nda' na xich joi'ndat, ja'p na jax aach nach jir a'aalh kat na mɨt gu'ch gɨɨ'bak jich xɨlhkadimɨk guch gɨ'kora' kat nam jax ja'k ɨlhii'ñ nach jix kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam bi'ya', na ba'x bhai' tuch jimia' nach jɨ'x juugɨt ya duduaka', nam pu'ñi xich joi'gɨ'nda'.
58012011	Maaxik dho gu' cham tu'r jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam gu tulhiiñara' no't jiñ a'm ba gɨi, na gu'x buam tu tatda' nañ jiñ chulhiiñdha'. Ku gu' mi' dhɨr no' ñich ba buus nañ xiñ chulhiiñaimɨi, ba machia' iñ ji na tu' cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios. Ba' mi' dhɨr dai nañ jix jɨkgɨm pɨx bap tui'ka', gio nañ cham tu'x buam ka tu buada' na tu' cham jir kɨɨ', nañ gu' ba too'nnia'.
58012012	Ba' aañ jam guguuxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ na pim jix io'm mui' xim biiñkada' buiñor gu Dios na ba' ja'p ji buusnia' na pim giop ba o'jo'nta', na gu' xib ja'p ji buusan na pimɨt ba momgo na pim tɨi jiimchu', pu'ñi duuji pim ba' giop o'jo'nta'.
58012013	Mui' pim ba' moo xi gaa'ñchu'nda' na pim jax ja'k jix bhai' mi' pui' jiimda' na jax pɨk ja'k jix aa' gu Dios na pim tui'ñgɨda'. Ja'p ji buusnia' na pim dai mi' bhɨichgɨda' na pai'x chɨ kɨɨ', na ba' gu jai' nam chakuix bhai'x biiñak ji jam tɨɨgɨi jix io'm soi'm ɨlhdhai mi' pui'p ba jimia' am na jax jix aa' gu Dios.
58012014	Jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp na pim joidham jix bhai' kai'chɨt jix jɨjɨkgɨm tu oi'ñka', cha'pim tu' kɨ'n jum kokdat, gu' dai ji na pim soi'm ɨlhdhat mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jir am. Cha'pim kam ua'tulhi'ñdha', na gu' gu jaroi' no' daim ua'tulhi'ñ, cham jɨ'xdha' aaya' bhammɨ buiñor gu Dios.
58012015	Jam aagi'ñ iñ mooñ jaaduñ na pim siamri bɨɨx tu' ka'm xi ñɨidhat gu Dios. Na gu' no' pim jai' dhɨt am ɨrdat oipo, cham tu' bhai' tu jam jimia' gatuuk. Ni ku cham tu'r am na pim jai' dhɨt tu' bhaan ba ji ja ko'kdhichdha' gu jai', nam gu' mi' dhɨr ba' bɨɨx bhai' jim kooda' na jɨ'k guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham. Ba' ja'p ji buusnia' gui' na tu ko'kdhichdha' na jax gu jax chu'm ɨ'ɨɨx nax maimdagɨm tɇ bhɇɇ na ja maikkutu'n gu ja'tkam no' mɨt xi juu.
58012016	Gio jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp na pim cham jai' dhɨt ja bɨɨm boppoda' gu jai' u'uub no' pim cham maap tɨɨmui'x. Ni ku pim cham tu' mɨk bua' ji tu' pɨx ba ɨlhii'ñdha' gu Dios nat tɨi xi jam joi'ndak tu jam uañ gu jam ua'tulhdhara'. Pui' dhom duu ji gui' na Esauu tɨɨgich bɨjɨk, na pu'ñi moo gampai' pɨx tɨ ɨlhii'ñdha'. Tɨɨ' nat ga'ra nar bɨɨpɨ' kam kat, maa'n jooxia' gu bhab gisaar jamɨt pɨx xi maa, ja'p ji buus ba' nar gatuuk kam pɨx ba'.
58012017	Ba' gatuuk na tɨi ba chian gu taata'n na tu daañxidha' nax bhai' tu jimia', nap jum aa' na gui' bhaan bipio' nar bɨɨpɨ' kam na jax tu daaxix, cham tu' tu daañxi gu taata'n, nat gu' pu bɨɨpɨ' dɨr ba maa gu sɨpdhi'ñ na saak gui' ja'p ji buusnia' nar bɨɨpɨ' kam ka'. Ba' tɨi ma susua ja'p io'm pa', cham jɨ'xdha' bhaan ka bii gui' na a'miram bipio'dat nar bɨɨpɨ' kam, nat gu' ga'ra, ja'ppɨx ba ji buusan gu' nar gatuuk kam.
58012018	Aapi'm chi gu' cham pai' dhuuk pu chu'm tɨ tɨɨgɨk ji na mɨt jax tɨ tɨɨgɨk guch bopxi kat bhammɨ gɇ' oidha' ta'm na pai' Sinaii tɨ tɨɨ', jano' nat maaxik bha ɇɇk gu Dios. Giilhim ɨɨbhidham ji nat tum duu jano', bhai' ji gi'ndukɨ gu oidha', gio nat giilhim jix chukgam jup tum duu, gio gu tai na pɨx nammɨ kɨkka bhai' na jɨ'x jir oidha' ta'm.
58012019	Gio nat gɇ' kɨ'n bhai' ji chum kuich, pɨx am joiñchu'n gu dɨbɨɨr, nat ba' mi' dhɨr bhai' ba tu ja a'gi gu Dios guch bopxi kat na jax ja'k tu daaxix ka' ja bui. Ba' guch bopxi kat jix chotdonɨt tɨip kai'ch am na ja'xbui' pɨx tu a'ga' gu Dios,
58012020	nam gu'x maat na cham jɨ'xdha' jaroi' nakga' na jɨ'k jax kai'ch, nam gu'x ɨɨbhidhat kɇɇ nap kai'ch: “Pu maa'n jimdam japim moo mu'aa' ma'yasimɨi joodai kɨ'n piam kuxiir kɨ'n gu jaroi' no't gan yammɨ tɨs oidha' ta'm nañ pai'p tu'ii', sia gu jax chu'm soi'.”
58012021	Giilhim ji nax ɨɨbhidham tum bua jano', cham tu' pui' pɨx. Sia gu Moisees tɨix choodon na bhammɨp tu'ii' oidha' kuu am, jup kai'ch: “Giilhim jañ jix io'm gi'bok nañ jix choodon.”
58012022	Aapi'm gu' ba jam kupio'kdhix ji bhammɨx dhaam na pai' joidham jix a'bhar gu ba'bhak na pai'p tu'ii' guch Gɨ'kora' na gammɨjɨ pur Dios, na pim ba' jiimɨt aaya' bhammɨ na pim pai' iimchudhix na pim saak oi'ñcha', bhammɨ na pai' ja'p ji buusan nar xibkam gɇ' kiicham na Jerusaleen tɨ tɨɨ', nam mui' bhai'p tu'ii' gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam gammɨjɨ gɇ'kamtu'n. Cham tu' kax chɨ ɨɨbhidhara' ka' nach pai' dhuuk bhammɨ aaya' buiñor, cham pui' na jax jano' nat bha ɇɇk Sinaii.
58012023	Jai' dhɨt jam bhammɨ bap tu'ii' xib buiñor gu Dios na mɨt jɨ'k tu' sɨlhkam mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa' ja'p na maamra'n, nat jɨ'k pu ja dai nam pu'ñi bhammɨ aaya' buiñor. Ba' aapi'm pu'ñi xib jiñ jaaduñ, cham xiim japim bhammɨp ji bubuakia', na pim gu' aapi'm mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios gui' na ja aagi'ñdha' gatuuk gu ja'tkam nam tu' jax buimɨi nam duduakat ja tutku' bhaan, nat gu' ba tu jam uañ bɨɨx dappaam gu jam ua'tulhdhara',
58012024	jano' dɨr pɨx nat guch Xoi'kam ya' ɇɇk maakam tu dai na tu aagix ka', nat guch a'mkam muu, na ba' pu'ñi duuji bɨɨx tuch uañdhix ka' guch ua'tulhdhara'. Nat gu' pu kai'ñkam pɨx jaax gu ɨ'ra'n bhaan gu kuruus na ba' dhi' kɨ'n pu'ñi tuch uañdhix ka', cham tu' na ja'p pɨx na jax bɨjɨk gui' na Abeel tɨɨgich nat pui' tɨi gɇ'p jaax gu ɨ'ra'n na mɨt pai' dhuuk mua.
58012025	Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ, mi' pim pui' xi jiimɨt na jax jam tɨɨdaidha' gu Dios, cha'pim gampai' pɨx ɨlhii'ñdha'. Na gu' no' pim gampai' pɨx ɨlhii'ñ jax no' tɨi jam tɨtda, jam tulhiiñchuda' ja'p nat jax ja dooda bɨjɨk guch bopxi kat nat pu maa'n jimdam ja tulhiiñchuda gui' na mɨt jɨ'k cham tu' ka'm tɨɨ nat jax tɨi ja tɨɨ'n. Aach pu'ñip tuch dhooda' no'ch am ɨrdat oipo no' tɨich a'gi'ñ nach jax ja'k tui'ñgɨda'.
58012026	Jano' nat maaxik tu ja a'gidhak gu Dios guch bopxi kat bhammɨ Sinaii, jix io'm gi'ndukɨ gu dɨbɨɨr nat jɨ'x mɨɨkim tu a'ga. Ba' dhi' cham xiim jum aaya' na pai' dhuuk giop joiñchuda' gu dɨbɨɨr, pui' tu ua'ñix gu ñio'ki'ñ, jup jum kai'ch: “Maa'nnim jañ pɨx ba joiñchuda' dhi oi'ñga'n, bɨɨx sia dhi' na tu' bha'ñi ja'p jix maax jix dhaam.”
58012027	Ba' gu dhi' pui' na kai'ch na pui' maa'nnim pɨx ba joiñchuda' dhi oi'ñga'n, ja'p kai'ñkam jup kai'ch na bɨɨx tu kuugalhdha' nat jɨ'k tu'p tu duu, na cham tu' bhai', na pu'ñi ampɨx tu gi'ndukda', na ba' mi' dhɨr dai gui' pɨx bax chu jai'ch ka' na cham jax jum bua, ni ku pai' joiñdha'.
58012028	Jix dhaam ja'k kat jup jum kai'ch dhi' na pai'p tu'ii' gu Dios, bhammɨ ja'k dho gi cham pai' dhuuk joñia' ji gu oi'ñga'n no't bhammɨ bach aich gu Dios. Na gu' gui'x io'm jir jix kɨɨ' ka', cham tu' pui' na dhi' nach bhaan oi'dha' xib. Pui' kuch ba' gammɨjɨx bhai'ch chaatɨt mui' xi dhaañchu'nda' bhammɨ ja'k na pai'p tu'ii' tu' ka'm nɨidhat. Gammɨjɨ nach mu gɇ'kamtu'nda' cham oodat na jax ja'k jix aa', na ba'ch baidhika'.
58012029	Na gu' no' chich jax dhuuk cham tu' ka'm tɨɨ, am tɨ'ñchoka' ich nax io'm jich chulhiiñchuda', na gu' gui' ja'p ji buusan na gu tai gui' nax io'm jix choiñ na tu' na pɨx ja'ngichu'n.
58013001	Jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp jiñ jaaduñ na pim joidham jix bhai' kai'chɨt xim jajoi'gɨ'nda' na jax ja'k jum aa' no'ch tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Cha'pim tu' bhaan jum bhabhaakuidha' ni na pim jum kokdada', gu' ja'pji na pim joidham jir jix bhabhai'kam ka' ji pɨx.
58013002	Gio no'm jam paxiaraim gu ja'tkam, joidham japim jix bhai' ja tɨɨdai ja aichdhai ja tɨbiaptuda' jix bhai'm taatɨt, cham tu'x oodam. Jai' dhɨt gu bɨjɨk dɨr kam nam pu'ñi joidham jir jix bhabhai'kam kat, gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios jamɨt ja tɨbiaptudak nam cham pum aa', na gu' pu'ñi jaroi' nam pɨx tɨbiaptudidha'. Aapi'm pu'ñi ɨp jiñ jaaduñ, cham maatɨ' ka' gu' nar tu'p tu'm da' ka' gui' na mi' jam paxiaraidha'.
58013003	Jix ja joi'ndat japim soi' pɨx jum ɨlhii'ñdha' ja a'mkam guch jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan nam jum tulhiiñ mu nam kuup, panaas ku pim moo aapi'm bɨɨx mup kuupka' ja bɨɨm. Sia gui' nam ja'p pɨx ja tulhiiñchu'n japim pui' soi'p jum ɨlhii'ñdha' ja a'mkam, panaas kum moo aapi'm bɨɨx jup jam tulhiiñchu'nda', na pim ba' gu' cham jax ɨlhii'ñdha' no' mɨt pui' bhai'p ji jam dooda ja'xpɨx.
58013004	Gio ba' jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp na pim cham jir ganai' pɨx ka'. Cha'pim jai'x bhai' ja tɨtdadat ja bɨɨm boppoda' gu u'uub, dai ji gui' na pim maap tɨɨmui'x na jax tu daaxix. Na gu' pui' pɨx jam tɨɨda' gu Dios jano' na pai' dhuuk tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n na pim jix u'ua'tulhdhix no' pim pu'ñi jai'x bhai' ja tɨtda gu u'uub. Ba' pui' xi jam tɨɨdai mu ja'k xi chu chiñia' nam jam iabu' na pim pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup mɨɨjidha'.
58013005	Jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp jiñ jaaduñ na pim cham tu' bhaan jum tutkagi'ñka' gu tuumiñ ni ku pim jix aa'nda' na pim mui' bia'ka'. Dhi' kɨ'n japim jix bhai'm taat ka' jɨ'k na pim bia'ka'. Dios dɨɨlh jix maat na pai' dhɨr tu jam maakidha' gu tu' na jam a'm jum aagaidha' no' pim cham ka bia', na gu'p jum kai'ch gu ñio'ki'ñ mi' u'uan ta'm na tu ua'ñix: “Aañ gammɨjɨm a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jum palhbui'ñchu'nda' kɨ'n gu tu' nam a'm jum aagaidha'. Cham jɨ'xdha' pai' dhuuk dɨɨlh jum bua' iñ.”
58013006	Jaiñ na gu' jax pɨk joidham kai'ch gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora', ja'pji dai nach buiñor jix biiñak kat pɨx tɨ'ñchoka' mi' ja'k na pai' ja'pnip tu ua'ñix gu ñio'ki'ñ: Cham jañ pai' dhuuk tu' bhaan jix choodon ka', na gu' cham jɨ'xkat jaroi' jax jiñ dhooda', na gu' gu Dios gammɨjɨ xiñ joi'ndat jiñ a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jiñ palhbui'ñchu' tu' na pɨx bhaan.
58013007	Gammɨjɨ pim tɨ'ñchokat mi' pui' xi chu daa'ñchu'nda' na mɨt jax tu jii gui' na mɨt ya ja'p tuch a'gi gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, nam joidham bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat jix biiñak kat buiñor.
58013008	Guch Xoi'kam bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch, cham pai' dhuuk jum pataas. Gio ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ pux jai'ch ka', cham pai' dhuuk jum pataasa'.
58013009	Pui' ku pim ba' dai gui' pɨx buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat jix biiñak ka' gammɨjɨ. Cha'pim tu'p jum buixdhat na jɨ'k jax tu daaxix gu ya' maaxik, pui' na jax gu koi' na jax chu'm jir jum kua'dam gio na jax chu'm cham. Na gu' dhi' cham jɨ'xkat tu' kɨ'n jich palhbuidha' sia kuch tɨi mi' pui' tu daa'ñchu' na jax tu daaxix. Ja'pji dhi' nax io'm jum aa' nach mi' pui' xi chu kuugalhdhidha' nat jax tu daasak guch Xoi'kam, nach ba' bhammɨ aaya' jix dhaam buiñor gu Dios.
58013010	Na gu' guch Xoi'kam pui' ji buusan na jax gu xibkam sasoi' mɨmɨi'ñkar, cham tu' pui' na jax gu bajɨk kam na jax chu'm jai'ch mi' nam pai' tu juan gui' nam tu ja daañxi'ñdha' gu Israel kam ja'tkam. Dai pɨx nam aa' nach buiñor jix biiñak ka', na ba' pui' ji buusanda' nach tu makgɨrxi'ñ gu Dios.
58013011	Piam pui' na jax gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' nam bhai' gɇ' chiop tu juanda' nam tu ja daañxi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam, na baxbhat gu ja ɨ'ɨɨr gu sasoi' mummu kɨ'n tu jupsusda' na pai'x io'm jix chu xidhuu ka', na ba' dhi' kɨ'n tu ja uañi'ñka' gu Dios gu ja ua'tulhdhara' gu ja'tkam. Gu ja bakxi'm ba' mɨk ja'k ja u'tɨkat ja mɨmɨi'ñdha', na pai'r gampɨx na cham jaroi' oirɨ.
58013012	Ba' jano' nat ya' ɇɇk guch Xoi'kam pu'ñip jum duu, dɨɨrap dɨr gu gɇ' kiicham jamɨt baidhak tulhiiñchudimɨk mua, gu ɨ'ra'n nat jaax kɨ'n ja uañchuda bɨɨx dappaam gu ja ua'tulhdhara' gu ja'tkam.
58013013	Aach ba' xib pui' cham jax jup jich aa'nda' sia ku mɨt pui' bhai'p jich chulhiiñchuda' na mɨt jax dhooda guch Xoi'kam, jix bhai'ch pɨx jix chaat ka', dai ji nach jix io'm mui' xix biiñak ka' pɨx buiñor, ja'p jach xi dhui bɨɨx na jɨ'k tuch chukgi'ñ ya' dhi oi'ñga'n,
58013014	nach ba' aaya'x dhaam nach pai' gammɨjɨ bhai' pu ba oi'ñka'. Na gu' ya' nach pai' oi'dha' xib cham tu' gammɨjɨ ya' pu oi'ñka' ich, pui' kuch ba' tɨi gaa'ñchu' xib dɨr nach jax dhui ja'p iam oi'ñcha' nach pai' gammɨjɨ bhai' pu ba oi'ñka'.
58013015	Ba' aañ jam guguuxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ nach gammɨjɨ mu daañchu'nda' guch Gɨ'kora' jix dhaam, gam nach taxchaabgi'ñdha' nat jix bhai' ba duu nat bha joot guch Xoi'kam na pu'ñi ya' tuch ñamkixdha' guch ua'tulhdhara', ja'p ji buusanda' nach mu tu makgɨrxi'ñdha' gui' na kɨ'n tuch uañi'ñka' guch ua'tulhdhara'.
58013016	Jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ɨp na pim cham mɨk buppat jix bhai'm duukam xip tu buada' bhaankamu'n gu Dios, gam na pim jix ja joi'ndat xi chu ja maakat gu jai' gu tu' no' ja a'm jum aagaidha', na gu' dhi' pu'ñi ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, ja'p ji buusanda' na pim tu makgɨrxi'ñdha'.
58013017	Gio gui' nam bɨɨpɨ' dɨr gu'kat jam aagi'ñ gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios japim siamri tu' ka'm jup xi ja nɨidhat, cha'pim gampai' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñdha'. Na gu' ja'p ji buusan nam gui' gammɨjɨ jam nuuka'n na cham tu' jam duñia', nam gu' gammɨjɨ tu jam daañxi'ñdha' buiñor gu Dios na jam nuuka'nda'. Gu Dios dɨɨlh pu chu'm kɨ'n ja darai nam pu'ñi jam nuuka'nda' gu jam i'ii'mda' bhaan, na ba' no't ba tum kuugalh ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, joidham jix bhai'm taatɨt pu tɨ'ya' am na pimɨt jix bhai' tu jii bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n. Jix bhai'm duukam japim xip tu buada', nam ba'x bhai'm taatɨt gammɨjɨ bɨɨpɨ' dɨr gu'kat jam aagi'ñdha' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios. Na gu' no' pim buam pɨx tu bua na tu'r jix buam jum duukam, jix buam jum aa'nda' am, na gu'x xijai ka' nam jix bhai' jam tuttu' na jax ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios.
58013018	Bhai' pim xi chuch dhaañxi'ñdha'ñ jaaduñ, nach ba' gammɨjɨx bhai' tu a'gada' dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios. Jix aa' ich nach jix bhai' mi' pui' tu kuugalhdhidha' na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora'.
58013019	Gio jam taan iñ ɨp na pim pui' ja'k tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios nañ palhbuidha' nañ jax dhui jootom gio mui'p jam paxiarmɨra' mu ja'p na pim jax tu oi'dha' nañ mu jam tɨɨ'mɨra'.
58013020	Ba' gu Gɇ'kam Dios gui' nat dua'ñdhak giop bamii' guch Xoi'kam mu dɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr, gui' na xib pui' ji buusan nar jix kɨɨ' bipia'dam, xi jam joi'ndat tu jam uañi'ñka' gu jam ua'tulhdhara' kɨ'n gu ɨ'ra'n nat jaax,
58013021	gam nax kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam jup jam duñia' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, na pim ba' gammɨjɨx biiñak kat mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa'. Gu Dios ba' dɨɨlh jix maat mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k na tu' jax dhuñia' jam bui na pim ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Gammɨjɨch ba' moo gɇ'kamtu'nda'. Ja'pni pɨx tui'ka'.
58013022	Ba' jam guguuxi'ñ iñ jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim cham oodat xi chu jiñkuidhai dhi' na ñich mui' ba tu jam ua'ñxi, na gu' cham pɨk moo ja'p jup jir gɇ', palhɨɨp ji, nañ jɨ'x pɨx bhaan jam guguuxi'ñ na pim jax ja'k gammɨjɨx biiñak ka' buiñor guch Gɨ'kora'.
58013023	Gio ba' xi jam aa'ñdham iñ ɨp nat kia'pɨx ba buus na kuupich gu Timoteo nar jich jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan. Ba' pui' tɨi ɨlhii'ñ iñ no't jootom ya' ai nach maap mu jiim nach mu jam paxiarpu' mu ja'p na pim pai' tu oi'dha'.
58013024	Mɨjɨ ja ñio'ki'ñ iñ guñ jaaduñ nam bɨɨpɨ' dɨr gu'kat jam aagi'ñ gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, gio gui' nam jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam no'm jix bhai'm ɨlhii'ñ. Aañ ya ja'p siamri jix bhai'ñ ɨlhii'ñ ji sia gu palhɨɨp. Gu ya' kam Itaalia guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham mɨjɨp xi jam ñio'ki'ñ am no' pim sap jix bhai'm ɨlhii'ñ.
58013025	Ja'pni pɨx ba' moo tui'ka' ku ba' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' pɨx gammɨjɨ xi jam joi'ndat jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n.
59001001	Aañ Santiago nañ jir tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' gio gu Jesuus jich Xoi'kam jañ ya' dɨr mu jam ñio'ki'ñ jiñ jaaduñ na pim mummu ja'p oi'dha' mui' kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, na pim jir ja bopxi gu mambhɨɨx gook gu maamra'n gu Jakob, na pim tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
59001002	Aañ ya' dɨr mu jam guguuxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai' pɨx jum taat ka' no't tu'x buam jum duukam jam a'm ba ji chu jii na panaas ku cham nakgam tu tatda'. Xi ñakoo'nda' pim,
59001003	na gu' no' pim pu'ñir maa'n na pim jax jix biiñak buiñor guch Gɨ'kora', sia ku pim bɨxchu' bhaan jum tulhiiñ, pui' ba machia' pim. Mi' dhɨr cham tu' jax ka ɨlhii'ñdha' pim sia tu'x buam jum duukam jam a'm jimiim, panaas ku pim moo pu cham tu'm tulhiiñdha', na pim gu' pui' ja'k ba kaapaka'.
59001004	Dai ji na pim gu'x bhai' xim ga'ngidhat mi' pui' duiñchu'nda' na jax moox kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ guch Gɨ'kora', dhi' pim bhaan ba' pu'ñi mui' xim otdatgɨda' cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt. Dhi' ba' bhaan bax maatɨ' ka' na pim sɨlhkam jix biiñak buiñor gu Dios, mi' dhɨr ba'x io'm bhai' ji machia' pim na jax ja'k jix aa' gui' na pim tui'ñgɨda'.
59001005	Ba' no' pim gu' jai' dhɨt aapi'm jix bhai'x maachik na jax pɨk ja'k moox aa' gu Dios na pim tui'ñgɨda', soi'm ɨlhdhai pim mui' xi chañia' gu Dios. Gui' jam makia' maa'n jimdam gu matda' cham jax ji chɨ'ji, gɇ' cham daaxix kam, na pim ba' mi' dhɨr kɨ'n bhai' ji machia' pu'ñi na jax pɨk ja'k jix aa' na pim tui'ñgɨda'.
59001006	Dai ji na gu'm aa' na pim bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak kat pu tɨɨda' na pim ba ɨlhii'ñdha' na pui' ji chu buusnia', bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n na pim tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' na sɨlhkam jam makia' gu Dios na pim pai' dhuuk mu tañia'. Na gu' no' pim aapi'm pɨx bap xi chɨtda pu cham ji chɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n na pui' ji chu buusnia', cham tu' jam makia' gu Dios gu matda'. Na gu' no' pim pu'ñi cham bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na pui' ji chu buusnia' na pim jax ɨlhii'ñdha', ja'p pɨx ba ji bubuakia' pim na jax gu suudai' na gu'ngukidhat mu ja'k jup jimda' pai' na ja'k bhɨɨda' gu jɨbɨɨlh, ja'p ja'k gio ja'p ja'k.
59001007	Ba' gu jaroi' no' pu'ñi ja'k pɨx jir tu'm, cham jɨ'xdha' makia' gu matda' guch Gɨ'kora', sia ku tɨix maachim na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios,
59001008	na gu'x mat ka' na cham tu'x biiñak kat jup tɨtdada', pɨx bap na tɨi xi chaanda'. Ni ku cham tu' gammɨjɨ nabap tanoolh pu chu'm bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka', na gu' buimgidhak maakam tu'm bhaan jup ba tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka', gio buimgidhak maakam ɨp. Mɨkkat mi' pu cham ka tɨ'ñchoka' na pɨn tu' ka taanɨt gu Dios, pu cham tu' kap jum buixdha'.
59001009	Ba' gu jax chu'm jiñ jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan no' gampai' pɨx tu'ii' na cham tu' bia', jix bhai' pɨx jum taat ka' buiñor gu Dios, na gu' bhammɨ dɨr bha ja'k jix chumñigam ɨlhii'ñdha' gu Dios, na gu' bhaan tɨ nɨi'ñdha'.
59001010	Gu' ba' gu jax chu'm jiñ jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan no'r jix chumñigam, gu' ji no't gu' nai' ji chu juu gu tu' na bia'kat, jix bhai' pɨx jum taat ka' ɨp sia buiñor gu Dios, na gu' gu Dios pui' na jax bhaan ba tɨ nɨidhidha', pui' na jax bar jix chumñigam ka' buiñor, sia ku gu' ya' gu maaxik bhaan pui' ji bii. Gio na gu' cham tu' gammɨjɨ ya' pur jix chumñigam ka' gu jaroi' no'r jix chumñigam. Ja'p pɨx ji buusan jia na jax gu yooxi' na alhio pɨx mu pai' yoota', ni jɨ'x ku iam moo gammɨjɨ mi' pu yootda'.
59001011	Na gu' no't jix io'm bhai' xi chon, bhaatai pu nai' ji gakia' bɨɨx bɨnkam gu toona'n, jix gak mi ja'p pup katka', mi' pu dɨbai cham pai' ka matgilhia'. Pu'ñi ɨp gui' nam jir jix chutumñigam, jotmoda' pɨx cham pai' matgilhia' no't tu' ma duu, gio gu' pu nix chu' ɨp ku bhɨika'.
59001012	Ja'p moo joidham jix bhai' ba tu jimia' gu jaroi' no' xi ñakgat gammɨjɨ pux biiñak buiñor gu Dios, sia kut giilhim bɨɨx aixim jix buam jum duukam bhai' a'miram ji chu jii, na gu' gatuuk na pu'ñi xim tulhiiñaimɨi, mi' dhɨr dai na ba baidhika' guch Xoi'kam jix dhaam ja'k na pai' gammɨjɨ jix jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', na joidham jix chu abhaar. Ba' pui' ji buusnia' na ba mai'chia' gu kuruun na joidham jix abhaar nax dha'ram namɨɨk, gui' nat jax chu'm ja iimchuda guch Xoi'kam na saak ja makia' gui' nam jɨ'k pu'ñi mi' pui' jimia' na jax jix aa'.
59001013	Gu' ba' gu jaroi' no' ampɨx pui'x buam jix chu duñiim na jax ja'k cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, cham tu' jax jum aa'nda' na gu Dios pui' ja'k jurtu'n ku ba' pui' tu tatda'. Jax dhui na gu Dios cham jɨ'xdha' pui' ja'k jurtu'nda' gu jaroi' nax buam tu duñia', na gu' cham tu'x buam jum duukam a'miram dɨr busaak.
59001014	Ja'pji dɨɨlh jura'ram dɨr na buusnia' gu jaroi' na pu'ñi bɨɨx aixim bam aa'nda', na mi' ba ji kaaya' na jax ja'k jurtu'nka' gux buam jum duukam na ba'x buam bax chu duñiim ka' na jax ja'k cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios.
59001015	Mi' ba' na pu'ñi xim aagaimɨi, dho gu' dai na pui' ba duñia' dho na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, ba' dai na bam ua'tulhdha'. Mi' dhɨr ba' no't cham soi' kam ɨlh buiñor gu Dios na tu uañdha', muuki' chɨr bap tui'ñgɨda' gu ii'mdagaram bhaan, na gu' gatuuk dai na ba tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios.
59001016	Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, cha'pim pui' ja'k kam aa'nda' na gu Dios pui' ja'k jam jurtu'nka' na pim ba' pu'ñi buam pɨx jix chu duñiim ka' na jax ja'k cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gui'.
59001017	Jax dhui na gu Dios cham tu' a'miram dɨr busaak gu tu' nar jix buam jum duukam, dai ji gui' na jɨ'k tu'r jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam. Bɨɨx gui' na jɨ'k tu'ch a'm jimiim nar jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam, Dios jir jup dunii'ñ, gui' nax dhaam jup tu'ii' nat jaroi'p duu dhi chiichia' na bha'ñi ja'p daraa jix dhaam gio dhi tanoolh na bɨɨx kap tu toonni'ñ. Gu Dios gammɨjɨ pur Dios jia, cham pai' dhuuk maakam jup bar tu'm, pu maa'n na jax pɨx jir tu'm na jax bar tu'm.
59001018	Ba' xich joi'ndat tɨi xich baidhikam jix dhaam na pai'p tu'ii' nach pai' gammɨjɨ jix jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', dai sap nach mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ. Joidham jix bhai'ch chɨɨdai jich aichdha'x dhaam dai aach nach jɨ'k mi' pui' jimia'.
59001019	Ja'pniñ ba' moo tɨip xi jam tɨɨdam jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, na pim siamri xi ñakgat no' jaroi' giilhim jam tɨtda na jax cham jir am. Cha'pim juanda', xi kɇɇkɇ' pim pɨx sia ku jax kai'ch.
59001020	Cham tu' na pim moo maa'n jimdam bhaakui giilhim mui'p tɨɨda' ya' dɨr mu ja'k, na gu' dhi' pu'ñi ja'k cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios.
59001021	Gu ja'pji na pim soi'm ɨlhdhat mi' pui' xi jiimda' ji na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, gui' na bhaan jich aagi'ñ na jax ja'k jix bhaai' nach duñia' nach ba' cham jich chulhiiña' gatuuk, na pim gu' bax maat. Ja'p japim xi dhui bɨɨx na jɨ'k tu'r jix buam jum duukam na ya' dhi oi'ñga'n jix chu jai'ch na pim ba' cham dhi' bhaan jum ua'tulhi'ñdha'.
59001022	Ku gu' dhi'm aa' ji na pim tu' sɨlhkam mi' pui' xi dhuiñchu'nda' na jɨ'k moo jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, cham tu' daipu' na pim jix mat ka' pɨx. Na gu'r ba pui' pɨx ɨp sia pim tɨix maat no' pim gu' cham pu bua na jax jum kai'ch, dɨɨlh japim ua'tulhdhara' tɨr jum iabuda', na pim gu' cham am buatgɨda'.
59001023	Na gu' gu jaroi' no' tɨix maat na jax ja'k jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, gu' ji no' gu' cham pu bua, dhi' ja'pni pɨx ba ji buusan na jax gu jaroi' no'm nɨnɨi'ñ nax maachim na jax moo tu'm ba tɨ nɨi'ñ, piam no' cham jix ja'kkulhi'.
59001024	Ba' dai mi' na ka tɨ'ñchoka' na kam nɨnɨi'ñdha', mi' dhɨr na ja'p tɨ tɨgia', pu cham tu' ka tɨ'ñchoka' na pɨn jax chu'm tɨ nɨi'ñ. Pu'ñi ɨp ba' dhi'.
59001025	Gu' ba' gu jaroi' no' kɇɇkɇt gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios mi' pui' xi dhuiñchu' na jɨ'k jax jum kai'ch na bhaan jich aagi'ñ nach jax ja'k dui cham kach chulhiiña', dhi' dho gi gu' joidham jix jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka' ji gio nax bhai' ji chu buusnidha' na jɨ'k tu' jax buada', na gu' joidham bhaan tɨ nɨidhidhat palhbui'ñchu'nda' gu Dios.
59001026	Ba' gu jaroi' no' mi' pui' tɨi xi jim na jax moo tu aagix gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gu' ji no' gu' buam pɨx tu ñiok na jax cham jir am na cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, pur cham tu' ka', sia ku gu' tɨi pui'm aa' na mi' pui' bhɨichu' na jax tu aagix, jir ja'p pɨx ka' ba' na pui'm tɨɨtɨ'nda' nar jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham, na gu' giilhim tu ñiokda'.
59001027	Gu' dhi' matgam no'ñ tu' sɨlhkam mi' pui' ba bhɨichu' na jax tu aagix gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios nañ ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, cham tu' ji nañ kañ ua'tulhi'ñdha' kɨ'n gu tu' ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n, pui' na jax nañ jix buam tu ñiokda' gam nañ giilhim ja tɨtdada' gu ja'tkam, gu' ja'pji nañ jix ja joi'gɨ'nda' ji gio nañ ja palhbui'ñdha' gu a'aalh nam alh jir dɨ'dɨr koi', gio gu dɨ'dɨlhdhɨm u'uub nañ xi ja maakidhat gu tu' na ja a'm jum aagaidha'.
59002001	Ja'pni ja'k jañ ba' moo tɨip kai'chɨt jiñ jaaduñ na pim ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam, na pim cham tu' jɨ'k pɨx jix ja joi'ndat jix bhai' ja buada' gu ja'tkam, jai' ba' tu' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñdha' pim.
59002002	Pui' na jax mu pai' no' pim jum jumpa'n na pim tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios, no't gu' maa'n mi' ba ai gu maa'nkam jix chumñigam na bɨxchu' bapaiñum jix u'uam totbikdam xi chu baapsatu' noonbiram, gio nax kɨkɨɨ' xi chɨ tɨi'chu' jix dha'ram namkɨm, ba' aapi'm pɨx jix bhai' tɨtdak jax chɨtda: “Jam jɨɨp jiñ jaduuñ ya'ni ja'k dhix kɨɨ' atooxkor ta'm.” Gu' ba' no't gu' ja'x dhɨr mi'p ba ai jumai gu maa'nkam na alh gampai' pɨx chu'm nax xaasak tɨ tɨi'chu' giox ɨ'k suuskam, ba' aapi'm jax chɨtda pɨx: “Aap baasɨ'n jap pɨx ka kɨɨka' soosna'n, piam kup mi ja'p xi dhaibu' dɨɨrap no'p jix oo'n nap kɨɨk.”
59002004	Dhi' jɨ' no' pim pu'ñi ja'k pɨx tu bua pui' bam kai'ch na pim jɨ'k pɨx jix ja kɨɨgalhdhat jix bhai' ja bua gu ja'tkam, jai' ba' cham. Dhi' cham tu'r am gu pui' ja'k. Bɨɨx ji sia nar jaroi' na pim jix bhai' ja buada'.
59002005	Dho gu' dhi' ji ba' pɨk jix io'm jix ja joi'ndat ja a'm tɨ nɨi'ñ gu Dios gui' nam alh gampai' tu'ii' nam cham tu' bia', nam gu' gammɨjɨ pɨx soi'm ɨlhii'ñdha' buiñor. ¿Tu'm gi bhaan gɇ'gɇrkam jum ɨlhii'ñdha'? Dai nam jix io'm jix biiñak ka' pɨx buiñor gu Dios. Dhi' ji ba' pɨk ja baidhika' jix dhaam ja'k nat pai' ja'k ja iimchuda na saak ja aichdha' gui' nam jɨ'k mi' pui' jimia' na jax jix aa'.
59002006	Gu' ji na gu' aapi'm dhi' ba' pɨk tu' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñdha', gampai' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñ japim na pim ja nɨi'ñ nam alh cham tu' bia', dai gux chutumñigam na pim ba'x ja kɨɨgalhdhat jix bhai' ja buada'. Gu' dhi' jim ba' pɨk tu xi bua no' mɨt bach o'bhai', jich ui'ka' am dho buiñor gu gɇ'kam nam jich chulhiiñchuda' no' chich palhɨɨp am cham am bua mi' pai'.
59002007	Gio nam gu' dhi' ba' pɨk cham kɨɨgalhi'ñ gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na tɨi tum a'ga, tu' pɨx ɨlhii'ñ am gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam gui' nach jaroi' buiñor ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ.
59002008	Gu' dhi'm aa' ji na pim mi' pui' xi chu daa'ñchu'nda' na jax jum kai'ch mi' pai' u'uan ta'm na tu daaxix gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios nap jum kai'ch: “Jix ja joi'ndat jap jix bhai' ja buada' gu ja'tkam sia jaroi' na pɨx, ja'p nap jax xim joi'ndat jix bhai' buada' aap dɨɨlh.” Dhi' jɨ' no' pim pu'ñi ja'k duiñchu' na pim ba' bhaan pui' ba ɨlhii'ñdha' na pim mi' pui' bhɨichu' na jax jum kai'ch gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios.
59002009	Gu' ji no' pim gu' pu'ñi jɨ'k pɨx jix ja kɨɨgalhi'ñdhat jix bhai' ja bua gu ja'tkam, jai' ba' tu' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñ japim, cham tu' mi' pui' duiñchu'nda' pim na jax ja'k tu daaxix gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios. Ba' dhi' bhaan bam ua'tulhdha' pim, na gu' dai na pim dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñdha' pɨx na pim pu tu buada', cham tu' na jax jix aa' gu Dios.
59002010	Gu ba' no' pim bɨɨx mi' pui' tɨi ka duiñchu' na jɨ'k jax tu daaxix gu ñio'ki'ñ, gu' ji no' pimɨt gu' mi' pai' maa'n kap am cham am xi bua, mi' pimɨt dho bam ua'tulh gɇ'kam kɨ'n, ja'p ji buusnia' na pim moo pu bɨɨx cham am bua' na jɨ'k jax tu daaxix gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, sia ku pimɨt gu' maa'n kap pɨx tɨi cham am bua.
59002011	Pui' na jax mi' pai' maa'n kap nap jum kai'ch gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios: “Cha'p bɨɨma'n boppoda' gu ubii no'p cham dhi' bɨɨma'n tɨɨmui'x”, gio jumai kap nap jum kai'ch: “Cha'p ja koo'nda' gu ja'tkam.” Ba' no' gu' gu jaroi' tɨi cham tu' bɨɨma'n boppo gu jumai ubii na cham tu' bɨɨma'n tɨɨmui'x, gu' ji no't gu' maa'n ma mua gu maa'nkam, dhi' dho kɨ'n gɇ'kam kɨ'n bam ua'tulh, ja'p ji buusnia' na pu bɨɨx cham am bua' na jɨ'k jax tu daaxix gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios.
59002012	Ba' aapi'm pu'ñi ɨp jiñ jaaduñ, mi' pim pui' xi jiimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios. Cha'pim buam pɨx ka tu ñiokda' na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ guch Gɨ'kora', gu' ja'pji na pim mi' pui' xi bhɨichgɨda' ji, panaas ku moo bar bhaan ka' na pai' dhuuk jam aagi'ñdha' gu Dios no' pimɨt mi' pui' jii na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ na bhaan jich aagi'ñ nach jax ja'k duñia' nach ba' cham mu ja'k bhɨɨya' nach pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jich chulhiiñdha', piam ku chich gu' cham mi' pui' jii.
59002013	Na gu' no' pimɨt aapi'm cham ja palhbuix ja joi'ndak gu ja'tkam kɨ'n gu tu' na ja a'm jum aa'nda', gu Dios pui' cham jup jam joi'nda' aapi'm, gu' ja'pji na jam tulhiiñchuda' jano' na pai' dhuuk tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, dai na pui' xi jam tɨɨdai na pimɨt cham bhai' ja duu jix ja joi'ndak gu ja'tkam. Gu' ba' gui' nam jɨ'k jix bhai' ja buimɨi jix ja joi'ndat gu ja'tkam sia jaroi' na pɨx, dhi' dho gi gu'x bhai' tu ja jimia' ji, jix bhai' ja tɨɨdai ja aichdha' guch Gɨ'kora' na pai'p tu'ii'.
59002014	Gio ba' no'ch aach jax kai'ch nach bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak kat tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gu' ji no' gu' ni jɨ'x kuch iam pui' xi bua na jax ja'k bhaan jix maatɨ' nar pui', pu bar iatda' ka' dho, pɨx jap kai'chdha' ich pɨx ba'. Ba' dhi' pu cham jɨ'xdhat jich palhbuidha' jano' na pai' dhuuk jich aagi'ñdha' guch Gɨ'kora' na chich cham tu' mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa', sia kuch gu' aach ya'x baabui'm kai'ch xib nach pui' kai'ch nach bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, no'ch gu' cham mi' pui' bua gu maaxik bhaan na jax jix aa'.
59002015	Na gu' dhi' ja'pni ja'k ji buusan jia na jax no' maadɨt gu jax chu'm jich jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan cham ka bia' gu koi' na tu' jugia' ni gu jajannulhi'ñ na tɨ tɨ'ya', no' gu' pui'x dhaapak pɨx ba oirɨ.
59002016	Ba' no' gu' maadɨt aapi'm mu jimɨɨk jax chɨtda: “Moo gɨt alh joidham jix bhai' tum jimda'ñ jaduuñ tu' na pɨx bhaan, gɇ' bia'ka' ap gu koi' nap tu kua'da', gio gum jajannulh jap gɨt moop tu bia'ka' nap tɨ tɨ'ka' nap ba' cham gɨbkaidha'.” Gu' ji no' gu' ni jɨ'x ku pich iam xi onbai' gui' na tu' a'miram jum aa' nap nɨi'ñ, ¿tu' gi kɨ'n jup palhbuidha' sia kup aap mi' joidham tɨi xi chɨtda?
59002017	Pu'ñi ja'k pɨx jup ji busaak ba' sia kuñ aañ pui' tɨi xi kai'ch nañ bɨɨx jiñ jur kɨ'n jix biiñak kat tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Pur ja'p pɨx ka' ba' nañ pui' kai'chdha' nañ sap pɨk ba' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam no'ñ gu' cham pui' xi bua gu maaxik bhaan na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora', pui' ji buusanda' ba' nañ pu cham pai' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
59002018	Jaiñ no' jaroi' jax jum tɨtda mu pai' jim namkɨk: “Na ba' aap moo ni jɨ'x kup iam jix bhai'm duukam xip tu bua na jax ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, na saak aap ba' pɨk bɨɨx jum jur kɨ'n jix biiñak kat tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Aañ iam jix bhai'm duukam jup tu bua ji, sia kuñ cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Pui' kai'chdha' ap na saak jum aa' nañ bɨɨx jiñ jur kɨ'n jix biiñak kat tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam na ba'ñ baidhika' jix dhaam ja'k, gu' ji na gu' ni jɨ'x kup iam jix bhai'm duukam xip tu bua na jax jix aa' gu Dios na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' gɨt nap sɨlhkam bɨɨx jum jur kɨ'n jix biiñak kat mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa'. Aañi' ji na ba' pui' bam kai'ch nañ panaas tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa' gu Dios. Tɨɨ' nañ gu'x bhai'm duukam xip tu bua na jax jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ.”
59002019	¿Ka' na pim bax maat aa nax io'm jir gɇ'kam gu Dios gam na daipu' maa'n jix jai'ch na bɨxchu'x aichu'n ku pim ba' ɨlhii'ñ na pim dai pui' pɨx ja'k bhaan jix biiñak kat bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n? Chaam ji gu'ñ jaaduñ, na gu' dhi' cham pɨk xijai jia nañ tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdhat jix mat ka' na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios. Sia dho gu jajo'k jix maat am na jax jir tu'm kam gu Dios, jix maat am ɨp na ja tulhiiñchuda' gatuuk, ba' tɨix chotdon am xib, nam gu'x maat nam jum tulhiiña'.
59002020	Moo pim siamri jam jujur xi bia'kat xim ga'ngada' na jax pɨk ja'k jix aa' gu Dios na pim tui'ñgɨda', jam moom am japim xi baapsai dhi' nañ jɨ'k jax jam tɨtda. Na gu' kai'ñkam pui' pɨx cham tu' kɨ'n jup jam palhbuidha' sia pim aapi'm tɨi bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak kat tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, no' gu' ni jɨ'x ku pim iam jix bhai'm duukam xip tu bua ja bui gu ja'tkam na jax ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, pur ja'p pɨx ka' ba' na pim pui'm tɨɨtɨ'nda' na pim jir jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham.
59002021	¿Jax japim gi bax maat nat tu jii bɨjɨk guch boxii kat Abraam? Jaiñ nat tɨi pup makgɨrxi gu Dios gu maraa'n Isaak, sia ku daipu' maa'n tu mar. Ba' joidham jix kɨɨgalh gu Dios, na gu'x maat na dhi' joidham tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa'.
59002022	¿Jia na gu' gui' tu' sɨlhkam bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n jix biiñak kat tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdhat buiñor gu Dios? Tɨɨ' na gu' moo mi' pui' xi chu buidha' na jɨ'k jax tɨɨdaidha', jix bhai'm duukam xip tu buada' gu maaxik bhaan, cham tu' na daipu' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n jix biiñak kat tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' pɨx buiñor gu Dios. Dhi' jɨ' ji ba' bhaan ba matgir na tu' sɨlhkam tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jimdat na jax ja'k moox aa'.
59002023	Pui dho mi' pai' tu ua'ñix u'uan ta'm dhi' nat jax tu duuk gux boxii kat Abraam, mi' na pai' tu ua'ñix gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios nap jum kai'ch: “Gu Dios jix io'm jix kɨɨgalhdhak gu Abraam, nat gu' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n tɨjɨɨ'ñdhat mi' pui' tu dunaak na jɨ'k jax tɨɨdaidha'.” Pui' ja'k jam ba' pup jix maat gu ja'tkam na sap gu Abraam gio gu Dios maap jix bhai'm daa' am, nam gu' maap maa'n ñi'ook jup duuk.
59002024	Dho jaiñ nat jax ja'k tu jii guch boxii kat Abraam. Pu'ñi ɨp ba' aach xib, jum aa' nach jix bhai'm duukam xip tu buada' gu ya' maaxik bhaan na jax jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ guch Gɨ'kora', gio ba' nach pu'ñi bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n xi chɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor, na ba' gu Dios pui' bach ɨlhii'ñdha' nach tu' sɨlhkam mi' pui' ba duiñchu' na jax jix aa', ba'x kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam bach bia'ka'.
59002025	Gio ja'pni ɨp nat jax tu jii bɨjɨk gui' na Raab tɨɨgich nar ganai' pɨx kat. Tɨɨ' nat joidham jix kɨɨgalh ɨp pui' gu Dios nat bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdhak buiñor jix bhai' ja duu nat ja palhbuidhak ja tɨbiaptuda gu gook ja'tkam nat mu ja joot gu Josue. Gio buimgidhak nat xia' na mɨt giop ba jii, nat ja'p ja'k gabɨɨlh ja joot nam bhɨɨya', cham tu' mi gɇ' boi cha'm nam sap ba' cham ja tɨgia' gu mi' oi'ñkam.
59002026	Aach pu'ñi ja'k jich a'm jup jum aa' nach xi chu buada' no'ch baabui' sɨlhkam mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios. Na gu' no'ch cham pu bua, pur ja'p pɨx ka' siach tɨi pui'ch tɨɨtɨ' nach jir jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham. Ja'pni na jax ba' jia gu maa'nkam na gu' muukix ka' no' cham bhaan kap tui'dhi' gu ii'mdaga'n, dai no' bhaan jup tui'dhi' na ba' duaka'.
59003001	Moo pim alh jix bhai'ñ jaaduñ, cha'pim bɨɨx pɨx jix aa'nda' na pim bɨɨpɨ' dɨr gu'kat ja aagi'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, na gu' dhi' cham tu'r jaaxmada'. Jum aa' gu' nañ bɨɨpɨ' jix bhai'x mat ka' gio ba' nañ mi' pui' xi jimda' na jax pɨk ja'k moox aa' gu Dios nañ ba' bar pu chu'm ka', nañ ba' gu' cham maakam pɨx ja aagi'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham. Na gu' no'ñ mi' pai' maakam pɨx ja aagi'ñ, no' gu' cham tu' pui' kai'ñkam jup jum kai'ch gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, dhi' ñich dho bhaan gɇ'kam kɨ'n bañ ua'tulh buiñor, ba' dai na bañ chulhiiñchuda'.
59003002	Na gu' tu' nañ pɨx bhaan bañ ua'tulhdha' sia tu' palhɨɨp jup jum duukam mi ja'p no'ñ cham bhai' maat, sia no' ñich mi' pai' maakam pɨx tɨi na cham pui' tum ñiok, dhi' kɨ'n jañich dho pu bañ ua'tulh buiñor gu Dios. Na gu' dhi' bɨɨpɨ'm aa' nañ jix bhai' tu ñiokda' nañ ba' ɨlhii'ñdha' nañ a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' gu Dios, nañ cham tu' giilhim ka tu ñiokda' na jax cham jir am na cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ. Dhi' pɨx no'ñ pu'ñi ja'k ba duiñchu', cham jɨ'xdhat pui' ka tu duñia' dhiñ chuuku' na dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñdha' nar jix buam jum duukam, na gu' ja'p ji buusnia' nañ mi' bhɨichdhatgɨda' na pai' jax jir am.
59003003	Ja'pni na jax ba' jia gu kabai piam gu tu' maachu', nañ gu' bhai' xi baaxdhai chiñi'ram gu piriiñ no' ñich pai' ba jii nañ ba' kɨ'n sɨlh bhɨichdhatgɨda' pai' nañ ja'k jimda', gam nañ kɨ'n kɨksaidha' gammɨjɨ bɨɨx boi no'ñ bax chɨmñim. Na gu' no' cham tu piriiñchu', gammɨjɨ pup jimda' pai' na ja'k ɨlhii'ñdha' dɨɨlh.
59003004	Gio ja'pni ɨp na jax gu gɇ'gɇr kaknub na mu ja'p bhaan tum oirɨ gɇ' suudai' dhaam. Jaiñ jir ɨ'lhich gu u'uux nam kɨ'n palhɨɨp jax xi chu bhiijidha' gui' nam bha daraichgɨda', sɨlh ja bhɨichdhatgɨda' am pai' nam ja'k ɨlhii'ñdha' sia ku gu' jax jir gɇ'gɇr gu kaknub, gio sia jax jix io'm jix jɨbɨɨr.
59003005	Pu'ñi pɨx jup ji buusan dhiñ ñɨɨn na yɨjɨ kɨɨk jiñ chiñ am, jir ɨlhi'ch jup jum duukam tɨi na palhɨɨp ja'p joiñdha' nañ ba' tu a'gada'. Gu' ji na gu' dhi' ba' pɨk jix io'm xi chu xi bua na pai' dhuuk mui' ji ñokia', ja'p na jax gu tai no't palhɨɨp mi ja'p pai' gɨi nax chɨ mɨidha', pu giilhim jɨ'x na gɇ' tɨ mɨɨya' pai' na juugɨt jix chɨ mɨidha' ka'.
59003006	Dhiñ ñɨɨn na yɨjɨ kɨɨk jiñ chiñ am, pu'ñip ji buusan na jax gu tai, na gu' na pai' dhuuk bhai' ji joñia', jix bhaai' na giilhim tɨ'ya' na jax cham pui' tum ñiok na sia gu Dios cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ. Aañ ba' bhai'ñ a'm ji jimia' gu ua'tulhdhara' na pai' dhuuk pu'ñi giilhim tɨ'ya' dhiñ ñɨɨn bɨnkam guñ chiñ no'ñ cham soo'mchulhi'ñ, na gu' nañ jax ba kai'ch, na kai'ñkam dhiñ ñɨɨn pui' ji buusan na jax gu tai. Ba' na pai' dhuuk giilhim tɨ'ya', ja'p ji buusnia' na bhai' pu ji mɨɨya' bɨɨx dhiñ chuuku', na gu'ñ a'm ba jimia' gu ua'tulhdhara'. Ku gu' dhi' mummu kat jup jum kai'ch ji na pai' cham tutkɨ gu tai nañ pu ba mɨɨjidhat jup tui'ka' nañ pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jiñ chulhiiñdha', dhiñ ñɨɨn na tu'm da'p duñia' no'ñ cham soo'mchulhi'ñ. Ku ba' gu' chi na gu'x xijai nañ ba' soo'mchulhdha' no' jax jix chɨ'iim,
59003007	cham pui' na jax gu jaroi' no'x ja sasoi'ntam gu jɨ'ngiarum sasoi', pui' na jax gu u'ji', piam gu kooko', piam gu maapi'ñ, piam sia jax chu'm, daipu' na ja da'ngɨi ja mamaansutdai ja mamtuxdha' jax ña ɨlhii'ñdha', pui' ja'k machia' am.
59003008	Gu' matgam dhiñ ñɨɨn gio dhiñ chiñ chi gu' moox xijai ji nañ aa'ñdha' gio nañ soo'mchulhdha' na jax jup ɨlhii'ñdha', ja'pji na pu tɨ'ya' na jax jup jix chɨ'iim ka', na gu' dhi' cham tu'r jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam bak. Dhi' ja'p ji buusan ji na bhaan dɨr jum gɨgɨ'lhi'ñ dai gu tu' nax io'm jix maimda'.
59003009	Jaiñ gu' dhiñ ñɨɨn gio dhiñ chiñ jañ kɨ'n pɨx jup gɇ'kamtu'nda' tɨi gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' nax dhaam jup tu'ii', gu' ji nañ gu' dhi' kɨ'n pɨx giilhim jup ja tɨɨda' gu jai' ja'tkam nañ jix maat nat Dios jup ja duu, na saak jir pu chu'm am ɨp na dɨɨlh, na jax aa' kuñ pu ja tɨtdaimɨi nañ jax ɨlhii'ñ na cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios.
59003010	¿Jax ba' ja'k jup tu'ii' dhi'ñ jaaduñ nach ba' gu' dhich chiichiñ kɨ'n pɨx jup gɇ'kamtu'nda' gu Dios gio ba' moo nach giilhim jup ja tɨtdada' gu ja'tkam na jax aa'? Panaas gu' moo dhi' cham tu' am gɨ'nsɨ ji gu pui' jiñ jaaduñ.
59003011	Na gu' dhi' ja'pni jia na jax ba' pai' no' dɨɨbon gu suudai', ¿paa pim duuk nɨi'ñ na jɨ'x jix i'oob mi' dhɨr jup ba buan, jɨ'x ba' moox xibu'? ¿Jia na gu' cham?
59003012	Gio ja'pni ɨp na jax gu iigɨx, na gu' cham jɨ'xdha' turaasno iibhai'ñcha', nix chu' gu uubas ku cham jɨ'xdha' iigɨx iibhai'ñcha', na gu' cham tu'r pu chu'm ka' gu toona'n. Pu'ñi ɨp ba' dhi'ñ jaaduñ, aañ cham pai' dhuuk tɨ nɨi'ñ ji pai' na dɨɨbon gu suudai' na jɨ'x jix xibu' mi' dhɨr jup ba buanda', jɨ'x ba' moox i'oob ɨp.
59003013	No' jaroi' maadɨt jix bhai' bax maat na jax pɨk ja'k moox aa' gu Dios na tui'ñgɨda', jum aa' nar jix bhai'kam ka' gio nax bhai' xi chu jimda' ja bui gu jai', na ba' dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na sɨlhkam jix bhai' bax maat gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios. Ba'x io'm pɨx bhai' ji maachidha' no' pui' ja'k duiñchu'.
59003014	Gu' ji no' gu' dai gɇ'kam jum taatɨt nai'x ja bhaamki'ñ gu jai' na pui' jim aagɨt nax io'm jix chu maat sia tu' na pɨx, gam sia na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios, cham tu'r di' ka' gu matda' gui' na Dios tu maak.
59003015	Na gu' gui' cham tu' pu chu'm tu maak jia gu matda' na ba' gu jaroi' kɨ'n gɇ'kam jim taatɨt nai'x ja bhaamki'ñdha' gu ja'tkam na palhɨɨp bar jix aixkam. Gu' dhi' ya' kam pɨx ji dhi oi'ñga'n na bhaan jup tui'ñgɨda' gu matda' gu jaroi' na pu'ñi ja'k pɨx jir tu'm ka' na jax ja'k jurtu'nka' pɨx gu ja'ook, pui' ku ba' gɇ'kam jim taatɨt nai' pɨx jix chu bhaamki'ñdha'.
59003016	Pai' no'm mui' jai'ch gu pu chu'm gu ja'tkam, gammɨjɨ pɨx jum daa'ngichgɨda' am tu' na pɨx bhaan nam xim jɨjɨɨgak kat kɨ'n gu tu' nam bia'ka' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n. Jum koo'nda' am jai', jai' ba' nam jum kokdadat jum ko'ktolhi'ñdha', gammɨjɨ na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios.
59003017	Matgam gu' gui' nam moo tu' sɨlhkam bax maat na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios nam tui'ñgɨda', nat ba ja tajaañ gu matdaga'n, mi' pui' ji nam xi jiimda' na jax ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ. Cham pai' tu' bhaan jum ua'tulhi'ñdha' am, ni kum cham pai' dhuuk tu' kɨ'n ja bhaamki'ñdha' gu ja'tkam, dai ji nam jir jix bhabhai'kam kat jix bhai' ja tɨtdada', gio ba' nam jix ja joi'mdat ja palhbui'ñdha' tu' na pɨx bhaan. Dhi' jɨ' ji na ba' pui' bam kai'ch nam sɨlhkam jix maatɨt mi' pui' ba bhɨichu' na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios no'm pu'ñir jix bhabhai'kam sia jaroi' na pɨx buiñor.
59003018	Ba' gu jɨ'k nam pu'ñi jix maatɨt gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios jix bhai' pɨx ja tɨtda' gu ja'tkam, nam cham pai' dhuuk tu' kɨ'n ja kokda, dhi' ja'p ji buusnia' nam jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam ja a'm tɨ ɨs gu ja'tkam. Pui' na jax nam jax ja'k dui cham tu' bhaan jax ji kai'chɨt tu oi'ñka', ni kum cham pai' dhuuk tu' kɨ'n jum kokdada', dai ji nam jix jɨjɨkgɨm jix bhai'm taatɨt mi' pui' jiimda' na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios.
59004001	¿Paa pim dɨr ɨlhii'ñ nam gɨgɨ'lhi'ñ gu bhaamda' na pim ba' ba jim ñiñiokboixdha' tu' na pɨx bhaan gam na pim ba jim kooda'? Dho bhai' dhɨr jam jujur am bhaan na pim bɨɨx aixim jix chu duñiik ka' na tu' cham jum aagaidha', gam na pim bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka' gu tu' ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n.
59004002	Tɨix aa'nda' pim na pim jai'p bia'ka' gu tu' na pim nɨi'ñxi'ñka' na bia' gu jumai. Jɨ'x japim tɨi bax chu kokdak ka', piam ku pim bax mu'aam ka' gu jaroi' na pim ba' pu'ñi duuji ba bia'ka' gɨt gu tu' na pim jix aa'nda' na pim bia'ka'. Gu' ji na gu' cham, na gu' ni jɨ'x ku pim soi'm ɨlhdhat jup xi chaanda' gu Dios na jam makia', dai na pim pu'ñix bhaamut ja tɨ'ñchoka' gu jai', gam na pim jix ja jɨɨgak ka' tu' na pɨx bhaan.
59004003	Gio ji na gu' sia ku pim tɨi taan gu Dios na jam makia' gu tu' na pim jix aa'nda' na pim bia'ka', cham tu'p jam maakda', na gu'x bhai'x maat ka' na pim bhaan pɨx gɇ'gɇrkam jum taat ka' gio na pim kɨ'n bɨɨx aixim jix chu duñiik ka' na jax ja'k cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, cham tu' na pim kɨ'n jix bhai'm duukam jup tu buada'.
59004004	Ja'p japim pɨx ba ji buan jiñ jaaduñ na jax gu jax chu'm ubii no' tɨi bɨɨma'n tɨɨmui'x maa'n gu chio'ñ, no' gu' jumai bɨɨma'n boppo. Dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam cham tu' ja kɨɨgalhi'ñ gu Dios, na pim gu'x maat na gu jaroi' no' pu'ñi pɨx ja'k tu jim, no' dai bɨɨx aixim tu bua na jax cham jir am, cham tu' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha' gu Dios, jir kɨ'darga'n ka' pɨx, na gu' cham mi' pui' jimda' na jax jix aa'.
59004005	Na gu'p jum kai'ch gu ñio'ki'ñ nax io'm xich joi'ndat xich dha' aach, nat gu' tɨich a'm ba tajaa gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' nach ba' kaichgɨt mi' pui' xi jiimda' gɨt na jax jix aa', cham tu' nach maakam tu buidha'.
59004006	Jumai kap jup jum kai'ch ɨp gu ñio'ki'ñ na sap jix kɨɨgalhdhat jix joi'gɨ'nda' gu Dios gu jaroi' na gampai' pɨx jum ɨlhii'ñdha', gu' ba' gui' na gɇ'kam jum taat ka', gampai' pɨx bia'ka', ni ku cham kɨɨgalhi'ñdha'.
59004007	Ba' aañ jam guguuxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ na pim mui' xix biiñak ka' buiñor gu Dios bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n. Cha'pim mu ja'k kɇɇkɇ' gu ja'ook. Xi ñiokdhai pim bhaankamu'n guch Xoi'kam, ka na gu' pu jimiññolhia', ba' cham tu' maakam ka jam jurtu'nka'.
59004008	Soi' pim bam ɨlhdha' buiñor guch Gɨ'kora' na ba' xi jam joi'ndai gio jam a'm jup ba tɨ nɨidhidha'. Ja'p ji buusnia' na pim jix bhai' bam i'koimdha' gio na pim ba uana' gu jam jujur, na gu' ba tu jam uañdha' gu Dios no' pimɨt soi'm ɨlhdhak pui' ba tɨɨ'n na pim cham pui' ka tui'ka', sia ku pim gu' pui' tɨi kam aagɨt na pim bɨɨx gok kap jup tui'ka' gɨt, pui' na jax na pim kaichgɨda' gu Dios gio ba' na pim pu'ñi bɨɨx aixim tu buada' gɨt na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ.
59004009	Na gu' cham kɨɨgalhi'ñ gu Dios gu pui' ja'k, gu' ji na pim soi' pɨx bam ɨlhii'ñdha' ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k. Cha'pim jix bhai'm taatɨt ka jɨɨmda', ni na pim gɇ'gɇrkam jum taat ka', ja'pji na pim soi'm ɨlhdhat ba suanda' ji pui' xim aagɨt na pim gɇ'kam kɨ'n cham am buatu' gu pui' na pim jax ja'k tu jim.
59004010	Gio na pim gampai' pɨx bam ɨlhii'ñdha' buiñor gu Dios, cham tu' na pim bhaan ka tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka' gu tu' ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n, na ba' mi' dhɨr pu'ñi xi jam joi'ndai gio jam a'm jup ba tɨ nɨidhidha', gam na ba jam palhbui'ñchu'nda' tu' na pɨx bhaan.
59004011	Gio ja'pniñ ba' moo tɨip kai'chɨt jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, na pim gɨt cham tu' bhaan jax ji kai'chɨt tu oi'ñka'. Cha'pim jum a'a'gat, gio na cham jir am na pim jax tɨɨda' gu jax chu'm jich jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na cham tu' mi' pui' jim na jax tu daaxix gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios. Nap gu' cham tu' dhi' pu chu'm kɨ'n daaxix ka'ñ jaduuñ nap mi' dhɨr ja aagi'ñdha' gu jai' no'm mi' pui' jiim ka' ba' cham, ja'pji nap mi' pui' xi jimda' aap dɨɨlh cham tu'p jum buixdhat nam jax ja'k jup tui'ñgɨda' gu jai'. Na gu' no'p pu'ñi ja'k duiñchu', pui'r jum duukam ka' nap gɇ'kam jum taat, cham tu' nap mi' pui' jim na jax jum kai'ch gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios.
59004012	Na gu' dai gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' jix maat na jaroi' mi' pui' jimchu' na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gio na jaroi' cham tu' mi' pui' jim. Gui' ba' dɨɨlh ja aa'ñdhai na mɨt pai' cham am bua ja tulhiiñchuda' gatuuk gu jɨ'k nam cham mi' pui' jimia'. Gu' ba' gu jɨ'k nam mi' pui' jimia', dai na ba ja baidhika'x dhaam na pai'p tu'ii'. Ja'pni ja'k dhi'ñ jaaduñ, ba' cham bhaai' nach aach moo jax jup ja tɨtdada' guch jaaduñ nam cham mi' pui' jiim, nach gu' cham pu chu'm kɨ'n dalhxix ka'. Ja'pji aach dɨɨlh nach mi' pui' xi jiimda' nax io'm jum aa'.
59004013	Jix bhai' pim xiñ kaaya' aapi'm na pim joidham tɨ ɨlhdhat jup kai'chdha': “Maik jach tu juanpu' mummu ja'p na jax jix bhai' tum namki'ñ. Maa'n oidha'ch mu juruuñdha', joidham jach mui' xi mai'chɨi gu tuumiñ bhai'p ba jimia', tu' gi. Ja'xñich moo gamai' ji jimia' piam kabuimuk, xi chu bhiiñorai ich gu tu' nach tu ga'raidha' nach ba'x io'm mui' mai'chia' gu tuumiñ.”
59004014	Jaiñ gu' ni ku pim jix mat ka' na tu' jax jam duñiidha' gu mi' jotmoda', sia ku pim aapi'm joidham tɨi tɨ ɨlhii'ñ na pim tu duñia'. Pu cham mat ka' pim no' pim moo pui'p ka duduaka' buimgidhak ka' ba' gu' cham, gui' dho ji nach gu' cham tu' gammɨjɨ joodaip jich dhuukat ya' pai' darka'. Jax dhui nach gu' aach ja'pni pɨx ji buan na jax gu jikoom na mu ja'p sɇ'ka' kabuimuk ja'k. Alhio pɨx mi' pui' tui'ka', na pai' dhuuk bhai' ji chu juuka' pɨx cham pai' matgilhia'.
59004015	Gu' dhi' bɨɨpɨ'm aa' ji nach jix biiñak ka' buiñor guch Gɨ'kora' gui' na jaroi'ch chaiñbui'ñ gu ii'mda' nach kɨ'n dudua. Ja'pjani nach kai'chdha' no'ch jax jup ɨlhii'ñ: “Mooñ ja'pni tu duñia' kabuimuk gio ja'pni, no' moo pui' ja'k jup jix aa'nda' gɨt dho ji guch Gɨ'kora' na jaroi'ch palhbui'ñ bɨɨx aixim bhaan.”
59004016	Gu' ji na gu' aapi'm dɨɨlh pɨx gɇ'gɇrkam jim taatɨt bɨɨx aixim jum aa'nda' na pim tu duñia', ni jɨ'x ku pim iam jix biiñak kat buiñor gu Dios. Dhi' pu'ñi chuutu'm gu ja'tkam, cham tu' ja kɨɨgalhi'ñ guch Gɨ'kora', na gu' cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ no'm dɨɨlh gɇ'gɇrkam jum taat.
59004017	Pu'ñi ja'k jañ dho ba' pɨx jam tɨtdañ jaaduñ, jam guguuxi'ñ iñ na pim siamri mi' pui' xi jiimɨt na jax ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ guch Gɨ'kora'. Na gu' moop jir ua'tulhdhara' ji bo no'ch aach ja'p xi dhuukat na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios maakam tu buim, no'ch gu' tɨix maat na jax ja'k jix aa'.
59005001	Ba' aapi'm na pim jir jix chutumñigam, soi' pim bam ɨlhdha' buiñor guch Gɨ'kora', na gu' bam aajim na pai' dhuuk cham bhai' tu jam jimia'.
59005002	Cha'pim mu ja'k bhaan ka jujurtɨka' gu tu' na pim bia' na pim kɨ'n jir jix chutumñigam, na gu' dhi' ja'p ji buusan na bax dhɨbaalh, na pu cham tu' ka bhai'. Gio dhi jam jajannulh jix dha'ram namkɨm na pim tɨ tɨ', pui' cham tu'p ka bhai', na gu' ja'p jup ji buusan na ampɨx bam bhɨɨ nax io'm bax dhɨbaalh.
59005003	Gux uam totbikdam gio gux chua totbikdam na pim bia' nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk, ja'p ji buusan nax io'm jix kuukum pɨx ba' gam na bax konbi'ñ, na gu' pur cham tu' buiñor guch Gɨ'kora', sia ku gu' panaas jix io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk na pim pui' xim aa'. Aapi'm chi gu' ja'p jum aa' na pim pui' pɨx jup jimia' jix dhaam ja'k sia ku pim ja'x ji chɨ kɨɨsaim na pim jumpadaim dhix dha'ram namkɨm xib na ya' bar mia'n na pai' dhuuk tum kuugalhdha'. Ja'kbui' kat ja'p ji buusnia' ji na dhi' ba' mu ja'k xi jam iabu' tai chɨr na pai' cham tutkɨ, na gu' dhi' bhaan jam tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios na pim dai jumpadim gux dha'ram namkɨm, iam gu' mi' pui'p ba ji jii pimɨt na jax jix aa' na pim ba' pu'ñi duuji jimia' gɨt buiñor.
59005004	Daman gu jam tujuandam tuk japim pui' pu cham ja namkidha' pai'jɨ, sia kum alh tɨix bhai' bua nam jam ɨxii'ñdha' gio nam tu orda'. Tu' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñdha' pim, ni jɨ'x ku pim jix ja joi'gɨ'nda'. Ku ba' gu' na gu' gu Dios jix bhai' ja kɇɇ nam gɇ'kam kɨ'n tɨi soi'm ɨlhii'ñ buiñor na pim ja tulhiiñchu'n, gui' ba' dɨɨlh jup bax maat na jax dhui ja palhbuidha',
59005005	sia ku pim gu' aapi'm cham tu'p jum buixdhat gɇ'gɇrkam jum taatɨt bɨɨx aixim tu bua na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ guch Gɨ'kora', dai gu' na pim bɨɨx aixim tu bua na pim dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñ. Ja'p ji buusan na pim jum gii'ñchudaim na ba' mi' dhɨr ja'p tu jam dooda' na jax gu sasoi' nam ja gii'ñchudat ja koodat ja kua'da',
59005006	na pimɨt gu' gɇ' bam ua'tulh na pimɨt bɨɨx ja tulhiiñchudak ba ja koi gui' nam cham tu' bhaan kuiñcha bia'kat.
59005007	Aapi'm moo cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt tɨ nɨɨrka'ñ jaduuñ jano' na pai' dhuuk bha jim guch Xoi'kam, Dios japim pɨx buiñor jix biiñak ka' cham jim o'jolhdhat. Ja'pni na jax ba' gu jaroi' no't tɨ ɨi, na gu' soi' pɨx jum ɨlhii'ñdha' na ba' bha duukda' na kɨ'n tu kaibhaidha', mi' dhɨr ba' tɨ nɨɨrda' na pai' kabka' na ba' pɨk ba tu oraa', cham tu' gu mi' jotmoda' nax aa'nda' na gɨt ba tu oraa'.
59005008	Aapi'm pu'ñi ɨp jiñ jaaduñ, cha'pim jax jum aa'nda' na cham ob pai' aajim guch Xoi'kam na pim tɨi xi chɨ nɨɨra, Dios japim pɨx buiñor jix biiñak ka' cham jax jim aagɨt nañ jax ba jam tɨtda. Pu ka na gu' jootom ya' pɨx ba kɨɨka' cham jum ɨlhdham, dai ji nach cham oodat pɨx am tɨ nɨɨrda'.
59005009	Aapi'm jix bhai' xi chu jimda' dai. Cha'pim bɨɨx aixim jum i'iattulhdhat jum ñiñiokboixi'ñdha', ni ku pim cham jum bhabhaakui'ñdha', na ba' gu' cham pui' jam tɨɨdai jam tulhiiñchuda' guch Xoi'kam no't ya' ba ai. Na gu' no' pim aapi'm pu'ñi ja'k pɨx tu jim, pui' ji jam tɨɨda' na pim dhi' bhaan kuiñcha bia', pui' jam tɨɨda' na pimɨt dhi' bhaan cham tu' mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa', ba' dai na ba jam tulhiiñchuda'. Alh moo cham jɨ'x ka mɨɨkidha' ji gu' na ya' pɨx ba aaya' guch Xoi'kam, am bha mia'n bam kɨisap ji gu' na bhai' bar jimdam.
59005010	Aapi'm gu' mi' pui' xi jiimdat ji na jax jix aa' jix biiñak ka' buiñor, cha'pim jax jim aagɨt sia ku jax giilhim cham bhai' tu jam jim xib bɨɨx aixim bhaan. Mi' pim pui' xi chu daa'ñchu'nda' nat jax tu ja jii gui' nam bɨjɨk ya ja'p bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk guch Gɨ'kora' nam pu'ñi giilhim jum tulhiiñaimɨk bɨɨx aixim bhaan nam tɨi tu a'gada' gu ñio'ki'ñ.
59005011	Aapi'm ba' pu'ñi ɨp, na gu' aach nach jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gammɨjɨ jich a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jich palhbui'ñchu' guch Gɨ'kora' nach ba' gammɨjɨx bhai'ch chaatɨt jix jɨjɨkgɨm jup tui'ka' guch i'ii'mda' bhaan, sia kuch pu'ñi bɨɨx aixim bhaan jich chulhiiñ. ¿Jax japim gi bax maat nat tu jii bɨjɨk gui' na Job tɨɨgich? Jaiñ nat giilhim jum tulhii bɨɨx aixim bhaan, ku gu' mi' nat xi ñakoo sia ku jax giilhim jix buam tu tatda', joidham jix bhai' tu jii ji, gɇ'p jum duukam jup tu duu gu Dios buiñor, jix joi'ndat palhbui, na gu' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidhat jup tui'ka'. Aach ba' pu'ñi ɨp jiñ jaaduñ no'ch xi ñakoo' siach pu'ñi giilhim jich chulhiiñ tu' na pɨx bhaan, gui' dhoch palhbuidha', na gu' gui' joidham jir jix bhai'kam, dai pɨx ji no'ch jix biiñak buiñor.
59005012	Gio ja'pniñ ba' moo tɨip kai'chɨt jiñ jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim tui'ñgɨda' gɨt, na pim cham pai' dhuuk jax kai'chdha' dho na dhix dhaam bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nar pui' ka' jax na pim kai'chdha', piam dhi oi'ñga'n, piam sia gu tu' ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n, na pim pui' jim aagɨt na dhi' ba' jam palhbuidha' piam ku jam tulhiiñchuda' no' jax dhuukat cham jir pui' jax na pim kai'chdha'. Ja'pji daipu' na pim pu tɨ'ya' pɨx na cham no' pim jix maat na cham jir pui'. Piam no' pim jix maat nar pui', dho daipu' na pim pu tɨ'ya' pɨx na jɇɇ'. Daipu' dhi' nax aa' guch Gɨ'kora' nach sɨlhkam tuch a'a'gi'ñdha' na ba' cham dhi' bhaan jich chulhiiñchuda' gatuuk no't ba tum kuugalh.
59005013	Gu' ba' no' moo maadɨt aapi'm cham bhai' tu jim na tu' na pɨx bhaan jum tulhiiñ, jum aa' na soi'm ɨlhdhai pu tɨɨda' gu Dios na palhbuidha' na ba' mi' dhɨr cham kam tulhiiñdha'. Piam ku gu'x bhai' tu jim, ba'x jɨkgɨm jup tu'ii' nax bhai' tu tatda', dho gu' dai dho na laala'ñxi'ñdha' gu alabaa'n buiñor gu Dios na taxchaabgi'ñdha'.
59005014	Piam ku gu' jaroi' maadɨt ɇɇ gu jax chu'm kokdai' na kɨ'n jix ka'ook, dai na ja umua'ñdha' dho guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham gui' nam jɨ'k bɨjɨk dɨr ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nam tu daañxidha' buiñor gu Dios na dua'ñdha' xi juulhdhai am palhɨɨp gu asait.
59005015	Dua'ñdha' dho guch Gɨ'kora' no' mɨt bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n soi'm ɨlhdhak buiñor tu daañxi, tu ua'ñdha' ɨp no't tu' bhaan jum ua'tulh buiñor.
59005016	Pu'ñi ja'k jum aa' na pim duiñchu'nda'ñ jaaduñ. Xi chu a'gat japim xi chum uañdhat maa'n ñi'ook xip bua't no' pimɨt tu' bhaan mam ua'tulh dai aapi'm jam bui, na ba' gu'p jam kɇɇkɇ' gu Dios na pim pai' dhuuk pu'ñi soi' ba tɨtdada' na pim tum daañxi'ñdha' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n na jam dudua'ñdha' no't ba ji jam ai gu jax chu'm ko'kdai', sia gu jam i'ii'mda' bhaan. Na gu' gu jaroi' no' moo mi' pui' xi dhuiñchu' na jax ja'k moox aa' guch Gɨ'kora', bɨxchu'x bhai'm duukam jix bhaai' na pu tu duñia' bhaankamu'n, na gu' kɇɇkɇ' na pai' dhuuk mui' ba taanda'.
59005017	Ja'pni na jax gu Eliiyas gui' na bɨjɨk ya ja'p bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk guch Gɨ'kora'. Jaiñ na tɨi pui' pɨx jup jir tu'm kat na jax aach, cham tu' mu pai'r tu'p tu'm da' kat. Tɨɨ' na kɇɇkɇ' gu Dios na pai' dhuuk taanda' gu tu', na gu'x mat ka' na mi' pui' jimda' na jax jix aa'. Jaiñ jano' nat soi'm ɨlhdhat pu tɨɨ'n gu Dios na cham tu duukchuda' baik oidha' daman taak mi' na jɨ'x jir Israel. Pui' dho ji chu buus, kai gu Dios nat jɨ'k jax tɨɨ'n.
59005018	Gio mi' dhɨr nat xi buus gu ja'kbui' baik oidha' daman taak, gio soi'm ɨlhdhak pui'p xi chɨɨ'n gu Dios nax bhaai' na ba tu duukchuda'. Pui' giop ji chu buus, giop ba duu'n mi' na jɨ'x jir Israel na mɨt ba' giop ba tɨ ɨ'sa gu ja'tkam. Pu'ñi ɨp ba' aach no'ch moox biiñak buiñor guch Gɨ'kora'.
59005019	Gu' ba' no' moo jax dhuukat jaroi' maadɨt cham tu' kap jim buix buiñor gu Dios, no' gu' maakam pɨx ba tui'dhi' na jax cham pui' ja'k aa', ba' no't gu' jaroi' maadɨt jix joi'ndak tɨɨgɨk guguux na gio mi' pui'p ba jimia' na jax jix aa' gu Dios,
59005020	dhi' gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai' ba duñia', na gu' guguuxdhaimɨi na jax ja'k dui giop bax biiñak ka' buiñor guch Gɨ'kora', ba' bɨɨx pu tu uañdha' ɨp gio gu Dios na jɨ'k ua'tulhdharga'n. Mi' dhɨr ba' cham tu' mu ja'k ka bhɨichgɨda' na pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha' gɨt.
60001001	Aañ Peegro nañ jir nobii'ñ guch Xoi'kam, ya' dɨr mu tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ iñ aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na pim mummu ja'p oi'dha' mui' kap na pai' jai' dɨppɨr bhaan bipio', pui' na jax aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ na pim mummu ja'k oi'dha' na pai' Ponto dɨbɨɨr bhaan bipio', gio aapi'm na pim mummu ja'k jup oi'dha' na pai' Galaasia dɨbɨɨr bhaan jup bipio', gio ba' moo aapi'm ɨp na pim mummu ja'k oi'dha' na pai' Kapadoosia dɨbɨɨr bhaan bipio', gio ba' aapi'm na pim mummu ja'k oi'dha' na pai' Aasia dɨbɨɨr bhaan jup bipio', gio aapi'm na pim mummu ja'k jup oidha' na pai' Bitiinia dɨbɨɨr bhaan bipio'.
60001002	Nat gu' bɨjɨk dɨr pu chu'm kɨ'n jam a'm tɨ tɨɨ gu Dios na pim pu'ñi tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' buiñor gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam, gio ba' nat bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n jam tajaañ gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n na pim ba' kaichgɨt mi' pui' xi bhɨichgɨda' na jax ja'k jam jurtudidha', gam na jam mattu'nka' nat guch Xoi'kam tu jam uañ gu jam ua'tulhdhara' jano' nat pai' dhuuk jaax gu ɨ'ra'n bhai' bhaan gu kuruus na mɨt sissapa, na pim ba' mi' dhɨr cham tu' ka ua'tulhdhix ka'. Ja'pni, moo gɨt ba' gu Dios pɨx jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' na pim ba' gammɨjɨ cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt jix jɨjɨkgɨm jup tui'ka'ñ jaaduñ.
60001003	Ja'p moor gɇ'kam ji gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' gui' nat bha joot gu Jesuus jich Xoi'kam ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, tu daanda' ich buiñor jiñ jaaduñ na gu'r jix bhai'kam. Tɨɨ' nat jix bhai' duu nat xich joi'ndak tuch uañ guch ua'tulhdhara' nach jix u'ua'tulhdhix kat, nat tuch ñamkix guch Xoi'kam jano' nat muukɨk duadɨk giop bam mu dɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr na mɨt pai' tɨi yaas. Ba' xib ja'p ji buus na chich giop ba maaxir nach jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, xib ba' gu' dai ji nach jix bhai'ch chaatɨt pɨx am tɨ nɨɨrda' nach a'm tu bi'ya' gui' nat tuch iimchuda gu Dios,
60001004	nap kai'ch na saak jich makia' gatuuk gu gɇ'gɇr jup tum duu'nkam no' chich bhammɨ ba ai na pai'p tu'ii', gui' na cham jɨ'xdha' jax jum duñia' ni gu cham pai' dhuuk kɨlhii'ñchai nai' ji dhɨbaa'. Ka gɨt na gu' pui' ji chu buusnia' nañ jax jam tɨtda,
60001005	na pim gu' bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n bax biiñak buiñor gu Dios, gɇ'kam kɨ'n jam a'm ba tɨ nɨidhim ba' gu xib. Ba' jano' na pai' dhuuk tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, dai na ba jam baidhika'x dhaam na pim pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', cham tu' mu ja'k na pai'r tu tulhiiñara'.
60001006	Ba' aapi'm dhi' kɨ'n jix bhai' pɨx bam taat ka'ñ jaaduñ na pim ba tu iimchudhix, cha'pim kuu' jimmɨda' sia ku jɨ'x cham bhai' tu jam jim tu' bhaan. Mui' pim xix biiñak ka' buiñor guch Gɨ'kora' na gu' gatuuk joidham jix bhai' tu jam jimia'.
60001007	Na gu' dhi' cham pɨk jir tu' sia ku pim jum tulhiiñ tu' na pɨx bhaan, na gu' bhaan pɨx jix maatɨ' ka' no' pim moo tu' sɨlhkam bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak buiñor guch Gɨ'kora'. Ja'pni na jax ba' jia gux uam totbikdam nax dha'ram namɨɨk, nam gu' xi mɨmɨi'ñdha' tai chɨr nam mi' pɨx mamtɨda' no' moor di' gux kɨɨ', piam ku gu' gui' na cham pɨk tu' bhai'. Aapi'm ba' pu'ñi ɨp jiñ jaaduñ, mi' pɨx bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' no' pim moo sɨlhkam jix biiñak buiñor guch Gɨ'kora' no' pim pu'ñi tu' bhaan jum tulhiiñ. Ba' no' pim pur maa'n na pim jax jix biiñak, ja'p ji buusnia' buiñor gu Dios na pim aapi'm jir di' gui' nax dha'ram namɨɨk. Jix io'm tu' ka'm jam ɨlhii'ñ gu Dios, cham tu' pui' na jax gux uam totbikdam, na gu' dhi' pui' pɨx jup jum xichui'dha' saalhiom. Ba' jano' na pai' dhuuk ya' ba aaya' guch Xoi'kam, joidham pɨx jix bhai' jam tɨɨdai jam baidhika' buiñor, na gu'x mat ka' na pim aapi'm gammɨjɨx biiñak kat buiñor sia ku pimɨt jum tulhii.
60001008	Na pim gu' aapi'm buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat tu' ka'm nɨidhat guch Xoi'kam mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa', sia ku pimɨt cham tu' maaxik tɨɨgɨk na ya' xi oilhimɨk. Jix maat iñ na pim bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak buiñor, sia ku pim jix maat na cham tu' ya' kap tu'ii' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, gam na pim gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai'm taatɨt buiñor jix jɨjɨkgɨm jup tu'ii' na pu cham bhaai' na pim jax xim buada' ni na pim jax xi chɨtdada',
60001009	na pim pui' xim aa' nat gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai' ba duu nat tu jam uañ gu jam ua'tulhdhara' na pim ba' mi' dhɨr cham tu' kam tulhiiña', dai na ba jam baidhika'x dhaam nat pai' tu jam iimchuda. Pui' ku pim chi ba' cham jax jum aagɨt mui' xix biiñak buiñor bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n sia ku pim jum tulhiiñ tu' bhaan.
60001010	Na gu' gui' nam bɨjɨk ya ja'p bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios, pui' tu a'gimɨk am gio na mɨt pui' tu ua'nak na sap pu'ñi jax chu'm tanoolh jix joi'ndat jam tɨɨgɨi gu Dios tu jam uañdha' gu jam ua'tulhdhara' na pim ba' cham jum tulhiiña' gatuuk.
60001011	Dɨɨlh guch Xoi'kam pui' ja'k ja jurtu'nka' gui' jɨ' nam bhaankamu'n tu a'gada' gu ñio'ki'ñ jano', na jɨ'k jax tu duñia' no't pu'ñi ya' ba ai dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, gam na jax ja'k jum tulhiiña' ja a'mkam na ba' mi' dhɨr jix io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n ba daasa' guch Gɨ'kora'. Tɨi ba' xim ga'ngada' am ja jujur am bhaan nam jix maachik ka' na jaroi' ba' pui'r jich Xoi'kam ka', na pai' dhɨr buusnɨi ba' pui' ba ja palhbuidha' gu ja'tkam, gam na pai' dhuuk ba' pui' tum duñia' gu pui' na jax ja jurtu'nka' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda'.
60001012	Ba' dɨɨlh gu Dios ba ja mattuda gui' jɨ' nam bhaankamu'n tu a'gada' na cham tu' jano' pui' tu kuugalhdha' na pui' tu ja uañdha' gu ja ua'tulhdhara' gu ja'tkam nam pai' dhuuk mi' kapup oipoda' gui'. Ja'pji sap jix io'm gatuuk ji na ba' pui' ba tu kuugalhdha', xib bak ba' nach pai' dhuuk pu'ñi ya' ba oipoda' aach. Jaiñ, pui' dho ba tum kuugalh ba' xib na mɨt jɨ'k jax tu ua'nak gui' jɨ' nam bɨjɨk ya ja'p bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk guch Gɨ'kora'. Ya' dho ɇɇk guch Xoi'kam pui' xi chu duuk nat tu' kɨ'n bha jii. Xib ba' dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook nai'p ba tum a'gichu' na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam, nat jɨ'k ja a'm tajaa gu Dios gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n gui' na ja a'm tajaañixchu'ndat gui' nam bɨjɨk ya ja'p bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk, na ba' ja mattudidha' nam jax ja'k tu a'gada', piam nam kɨ'n machia' gu tu' no'm jix maachik sia moo jax jix xijai, nam sia gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios cham jɨ'xdha' machia' siam tɨix maachik.
60001013	Ba' aañ jam guguuxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ na pim siamri mi' pui' xi jiimɨt na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora' pɨx am tɨ nɨɨrda' jano' na pai' dhuuk ya' aaya' guch Xoi'kam na ba' mi' dhɨr ba jam makia' gu gɇ'gɇr jup tum duu'nkam nat jam iimchuda gu Dios na jam makia'.
60001014	Cha'pim mu ja'k bhaan ka tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka' gu tu' ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n na pim jax tu buimɨk jano' na pim chakui tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam, na pim gu' aapi'm xib bar maamra'n gu Dios.
60001015	Gu' ja'pji dai ji na pim pɨx bhaan ji baapmigia' na pim mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax ja'k moox aa' guch Gɨ'kora' na pim ba' pu'ñi duujix chu uañ kɨr bap tui'ka' ja'p na jax gui' nat jaroi' xi jam joi'ndak jam a'm tɨ tɨɨ na joidham jix uañ.
60001016	Na pim gu' bax maat na jax jum kai'ch gu ñio'ki'ñ mi' pai' u'uan ta'm na tu ua'ñix nap jum kai'ch bo: “Joidham japim jix chu uañ kɨr jup tui'ka' ja'p na jax aañ nañ joidham jix uañ.”
60001017	Gu' ba' gu xib jum aa' na pim siamri soi'm ɨlhdhat mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, gui' na pim pui' ba iim xib nar jam Gɨ'kora', na pim ya' kapup dudua dhi oi'ñga'n dhi jam tutku' bhaan, na ba' jam baidhika' jix dhaam ja'k. Na gu' gui' cham jɨ'xdha' jaroi' joi'nda' no'x maat nat cham mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa' jano' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' na ja aagi'ñdha' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam tu' jax buimɨi nam duduakat. Bɨɨx ji na mi' pui' xi ja tɨɨda' nam sɨlhkam kuiñcha bia' na mɨt cham mi' pui' jii nat jax tu daasak, cham tu' na gu' jɨ'k ba'p jix ja joi'gɨ'nda' sia ku mɨt cham tu' ka'm tɨɨ.
60001018	Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ cham pu chu't, tu' ka'm japim xi ñɨidhat gu Dios, nat gu'x bhai' ba duu nat tuch uañ guch ua'tulhdhara' nach buam pɨx tu jimdat nam jax tu jimdat guch bopxi kat gam jich kukuulsi kat, nat bha joot guch Xoi'kam na ya' tuch ñamkixdha' kɨ'n gui' nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk, cham tu' kɨ'n gu tu' ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n na sap pɨk ba' pui' tɨix dha'ram jup namɨɨk, pui' na jax gux uam totbikdam gio gux chua totbikdam na nai' pɨx jim xichui'dha' mɨkkat.
60001019	Gu' ja'pji gu ɨ'ra'n guch Xoi'kam nat jaax bhaan gu kuruus nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk nat kɨ'n tuch ñamkix nach jix u'ua'tulhdhix kat, na mɨt mua sissapak kuruus ta'm na ba' mi' dhɨr pu'ñi duuji tuch uañdhix ka' guch ua'tulhdhara'. Ja'p jum duu na jax maa'n gux kɨɨ'x dhuakam gu kasnir nam ba makgɨrta' bhaan gu sasoi' mɨmɨi'ñkar.
60001020	Gu Dios bɨjɨk dɨr na chakui ya'r oi'ñga'n ka' pu pu chu'm kɨ'n dai jia guch Xoi'kam na sap ba' pu'ñi bha jimɨi ya'ch a'mkam jum tulhiiña' na tuch ñamkixdha' nach jix u'ua'tulhdhix, nach ba' mi' dhɨr cham mai' ka suulhgia'. Dho jaiñ, pui' tum duu dho, ya' dho xi ɇɇk pui' xi chu kuugalhdhak. Ja'p moo joidham iam, tɨɨ' na gu' jano' pɨk nach pai' dhuuk ya' ba oipo aach, jix bhai' tuch jii dho gu', nat gu' ba tuch uañ gu Dios guch ua'tulhdhara'.
60001021	Jix bhai' duu dho guch Xoi'kam nat tuch ñamkix, nach gu' mi' dhɨr ba' pu'ñi duuji dai gu Dios pɨx buiñor bax biiñak ka', gui' nat jaroi' dua'ñdhak giop bamii' guch Xoi'kam mu dɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr na mɨt pai' tɨi yaas gu ja'tkam xi mu'aak nat ba' mi' dhɨr jix io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n ba dai bhammɨx dhaam. Ba' xib dai gui' pim pɨx buiñor jix biiñak kat tɨ nɨɨrda' na pui' tu kuugalhdha' nat jax tuch dhaaxdhak.
60001022	Na pim gu' aapi'm jix chu uañ kɨr ba'p tu'ii' ba' xib, na pim gu' kɇɇkɇt gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios mi' pui' ba bhɨichu' na jax jix aa' tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam, nat gu' ba tu jam uañ gu jam ua'tulhdhara', gio na pimɨt ba maat na pim jax ja'k dui jix bhai' kai'chɨt xim jajoi'gɨ'ndat tu oi'ñka' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n gammɨjɨ . Ba' dhi' pu'ñi ja'k japim duiñchu'nda' gammɨjɨ nabap tanoolh, cha'pim tu' bhaan jum kokdada', gu' ja'pji na pim joidham jix bhai' kai'chɨt jix bhai' xim tɨ tɨtdat xim ja joi'gɨ'nda' ji bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n gio na pim jɨ'x jup jum taat.
60001023	Na gu' aapi'm na pim mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, ja'p ji buus na pimɨt giop ba maaxir gu jam i'ii'mda' bhaan, cham tu' gu ya' maaxik na jax na pimɨt pai' dhuuk maaxir dhi tuuku' bhaan. Gu ja'pji na pim mi' pui' ba jiim ji na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora' na jax bam kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ, nat gu' ba pataasa gu jam i'ii'mda', cham tu' pui' ja'k ka tu jim japim na pim jax chu jimdat. Ba' dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na pim kaichgɨt mi' pui' ba jiim, cham pai' dhuuk jum pataasa' ni ku cham pai' dhuuk jugia', gammɨjɨ ya' pui' pu tu daaxix ka' na jax ba tu ua'ñix.
60001024	Pui' na jax ba tu ua'ñix maa'n kap gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios nap jum kai'ch: Bɨɨx na jɨ'k gu ja'tkam ja'pni pɨx ji buan am na jax gu sai' na mu ja'p tuut. Ba' nam pai' dhuuk bar gɇ'gɇrkam ka', ja'p pɨx jup ji buanda' am na jax gu yooxga'n. Ba' na pai' dhuuk bhaatai nai' ji gakia' gu sai', bɨɨx gu yooxga'n pɨx cham pai' matgilhia', na gu' ba gakia' gu toona'n.
60001025	Pu'ñi ɨp gu ja'tkam ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, alhio pɨx nam ya' oipoda', gu' matgam gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios cham pai' dhuuk jugia' ji, gammɨjɨ ya' pui' pu tu daaxix ka' nat jax ba tu dai na tu aagix ka', ni ku cham pai' dhuuk jum pataasa'. Ba' dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam na jax jir tu'm kam na xib mui' kap tum a'gichu', jir di' pɨx gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na gammɨjɨ pui' pup tu aagix ka'.
60002001	Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ, mi' pim pui' xi jiimɨt na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora', cham tu' na pim pui' pɨx xim tɨɨtgat na pim jir jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham pu cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' na jax jix aa', sia ku pim gu' pui' tɨi xi chu bua nam jax ja'k bhaan pui' jam ɨlhii'ñdha' gu ja'tkam na pim jir jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham. Gu' ja'pji na pim sɨlhkam tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' ji. Cha'pim bɨɨx aixim jix buam jum duukam kap tu buada', ni ku pim cham jum i'iatgi'ñdhat, sɨlhkam japim tu a'gada'. Ni ku pim cham tu' ka jɨɨgak ka' maa'n no' tu' bia', gam na pim cham nai' ka tu a'gada'.
60002002	Gu' ja'pji dai ji na pim joidham bax maachik ka' na jax pɨk ja'k jix aa' gu Dios na pim tui'ñgɨda', na pim kɨ'n joidham jix kokba'n ka' gu jam i'ii'mda' bhaan, ja'p na jax gu a'aalh gui' nam kia'pɨx maaxilhia' nam gu' joidham gammɨjɨ pɨx kax xi'iik ka'. Pu'ñi ɨp aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ, mui' pim xi gaa'ñchu'nda' na jax pɨk ja'k jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora' na pim ba' cham mu ja'k ka bhɨichgɨda' na pim pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha' gɨt,
60002003	no' pim dho ji moo baabui' pui' bax chu maat na joidham jir jix bhai'kam gu Dios piam ku gu' cham.
60002004	Mui' pim xix biiñak ka'x io'm buiñor guch Xoi'kam jiñ jaaduñ, na gu' gui'x io'm jir gɇ'p jum duukam buiñor gu Dios, pui' kut ba' gɇ'kam kɨ'n bhaan tɨ tɨɨgɨk bha joot ya' dhi oi'ñga'n. Gui' ja'p ji buusan jia na jax maa'n gu jodai gui' nax io'm jir jix kɨɨ' na mɨt tu' pɨx ɨlhdhak ja'p xi dhuuk gu ja'tkam cham kɨɨgalhdhak.
60002005	Ba' aapi'm no' pim moo bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, gu Dios pu chu'm jup jam duñia' na jax gu joodai gux kɨkɨɨ' joidham, mi' dhɨr ba' kɨ'n kɨɨsa' gux abhaar gu chiopga'n. Piam na pu chu'm jup jam duñia' na jax gui' nam mi'r gɇ'gɇrkam ka' jax chu'm chiop, nam mi' oipot tu makgɨrxi'ñdha' gu Dios gam nam tu kubhioñxi'ñdha' na gammɨjɨ gui' na joidham jix kɨɨgalhdhidha'. Aapi'm pu'ñip ji bubuakia'ñ jaaduñ no' pim moo pɨx bhaan ji baapmigim na pim mi' pui' jiimɨt jix biiñak buiñor guch Xoi'kam nar gɇ'p jum duukam buiñor gu Dios,
