62004009	Na gu'x bhai'x maatɨ' jia na joidham jix chu joi'gɨ'n gu Dios. Tɨɨ' nat moo bha joot gu dai maa'n Maraa'n ya' aach jich bui, nat xich joi'gɨlh na sap ba' no' chich tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor, jich baidhika'x dhaam nach pai' joidham jix jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'.
62004010	Dɨɨlh pɨx nat xich joi'gɨlh gu Dios, sia kuch chakui mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa', dai pɨx nax mat ka' nach mu ja'k bhɨichu'n nach pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jich chulhiiñdha'. Pui' kut ba' bhai' ma joot gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam na ya'ch a'mkam jum makgɨrta' na ba' pu'ñi duuji tu namkix ka' nach jɨ'x jix u'ua'tulhdhix.
62004011	Dho jaiñ na jax pɨk jir jix bhai'kam gu Dios, gɇ'kam kɨ'n xich joi'gɨlh nach mai' ba suulhgix kat. Aach ba' mi' pui'p xi chu daa'ñchu'nda'ñ jaaduñ na jax gui', joidham jach xich jajoi'gɨ'nda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n.
62004012	Na ba' no'ch pu'ñi xich jajoi'gɨ'n bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, gammɨjɨch a'm ba kioka' guch Gɨ'kora', gam nax io'm ba xich joi'gɨ'nda'. Sia kuch gu' cham nɨi'ñ gu maaxik bhaan na jax chu'm, ku gu' ya'p tui'ka' ji jich bui no'ch pu'ñi ja'k xi dhuiñchu'.
62004013	Jix bhai'x maatɨ' nach a'm tɨ nɨidhim gu Dios, gio aach ya' dɨr mu ja'k nach buiñor jup tui'dhi', na gu' pui' ja'k jich mattu'n gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' nat jich a'm tajaa bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n.
62004014	Bax maat ich ɨp nat guch Gɨ'kora' bha joot gu dai maa'n Maraa'n ya' dhi oi'ñga'n na ba' ya'ch palhbuidha' bɨɨx nach jɨ'k ja'tkam nach ba' cham kach chulhiiña' gatuuk. Dhi' bɨɨx pu'ñi ja'k jich mattu'n gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda'.
62004015	Gu jaroi' no' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nat gu Dios bha joot gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam, dhi' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha', na gu' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' nar sɨlhkam, gio gui' ya' dɨr mu ja'k buiñor jup tui'ñgɨda' ɨp.
62004016	Ba' aach nach jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n buiñor guch Xoi'kam, jix bhai' bax maat ich na gu Dios joidham xich joi'gɨ'n, na gu'r di' pɨx gux chu joi'gɨ'n. Ba' gu jaroi' no' pui'p jix chu joi'gɨ'n na gui', dhi' bhaan bax maatɨ' ka' na sɨlhkam bax maat gu Dios, ba' pui' bam kai'chdha' na bhaan ba tɨ nɨidhim.
62004017	Ba' no'ch aach pui'p jix chu joi'gɨ'n na gu Dios, cham pai' totdon ka' ich jano' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' na ja aagi'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam tu' jax buimɨi nam duduakat ja tutku' bhaan, nach gu' pui' xich aa'nda' nach pui' ja'k jup tu jimdat nat jax tu jii dɨɨlh jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk.
62004018	Na gu' no'ñ moo joidham xix chu joi'gɨ'n na jax gu Dios, cham tu' bhaan toodon ka' iñ, dai nañ joidham jix bhai' pɨx jiñ chaat ka', pu pai' na ja'k jax jum duñia' gu too'nni'. Gu' dai ji no'ñ cham pui'p jix chu joi'gɨ'n na gu Dios nañ ba' tɨix choodon ka', nañ gu'x mat ka' nañ bañ chulhiiña' pɨx ba', nañ gu' dhi' bhaan cham am buatu'nda'.
62004019	Aach tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' ba jiim ji ba' xib na jax jix aa' gu Dios, nat gu' gui' bɨɨpɨ' dɨr xich joi'gɨlh ampɨk nach ba' aach tu' ka'm jup ba nɨi'ñdha', cham tu' nat gatuuk xich joi'gɨlh nach aach pu tu' ka'm ba nɨi'ñ.
62004020	Ba' no' gu' jaroi' maadɨt jax kai'ch: “Aañ dho gi tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jim ji na jax jix aa' gu Dios”, gu' ji no' gu'x bhaamki'ñ gu jumai na pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, pɨx jap kai'chdha', cham tu' sɨlhkam tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' gu Dios. Na gu' no' pu'ñi cham tu' ka'm nɨidhat jix joi'gɨ'n gu jumaich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham na ya' nɨi'ñ maaxik, ¿jax dhui tu' ka'm jup tɨgia' gu Dios na cham maax?
62004021	Gu' dhi'm aa' ji na pui'p xix jajoi'gɨ'nda' gu jai'ch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham no' baabui' tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' ba jim na jax jix aa' gu Dios, pui' nat jax ja'k xi chu daasak guch Xoi'kam jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk nap kai'ch bo: “Gu jaroi' no' tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' ba jim na jax jix aa' gu Dios, jum aa' na tu' ka'm nɨidhat jix joi'gɨ'nda' ɨp gu jumai na pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aañ jiñ bui.”
62005001	Gu jaroi' no' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na gu Jesuus jir di' guch Xoi'kam nat Dios bha joot, dhi' jɨ' pui' bam kai'chdha' na Dios jir Maraa'n. Ba' no' pui' bam tɨɨtɨ' na Dios bar Maraa'n, jum aa' nax ja joi'ndat jix bhai' ja tɨtdada' gu jai' nam pui'p jir maamra'n gu Dios.
62005002	Ba' aach no'ch tu' sɨlhkam tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora', jich a'm jum aa' nach jix ja joi'ndat tu' ka'm ja nɨi'ñdha' gu jai' nam pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, nam gu'r maamra'n guch Gɨ'kora'.
62005003	Nañ mi' pui' xi jimda' na jɨ'k moo jax jix aa' gu Dios na ba' pui' bam kai'ch nañ tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ. Cham xijai ɨp nañ mi' pui' tu kuugalhdhidha' nat jax tu dai, ni ku pai'x magooñi'.
62005004	Gio na gu' no'ñ sɨlhkam bar maraa'n gu Dios, cham tu' bhaan ka tɨtɨɨ'ñchoka' iñ jia gu tu' nar ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n, ni kuñ tu' bhaan ka xiñ ua'tulhdham ka', nañ gu' bɨɨx jiñ jur kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' buiñor guch Xoi'kam, ba' cham jɨ'xdha' jax jiñ dhooda' gux buam jum duukam.
62005005	No'ñ tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ dho siamri bɨɨx jiñ jur kɨ'n na gu Jesuus jich Xoi'kam Dios jir Maraa'n nat bha joot na ba' cham jax jiñ dhooda' gux buam jum duukam, na gu' bañ palhbui'ñchu'nda' gu Dios nañ ba' cham ka xiñ ua'tulhdham ka'.
62005006	Jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk guch Xoi'kam dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, suudai' kɨ'n jum bakuanak, gio mɨkkat na mɨt pai' dhuuk mua na mɨt sissapa kuruus ta'm, gɇ' jaax gu ɨ'ra'n. Dhi'ch ba' bhaan jix mat ka' na sɨlhkam ya' oilhimɨk. Bɨɨx gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' pui'x chu maat nat pu'ñim duu guch Xoi'kam, ba'm aa' nach jɨɨgi'ñdha' na pai' dhuuk pu'ñi ja'k jich jurtu'nka'.
62005007	Ba' pui' ji buusan nam baik pui'x chu maat nat sɨlhkam ya' ɇɇk guch Xoi'kam, pui' na jax gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda', gio ba' gu suudai', gio ba' gu ɨ'ra'n ɨp. Ba' dhi' dhi bɨɨx baik xi chuut am nam pui' kai'ch nat sɨlhkam ya' ɇɇk ji guch Xoi'kam, ba'm aa' nach tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' no'm pui' ba tuch a'gi'ñ.
62005009	Na gu' ja'pni jia na jax ba' gu jaroi' no' ya'ni ja'p pai' kɨɨkat jax tuñ a'gi'ñ, nañ gu' joidham pɨx jix dhappaam jɨɨgi'ñdha' no' jax kai'ch. Gu' dhi' gi ba' na Dios jir ñio'ki'ñ, pu moo jano' ji nach joidham kɇɇji ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' no'm pui' ba tuch a'gi'ñ, nam gu' pui'ch chɨtdaidha' na guch Xoi'kam Dios jir Maraa'n nat bha joot bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam. Dhi ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios gɇ'p jum duukam bhaan tu a'ga, cham tu' tu' palhɨɨp jup jum duukam.
62005010	Ba' gu jaroi' no' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na guch Xoi'kam sɨlhkam Dios jir Maraa'n nat bha joot, cham tu' iatda' ɨlhii'ñdha' no' jaroi' pui' ba tu a'gi'ñ. Gu' no' gu' cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na Dios jir Maraa'n guch Xoi'kam, iatda' dho pɨx ɨlhii'ñdha' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na bhaan tu a'ga na guch Xoi'kam jir Maraa'n nat bha joot bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam, pui' ba' pɨx ba ji buusnia' nax iatbi' gu Dios.
62005011	Gu' gu Dios pui' tɨi ba tɨi ji na sap jich baidhika'x dhaam nach pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', ku gu' sap no'ch tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' ji buiñor gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam. No'ch gu' sap cham tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha', cham tu' dhoch baidhika'.
62005012	Na gu' dai gu jaroi' no' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor gu Maraa'n gu Dios na ba' jimia'x dhaam na pai'p tu'ii'. No' gu' pu'ñi cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, dho gi gu' cham tu' jimia' ji, ya' pup bi'ya' na pai'r tu tulhiiñara'.
62005013	Ba' aapi'm jix bhai' pɨx jum taat ka'ñ jaaduñ, na pim gu' aapi'm jimia'x dhaam na pim pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', na pim gu' aapi'm bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam nar Maraa'n gu Dios.
62005014	Na gu' aach nach jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, dai gu Dios jach pɨx buiñor bax biiñak, nach gu'x maat nach kɇɇkɇ' nach pai' dhuuk soi'ch ɨlhdhat mu taanda' gu tu' nach a'm jum aa'nda', no'x maat na sɨlhkam jich a'm jum aa'.
62005015	Ba' dai nach pɨx tɨ nɨɨrda' na gui'ch makia' maa'n jimdam gu tu' nach mu tañia' nach a'm jum aa', no'ch dho ji baabui' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na gui'ch kɇɇkɇ' nach jɨ'k tu' mu taanda' soi'ch ɨlhdhat.
62005016	Gioñ ba' moo ja'pnip xi jam tɨɨdam jiñ jaaduñ, no' pim maadɨt nɨi'ñ gu jax chu'm jich jaduuñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan na cham pɨk mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora', no' gu' pui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, tu daañxi'ñdha' pim buiñor gu Dios na tu uañdha' gu ua'tulhdharga'n na ba' cham ka tulhiiñchuda' gatuuk. No' gu' pu cham ka tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, dho gi gu' cham jɨ'xdha' tu uañdha' ji gu Dios, sia ku pim aapi'm tɨi tu daañxi'ñ buiñor na tu uañdha' gu ua'tulhdharga'n, na gu' pu cham pai' soi'm ɨlhii'ñdha', ba' dai na ba tulhiiñchuda' gatuuk.
62005017	Na gu' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan, tu' nach pɨx bhaan bach ua'tulhdha' ji bo, ku ba' gu' no'ñ moo tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam soi'ñ ɨlhii'ñ, tuñ uañdha' ji gu Dios guñ ua'tulhdhara', ba' cham tu' kañ chulhiiñchuda' gatuuk.
62005018	Gu' ba' gu jaroi' no' Gɨ'korga'n ba iim gu Dios, cham ka joojoi'ñdha' nam ua'tulhi'ñdha', na gu' palhbui'ñchu'nda' guch Xoi'kam na ba' cham mai'chia' gux buam jum duukam.
62005019	Aach nach jɨ'k moo ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, Dios buiñor jup tui'dhi' ich, na gu'ch a'm tɨ nɨidhim. Gu' ba' gui' nam jɨ'k tu' pɨx ɨlhii'ñ guch Xoi'kam nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, dhi' dai bɨɨx ja daam kɨɨk gu ja'ook.
62005020	Aach nach gu' bax maat gu sɨlhkam Dios na jaroi'x io'm jir gɇ'kam, nat gu' bach mattuda gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam nat bhammɨ dɨr bha joot jix dhaam na pu'ñi ya'ch aagi'ñdha' na jax jir tu'm kam guch Gɨ'kora'. Pui' kuch ba' aach xib dai guch Xoi'kam buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat mi' pui' bhɨichu' na jax jix aa', nach gu' bax maat nar di' gu sɨlhkam Dios nax io'm jir gɇ'kam, gio nax bhaai' nach baidhika' gatuuk jix dhaam ja'k nach pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'.
62005021	Dai gu Dios japim ba' tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jiimda' na jax jix aa' jiñ jaaduñ. Cha'pim mu ja'k ja daanda' gup duñiixim didios. Ja'pniñ ba' pɨx jam guguuxi'ñ.
63001001	Mɨjɨ ja'p tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ iñ jiñ jaaduñ na pim jɨ'k joidham maap jum jumpadat tu daan buiñor gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' mi' pui' jiimɨt na jax jix aa' tu' ka'm nɨidhat, nañ gu' aañ joidham jix bhai'ñ chaatɨt aapi'm jam bui xi jam joi'gɨ'n bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n. Bɨɨx siañ bɨɨm jix bhai'm taatɨt xi jam joi'gɨ'n am gu ya' kam jiñ jaaduñ nam pui'p kaichgɨt guch Xoi'kam mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora'.
63001002	Ba' aach ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k cham jɨ'xdha' mɨk ka bua' dhi' nach tu' bax maat xib, nach gu' bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na dhi'r sɨlhkam, cham tu' nar iatda'. Pui' kuch ba' xib joidham jix bhai' bach chaat aapi'm jam bui na pim pui' bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n jup ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Jam guguuxi'ñ iñ ba' na pim cham tu' mɨk ka buppada' dhi' na pimɨt tu' ba maat.
63001003	Ja'pni ku ba' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' bɨɨma'n gu Maraa'n jich Xoi'kam xi jam joi'ndat jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' am gammɨjɨ na ba'x bhai' tu jam jimda', gam na pim ba' joidham jix jɨjɨkgɨm jup tui'ka' cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt, gio na pim ba' mi' pui' jiimɨt na jax jix aa' xim jajoi'gɨ'nda' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n.
63001004	Joidham gɇ'kam kɨ'n jañich jix bhai'ñ ɨlh aapi'm jam bui na ñich pui' ba tɨ kai na pim joidham bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora'.
63001005	Ba' aañ pui' tɨi jam guguuxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ na pim siamri cham jum kokdat, joidham japim xim jajoi'gɨ'nda' pɨx bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, na gu' pui' ja'k aagix jia gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na pim jax ba tɇ kɇɇ jano' dɨr na pimɨt pai' dhuuk tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Cham tu' na dhi'r xibkam nañ aañ mui' ba tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ, pu dhi' pɨx ji na jax bhaan ba tum a'ga bɨjɨk dɨr.
63001006	Na gu' no'ñ moox aa' nañ tu' sɨlhkam tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora', jum aa' nañ bɨɨx mi' pui' tu kuugalhdhidha' na jɨ'k moo jax jix aa', cham tu' nañ maa'n kap cham mi' pui' duiñchu'nda'. Ba' aach na chich pai' dhuuk dɨr tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, pui' puch chɨtda nach sap jix ja joi'gɨ'nda' gu jai', sia jaroi' na pɨx.
63001007	Moo pim xi chɨ nɨidhat jiñ jaaduñ, nam gu' xib jix io'm mui' nai' oipichu' gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam pui' tu iatgidhim nat sap guch Xoi'kam cham tu' sɨlhkam maa'nkam jup jum duuk ya' ɇɇk, nam gu' dhi' cham tu'r jix kɨkɨɨ' ja'tkam. Dhi' jim ba' bar di' gui' nam tu' sɨlhkam jix bhaamki'ñ guch Xoi'kam, pu cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ am gu' nat ya' ɇɇk, gu' chi ba' pɨk nam jup ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' buiñor.
63001008	Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ cham pu chu't, ni ku pim cham ja kɇkɇɇda' gu dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam no'm jax jam iatgi'ñ. Jir maa'n na pim jax tu daa'ñchu'n na pim pai' jax ba bhɨichu' na ba' jam a'm tu bi'ya' gu gɇ'gɇr jup tum duu'nkam na saak tu jam makia' gu Dios. No' pimɨt gu' mu ja'k ji ja kai, dho gi gu' cham tu' jam makia' ji.
63001009	Ba' gu jaroi' no' jai' pup mi' xi baapsaim na dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñdha' na pai' dhuuk tɨi sap pɨk ba' tu a'gada' gu Dios ñio'ki'ñ, cham tu' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha' gu Dios. Jɨɨ' ji no' daaxix kam pɨx tu a'ga, daipu' nat jax pɨx xi chu daasak guch Xoi'kam jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk na ba' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha' gu Dios gio gu Maraa'n Jesuus.
63001010	Ba' no' jaroi' maadɨt mu ja'p pai' jimdat jam ki'aam jax ba tu jam a'gidhim, no' gu' cham tu' pui' ja'k kai'chim nat jax tu daasak guch Xoi'kam, sia ku gu' pui' kai'chim na Dios ñio'ki'ñ tu a'gim, cha'pim ja kɇkɇɇda', ni ku pim cham tu' pɨx jix bhai' ja tɨɨdai ja aichdha'.
63001011	Na gu' no' pimɨt aapi'm pɨx jix bhai' ja tɨɨdak ja aich, dhi' bhaan pui' bam kai'chdha' na pim jai'p ba ja bɨntatu' gui' nam jix bhaamut a'gada' guch Xoi'kam.
63001012	Bɨɨx aixim ji gu' nañ tɨi xi chu jam a'gidham jiñ jaaduñ dhi u'uan ta'm, gu' ji nañ gu' chi moo ja'xbui' pɨx mu tu jam ua'ñxidha' gu xib. Dɨɨlh jañ mu jim bhammɨ dɨr jam bui nañ ba' maaxik mi ja'p daibui jam aagi'ñdha' nañ jɨ'k jax ka xi chu jam a'gidham, nach ba' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k bɨɨx dhɨt joidham jix bhai' bach chaat ka'.
63001013	Ja'pniñ ba' pɨx mu tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ. Ba' mɨjɨ ja'p jam ñio'ki'ñ am gu ya' kam jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham no' pim jix bhai'm ɨlhii'ñ, nam gu'x bhai'm taat nax ja joi'ndat pui' ja a'm jup ba tɨ nɨidhim gu Dios na jax aapi'm.
64001001	Mu tum ua'ñxi'ñ iñ jiñ jaduuñ Gaayo, nañ gu' gɇ'kam kɨ'n xim joi'gɨ'n, nach gu' gook dɨt maa'n ñi'ook jup duukat jix bhai' maap jich dhaa'.
64001002	Aañ gammɨjɨm a'mkam tu daañchu'nda'ñ jaduuñ buiñor guch Gɨ'kora' nañ pui' tɨɨ'ntu'nda' nam a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jum palhbui'ñchu'nda' na ba'x bhai' tum jimda' gu maaxik bhaan, nax bhai' ji buusnidha' gu tu' nap jax buada', ja'p na jax jix bhai' tum jim gum ii'mda' bhaan.
64001003	Joidham gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai'ñ ɨlh jañich nam pui' ba tuñ a'gi'ñ jɨ'kchi guñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan nam bhɨjɨ dɨr jiim, nap sap joidham jir maa'n nap jax mi' pui' jim na jax pɨk ja'k moox aa' guch Gɨ'kora'
64001004	ja bɨɨm gu jai'ñ jaaduñ nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Ba' gammɨjɨ pɨx joidham jix jɨkgɨm jup tu'ii' iñ nañ pui' xiñ aagɨt na pim jir maa'n na pim jax mi' pui' xi jiim na pim pai' jax ba bhɨichu'.
64001005	Aap dho gi tu' sɨlhkam jix biiñak kat buiñor guch Gɨ'kora' jir jix bhai'kam ji jiñ jaduuñ. Tɨɨ' nap gu' joidham jix ja joi'ndat jix bhai' ja bua gu jai'ch jaaduñ nam mɨk dɨr ja'k tu jimda' nam mi' aajidha' jum ki'aam, nam mi ja'p tu a'gidha' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios.
64001006	Dhi'm ba' ya ja'p pui' ba tu a'gim nap jax jir tu'm kam jiñ jaduuñ, nap sap pu'ñi joidham jix ja joi'ndat jix bhai' ja buada' na mɨt jɨ'kim bhai' ba ai jum ki'aam. Bɨɨx jam pui' bax chu maat gu ya' kam jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham. Ba' aañ jum guguuxi'ñ jiñ jaduuñ nap siamri pu'ñix bhai' xi ja bua't guñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan no'm bhai' aajim jum ki'aam, xi ja palhbuidhat ap kɨ'n gu tu' na ja a'm jum aagaidha', na gu' pu'ñi ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios.
64001007	Nam gu' dhi' tu juanaidhat jup tui'ñgɨda' jia buiñor guch Xoi'kam nam tu a'gidha' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ, cham tu' nam ja'p pɨx mu ja'p jiimda', na gu' sap cham jir am nam ja taanda' gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam gu tu' na ja a'm jum aagaidha'.
64001008	Aach ba'ch a'm jum aa' nach jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nach pu'ñi xi ja palhbuidhat guch jaaduñ no'm jich aajim kɨ'n gu tu' na ja a'm jum aagaidha' nam ba' kɨ'n jum guguuxdhatgɨda' nam tu a'gidha' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios. Ba' pui' bam kai'chdha' nach aach bɨɨx jup jir tujuandam tugi'ñ guch Gɨ'kora' no'ch ja palhbui'ñ.
64001009	Maa'nnim jañich mɨjɨ tɨi tu ja ua'ñxi guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham nañ ja aagi'ñ na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios nam tui'ñgɨda'. Gu' ji nañ gu' ja'p tɇ kɇɇ nax bhaam gu Diotrepes nat mu bam aich gu u'uan, panaas ku gɇ'kam jum taat. Tɨix aa' nam dɨɨlh kaichgɨda' gɨt guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham, pui' ku ba' cham aa' nañ aañ ya' dɨr jax jup ka ja tɨtdada' guñ jaaduñ, na gu' tɨix aa' na ja daam kɨɨka' gɨt.
64001010	Kuñ ji gu' aañ siamri xi aagi'ñdha' ji nañ pai' dhuuk mu jimda' na cham bhai' na pui' ja'k tu jimda', na gu' dhi' cham tu'r am buiñor gu Dios. Gio gu' bɨɨx aixim jich a'ga bɨɨx nach jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ ya ja'p buiñor guch Xoi'kam, sia ku cham jir pui', na pui' pɨx jich buixi'ñ na xich bhaamkidhat. Gio ja'p jup tɇ kɇɇ iñ na sap cham jɨ'xdha' ja tɨbiaptuda' guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham nam mɨk dɨr mi' tɨi aajidha' kia'mi'ñ nam bhaankamu'n tu a'gidha' guch Xoi'kam. Piam no'm jai' dhɨt gu mi' kam jich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham tɨix ja tɨbiaptudak, ja soo'mchulhi'ñka'. Ba' no't jaroi' maadɨt xi ja tɨbiaptuda, pu mai' ardimia' sap mi' dhɨr nam pai' tu daanda'. Ja'pni ja'k dho pɨx kaidha'.
64001011	Ba' aap jiñ jaduuñ cham pu chu't. Jix bhai'p xi chu jimda' na jax ja'k jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ guch Gɨ'kora' cham tu'p jum buixdhat sia kum jai' jax jup tu jim. Na gu' cham tu' bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha' jia saak gu Dios gu jaroi' no'x buam pɨx tu jim na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, jɇɇ' ji gu jaroi' na joidham jix bhai' xi chu jimda' na ba' joidham bhaan tɨ nɨidhidha'.
64001012	Gio guñ jaduuñ Demetrio pui' joidham jup kaidha', bɨɨx pɨx jix bhai' aa' am, jup kai'ch am na sap joidham jir jix bhai'kam. Tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ iñ dho nar sɨlhkam na jax kaidha', nañ gu'x maat na gui' tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jim na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora', nap jax bax maat jiñ jaduuñ.
64001013	Ja'xbui'ñ pɨx mu tum ua'ñxi'ñ jiñ jaduuñ. Bɨɨx aixim ji gu' nañ mui' tɨi xi chum ua'ñxidham kat, ji na gu' chi moo ja'xbui' pɨx gu xib.
64001014	Dɨɨlh jañ mu jim nañ mum paxiarmɨra'ñ jaduuñ mu nap pai' kio, muñ ba' moo bam aagi'ñdha' dho gi ji ba' nañ jɨ'k jax ka xi chum a'gidham.
64001015	Ja'pniñ dho ba' pɨx mu tum ua'ñxi'ñ jiñ jaduuñ. Moo gɨt ba' joidham gammɨjɨ pɨx jix jɨkgɨm jup tui'ka' ap. Ba' ya' dɨr mum ñio'ki'ñ am gum jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan no'p jix bhai'm ɨlhii'ñ, gio aañ ya' dɨr mɨjɨp ja ñio'ki'ñ gu mu ja'p kam jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan nam jax jum ɨlhii'ñ, nap ba' mi' dhɨr jiñ a'mkam ja ñio'kdha'.
65001001	Aañ Juudas nañ jir ja'nni'ñ gu Santiago gio nañ jir tujuandam tugi'ñ guch Xoi'kam, mu tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ iñ jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan mu ja'p na pim jax tu oi'dha' na jɨ'k xi jam joi'ndat jam a'm ba tɨ nɨidhim gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' na pim ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam no' pim siamri mɨjɨ ja'p pai'x bhai'm ɨlhii'ñ.
65001002	Moo gɨt ba' gɇ'kam kɨ'n jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat xi jam joi'gɨ'nda' gu Dios na pim ba' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm pɨx jup tui'ka' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, gam na pim xim jajoi'gɨ'nda'.
65001003	Bɨjɨk dɨr jañ mɨjɨ tɨi xi chu jam ua'ñxidham ka'ñ jaaduñ, nañ tɨi bhaan xi chu jam a'gidham ka' nat jɨ'k tu' jax dhuu guch Xoi'kam jano' nat tuch ñamkix guch ua'tulhdhara' nach ba' cham kach chulhiiña' gatuuk. Ku ba' gu' xib jumai bhaan xi chu jam a'gidham iñ ji, cham tu' dhi'. Xib gu' dai ji nañ pui' tɨi xi jam tɨɨdam dhi u'uan ta'm jiñ jaaduñ na pim mui' xim guguuxdhatgɨda' na pim jix biiñak kat bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n mi' pui' xi jiimda' na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ guch Gɨ'kora', nat jich chianɨk nach saak mi' pui' tu kuugalhdhidha' na jɨ'k xich joi'ndat jich a'm ba tɨ nɨidhim.
65001004	Tɨix buam jiñ aa' iñ gu' na mɨt bhɨjɨ ba ji kai'ñcha jam bui gui' nam tu iatgi'ñ, nam pui' kai'ch na sap cham tum aa' nach tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' guch Xoi'kam, na gu' sap pur cham tu'. Gam nam pui' kai'chɨt oipo na sap cham jɨ'xdha'ch chulhiiñchuda' gu Dios sia kuch jix buam tu bua na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, na gu' sap gui'r jix bhai'kam, cham jɨ'xdha' na moop ba jich chulhiiñchuda'. Ku ba' gu' dhi' am tɨ'ñchoka' am ji nax io'm ja tulhiiñchuda' guch Gɨ'kora', na mɨt gu' giilhim gɇ' bam ua'tulh buiñor. Pui' ja'k tu daaxix gu ñio'ki'ñ mi' nat pai' tum ua'nak bɨjɨk na jax ja dooda' gu pu'ñi chu'm gu ja'tkam. Cham jir am gu' gu pui' nam jax kai'chɨt oipo bhaan xim iatat nam sap pɨk ba' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nat gu Dios jix ja joi'ndak ja palhbui, gu' na jax dhui pɨx bhaan cham maatɨ' ka' ji nam cham kɨɨgalhdhat jix bhaamut aa' guch Xoi'kam, gam nam bɨɨx aixim tu bua na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ.
65001005	Na gu' dhi' ja'pni jia nat jax tu ja dooda bo bɨjɨk guch bopxi kat. Pu kani gɨt nañ moo palhɨɨp bhaan xi chu jam a'gidha'. Jano' nam bhammɨ dɨr tu ja juantu'nda' Ejipto gu Israel kam ja'tkam, gu Dios ja palhbui na mɨt ba' bha bubua yammɨ dɨr ja'k Kanaan. Yammɨ dɨr nat ja aichdhak ba' moo dai nat jup ba ja koi gui' na mɨt jɨ'k cham tu' ka'm tɨɨ na jax tɨix aagat. Dhi' pu'ñip tu ja dooda'.
65001006	Gio ja'pni ɨp na jax gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios jano' na mɨt gɇ'kam kɨ'n jum ua'tulh buiñor, na mɨt dai dɨɨlh gɇ'gɇrkam ba jim ɨlh, gio na mɨt pui' ba ji chu duu nam dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñ. Jaiñ nat cham tu' tu ja uañ gu Dios, pu moo jano' ji nat tu chia nam ja buuprai bapaiñum tɨtropiñ kɨ'n mɨjɨ ja'p ka xi ja kuupa' mi' maa'n kap na pai'x io'm jix chu tukgam, jano' juugɨt na pai' dhuuk tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n na xi ja aa'ñdhai na mɨt tu' bhaan cham am bua na ba' moo mu ja'k xi ja iabu' nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'.
65001007	Gio ja'pni ɨp na pim jax bax maat nat tu ja dooda bɨjɨk gui' nam mu oi'ñkat Sodooma, gio ja'pni ja'k na pai' Gomorra tɨ tɨɨ', gio mi' dhɨr ja'p bɨɨx xikoolh na jax a'lhich jir kikcham kat, nat tai kɨ'n ja koi bo gu Dios nam cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha'. Pu'ñi bɨɨx aixim tu buada' am na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñdha', gam nam giilhim mui' ja bɨɨm boppoda' gu u'uub, gam sia dɨɨlh dai chichio'ñ. Gammɨjɨ nam jax aajidha' nam pu tu buichgɨda', ja'pni kai'ñkam ba' ja mɨi'ñ gu Dios, na mɨt gu' giilhim gɇ' bam ua'tulh buiñor. Sia xib jam dho pui mɨɨjim mu na pai' gɇ' mɨim gu tai na cham jɨ'xdha' tukia', ba' dhi' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha' am. Dhi'ch ba' bhaan tɨ'ñchoka' xib na pu'ñip tuch jimia' aach no'ch jax dhuuk cham tu' ka'm tɨgia' gu Dios.
65001008	Ba' dhi' dhi ja'tkam nañ jaroi' ja aa' na mɨt bha ja'p maakam ba ji jam iatgi, pu'ñi ja'k jup tu ja dooda', na mɨt gu' pui' gɇ'p bam ua'tulh bɨxchu' bhaan, gam nam pui' kai'chɨt oipo na cham tu'r jich Gɇ'kam tuk guch Xoi'kam. Gio gu' cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ am pui' xi kai'chɨt, daman tu' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñ am gui' nam ya ja'p jir gɇ'gɇrkam. Sia gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios gampai' pɨx ja bia' am, dai nam giilhim xi ja ai'chuxdhat, nam gu' ja'p moo tu' nam pɨx bhaan gɇ'gɇrkam jum taat ka'.
65001009	Cham pui' na gu Migial gui' nar nobii'ñ gu Dios, na cham pai' moo ja'p pu'ñi pɨk gɇ'kam jum taat sia kur ja gɇ'kam tuk bɨɨx na jɨ'k noonbi'ñ gu Dios. Jaiñ na cham pai' jax xi chɨtda gu ja'ook dɨɨlh gɇ'kam jum taatɨt na jax ɨlhii'ñ jano' nat joot gu Dios na baabuidhai yaaspa' gu tukga'n gu Moisees nat ba muu. Jup tɨtda pɨx soi'm ɨlhdhat: “Dho gu' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' ji nam aagi'ñdha' na jax jup ɨlhii'ñ. Aañ nañ gu'r tujuandam tugi'ñ pɨx, cham bia' iñ nañ jax jum tɨɨda'.”
65001010	Gu' dhi' dhi ja'tkam ja'pji nam moo pu cham ja jur bia', ja'p pɨx ji nam moo gɇ'gɇrkam jim taatɨt bɨɨx aixim kai'chdha' nam sia dɨɨlh pu cham maatɨt kɇɇ nam jax kai'ñkam jup kai'chdha'. Sɨlh pɨx nam gammɨjɨ pup kai'chidha' nam jax ɨlhii'ñdha', ja'p pɨx ji buan am na jax gu sasoi' na ni jɨ'x kum ja jur bia'. Dhi' ba' pui' pɨx ba ji buusan nam dɨɨlh gaa'ñchu' nam jax dhui mu ja'k suulhgia' nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'.
65001011	Tɨix buam jiñ aa' iñ ja a'mkam, na gu' dhi' cham bhai' tu ja jimia', nam gu' buam pɨx tu bua na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ guch Gɨ'kora'. Pui' ja'k jup xi chu jim am gu' nat jax tu jii bɨjɨk gu Kayiin nat mua gu sɨpdhi'ñ. Gam nam bɨɨx aixim jix buam jum duukam bhaan mui'x mai'chik gu tuumiñ, ja'p nat jax tu jii ɨp bɨjɨk gui' na Balaam jup tɨɨgich, na pu'ñi dai tuumiñ mui'x mai'chim kat. Ba' dhi' saalhiom dai na ja'pni pɨx ba tu ja dooda' nat jax jum duu bɨjɨk gui' na Koree tɨɨgich, nat bhaa gu dɨbɨɨr nat gɇ'kam kɨ'n bam ua'tulh buiñor gu Dios.
65001012	Ja'p chi alh moox xi'ɨraam no'm jai' mɨjɨmmɨp xi dharaa pai' na pim tu piastatda' daich Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham na pim jix bhai'm taat ka' buiñor gu Dios. Nam gu' dhi' dhi ja'tkam cham tu' ka'm tɨ nɨi'ñ, ni nam jix maatɨt tu xi'ɨ'ra, gɇ'gɇr bha chu koi'mɨi am nam jɨ'x ɨlhii'ñdha', nam jax dhui pɨx ba' mi' ba jam ia'ñdha' nam jax jir tuutu'm no' pim gan ja bɨɨm tu kua'. Nam gu' mu dɨr bha ja'k pu cham xi jam joi'gɨ'nda', dai dɨɨlh pɨx nam xim joi'gɨ'n. Dhi' ja'pni pɨx ji buan am jia na jax no' tɨi pɨx jix chuk sai'chu' gu tɨbaa', gu' ji no' gu' cham bha duuk, dai na pɨx ji jim gammɨjɨ pai' na ja'k ua'ka' gu jɨbɨɨlh. Piam ja'pni ɨp na jax gu jax chu'm ɨ'ɨɨx no' cham i'bhai'ñchar sia kut tɨi bam ai na pai' dhuuk iibhai'ñchai ba bhaaya' gɨt. Ja'p ji buusan nam pu ba ko'iix dhi' dhi ja'tkam, nam gu' cham xiim bam tulhiiña'.
65001013	Gio ba' ja'pni ja'k pɨx jup ji buan am dhi' na jax gu gɇ' suudai' na giilhim bha sɨlh gu'ngukda' no'x jɨbɨɨr. Gu ja ua'tulhdhara' ba' ja'pni ɨp na jax gu tokso' na mi' dhɨr ja'p katka' bɨɨx suudai' jugii'ñ, jix ikoora' giox chanaara' na jax aa' gu pu chu'm, nam gu' dhi' dhi ja'tkam giilhim bɨxchu' bhaan jum ua'tulhi'ñ. Ja'pni pɨx jup ba ji buan am na jax gu chiichia' no'm gammɨjɨ pɨx pup jiim, na gu' dhi' ba ja bi'chulhdhix nam mummu ja iabu' maa'n kap na pai' giilhim jix io'm jix chukgam, nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'.
65001014	Moo pu pui' ba kai'ch ji gu' gui' na Enok tɨɨgich na bɨjɨk bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios, na mɨk dɨr pa'r kuulsi'ñ gu Adaan, na sap jax tu ja jimia' gu dhi' pu chu'm gu ja'tkam, nap kai'ch: “Alh moo jootom bhai' ka jim gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' ja bɨɨm mui' cham daaxix kam gu noonbi'ñ
65001015	na bam aaya' na pai' dhuuk ja aagi'ñdha' bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam nam tu jax buimɨi nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan. Ba' mi' dhɨr dai na ba ja tulhiiñchuda' gui' nam jɨ'k bɨɨx aixim jix buam tu buimɨi na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, gam gui' nam bɨɨx aixim ai'chuxdhat jix bhaamut a'gimɨi gu Dios.”
65001016	Ba' pu'ñi ja'k tu ja jimia' dhi' dhi ja'tkam nañ jaroi' bhaan tu a'ga, nam gu' giilhim buam pɨx tomaat na jax cham pui' ja'k aa' gu Dios. Jix bhai'x mat kam xim ɨlhii'ñdha' am gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, gɇ'gɇrkam jum taatɨt gampai' pɨx ja ɨlhdhat jix bhaamut ja aa'nda' am ba' gui' nam sɨlhkam tu a'gada' gu Dios ñio'ki'ñ pui' xi ja ai'chuxdhat nam cham tu' maat, nam sap ba' dai gui' pɨx mu ja'k ja kaichgɨda' gu ja'tkam. Jix bhai'm taat ka' am ba' no' mɨt mu ja'k ji ja kai, nam gu' mi' pɨx ja iatgi'ñdha'.
65001017	Tɨ'ñchokat japim jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan nam jax tu jam a'gidhimɨk gu noonbi'ñ gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam,
65001018	nam jup jam tɨtda bo na saak pu'ñi na pai' dhuuk ba miamlhia' na tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, mui' bhai' ji jai'chdhɨlhia' am gu ja'tkam nam pu'ñi bɨɨx aixim tu buada' nam dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñdha', gio gam nam bɨɨx aixim xi ja ai'chuxdhat tu' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñdha' gui' nam bhaankamu'n tɨi tu a'gada' guch Gɨ'kora'.
65001019	Dho gu' dhi' jim ba' bar di' nam bha ja'p ba oipo jam bui nam ba xi jam kokdhichdhak na pim joidham maap maa'n ñi'ook jup duukat kax biiñak buiñor guch Xoi'kam, na pim sap ba'm jɨ'dɨlhkadai mu ja'k ji ja bɨnta' na pim jai' pui' ja'k jup ba tu jimda' nam jax tu jim dɨɨlh. Pui' kai'ñkam pɨx jam ba' maakam ba xi jam iatgidhak, na gu' dhi' dhi ja'tkam cham tu' ja a'm tajaañix jia gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' na pui' ja'k ja jurtudim nam ba' xi jam iatgidhak, dɨɨlh pɨx ji nam gɇ'gɇrkam jim taatɨt.
65001020	Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan, cha'pim ja kɇkɇɇda' no' mɨt jax ba ji jam iatgi dhi' dhi ja'tkam. Dios japim pɨx buiñor jix biiñak ka' mi' pui' jiimɨt na pim pai' jax ba bhɨichu'. Gammɨjɨ pim tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios na ba' jam aagi'ñdha' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' na pim jax ja'k tui'ñgɨda'.
65001021	Joidham japim tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' xi jiimda' pɨx na jax pɨk ja'k jix aa', dai ji na pim pɨx tɨ nɨɨrda' jano' na pai' dhuuk bha jim gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam, gui' na jaroi'x io'm xich joi'gɨ'n, na ya' dɨr jich baidhika' bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam nach pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'.
65001022	Jix ja joi'ndat japim jix bhai'p xi ja aagi'ñdha' gui' nam chakui bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam nam ba' maatɨi jum biiñkada' buiñor.
65001023	Gio jai' dhɨt nam chakui pai' kɇɇ gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, jix ja joi'ndat japim xi ja aagi'ñdha' nam jax ja'k duñia' nam ba' cham mu ja'k ka bhɨichgɨda' na pai' giilhim gɇ' mɨim gu tai, nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup mɨɨjidha'. Ku pim ji gu'x bhai' ji nam cham ja'kbui' kat mu ja'k jam bhɨichdha' nam jax ja'k tu jim dɨɨlh nam giilhim bɨɨx aixim bhaan jum ua'tulhi'ñ. Ja'p ji buusnia' na cham bhaai' na pim gan da'ngɨda' gu ja jajannulh no' mi ja'p pai' daraa na cham jam ia'ñdha' gu ja ua'tulhdhara', na gu' giilhim gɇ' mi bhi'sap.
65001024	Ku ba' gu' gu Dios jich Xoi'kam dɨɨlh jam palhbuidha' ji na pim jax dhui cham gai suulhgia' tu' na pɨx bhaan, gui' nat jaroi' bha jimɨɨk tuch ñamkix guch ua'tulhdhara'. Gui' tu jam uañi'ñka' gammɨjɨ no' pim soi'm ɨlhii'ñ buiñor, na pim ba' cham u'ua'tulhdhix ka' jano' na pai' dhuuk ya' aaya', ba' dai na pim joidham jix bhai'm taattugɨt ba oidha' bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam.
65001025	Dai gu Dios jach ba' pɨx buiñor tu daanda' gammɨjɨ nat jaroi' xich joi'ndak jich boosolh mu dɨr na pai'r tu tulhiiñara', na gu' gui'x io'm jir gɇ'kam, bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia'. Joidham jix chu joi'gɨ'n ɨp, tɨɨ' nat bhach joochxi gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam na ya'ch palhbuidha' nach jax dhui cham mai' ka suulhgia'. Gammɨjɨch ba' moo tu daanda' buiñor sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt. Ja'pni ba' pɨx tui'ka'.
66001001	Bɨɨx na jɨ'k jax ya' tu ua'ñix dhi u'uan ta'm, ya'ch aagi'ñ gu Jesuus jich Xoi'kam nach jɨ'k ba kaichu' na jax tum duñia' gatuuk, pui' na jax ja'k jup mattu'n gu Dios. Ba' guch Xoi'kam mu joot maadɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios mummu buiñor gu tujuandam tugi'ñ Juan na sap ba' mattuda' na jɨ'k jax tum duñia' gatuuk.
66001002	Ba' gu Juan pui'p tu ua'na bɨɨx nat jɨ'k jax tɨ tɨɨ nat pai' dhuuk mattuda guch Xoi'kam bhaankamu'n gu Dios na tu' jax dhuñia'. Cham pai' maa'n kap tu ua'na na dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñ, daipu' nat jax pɨx tɨ tɨɨ gio nat jax tɨ kai.
66001003	Ba' joidham jix bhai' tu ja jimia' gui' nam jɨ'k tu jiñkaidhai mi' pui' ba jimia' na jɨ'k jax ya' tu ua'ñix dhi u'uan ta'm gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, bar mia'n gu' na pai' dhuuk pui' tum kuugalhdha' na jɨ'k jax ya' tu daaxix.
66001004	Aañ nañ Juan tɨɨ' mu tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ iñ jiñ jaaduñ jich Xoi'kam bhaan mu ja'p xijum gok kap na pim pai' jax jum jumpadat tu daan buiñor guch Gɨ'kora' na Aasia dɨbɨɨr bhaan bipio', nañ mu jam ñio'ki'ñ no' pim jix bhai'm ɨlhii'ñ. Gammɨjɨ gɨt ba' xi jam joi'ndat jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha' gui' na bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch, gio na ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ pux jai'ch ka', gam na gio bhai'p jim gatuuk, gio ba' gux xijum gook jix dhuudu' kam jix u'uañ i'ii'mda' nam bhammɨp tu'ii' sonpan na pai' daa,
66001005	gio ba' gu Jesuus jich Xoi'kam ɨp gui' nat duadɨk giop bam mu dɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr, na xib jix io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n ba daa ja bui bɨɨx gu gɇ'gɇrkam ya' dhi oi'ñga'n. Guch Xoi'kam gɇ'kam kɨ'n xich joi'gɨ'n jia, pui' kut ba' bha jimɨɨk tuch ñamkix guch ua'tulhdhara' kɨ'n gu ɨ'ra'n nat jaax kuruus ta'm, na ba' pu'ñi duuji tuch uañdha' gu Dios.
66001006	Ba' mi' dhɨr pui' ja'k duu na gatuuk gɇ'gɇrkam kɨ'n jich dharsa' nach ja sɨlhka'nda' gu jai', gio ba' nach bhai' ba tu juanda' na pai' tu chiopi' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora'. Jaiñ na jax pɨk joidham. Gɇ'kamtu'nda' pim guch Xoi'kam, na gu'x io'm jir gɇ'kam sia nar pai' dhuuk.
66001007	Ba' jano' na pai' dhuuk gio bhai'p jimda' guch Xoi'kam, tɨbaa'ñ cha'm bhaan bhɨjɨmmɨni dhɨr bhai' ji chɨmñia'. Bɨɨx tɨgia' am gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n kam, sia gui' na mɨt tulhiiñchudak sissapa kuruus ta'm jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk. Ba'x buam jum ɨlhdhai bhai' ji susuañia' am tɨi gui' na mɨt jɨ'k cham tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor nam ba tɨgia' na bhai' ba jimda', nam gu' pui' xim aa'nda' na mɨt cham mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa'. Kani gɨt na pui' tum duñia'.
66001008	Gui' nax io'm jir gɇ'kam, na bɨjɨk dɨr pur Dios, gio na ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ bar pu chu'm ka', gam na saak gio bhai'p jimda', ja'pni kai'ch: “Aañi' nañ bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch, jup tu duu ñich bɨɨx na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch. Aañ ba' giop tu kuugalhdha', dai ba' aañ gammɨjɨ pu jai'ch ka'.”
66001009	Aañ pui'p jir jam jaduuñ guch Xoi'kam bhaan, nañ gu' aañ pui'p tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, pui' kuñ ba' mɨjɨ tu jam ua'ñxi'ñ, pui' bhammɨp aaya' iñ buiñor gu Dios na pim pai' ja'k bhɨichu' aapi'm. Gio ja'xbui' pui'p jiñ chulhiiñ iñ bɨxchu' bhaan na jax aapi'm, gu' ji na gu' guch Xoi'kam jiñ palhbuidhat jiñ guguuxi'ñ nañ jax dhui nakga'. Xib jañ yammɨ dɨr ja'k jup tu'ii' suudai' ɨraab na pai' alhi'ch jir dɨbɨɨr na Patmos tɨ tɨɨ', na mɨt jiñ dhaagɨk yammɨ dɨr ja'k jiñ aich gu Rooma kam nam cham aa' nañ bha ja'p tu a'gada' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam.
66001010	Ba' maa'nnim maa'n tumiiñku ta'm nañ ka tu daan buiñor gu Dios, gɇ'ñ a'm bam tajaa gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda'. Ba' mɨjɨ dɨr ja'p pai' bhai' ji chum ñio jiñ bɨɨbhi' dhɨr jix io'm gɇ' kɨ'n, ja'xbui' na jɨ'x tu kuu gu kuichdhakar,
66001011	jup tum kai'ch: ―Tu ua'na' ap u'uan ta'm bɨɨx nap jɨ'k jax tɨ tɨgia' nañ tɨm tɨɨ'ñchoda', mu ja joochxidha'p ba' gui' nam jiñ bui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ mu ja'p xijum gok kap nam pai' jax jum jumpada' nam tu daan jiñ bui na Aasia dɨbɨɨr bhaan bipio', pui' na jax mu na pai' Eepeso tɨ tɨɨ', gio ba' jumai mu ja'k jap jup tu jootsa' na pai' Esmirna tɨ tɨɨ', gio ba' moo jumai mu ja'k ɨp na pai' Peergamo jup tɨ tɨɨ', gio ba' moo mu ja'k ɨp na pai' Tiatira tɨ tɨɨ', gio pui' na jax mu ja'k na pai' Sardiis jup tɨ tɨɨ', gio ba' moo mu ja'k Piladelpia ɨp, gio ba' mu ja'k Laodiisia.
66001012	Ba' na ñich pai' dhuuk mui' ji chɨ tɨɨ nañ jix maachim na jaroi' ba' mɨjɨ pai' dhɨr bha tuñ a'gi'ñ, mi ja'p tuut xijum gook gui' na bhaan jum tuttu gu kañdhiir nar jix uam totbikdam.
66001013	Mi' ɨrban ba' kɨɨk maa'n gu maa'nkam, pui' kam tu'ii' na gu Jesuus jich Xoi'kam. Tɇb jum tɨ'ii'ñ gu jannulh, dɨɨrap xi ju', gio ba' maa'n gu bhispara' bha ja'p jup xi bur bhaasturam na pui'p jir jix uam totbikdam.
66001014	Gu kuupa'n joidham jix chuam maaxi'ñ ja'p na gu jabook kɨb, piam ja'p na jax gux chua bapoo, gio gu buupui'ñ gɇ'gɇr mɨmɨim ja'p na tai.
66001015	Gio gu tootna'n jix io'm jix mɨmɨim ja'p na jax tui'ka' gu baiñum no' tai chɨr baaxich, na giilhim bax mɨim ka' nax io'm bax choiñ ka'. Ba' na xi chu a'ga, giilhim gɇ'x kaidha', am tɨroon, ja'p na jax kai'chdha' gu suudai' pai' no' gɇ' mɨr na pu'ñi am tɨroonda' na sasbakda'.
66001016	Ba' ja'pni kɨɨ'n dɨr ja daa' xijum gook gu chiichia', gio ba' na chiñi'ram dɨr busaak maa'n gu tɇb kuxiir na bɨxxik dɨr jix mu'muk. Gio gu buibsa'n giilhim jix o'jo' tanoor, ja'p na jax gu tanoolh no'x dhaam ba daa.
66001017	Ba' aañ na ñich pu'ñi tɨɨ, mukxi kam jañich panaas mi ja'p pu gɨi tootnaram na ñich tu kaam, na ñich gu' giilhim jix choo'n. Ba' gui' bhai' xiñ dhaagɨk kɨ'n gu kɨɨ'n dɨr kam nobii'ñ jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Aap moo cham toodon ka'ñ jaduuñ. Aañi' pɨx jir di' nañ bɨjɨk dɨr pu jai'ch na ñich jup tu duu bɨɨx na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch. Aañ ba' giop tu kuugalhdha', dai aañ ba' gammɨjɨ pu jai'ch ka'.
66001018	Aañ pɨx jir di' na ñich duadɨk giop bam mu dɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr. Ba' ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k jañ gammɨjɨ pu ba duaka', cham jañ pai' dhuuk ka mukia'. Aañ ba tu daam kɨɨk ba' xib mu nam pai'm tulhiiñ gu koi'ñga'n, ja'p ji buusan nañ aañ ba ua' ba' xib gui' na kɨ'n jum kukpio'k gu ki'ñgob na pai' dhɨr mu tum bapkɨ, cham tu' kia' gu ja'ook.
66001019	Ba' aañ pui' ɨlhii'ñ nap tu ua'na' bɨɨx nap jɨ'k jax tɨ nɨi'ñ xib gio nap jɨ'k jax ka tɨ tɨgia'.
66001020	Ba' xim aagi'ñdha' iñ na jax jir jum duukam dhix xijum gook chiichia' nañ ja daa' gio dhix xijum gook na bhaan jum tuttu gu kañdhiir nap ya' nɨi'ñ. Dho dhix xijum gook chiichia', jir di' am guñ chujuandam tuk gui' nam mu ja'p bɨɨpɨ' dɨr gu'kat ja aagi'ñ gux bhai'm kai'chdham jiñ ñi'ook gui' nam bañ kaichu'. Gu' ba' dhix xijum gook na bhaan jum tuttu gu kañdhiir, dhi' pɨx pui' ja'k jum maaxi'ñ mu ja'p xijum gok kap nam pai' jax jum jumpa'n nam jiñ dhaanda' gui' nam ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aañ jiñ bui.
66002001	’Mu tu ua'ñxidha' ap guñ chujuandam tuk na mu tu juan Eepeso jiñ a'mkam ja bui gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ jiñ bui. Ja'pnip ja'k mi chu daasa': “Gui' na ja daa' gux xijum gook chiichia', na mi' ɨrban kɨɨk na pai' xikoolh tuut gui' na bhaan jum tuttu gu kañdhiir nar jix uam totbikdam, nap sap ba' mi' dhɨr ja aagi'ñdha' gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, ja'pni kai'ch:
66002002	Jix bhai'x maat iñ na pim jax ja'k tu dudua aapi'm na pim jiñ bui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ, gio na pim jɨ'k tu' jax bua't oipo. Jix maat iñ ɨp na pim pui' na pim jax bax biiñak aañ jiñ bui, sia ku pim bɨxchu' bhaan jum tulhiiñ, gam nam bɨɨx aixim jam tɨtdada' gui' nam jix buam tomaat. Siax bhai'x maat iñ na pim cham ja kɇkɇɇ gui' nam maakam tu iatgi'ñ mi ja'p oipot pui' xim tɨɨtgɨt nam aañ jir jiñ chujuandam tuk, na pim gu' bax maat nam bhaan pɨx tu iatgi'ñ.
66002003	Jix maat iñ ɨp nar maa'n na pim jax tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ jiñ bui sia kum giilhim jam tulhiiñchu'n gu ja'tkam na pim bañ kaichu'.
66002004	Maa'n kap dai cham pui' ka duiñchu' pim nañ jax jix aa', cham tu' bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak kat tu' ka'm kañ ñɨi'ñ japim, ja'p na jax moo jano' na pimɨt jax tɨ jɨɨ'ñ jiñ bui na pim joidham bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak kat. Xib ampɨx pui'x oodam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ japim jiñ bui.
66002005	Ba' aañ pui' ɨlhii'ñ xib na pim gio soi'p jum ɨlhdhai mi' pui' ba jimia' na pim jax ja'k tui'ñgɨt bɨɨpɨ' dɨr, na pim joidham tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jiimɨt na jax jix aa' gu Dios. Piam ku pim gu' cham pu tu duñia' nañ jax jam tɨtda, ja'k bhɨɨya' iñ gui' na tu jam bɨ'ñxi'ñ na pim ba'x chu maax kɨr jup tu'ii', ba' pui'x chukgam kɨr ji bi'ya' pim, nañ gu' xi' pɨk cham ka xi ñakgaim na pim jax tu jim.
66002006	Siamri dho maa'n kap mi' pui' duiñchu' pim nañ jax ɨlhii'ñ aañ, na pim cham ja kaichgɨt pui' ja'k jup tu bua nam jax tu jim gui' nam Nikolaitas jum tɨɨtɨ', pui' cham jup ja kɨɨgalhi'ñ japim na jax aañ.
66002007	Ba' gu jɨ'k nam kɇɇji mi' pui' jimia' na jax tu a'gada' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' mu ja'p chichiop nam pai'm jumpadat tu daan jiñ bui gui' nam bañ kaichu', ja baidhika' iñ bhammɨ ja'k na pai' joidham jix chu abhaar, na bɨxchu' bha tɨ ɨ'xchix. Ja chiñia' iñ ba' nam jugia' gu bhaidha' na bhai'p kɨɨk nam kɨ'n gammɨjɨ pu ba duduaka'x jɨjɨkgɨm, sia gui' nam nakgair maa'n nam jax jix biiñak ka' aañ jiñ bui sia kut jax bɨɨx aixim jix buam jum duukam bhai' jam daam ji chu jii, nam gu' bhammɨ ja'k gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'.”
66002008	’Mu ja'k jap jup tu ua'ñxidha' gu jumaiñ chujuandam tuk na mu ja'k jup tu juan jiñ a'mkam na pai' Esmirna tɨ tɨɨ' ja bui gui' nam bañ kaichu'. Ja'p jap tɨɨda': “Gui' na bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch, gio na gammɨjɨ pu bax jai'ch ka' ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k, nat maa'nnim duadɨk giop bam mu dɨr koi'ñga'n tɨr na mɨt tɨi mua, nap sap ba' mi' dhɨr ja aagi'ñdha' gui' nam ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor, ja'pni kai'ch:
66002009	Jix bhai'x maat iñ na pim giilhim bɨxchu' bhaan jum tulhiiñ mi ja'p na pim jax tu oi'dha', gam na pim gampai' pɨx tu'ii' na pim cham jir tu bia' kam. Ku ba' gu' aapi'm cham jax jum aa'nda' ji, na gu' kam aajim na pai' dhuuk jam a'm tu bi'ya' gu gɇ'gɇr jup tum duu'nkam bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam, sia ku pim gu' xib cham tu' bia'. Jix maat iñ ɨp nam xi jam bhaamkidhat giilhim jam a'ga gui' nam pui'm aa' na gɇ'kam kɨ'n ja a'm tɨ nɨi'ñ gu Dios, nam gu'r Judea kam, nam gu' paa gi mi' pui'p jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios pui' xi kai'chɨt. Na jax ja'k jix aa' gu ja'ook dho gi gu' jɇɇ' ji, pui' xi chu buim am dho na jax ja tɨɨdaim.
66002010	Ba' aapi'm cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt gammɨjɨ mui' xix biiñak ka' buiñor gu Dios. Cha'pim jax jum aa'nda' sia kut bɨɨx aixim jix buam bhai' ji chu jam jii. Xi ñakoo'nda' pim sia no' mɨt bhai' ji jam tulhiiñchuda gu ja'tkam bhaankamu'n gu ja'ook, na gu' jax chu'm tanoolh pui' ja'k ja jurtuda' nam jam tulhiiñchudai jam kuupa', ku gu' dhi' na bhaan pɨx matgilhia' ji no' pim moox biiñak jiñ bui piam ku gu' cham. Gio gu' cham tu' mui' tanoolh jum tulhiiña' pim, mambhɨɨx tanoolh pɨx. Ba' no' pimɨt nakoo sia ku pim pu'ñi giilhim jum tulhiiñ, jam makia' iñ gu gɇ'gɇr jup tum duu'nkam nar jam namki' ka'.
66002011	Na gu' gu jɨ'k nam kɇɇji mi' pui' jimia' na jax tu a'gada' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' mu ja'p chichiop nam pai'm jumpadat tu daanda' gui' nam bañ kaichu', cham tu'm tulhiiña' am gatuuk mu nam pai'm tulhiiña' gui' nam cham tu' ka'm tɨgia' gu Dios.”
66002012	’Xib jap ba' moo mu ja'k jup tu ua'ñxidha' guñ chujuandam tuk na mu tu juan jiñ a'mkam na pai' Peergamo tɨ tɨɨ' ja bui gui' nam bañ kaichu'. Ja'pnip mi chu daasa' u'uan ta'm: “Ja'pni kai'ch gui' na chiñi'ram dɨr busaak gu tɇb kuxiir na bɨxxik dɨr jix mu'muk:
66002013	Jix maat iñ na pui' na pim jax bax biiñak bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n jiñ bui sia ku mi' tu daam kɨɨk gu ja'ook na pim pai' oi'dha', ni ku pim cham tu' bhaan jax jum aa' sia kut mua gu ja'ook guñ chujuandam tuk Antiipas na mi' pui' jimdat nañ jax jix aa', na cham aa' na mi ja'p tu a'gada' gux bhai'm kai'chdham jiñ ñi'ook, na gu' mi' kia'mi'ñ tɨ ɨlhii'ñ na jɨ'x Peergamo tɨ tɨɨ'.
66002014	Dai maa'n kap moo cham jiñ ko'raar na pim jax ja'k duiñchu', na pim gu' jai' dhɨt pui' ja'k tu bua nat jax tu jii bɨjɨk gui' na Balaam tɨɨgich, nax ɨxchuixim aagi'ñ gu Balak na jax ja'k duñia' nam ba'm ua'tulhdha' gu Israel kam ja'tkam na cham ja kɨɨgalhi'ñdha'. Pui' ku mɨt ba' saalh pui' mu ja'k ji ja bɨɨnat gu mi' kam ja'tkam na pai' kio gu Balak, jai'p ba tu daanda' am ja bui gu ja didios tuk jup duñiixim, gam nam tu kua'da' gu koi' nam ja tɨtki'ñdha' gu ja didios tuk, gio ba' nam jix bhai' ja tɨtdat ja bɨɨm boppoda' gu mi' kam u'uub. Ku ba' gu' gu Balaam ji nat tu'm da'p duu.
66002015	Gio jai' dhɨt dhi' nam jiñ bui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nam pui' ja'k pɨx iam jup tu daa'ñchu' nam jax tu jim gui' nam Nikolaitas jum tɨɨtɨ'. Dhi'jani bhaan jañ ba' pui' kai'ch na pim cham tu' bɨɨx pui' tu kuugalhdhim nañ jax jix aa'.
66002016	Ba' aañ pui' ɨlhii'ñ na pim siamri soi'm ɨlhdhai mi' pui' xi jimɨi nañ jax jix aa', ja'p japim xi dhui na pim jax ja'k tu jim xib. Piam ku gu' cham, mu jimɨiñ jam tulhiiñchuda' jam bɨndai dhi' nam Nikolaitas jum tɨɨtɨ'. Ja'p ji buusnia' nañ jam kooda' kɨ'n dhi tɇb jiñ kuxiir nañ chiñ am dɨr busaak.
66002017	Ja'pni ku pim ba' siamri mi' pui' xi jimɨi nañ jax jam tɨtda, na gu' no' pimɨt moo mi' pui' xi jii nañ jax jix aa' cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt sia ku pimɨt bɨxchu' bhaan bhai' jim tulhii, aañ bhammɨ ja'k jam aichdhaix dhaam jam makia' gux kɨɨ' koi' na manaa jum tɨɨtɨ' na pim kɨ'n gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'. Gio ba' moo gu a'lhich ko'kmarak joodai sopkoñxim ɨp na joidham jix chooto na bhaan mi ua'ñixchu'nda' na pim jax ja'k ba tɨɨ'ka' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k. Cham jaroi' mat ka', dai aapi'm dɨɨlh. Gu ba' no' jaroi' maadɨt jix kaim gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n xi kɇɇkɇ' na jax tu a'gada' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' mu ja'p chichiop nam pai'm jumpadat tu daanda' gui' nam jiñ bui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ.”
66002018	’Xib jap ba' moo mu ja'k jup tu ja ua'ñxidha' gu Tiatira oi'ñkam nam jiñ bui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ, buiñor guñ chujuandam tuk na mi' tu juan ja bui, na ba' mi' dhɨr ja aagi'ñdha'. Ja'pnip ja'k mu tu ua'ñxidha': “Ja'pni kai'ch gui' na gɇ'gɇr mɨmɨim gu buupui'ñ, gio ba' gu tootna'n nax mɨmɨim ja'p na jax gu baiñum toiñdhichdhix kam:
66002019	Jix bhai'x maat iñ na pim jax ja'k tu dudua mi' na pim pai' oi'dha'. Jix maat iñ ɨp na pim joidham bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tu' ka'm nɨidhat jix biiñak aañ jiñ bui, gam na pim joidham jix ja joi'ndat jix bhai' ja bua't ja palhbui'ñ gu jai' kɨ'n gu tu' na ja a'm jum aa'. Gio xib joidham bax chu joi'gɨ'n japim, cham tu' pui' na bɨɨpɨ' dɨr.
66002020	Gu' ji na gu' cham jiñ ko'raar na pim jai' dhɨt pui' ja'k jup tu daa'ñchu' na jax tu jimdat bɨjɨk gu ubii na Jesabeel tɨɨgich, pui' kai'chdha' pim na pim Dios bhaankamu'n tu a'gada' ja'p na jax kai'chdha' gui'. Paa gip jir sɨlhkam, pu cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ japim gu Dios pui' xi kai'chɨt. Tɨɨ' na pim jai'x bhai' ja tɨtdat ja bɨɨm boppo gu u'uub, gam na pim tu kua' gu koi' na tɨkdhix kat gu didios jup duñiixim, pui' ɨp na jax ja'k tu buada' bɨjɨk gu Jesabeel. Dhi'jani bhaan jañ ba' cham tu'x bhai'ñ chaat jam bui.
66002021	Bɨɨx gui' nam pu'ñi ja'k tu jam a'gi'ñdha' na jax tu jimdat gu Jesabeel, tɨix ja joi'ndat ja nɨɨrka' iñ nam soi'm ɨlhdhai mi' pui' ba jimia' gɨt na jax jix aa' gu Dios, bɨɨx sia aapi'm na pim jɨ'k pui' ja'k ba tu jim. Gu' ji na pim gu' cham tu' soi' xim ɨlhdhak buiñor gu Dios, pui' na pim jax bam ua'tulhi'ñ, na pim jai'x bhai' ja tɨtdat ja bɨɨm boppo gu u'uub, gam na pim tu daan ja bui gu didios jup duñiixim.
66002022	Ba' gu xib na tu' jax tui'ka', jam tulhiiñchuda' iñ ko'kdai' kɨ'n, cham jax bua sia pimɨt jai' dhɨt ma koi no' pimɨt cham nakoo. Ba' no' pim gu' sia cham soi'm ɨ'lhi'ñ buiñor gu Dios, dho gi ba' gu'x io'm ba jam tulhiiñchuda'ñ ji, no' gu'r maa'n na pim jax pui' ja'k tu jim nat jax chu jii gu ubii na Jesabeel tɨɨgich,
66002023	nam ba' dhi' bhaan jix chotdon ka' bɨɨx nam jɨ'k jiñ bui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ nam mui' kap jum jumpadat tu daan, na gu' pu'ñi ja'k jup tu ja jimia' no'm jai' pui' ja'k jup tu jim. Gio nam ba'x mat ka' nañ aañ bɨɨx jix mat ka' nam jɨ'k jax jum aa'nda' gu ja'tkam, gam nam jax tu buada', gio nam tu' jax jix dhuñiik ka'. Ba' bhaan jup ba machia' am ɨp nañ aañ tu maak na jax ja'k ja a'm bipio'da' gui' nam pu'ñi tu' pɨx ɨlhdhat cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñdha' gu Dios.
66002024	Gu' ba' aapi'm na pim jɨ'k cham pui' ja'k tu jim na jax tu jimdat gu Jesabeel, cham jañ jam tulhiiñchuda', na pim gu' cham tu' pui' ja'k jup tu bua na jax tu bua't gui', na gu' dhi' ba' bhaan bax maatɨ' ka' gɨt na pim pui'p kaichu' gu ja'ook na jax gui'.
66002025	Dai nañ jam guguuxi'ñ na pim cham mɨk buppat gammɨjɨ tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' aañ jiñ bui jano' juugɨt nañ pai' dhuuk gio bhai'p jimda'.
66002026	Gio no' pimɨt mi' pui' jii nañ jɨ'k jax jix aa', gam no' pim pu gammɨjɨx biiñak jiñ bui sia kut tu'x buam jum duukam bhai' jam daam ji jii, gɇ'gɇrkam kɨ'n jam darsa' iñ ja bui bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na pim ja sɨlhka'nda',
66002027	ja'p na jax aañ nat gɇ'kam kɨ'n jiñ dhai guñ Gɨ'kora' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n. Aapi'm pu'ñi ɨp gatuuk, jɨ'ma'n japim ja daada' ka' gu bapaiñum o'xia, aapi'm ba' ja aagi'ñdha' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na mɨt tu' bhaan cham am bua nam duduakat ja tutku' bhaan, ba' ja'p ji buusnia' na pim ja jaisa' kɨ'n gu jam o'xia ja'p na bhi'ñ jaja'.
66002028	Gio ba' pu'ñi ja'k tu'm kɨ'n jam darsa' iñ na jax gu gɇ' chi'ɨɨ' na katukgab bha tɨssa'n.
66002029	Gu ba' gu jaroi' no' tu' sɨlhkam jix maachim gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, jum aa' na bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n xi kɇɇkɇ' na jax tu a'ga gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' mu ja'p chichiop nam pai'm jumpa'n gui' nam bañ kaichu'.”
66003001	’Xib jap ba' moo mu ja'k jup tu ua'ñxidha' guñ chujuandam tuk na mu ja'k jup tu juan jiñ a'mkam na pai' Sardiis tɨ tɨɨ' ja bui gui' nam bañ kaichu'. Ja'p jap tɨɨda': “Ja'pni kai'ch gui' na ja daa' xijum gook gu chiichia' gio gux xijum gook jix dhuudu' kam jix u'uañ i'ii'mda', nap sap ba' mi' dhɨr ja aagi'ñdha' gui' nam ba kaichu': Jix bhai'x maat iñ na pim jax ja'k tu dudua mu ja'p na pim pai' oi'dha'. Cham tu' mi' pui' jiim japim nañ jax jix aa', pui' xi kai'chɨt japim na pim tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor gu Dios, gu' paa gi tu' ka'm jup nɨi'ñ japim pui' xi kai'chɨt. Ba' dhi' ka daasaim na pai' dhuuk jam tulhiiñchuda'.
66003002	Ku ba' gu' no' pimɨt moo soi'm ɨlh pu xib na kapbhai' xia'lhidhat kapup tu maaxilhim, cham tu' jam tulhiiñchuda' ji. Jix io'm japim mi' pui' xi jimia' na jax ja'k jix aa', cham tu' palhɨɨp pɨx na pim jax tui'dhi' xib. Alhi'ch pɨx ba aa' gu' na ba jam tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios no' pimɨt chakui soi'm ɨlh, ba' dhi' ja'p ji buusnia' na jam kooda', na gu' cham tu' kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu pui' na pim jax ja'k tu jim.
66003003	Siamri pim moo mi' pui' xi jimɨi na jɨ'k jax jix aa' gu Dios, ja'p na pim jax ja'k tui'ñgɨt moo jano' na pimɨt jax tɨ jɨɨ'ñ aañ jiñ bui na pim joidham bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tu' ka'm jiñ ñɨidhat. Soi' pim bam ɨlhdha' ɨp gio, cha'pim kooksɨt darka'. Na gu' no' pim aapi'm cham tu'p jum buixdhat am ɨrdat oipo, cham tu' jam baidhika' iñ bhammɨ ja'k nat pai' tu jam iimchuda gu Dios na saak jam aichdha', nañ gu' aañ jotmoda' pɨx mi' pɨx ba kɨɨka' cham jum ɨlhdham nañ pai' dhuuk mu jimda'. Pu cham jaroi' mat ka' na pai' dhuuk, ja'p na jax ba' gu jax chu'm jix ɨxkum pai' no't ba tu o'bhai' jax chu'm ba'k chɨr na tɨ ɨɨxdha', na gu' cham tu' na mu pai'p ja aagi'ñdha' gu mi oi'ñkam, mi' pɨx ba bakia'. Pu'ñi ɨp ba' aañ nañ pai' dhuuk mu jim.
66003004	Dai ba' gui' nam jɨ'k jiñ ñɨɨr jañ xi ja baidhai, pui' na jax gui' nam jɨ'k mi' pui' jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios mi' dhi' Sardiis, nam cham pai' dhuuk tu' bhaan jum ua'tulhi'ñ. Ba' gammɨjɨñ bɨɨm oipoda' am bhammɨx dhaam joidham jix chooto ji chɨm tɨi'dhat.
66003005	Bɨɨx gui' nam jɨ'k mi' pui' jimia' nañ jax jix aa', pu'ñi chu'm jañ tu ja tɨi'dha' joidham jix chooto, gio ba' nañ mi' xi ja daasa' u'uan ta'm nam jax chɨɨ' nañ pai' ja daasaim gui' nam jɨ'k tu' ka'm jiñ ñɨidhat mi' pui' ba jiim nañ jax jix aa' nañ ba' gatuuk pu sɨlh ja baidhika' bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam nam pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'. Aañi' pu tɨɨda' jano' gu Dios ja kaixdhat bɨɨx gu noonbi'ñ na ñich aañ bɨɨx tu ja uañ gu ja ua'tulhdhara' gui' nam jɨ'k tu' ka'm jiñ chɨgia' xib.
66003006	Ba' no' jaroi' tu' sɨlhkam jix maachim gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, jum aa' na mu jimɨi bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n xi kɇɇkɇ' na jax tu a'gada' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' mu ja'p chichiop nam pai'm jumpa'nda' gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ jiñ bui nam tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios.”
66003007	’Xib jap ba' moo mu ja'k jup tu ua'ñxidha' guñ chujuandam tuk na mu ja'k tu juan jiñ a'mkam na pai' Piladelpia tɨ tɨɨ' ja bui gui' nam ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aañ jiñ bui. Ja'pnip mu tu ua'ñxidha': “Gui' nar Maraa'n gu Dios, na joidham jix uañ kɨ'n kɨɨk gio nax io'm jir gɇ'kam, cham tu' pui' na jɨ'x jir gɇ'kam kat gu Dabii, gam na cham jɨ'xdha' jaroi' soo'mchulhdha' no' tu' jax jix dhuñiim, pui' tu kuugalhdha'. Ja'pni kai'ch nap sap ba' mi' dhɨr ja aagi'ñdha' gui' nam ba kaichu':
66003008	Jix bhai'x maat iñ na pim jax ja'k tu dudua ɨp aapi'm. Jix bhai' mi' pui' jiim japim nañ jax jix aa' cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt, sia ku pim jum tulhiiñ bɨxchu' bhaan. Ba' aañ pui' ɨlhii'ñ nañ jix io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n jam a'm ba tɨ nɨidhidha' ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k, cham jɨ'xdha' jaroi'ñ soo'mchulhdha' nañ jɨ'x gɇ'kam kɨ'n xi jam joi'gɨ'n, dai ji no' pim jix biiñak pɨx aañ jiñ bui.
66003009	Aañ pui' ja'k tu duñia' nam xi jam ɨɨbhidhai tu' ka'm jam tɨgia' bɨɨx gui' nam kaichu' gu ja'ook, gui' nam pui'm aa' na gɇ'kam kɨ'n ja a'm tɨ nɨidhim gu Dios nam jir Israel kam, nam ba' machia' nañ aapi'm xi jam joi'ndat jam a'm tɨ nɨidhim, nam gu' gui' cham tu' mi' pui' jiim nañ jax jix aa', dai na jax ja'k ja tɨɨdaim pɨx gu ja'ook.
66003010	Aapi'm ji na pim ba' bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tu' ka'm jiñ ñɨidhat jix biiñak jiñ bui, tɨɨ' na pim gammɨjɨ mi' pui' jiim nañ jax jix aa'. Ba' aañ xi jam joi'ndat jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jam palhbui'ñchu'nda' na pai' dhuuk bhai' ja daam ji jimia' gu tulhiiñara' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, na bhaan pɨx matgilhia' nam jɨ'k moo tu' sɨlhkam jix biiñak ka' aañ jiñ bui, gio na jɨ'k cham. Aapi'm jañ ba' dai jam palhbuidha', na pim gu' gammɨjɨx biiñak jiñ bui.
66003011	Ba'm aa' na pim pu'ñi gammɨjɨ tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat jix biiñak ka' aañ jiñ bui na ba' jam a'm tu bi'ya' gu gɇ'gɇr jup tum duu'nkam jano' nañ pai' dhuuk jam baidhika' bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam. Na gu' no' pim am ɨr, jumai bhaan bi'ya'. Bar mia'n gu' nañ pai' dhuuk mu jim nañ mu ja bai'ñmɨra' jɨ'k nam jiñ ñɨɨra.
66003012	Ba' gui' nam pu'ñi mi' pui' jimia' nañ jax jix aa', gɇ'gɇrkam kɨ'n ja darsa' iñ bhammɨx dhaam, ja'p ji buusnia' nam gui' bhai' siisap ka' gu chiop ga'n gu Dios. Gammɨjɨ bhai' pu bap tui'ka' am, cham tu' jɨ'x juugɨt. Ja a'm ua'na' iñ na jax chɨɨ' gu Dios gio na jax tɨ tɨɨ' bhai' na pai' dhɨr nai'r gɇ'kam, nax io'm gɇ'r kiicham, na xibkam Jerusaleen jup tɨ tɨɨ', gio ba' nañ jax jup ba tɨɨ'ka' ɨp aañ mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k.
66003013	Ba' no' jaroi' tu' sɨlhkam jix maachim gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, jum aa' na bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n xi kɇɇkɇ' na jax tu a'gada' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' mu ja'p chichiop nam pai'm jumpa'nda' gui' nam ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aañ jiñ bui nam tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios.”
66003014	’Xib jap ba' mu ja'k jup tu ua'ñxidha' gu jumaiñ chujuandam tuk na mummu ja'k tu juan jiñ a'mkam na pai' Laodiisia tɨ tɨɨ' ja bui gui' nam jiñ bui tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ. Ja'pnip mi' tu daasa' bhaan gu u'uan nap mu joochxidha': “Gui' nat jup duu dhi oi'ñga'n bɨɨma'n gu Dios gio na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch, na joidham jix uañ kɨ'n kɨɨk, gam na pui' tu kuugalhdha' jax no't ba tɨi, ja'pni kai'ch nap sap ba' mi' dhɨr ja aagi'ñdha' gui' nam ba kaichu':
66003015	Jix bhai'x maat iñ na pim jɨ'k tu' jax bua't tu dudua mu ja'p na pim pai' oi'dha'. Jix maat iñ ɨp na pim cham tu' bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tu' ka'm jiñ ñɨidhat jix biiñak aañ jiñ bui. Cham tu'x bhai' mi' pui' jiim japim nañ jax jix aa', palhɨɨp pɨx. Ja'p pɨx ji buan japim na jax gu suudai' no'x juuk pɨx, na cham tu'x io'm jix choiñ ka' piam na cham io'm jix jɨɨpi'ñ ka'. Ba' aañ jiñ bui cham tu'r am gu pui' na pim jax tui'dhi', ja'pji no' pim jix aa' na pim jiñ kaichgɨda', bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n ɨp na pim tu' ka'm jiñ ñɨidhat mi' pui' jiimda' nañ jax jix aa', cham tu' palhɨɨp pɨx. Piam no' pim jup jix oo'n na pim tu' ka'm jiñ ñɨi'ñdha', cha'pim pui' kai'chdha' na pim jiñ kaichu'.
66003016	Gu' ba' gu xib na tu' jax tui'ka', cham tu'ñ jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidha', na pim gu' cham tu' bɨɨx jam jujur kɨ'n tu' ka'm jiñ ñɨidhat mi' pui' jiim nañ jax jix aa', sia ku pim gu' pui' kai'ch na pim jiñ kaichu'. Ja'p ji buusnia' nañ jam biñbo' ya' dɨr jiñ chiñ am, na pim gu' pui' pɨx ji buan na jax gu suudai' no'x juuk na pu cham i'oob no'ñ tɨi xi io'.
66003017	Pui' kai'chdha' pim gu' na pim jir jix chutumñigam, na pim saak bɨɨx tu bia' na tu' jam a'm jum aa' jam i'ii'mda' bhaan gio gu maaxik bhaan, gam na saak gammɨjɨx bhai' tu jam jim, gio na bɨɨx jix bhai' ji chu buusnidha' gu tu' na pim jax buada'. Gu' aañ jiñ bui, paa gip jir jix chutumñigam japim. Cham tu' bɨɨx tu bia' pim na tu' jam a'm jum aa'. Ja'pni pɨx ji buan japim na jax gui' nam alh gampai' tu'ii', nam cham jir tu bia' kam. Ja'p ji buusan ɨp na pim pui'x dha'npakat oipo, gio na pim cham ñiññia, sia ku pim gu' aapi'm pui' kai'ch na pim jir jix chutumñigam, pui' ku pim ba' cham Dios ka tɨ'ñcho.
66003018	Paa gip jir pui' na pim jax jum aa'. Cham tu' bia' pim gui' nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk. No' pim jix aa' na pim bia'ka' dhi' nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk, jum aa' na pim aañ jiñ chañia', na ba' dhi' kɨ'n pui' bam kai'chdha' na pim jir jix chutumñigam. Daipu' aañ bia' jia dhi' jɨ' nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk. Ba' no' pimɨt jiñ chaa, cham tu'x dha'npakat ka oipoda' pim gu jam i'ii'mda' bhaan, ja'p ji buusnia' gu' na pim ba tɨm tɨi'dha' joidham jix chooto gu jajannulh, gio na pim ba tum juulhia' gui' na dudua'ñdha' gu jam buupui na pim cham ñiññia'.
66003019	Ja'p jañ dho kai'ñkam jup jam tɨtda, na pim soi'm ɨlhdhai mi' pui' ba jimia' nañ jax jix aa', cha'pim kam ua'tulhi'ñdha'. Piam ku gu' cham, jam tulhiiñchuda' iñ na pim jɨ'x pɨx juugɨt soi'm ɨlhdha' aañ jiñ bui, nañ gu' tɨi xi jam joi'gɨ'n. Pu'ñi ja'k jañ ja bua't ja sɨlhka'n jia gui' nañ jɨ'k jix ja da'.
66003020	Tɨix aa' iñ nañ bɨɨx jam a'm jup tui'ñgɨda' gɨt, ja'p ji buusan nañ mi' dhɨr ki'ñgob kɨɨkat mu tu son na pim pai' jax chu oi'dha'. Ba' no't jaroi' maadɨt jiñ kupio'kdhak jiñ chia nañ mu bakia' ɨrban dɨr, mui'ñ dhop ji bakia' cham jax ji chɨ'ji, ba' mi' dhɨr dai nach maap daraibui ba tu jugia'. Pu'ñi ja'k jum aa' na duñia' gu jaroi' no'x aa' nañ bhaan jup tui'ñgɨda'.
66003021	Gu' ba' gu jɨ'k nam jiñ buix biiñak kat mi' pui' tu kuugalhdhim nañ jɨ'k jax jix aa' cham tu' bhaan jax jim aagɨt sia tu' ba ji ja duu, aañ gɇ'gɇrkam kɨ'n ja darsa' ya' nañ pai' Gɇ'kam kɨ'n ba daa sonpan gu Dios, nam jai'ñ a'mkam ja sɨlhka'nda' gu ja'tkam.
66003022	Gu' ba' no' jaroi'x bhai'x maachim gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, jum aa' na mu jimɨi bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n xi kɇɇkɇ' na jax tu a'gada' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' mu ja'p chichiop nam pai'm jumpadat tu daanda' buiñor gu Dios gui' nam jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aañ jiñ bui.”
66004001	Ba' mi' dhɨr bɨɨx dhi' pui', bhammɨ ja'k jup ba tum maax jix dhaam. Maa'n kap gɇ' kiidha' na pai' bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr kuup na pai' tuut gu ba'bhak, kupio'kix ji gu', cham tu' kuup. Ba'p jiñ chɨtda ɨp gio gui' na mi' tuñ a'gi'ñ, nax io'm gɇ' tu ñiok ja'xbui' na jɨ'x tu kuu gu kuichdhakar: ―Bhai' xi jiim yammɨni ja'k nañ pai'p tu'ii', nañ tɨm tɨ'ñchoda' na jax chum duñia' jano' nañ pai' dhuuk tu kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n.
66004002	Ba' nat gu' gɇ'ñ a'm bam tajaa gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda', bhammɨ ñich ba ai jix dhaam. Ba' bhai' kɨɨk maa'n gu atooxkor nam jax chu'm bhaan daraaka' gui' nam jix io'm jir gɇ'gɇrkam. Jaroi' maadɨt ba' bhai' dhaa bhaan dhi' dhi atooxkor.
66004003	Joidham jix a'bhar totbik gu tɨi'dhar ga'n gio dɨɨlh, ja'p na jax chu'm totbikda' gu joodai gui' nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk ya' dhi oi'ñga'n. Gio maa'n gui' na ja'p tu'm na ki'oor bhai'p kɨɨk daam dɨr na pai' daa, pui' bɨɨx aixim tu'm kɨ'n jup mɨmɨim joidham jix a'bhar.
66004004	Gio ba' moo bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr jup tuut ɨp jai' maa'n oo'm daman maakob gu a'toxkar nam jax chu'm bhaan jup dadarrɨ gui' nam cham pɨk jir gɇ'gɇrkam ka'. Bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n dhi a'toxkar bhaan daraa am maa'n oo'm daman maakob gu ja'tkam nam bar jagɨ'gɨr pa', nam jir tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios. Jix chooto tɨ tɨ' am bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, gio nam ja tuttu gu kukrun jix u'uam totbikdam.
66004005	Ba' giilhim gɇ' tɨm tɨroon mi' na pai' daa gux io'm Gɇ'kam, ja'p na jax kai'chdha' gu duuk no' tɨrooñ, gio ba' na gɇ' kɨ'n tum a'ga. Amuub ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr ba'p mɨmɨim gui' na ja'p tuutu'm na kañdhiir xijum gok kap, dhi' pɨx pui' ja'k jum maaxi'ñ gux dhuudu' kam jix u'uañ i'ii'mdaga'n gu Dios.
66004006	Gio ba' gu suudai' mi ja'p jup suu'n joidham jix kɨɨ'x uañ, cham pai' ikoora'. Gio ba' moo bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr mi' na pai' daa gux io'm Gɇ'kam gio gu jai' nam jir tujuandam tugi'ñ, mi'p guguuk am maakob gu sasoi' kam tuutu'm nam jir dudua kam gio nam pui' ja jur jup bia' na jax gu ja'tkam, bɨɨx kap tu buupui am na jɨ'x jir ja tutku'.
66004007	Maa'n ja'p tu'm na gu mabii'ñ, jumai ba' ja'p tu'm na gu tuur, gio ba' moo gu jumai ja'p tu'm ɨp na gu maa'nkam, gio ba' moo gu jumai ja'p tu'm ɨp na gu bha'aa' na jax tui'ñgɨda' no' dai'chu'.
66004008	Bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n dhi sasoi' xijum maa'n tu kakarbo am, sia bɨɨx kap tu buupui am na jɨ'x jir ja kakarbo, daam dɨr gio bɨtaa'n dɨr. Ba' gammɨjɨ cham jum jɨɨpi'ñka' am nam laala'nda' nam gɇ'kamtu'nda' gu Dios, jup kai'chdha' am: Ja'p moox uañ kɨ'n kɨɨk ji dhi Dios jich Gɨ'kora' na ya' daa. Joidham bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia', na gu'x io'm jir gɇ'kam. Dhi'x io'm bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch na chakui jai'ch kat gu oi'ñga'n, gio xib ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ pux jai'ch ka'. Dhi' ba' dɨɨlh giop kuugalhdha' gu oi'ñga'n.
66004009	Ba' gammɨjɨ gu maakob sasoi', nam pai' dhuuk gɇ'kamtu'ndat taxchaabgi'ñdha' gui' na bhai' daa gɇ' atooxkor ta'm na gammɨjɨ pu dua sia nar pai' dhuuk, gu maa'n oo'm daman maakob gu ja'tkam nam bɨɨx xɨkoolh dhɨr daraa, jotmoda' ja o'lhia kɨ'n gu'kɨt tu daanda'm ɨp buiñor, nam pui'p gɇ'kamtu'nda', xi ja kookosat am gu ja kukrun mu xi ja daraasdat ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pai' daa gu Gɇ'kam. Jup kai'chdha' am:
66004011	Dai aap jix bhai' nam tu' ka'm jum nɨidhat jum gɇ'kamtu'nda' gammɨjɨ Dios jich Gɨ'kora', nap gu'x io'm jir gɇ'kam, gio nap bɨxchu'x aichu'n nap pu tu duñia'. Tɨɨ' na pich jup tu duu bɨɨx na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch, sia gui' nam jir tu dudua kam, aap ja taiñbui'ñ gu ii'mda' nam kɨ'n dudua xib.
66005001	Ba' gux io'm Gɇ'kam na bhai' daa atooxkor ta'm, ja'pni kɨɨ'n dɨr daa' maa'n gu u'uan bhiibgixim na bɨxxik dɨr mi tu ua'ñix, xijum gok kap ba' bhiibhi'sap kɨ'n gui' nax kabkam tu bhibhi'sap, na sap ba' cham jaroi' sɨlhñai tɨgia' na jax jum kai'ch.
66005002	Ba' maadɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios bha ja'p kɨɨkat jup kai'ch gɇ' kɨ'n na jɨ'x tu jiiñak: ―¿Jaroo chix bhai' na bhi'spio'kai sɨlhñai tɨgia' na jax jum kai'ch dhi u'uan bhiibgixim?
66005003	Pu cham jaroi' jai'ch gu' nax bhai' na bhi'spio'kai sɨlhñai tɨgia' gu u'uan na jax mi tu ua'ñix gui' nam jɨ'k bhammɨ ja'p jup tu'ii' jix dhaam nam jir noonbi'ñ gu Dios, gio gui' na mu ja'p jix chu jai'ch na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, piam sia chi moor pa ja'k kam ka' gɨt.
66005004	Ba' aañ jix buam jiñ aagɨt ma susua nat moo pui' pɨk cham jup jai'chdhɨr gu jaroi' nax bhai' na bhi'spio'kai sɨlhñai tɨgia' gui' gu u'uan.
66005005	Gu' ji na gu' maadɨt gu maa'n oo'm daman maakob nam mi' daraa bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr na pai' daa gux io'm Gɇ'kam, jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Aap moo cham jax jum aa'nda'ñ jaduuñ, ba jɨkgɨ ap. Matgam ya' pai' jai'ch ji maadɨt nax bhai' na bhi'spio'kai sɨlhñai tɨgia' na jax jum kai'ch dhi u'uan bhiibgixim, nat gu' gui' ba ma'iich gux buam jum duukam. Gui'ñ dho aagɨt jup kai'ch nar boxii'ñ gu Judaa, na xib jix io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n ba daa, sia bɨɨx jai' bhaankamu'n gu Dabii, na gu' pui'p jir boxii'ñ.
66005006	Ba' gui' nat ja'p ji buus na gux kɨɨ' kasnir mi'p kɨɨk ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pai' daa gux io'm Gɇ'kam, mi' ɨrban nam pai' bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr daraa gu ja'tkam nam jir jagɨ'gɨr pa' gio gu maakob sasoi' nam bɨɨx aixim tu'm, xijum maakob tu a'aa', gio gu buupui'ñ ja'kbui' ɨp. Dhi' pɨx kat jup jum kai'ch gux xijum gook jix dhuudu' kam jix u'uañ i'ii'mdaga'n gu Dios nat mui' kap ja joot bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n. Gui' jɨ' na pui' ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, bɨɨx kap jix bapaiñmi' gu tukga'n nam pai' jax gɨbiimɨk jano' nat jum makgɨrta,
66005007	ba' mu jimɨɨk bhai' ji dhaa gu u'uan bhiibgixim na ja'pni kɨɨ'n dɨr daa' gux io'm Gɇ'kam na bhai' daa atooxkor ta'm.
66005008	Gu' ba' gu maakob sasoi' nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr guguuk, gio gu maa'n oo'm daman maakob gu ja'tkam nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr jup daraa, mi' ja o'lhia kɨ'n ji guguu mɨt ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pai' kɨɨk gui' jɨ' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n ja daada' am gu sasaasbikar gio gu a'lhich jaja' jix u'uam totbikdam, susdagɨm mi jim gui' na joidham uub na jax chu'm jum kubhioñxi'ñ gu Dios. Dhi' pɨx pui' ja'k jum maaxi'ñ gui' nam jɨ'k ba tu daan buiñor gu Dios nam ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, na gu' pui' ji buusanda' nam tu kubhioñxi'ñdha' nam pai' dhuuk tu daanda' buiñor.
66005009	Ba' bɨɨx dhɨt bhai' ji laalagɨ mɨt maa'n gu xibkam alabaa'n na ja'pnim kai'ch: Dai aap jix bhai' nap bhi'spio'kai sɨlhñai tɨgia' na jax jum kai'ch dhi u'uan bhiibgixim nap mi' daa', na pich gu' pu kai'ñkam jum tulhiiñaimɨk jum makgɨrta jano' nat gɇ' jaax gum ɨ'ɨɨr bhaan gu kuruus ja a'mkam bɨɨx dappaam gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, nam bɨɨx aixim tu'm tu ñiok gam bɨɨx aixim tuutu'm, na pich gu' bɨɨx ja saba'lh kɨ'n gum ɨ'ɨɨr na pich kɨ'n tu ja namkix gu ja ua'tulhdhara' na ba' mi' dhɨr bax bhai' ka' nam yammɨ aaya' na pai'p tu'ii' gu Dios.
66005010	Ba' xib pui' ja'k ba duu pich nam jai' dhɨt ba tu daam kɨɨka' na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, gam jai' nam nai' ba tu a'gidha' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, nam pui' ja tɨtdaidha' gu ja'tkam nam ba tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' soi'm ɨlhdhai aap jum bui.
66005011	Ba' mi' dhɨr mui' cham daaxix kam mi' bam maax jamɨt gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr mi' na pai' daa gux io'm Gɇ'kam, gio nam pai' daraa gu maa'n oo'm daman maakob gu ja'tkam gio ba' gu maakob sasoi'.
66005012	Jup kai'ch am gɇ' kɨ'n: Gɇ'kamtu'nda' ich dhi' na pui' ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, nat gu'm makgɨrta kuruus ta'm. Na gu' xib jix io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n ba daa, bɨɨx bhaan ba tu bii gu tu' nax chu jai'ch, pui' na jax gu gɇ'gɇr jup tum duu'nkam gio gu a'lhich jup tum duu'nkam. Xib dhi' bax bhai' na pu tu duñia' jax ña ɨlhii'ñdha' ja bui bɨɨx gu ja'tkam. Ja'pni kuch ba' moo gammɨjɨ tu' ka'm nɨidhat gɇ'kamtu'nda'.
66005013	Ba' mi' dhɨr bɨɨx gui' nat jɨ'k tu'p tu duu gu Dios na bhammɨ ja'p jix chu jai'ch jix dhaam, gio ba' mu ja'p na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n bhaan, gam mu ja'p suudai' chɨr, jup kai'ch am ɨp: Gammɨjɨch moo tu' ka'm nɨidhat tu daanda' buiñor gux io'm Gɇ'kam na bhai' daa atooxkor ta'm gio dhi' nat ja'p ji buus na gux kɨɨ' kasnir nat jum makgɨrtak, nam gu' gammɨjɨ pur gɇ'gɇrkam sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt.
66005014	Ba' gu maakob sasoi' nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr guguuk mi' na pai' daa gux io'm Gɇ'kam jup kai'ch am ɨp: ―Pui' dho. Gu' ba' gu maa'n oo'm daman maakob gui' nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr daraa, na mɨt jax ja o'lhia kɨ'n guguu bhai' ji chu daanɨ mɨt buiñor.
66006001	Ba' gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, maa'n kap xi bhi'spio' gui' jɨ' u'uan bhiibgixim na daa'. Ba' maadɨt gu maakob sasoi' jup jiñ chɨtda gɇ' kɨ'n, pɨx am nammɨ ja'p tu baapkichu'n: ―Pu kani muni ja'k xi chɨ tɨɨ'.
66006002	Ba' na ñich mui' xi chɨ tɨɨ, maadɨt mu kɨɨk gu maa'nkam jix chua kabai cha'm gaat ji dhaagɨt. Ba' maa'n xi kɨɨx jamɨt gu kuruun na bhaan jix maatɨ' nat ba tu ma'iich nat tu kokdarak ja bui gui' nam jix bhaamki'ñ, gio ba' na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' ɨp na mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ tu daam ba kɨɨka'.
66006003	Ba' nat jumai kap jup xi bhi'spio' gu u'uan bhiibgixim gui' jɨ' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, jup jiñ chɨtda ɨp jumai maadɨt gu maakob sasoi': ―Mi'ñi ja'k jup xi chɨ tɨɨ'.
66006004	Ba' na ñich mui' xi chɨ tɨɨ, maadɨt mu ja'k jup kɨɨk gu maa'nkam jix bɨ' kabai cha'm. Ba' maa'n xi maa mɨt gu tɇb kuxiir na bɨxxik dɨr jix mu'muk, gio ba' na mɨt xi chia na ja kokdhichdha' gu ja'tkam bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n na pui' ja'k tu duñia' nam dɨɨlh pɨx bhai' jim kokda', nam cham maa'n ñi'ook kap duuka'.
66006005	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumai kap jup xi bhi'spio' gu u'uan bhiibgixim na ba' moo baik kap ba bhiibhi'spio'kix ka', jumai bhai'p ji ñio maadɨt gu maakob sasoi', jup jiñ chɨtda ɨp: ―Muni ja'k jap jup xi chɨ tɨgia'. Ba' na ñich mu ja'k jup xi chɨ tɨɨ, jumai mu ja'k jup kɨɨk gu maa'nkam jix chuk kabai cha'm ji ua'dat maa'n gui' na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' na jɨ'x jix bɨt ka' gu tu'.
66006006	Ba' mi' ɨrban nam pai' bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr guguuk gu sasoi', bhai' ji chum ñio, jup tum kai'ch: ―Ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gook kiilo pɨx ba aix ka' gu juun na jɨ'k mai'chia' gu maa'n tanoolh no't tu jua gu jaroi', piam baik kiilo gu tiriik. Pu'ñi ku pim ba' siamri cham xi buada' gu asait gio gu uubas baraa', na pim gu' pu'ñi cham tu' gammɨjɨ gɇ' bia'ka'.
66006007	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumai kap jup xi bhi'spio' gu u'uan bhiibgixim gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, na ba' moo maakob kap ba bhiibhi'spio'kix ka', jumai bhai'p ji ñio gu maakob sasoi', jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Mi'ñi ja'k jap jup xi chɨ tɨgia'.
66006008	Ba' aañ mu ja'k jup xi chɨ tɨɨ na pai' ja'k tuñ aagi'ñ. Mu kɨɨk ɨp jumai gu maa'nkam jix uam kabai cha'm, Muuki' sap tɨɨ' gui' gu maa'nkam. Ba' dhi' jumaip oi'ñchu' gu maa'nkam na Tulhiiñara' tɨɨ', na dhi' pɨx kat jup jum kai'ch mi' nam pai'm tulhiiña' gatuuk gu ja'tkam. Ba' bɨɨx gook jup ja tɨtda am nam sap ja kooda' gu ja'tkam nam jɨ'k daaxix mui' kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, nam pui' ja'k tu duñia' nam dɨɨlh pɨx bhaakui bhai' ji chɨ jɨgialhchuda' nam jax dhui pɨx ko'ya', gam jai' nam ua'mai, nam ja a'm jimiichdha' gu bhiogi', gio jai' ko'kdai' kɨ'n, gam jai' nam ja jugioka' gu gampɨx kam sasoi' nam jix bhaa'mna'.
66006009	Ba' nat jumai kap jup xi bhi'spio' gu u'uan bhiibgixim na ba' moox chamaam kap ba bhiibhi'spio'kix ka', mi sonpan gu sasoi' mɨmɨi'ñkar na mi ja'p kɨɨk, ba tɨɨ ñich nam mi'm maaxi'ñ gu ja i'ii'mda' gui' nam bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios na mɨt ja bhaamkidhak ja koi gu ja'tkam nam cham aa' nam tu a'gada'.
66006010	Ba'p kai'ch am mi' ji gu'kat gɇ' kɨ'n: ―Aapi' Gɇ'kam Dios jich Gɨ'kora', nap joidham bɨxchu'x aichu'n gio nap joidham jix uañ kɨ'n kɨɨk, gam nap pui' tu kuugalhdha' jax no' pich ba tɨi, ¿paa duuk jum aaya' nap saak ja aagi'ñdha' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam tu' jax buimɨk gu ja tutku' bhaan kup ba ja tulhiiñchuda' gui' na mɨt jich bhaamkidhak jich koi nach mu ja'p jum a'mkam ka tu a'gat gux bhai'm kai'chdham jum ñi'ook?
66006011	Ba' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n dhi' nam mi' guguuk sonpan gu sasoi' mɨmɨi'ñkar, xi ja tɨi' mɨt gu jajannulh joidham jix chooto, gio ba' nam jup ja tɨtda nam sap ka xim nɨɨra' alhi'ch pɨx ba', nam bɨɨx bhammɨ ka xi aaya' gui' na mɨt chakui ja koi, nam pui ka tu a'gichu' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam jɨ'k daaxix nam pu'ñi ja kooda', na ba' mi' dhɨr pui' ba tu kuugalhdha' gu Dios nam jax kai'ch.
66006012	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumai kap jup xi bhi'spio' gu u'uan bhiibgixim, giilhim gɇ' bhai' ji chɨm tɨr, gio gu tanoolh bhai' pɨx ji chukuur, jix chuk bhai' pup daa, ja'p na gu jax chu'm jannulh no'x chukuum jix chuk, gio gu masaa'n jix bɨ'p jum duu ja'p na ɨ'ɨɨr.
66006013	Gio gu chiichia' nat mui' ji ii' mu ja'k oi'ñga'n bhaan, ja'p na jax gu iibhai'ñga'n gu iigɨx na giilhim mui' mu pɨx tɨtronia' dɨɨrap no't jix io'm bhai' xi jɨb.
66006014	Gio gux dhaam pɨx cham pai' matgir, ja'pni pɨx jum duu na jax gu u'uan no't jotmoda' xim bhiib. Gio ba' nat giilhim jix io'm bhai' ji gi'ndokɨ gu oi'ñga'n, pɨx cham pai' matgir gu oi'dha' na mui' kap ka daraat na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, gio gu a'lhich dɨppɨr na mu ja'p dɨr kax maaxich suudai' ɨraab.
66006015	Ba' gui' nam nai' ja'p daraa nam jir gɇ'gɇrkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, ma jiboi'ññor jamɨt bha ja'p oi'dha' ta'm na jax chiichio', jai' bha ja'p na jax tɨ dɨɨdɨ' na mɨt bam o'ñchom, ja bɨɨm gu jaja'tkam tuk gam gu ja tujuandam tuk, pui' na jax gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gu ja sandaarui'x chuk, bɨɨx sia gui' nam jir jix chutumñigam, sia gui' nam jix io'm jix o'jo', gam sia gui' nam jir ja'ppɨx ja'tkam.
66006016	Ba'p ja tɨtda am gu oi'dha' bhɨjɨ ja'p ji baapxich chiichiob gam bha ja'p na jax tɨ dɨɨdɨ': ―Iam gor bhai' xi ia'lh jich a'm, xich ɨxchu' pim, na cham jich chɨgia' gui' nax io'm gɇ'kam kɨ'n daa bhammɨx dhaam, gio gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, na gu' giilhim jix bhaam jich bui.
66006017	Bam ai gu' na pai' dhuuk jich chulhiiñchuda' aach na chich cham mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa', gam gu jai'. ¿Jaroo gip jix ñakoo' nax io'm jum tulhiiña'?
66007001	Gio ba' moo mi' dhɨr ja'pni ñich jup tɨ tɨɨ, maakob sap gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios maakob kap guguuk am na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, na mɨt pui' ja'k ja tɨɨdak mu ja joot nam jix io'm tɨ jɨlhbichdha' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n na ba' tum xichui'dha' bɨɨx na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch bɨɨx kap, sia mu ja'p suudai' chɨr.
66007002	Ba' jumai ja'pni jurnip dɨr ja'k mui'p ba jim gu nobii'ñ gu Dios ji ua'dat gui' na kɨ'n ja matgilhchu'n gu Dios gui' nam jɨ'k kaichgɨda'. Ba' mui' xi ja jiñkai gu jai' noonbi'ñ nam mu ja'p guguuk maakob kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, na mɨt ja chia nam tu xichui'dha' jɨbɨɨlh kɨ'n bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, jup ja tɨtda:
66007003	―Chakui pim jix io'm tɨ jɨlhbichu'nda', nam gu' bɨɨx pu ko'ya' gui' nam jɨ'k tu dudua na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, sia bɨɨx pum xichui'dha' gu tutua gam sai' gio gu suudai', nach gu' ka ja matgilhdha' gui' nam jɨ'k tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' tu kuugalhdhim na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora'. Dai nach ka xi ja matgilhdha' na pim ba' moo mui' ba tɨ jɨlhbichdha'.
66007004	Ba' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios xi ja matgilh ja kokobtai' am gui' nam jɨ'k tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios nam jir Israel kam ja'tkam, xijum gook oo'm daman maakob miil (144,000) ja matgilh.
66007005	Mambhɨɨx daman gook miil ja matgilh gui' nam jir bopxi'ñ gu Judaa, gio gui' nam jir bopxi'ñ gu Rubeen ja'kbui' ɨp mambhɨɨx daman gook miil, gio gui' nam jir bopxi'ñ gu Gaad mambhɨɨx daman gook miil ɨp,
66007006	gio ba' gui' nam jup jir bopxi'ñ gu Aseer ja'kbui' mɨt jup ja matgilh mambhɨɨx daman gook miil, gio ba' gui' nam jir bopxi'ñ gu Neptalii ja'kbui' mɨt jup ja matgilh mambhɨɨx daman gook miil, gio gu bopxi'ñ gu Manasees mambhɨɨx daman gook miil ɨp,
66007007	gio gui' nam jir bopxi'ñ gu Simeon mambhɨɨx daman gook miil ɨp, gio ba' moo gui' nam Lebiip jir bopxi'ñ ja'kbui' mambhɨɨx daman gook miil jamɨt jup ja matgilh, gio gui' nam jir bopxi'ñ gu Isakaar ja'kbui' mambhɨɨx daman gook miil jamɨt jup ja matgilh,
66007008	gio ba' moo gui' nam jɨ'k jir bopxi'ñ gu Sabuloon ja'kbui' ɨp mambhɨɨx daman gook miil ɨp, gio ba' gui' nam jir bopxi'ñ gu Josee mambhɨɨx daman gook miil ɨp, gio ba' gui' nam jup jir bopxi'ñ gu Benjamiin ja'kbui' mɨt jup ja matgilh mambhɨɨx daman gook miil.
66007009	Ba' mi' dhɨr mui' mi' bam maax jamɨt gu ja'tkam cham daaxix kam, ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pai' daa gux io'm Gɇ'kam gio gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, pu cham jaroi' maat nam jɨ'k aix, pui' pɨx tu'ii' am. Bɨɨx kap dɨr mi' guguuk am gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n kam, nam bɨɨx aixim tu'm tu ñiok gam bɨɨx aixim tuutu'm. Jix io'm mui' dho ba' ji gu ja'tkam nam mi guguuk, nam pu cham jɨ'xdha' jaroi' ja tɨɨmo' siat tɨi ma ja ja'kɨlh. Bɨɨx jix chooto tɨ tɨ' am, gio nam jɨ'ma'n ja daada' gu ko'kmarak jaaja'.
66007010	Ba'p kai'ch am gɇ' kɨ'n: ¡Ja'p moo gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix bhai' duu ji dhi Dios jich Gɨ'kora' na bhai' dhaa atooxkor ta'm nat jich uañ guch ua'tulhdhara', nat gu' mu joot dhi' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir na ba' pu'ñich a'mkam jum makgɨrta' na ba' kɨ'n tu namkix ka' guch ua'tulhdhara'! Gammɨjɨch jix bhai'ch chaatɨt tu daanda' buiñor, na gu'r jix bhai'kam.
66007011	Ba' gu mui' cham daaxix kam gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr guguuk mi' na pai' daa, gio mi' nam pai' bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr daraa gu maa'n oo'm daman maakob gui' nam jir jagɨ'gɨr pa', gio gu maakob sasoi', ja o'lhia kɨ'n gu'kɨk bhai' ji chu daanɨ mɨt buiñor gu Dios na mi' daa ɨrban.
66007012	Jup kai'ch am: Maaxik dhor pui' nam jax kai'ch dhich jaaduñ, gammɨjɨch dho tu' ka'm nɨidhat gɇ'kamtu'nda' dhi Dios jich Gɨ'kora' na ya' gɇ'kam kɨ'n daa, na gu' maaxik jix io'm jir Gɇ'kam, bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia'. Gammɨjɨch gɇ'kamtu'ndat taxchaabgi'ñdha' sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt. Ja'pni tu tui'ka'.
66007013	Ba' maadɨt gui' nam mi' bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr daraa nam jir jagɨ'gɨr pa' jup jiñ chɨtda: ―¿Jaroom da' dhi ja'tkam jix chooto tɨ tɨ' kam nam ya' guguuk? ¿Paam dɨr ja'k jiim?
66007014	Ba' aañ jup tɨtda: ―Cham ji nañ maat. No' pich mi' dhɨr iam jiñ aa'ñ jiñ jaduuñ nap jix maat. Ba' gui' xiñ aagi'ñ ɨp, jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Jir di' am dho gui' nam giilhim jum tulhiiñaimɨk mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan, gio nam gammɨjɨ pux biiñak kat buiñor gu Dios siam jum tulhiiñ. Ba' xib yammɨ ja'k bap tu'ii' am jix bhai'm taatɨt, nat gu' bɨɨx dappaam tu ja uañ gu ja ua'tulhdhara' guch Xoi'kam, dhi' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, kɨ'n gu ɨ'ra'n nat jaax bhaan gu kuruus, na mɨt gu' soi'm ɨlhdhak tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor.
66007015	Ya' jɨ' bar di' nam pai' gammɨjɨ bɨɨma'n bap tui'ka' gu Dios joidham jix jɨjɨkgɨm, ja'p ji buusnia' nam gammɨjɨ ya' pu ba tu juanda' na pai' tu chiopi' gu Dios. Dhi' ba' dɨɨlh ja buip tu't ja nuuka'nda'.
66007016	Ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k cham pai' dhuuk kax bhio'n ka' am, ni nam cham pai' dhuuk ka tanook ka', ni gu tanoolh ku cham pai' dhuuk ja a'm ka tonnia', ba' cham pai'x chatoiñ kɨr kam tulhiiña' am.
66007017	Ba' xib ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ ya' pu ba oi'ñka' am jix bhai'm taatɨt, cham tu' bhaan jum tulhiiñat ka suanda' am nam jax jum tulhiiñaimɨk mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan, na gu' ya' gammɨjɨx bhai' tu tatda' buiñor dhich Gɨ'kora', gio na gu' gammɨjɨ ja bɨɨm oirɨda' dhi' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, ja'p ji buusnia' na ja bipia'da' ja'p na kakasnir, gio na gammɨjɨ ja i'chu'nda' gux kɨɨ' suudai' nam kɨ'n gammɨjɨx bhai'm taat ka'.
66008001	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumai kap jup xi bhi'spio' gu u'uan bhiibgixim gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir na ba' kɨ'n bɨɨx ba bhiibhi'spio'kix ka' na jɨ'k kap bhiibhi'sap kat, pɨx cham tum ñio bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x jir jix dhaam, mɨɨkim pa' moo na cham tum ñiok.
66008002	Ba' gux xijum gook gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr guguuk mi' na pai' daa, xi ja maa mɨt jɨ'ma'n gu kukuichdhakar.
66008003	Ja'xpɨx ba' moo jumai mi'p ba ai na pui'p jir nobii'ñ gu Dios alhi'ch kubhioñkar ji kusbiot nar jix uam totbikdam, ba' mi' ji kɨkbo sonpan gu gɇ' kubhioñkar na ja'p tu'm na sasoi' mɨmɨi'ñkar. Ba' gɇ' xi maa mɨt gui' na joidham uub na sap ba' kubhioñxidha' gu Dios bhaan gu kubhioñkar na mi' kɨɨk ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pai' daa, maap xi bɨndai gui' na mɨt tu kubhioñxi gui' nam tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, na pui' ji buusan nam tu kubhioñxidhimɨk nam tu dañiimɨk buiñor tu' ka'm nɨidhat.
66008004	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk bhai' ji chu kubhiona, sɨlh mu ja'k bhɨi gu kuu'mxiga'n na pai' daa gu Dios, maap jum bɨndak gui' nam tu kubhioñxi'ñ guch Xoi'kam jɨɨgi'ñdham.
66008005	Mi' dhɨr ba' nat jax daa ɨp gio gu alhi'ch kubhioñkar, mi' xi suuduidhak gu tuupalh bhai' dhɨr bhaan gu gɇ' kubhioñkar mɨjɨmmɨ xi bua oi'ñga'n bhaan. Ba' bhai' pu ji gi'ndokɨ gu oi'ñga'n, gio na gɇ' tɨm tɨroon ja'p na jax kai'chidha' gu duuk tɨrnɨdam.
66008006	Gu' ba' gux xijum gook noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam jɨ'ma'n ja daada' gu kukuichdhakar, jix kɨɨ' bam duu mɨt nam ba tu kuichdha'.
66008007	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk maadɨt xi chu kuich, jix dhaam dɨr mui' pu ji ii' gu chia mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan, gio ba' gu tai ɨp bɨnkam gu ɨ'ɨɨr. Ba' pu mɨi alhi'ch gu dɨbɨɨr bɨnkam gu tutua gam sai' na mi ja'p ka tu tuutɨt na jɨ'x pɨx aagix na tɨ mɨɨya'.
66008008	Mi' dhɨr ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumaip xi chu kuich gu nobii'ñ gu Dios, maa'n jix dhaam dɨr mui' xi jibua mɨt gɇ' gui' na ja'p tu'm na oidha', dai na bɨɨx mɨimtu', sɨlh mummu gɨi ɨrban gu gɇ' suudai'. Ba'x bɨ'p jum duu taak dɨr gu suudai' ja'p na ɨ'ɨɨr na jɨ'x pɨx aagix na bɨ'lhia'.
66008009	Ba' koi mɨt gu boptop gam gu jai' nam mi' ka tu oipot mi' nat jɨ'x bɨgiir gu suudai' na jɨ'k aagix nam ko'ya'. Gio gu ja'tkam nam mi ja'p ka oipot kaknub ta'm pui'p koi mɨt nam jɨ'k pɨx jup aagix, bɨɨx pu baap gu ja kaknub.
66008010	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumaip xi chu kuich gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na ba' kɨ'n bar baik ka', jix dhaam dɨr mui' ji jigɨi maa'n gui' na ja'p tu'm na chi'ɨɨ', ba' mu ja'p gɨi jɨ'kchi kap gɇ'gɇr jir a'kkɨ'n na pai' mɨr gu suudai' gio mu ja'p na jax jir biipiatam, na jɨ'k kap aagix na gɨxia'.
66008011	Jix Xibu' sap tɨɨ' gui' gu chi'ɨɨ', ba' bɨɨx nat jɨ'k kap a'kkɨ'n gɨi, jix xibu'p jum duu gu suudai'. Ba' mui' koi mɨt gu ja'tkam na mɨt jɨ'k ii gui' gu suudai' na jɨ'k pɨx aagix nam ko'ya', nat ja maimtuda gu suudai' na gu' giilhim jix xibu'.
66008012	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumaip xi chu kuich gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na ba' kɨ'n bar maakob ka', tɨi pup ɨrban juugɨt nai' ji chuu gu tanoolh, gio gu masaa'n, gio ba' gu chiichia'. Cham tu'x bhai' ka tu tonni'ñ gu tanoolh, gio gu masaa'n palhɨɨp pɨx ba tum masbagi'ñ gio gu chiichia', ba'x chukgam jup tum duu jai' kap na jɨ'k kap aagix na tum tukgamta', tataab ja'k gio tukaa' ja'k.
66008013	Ba' maa'n gu bha'aa' bhammɨ ja'p ji dhɇdɇ'dat jix dhaam jup kai'ch gɇ' kɨ'n: ―Ja'p moo joi'ndam jum duñia' am gu ja'tkam bɨɨx na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam pai' dhuuk xi chu kuichdha' dhi baik noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam ka bi'iix nam tu kuichdha'.
66009001	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumaip xi chu kuich gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na ba' kɨ'n bar jix chamaam ka', maa'n jix dhaam dɨr mui' ji jigɨi gu chi'ɨɨ' mummu oi'ñga'n bhaan, ba' xi maa mɨt gui' na kɨ'n jum kukpio'k mu na pai' gɇ' tɨ dɨ' na cham pai' ju'.
66009002	Ba' xi kupio' mi' dhɨr na pai' kiidha', giilhim gɇ' mɨjɨ dɨr ji buus gu kuubhɨx ɨɨbhidham jix chuk jix kubha'biñ, ja'p na jax chu'm kuubhɨsda' gu tɨɨ'nkar no' jaroi' bax chu mamaim. Ba' ja'xpɨx bhai' pɨx ji chɨm ɨɨka bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, nat gu' ba taa'bi gu tanoolh gu kuubhɨx, na gu' giilhim jix chuk nat mɨjɨ dɨr buus na pai' gɇ' tɨ dɨ'. Sia gu jɨbɨɨlh cham tu' ka kɨɨ', nat gu' bɨɨx ba ia'ñ gu kuubhɨx.
66009003	Ba' bhɨjɨ dɨr ja'p bhaan gu kuubhɨx bhai' ji bubua mɨt mui' gu sossoi, bɨɨx kap ba oipo am na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, dai nam pui'x io'm jup jix bhaa'mna' na jax gu nankasɨr.
66009004	Pui' ja'k ja tɨɨdak mu ja joot jamɨt nam ja ki'mna' gu ja'tkam na jɨ'k cham daaxdhix ka' ja kokobtai' am gui' na kɨ'n tu matgilhchu'n gu Dios na bhaan jix maatɨ' nam gui' kaichu', gio nam cham jax ja buada' gu tutua gam sai' na mi ja'p tu tuut, daipu' nam jax pɨx ja tɨtda.
66009005	Gio ba' moop ja tɨtda am ɨp nam sap cham tu' pu ja koodaidha' gu ja'tkam nam jɨ'k ja ki'mna', ja'pji dai nam jɨ'x pɨx bhaan jum tulhiiña'. Ba' dhi' jɨ' nam ja'p tuutu'm na sossoi, bhai' ji ja ki'mna mɨt bɨɨx gu ja'tkam jix chamaam masaa'n juugɨt, pui' ja'k tɨ kɨkɨ' am na nankasɨr.
66009006	Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk bhai' jim tulhii gu ja'tkam na mɨt bhai' ji ja ki'mna gu sossoi, mui' tɨix aa' am nam ba ko'ya' gɨt nam cham mi' pum tulhiiñdha', gu' ji nam gu' cham ko' siam chi moo jax jum bua't tɨi muuki' dhaan, ja'p ji buus gu' nat mai' mɨɨ gu muuki' mi' dhɨr ja bui.
