66009007	Gu sossoi ja'p tuutu'm am na gu kakbai, gio nam pui'x ja joiñi' nam nai' xi bapo' nam jax xim buada' gu kakbai pai' no'r jɨgialhi'. Dai nam bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n ja'p tu'm tu moom na ja'tkam, gio nam bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n ja tuttutu' gui' na ja'p tu'm na kuruun.
66009008	Gu ja kuup ba' ja'xbui'r tɇ'tɇb nam jɨ'x tu kuup gu u'uub, gu' ba' gu ja taatam ja'p tu'm ɨp na gu mabii'ñ gu taatmu'n.
66009009	Bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x jir ja tutku' tu baapsatu' am gu ko'kmarak bapaiñum nam kɨ'n jum soo'mdhatu'. Ba' nam xi a'ngɨb ja'p tum kai'ch na jax no'm pai' dhɨr mui' mu boopo' gu kakbai ji ja tɨɨbiopat gu kakret no't ba ji chum kokda.
66009010	Gu' ba' gu ja bhaabhai ja'p tu'm na gu bhai'ñ gu naksɨr, kukgaram mi chuut gui' na kɨ'n tɨ kɨkɨ'. Dhi' ba' kɨ'n ja ki'mna mɨt gu ja'tkam jix chamaam masaa'n juugɨt.
66009011	Gu ja gɇ'kam tuk dhi sossoi, Abadoon tɨɨ' gu ebreo ñi'ook kɨ'n, gu' ba' gu griago ñi'ook kɨ'n Apolion. Dhi' pɨx jir di' gui' na mu ja'k jup jir gɇ'kam na pai' giilhim gɇ' tɨ dɨ'.
66009012	Ja'pni ja'k tum bua, ku gu' gook ka bi'iix ji gu tulhiiñara' na ja a'm ka jimia' gu ja'tkam, cham tu' daipu'. Dhi' kɨ'n kia'pɨx maa'n ba jim.
66009013	Gu' ba' nat pai' dhuuk xi chu kuich gu jumai nobii'ñ gu Dios na ka bi'iix, bhai' ji chum ñio bhai' dhɨr bhaan gu kubhioñkar nar jix uam totbikdam na mi' kɨɨk ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pai' daa gu Dios,
66009014	jup tɨtda gu nobii'ñ gu Dios nat kia'pɨx tu kuich: ―Mi' dhɨr jap ja do'ñchora' gu maakob noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam mummu buupulh gɇ' akkɨ'n na Eupraates tɨ tɨɨ'.
66009015	Ba' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios mu jimɨɨk jup xi ja do'ñcho gu jai' noonbi'ñ nam mummu buupulh ak jugii'ñ, nam sap ba' ba ja kooda' jɨ'kchi gu ja'tkam na jɨ'k aagix, nam gu' pu pu kai'ñkam mi' buupulh nam pu'ñi tu duñia' na pai' dhuuk jum aaya' gu tanoolh gio gu oidha' na pui' tu kuugalhdha'.
66009016	Ba' gu ja sandaarui'x chuk gook jix cha'tmam oo'm miyoones ja aa am nam aix, bɨɨx kakbai cha'm jiim am.
66009017	Bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n gu ja sandaarui'x chuk nam bha daraichu' kakbai cha'm, jɨ'ma'n ja baapsatu' am gu ko'kmarak bapaiñum nam kɨ'n jum soo'mdha', dai na gɇ' mɨimtu' ja'p na tai, taak dɨr jix chɨɨdu'm maaxi'ñ, taak dɨr ba'x uam. Gu' ba' gu ja kakbai' ja'p tu'm tu moom am na jax chu'm tu mo' gu mabii'ñ, ba' ja chiichiñ am dɨr busaak gu taix io'm jix choiñ kuubhɨx bɨnkam.
66009018	Ba' mui' ja koi mɨt gu ja'tkam kɨ'n gu tai nam jɨ'k pɨx aagix nam ja kooda'.
66009019	Gu ja bhaabhai ba' ja'p tuutu'm na kooko', tu moom kukgaram dɨr na jax chu'm gu ko'. Dhi' kɨ'n jamɨt ba' mui'p ja ki'mna gu ja'tkam.
66009020	Ba' gui' na mɨt bii na mɨt cham koi kɨ'n gu tai na ja chiichiñ am dɨr busaak gu kakbai, gio na mɨt cham ja ki'mna, cham pai' iam soi' ba jim ɨlh jamɨt buiñor gu Dios sia kum jax tɨ nɨi'ñ, pui' nam jax ba tu bua na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ. Jix io'm ba xi jii mɨt nam tu daan ja bui gu cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda' nam jir noonbi'ñ gu ja'ook, gam ja bui gu didios jum tɨɨtgɨdam nax uam totbikdam kɨ'n jup duñiix, gam jai' gui' nax chooto totbik, gio jai' bɨɨx aixim tu'm, gio gam jai' gui' nar u'uux jup duiñxim nam pu cham tu oipo sia kum tɨi tu tooton, ni nam tɇ kɇɇ sia kum tɨi tu naanak, gio nam cham ñiññia sia kum tɨi tu buupui, nam gu' pu cham tu' dudua, nam gu'r jup duñiixim pɨx.
66009021	Gio ba' nam mui' ja bia'kat gu u'uub ja bɨɨm boppo, gio nam tɨ ɨɨxi'ñ, gam nam ja koo'n gu ja'tkam, gio ba' nam nai' tu jiboiñ.
66010001	Ba' maa'n gu nobii'ñ gu Dios jix dhaam dɨr mui' ba jurnim mu ja'k oi'ñga'n bhaan joidham tɨbaa'ñ cha'm. Gɇ'kam kam tui'dhi' gui' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios, ki'oor bɨɨx xikoolh xi bhɨichdhixchu' bha mo'r daam, gio gu buibsa'n na gɇ' mɨimtu' ja'p na gu tanoolh, gio gu tootna'n pui' ɨp,
66010002	maa'n daa'ñchu' gu u'uan sɨlhñixim na bɨxxik dɨr mi chu ua'ñix. Ba' mummu ji kɨkbo oi'ñga'n bhaan, maap dɨr suudai' chɨr tɨ kɨis gu kɨɨ'n dɨr kam toona'n kɨ'n, gu o'nsop dɨr kam toona'n ba' dɨbɨɨr ta'm tɨ kɨis.
66010003	Ba' xi jiiñ gɇ' kɨ'n, ja'p tɨi na gu mabii'ñ no' gɇ' kɨ'n jɨɨrok. Ba' mu pai' dhɨr bhai' ji chum ñio gɇ' kɨ'n gio nat tɨm tɨr, jix xijum gook tɨi na mɨt bha ñio maap maa'n jimdam.
66010004	Ba' aañ ba ji chu ua'nak nam jɨ'k jax kai'ch gui' nam mu pai' dhɨr bha ñiok, gu' ji nat gu' jotmoda' bhai' ba tum ñio bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam, jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Dhi'p dai cham tu' u'uanda' nam jax kai'ch dhi' nam mu ñiok, dɨɨlh jap pɨx pui'x chu mat ka'.
66010005	Ba' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na mu kɨɨk oi'ñga'n bhaan, na maap dɨr suudai' chɨr tɨ kɨisap, xi bamii'ñdhak gu kɨɨ'n dɨr kam nobii'ñ
66010006	jup kai'ch bhaankamu'n gui' na bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch, gio na mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ pux jai'ch ka', gam nat jup tu duu bɨɨx na jɨ'k tu'x chu jai'ch: ―Ja'xbui' pɨx juugɨt tɨ nɨɨra gu Dios,
66010007	na gu' xib na pai' dhuuk xi chu kuichdha' dhi jumai nobii'ñ nat chakui tu kuich, bɨɨx pui' ba tu kuugalhdha' nat jɨ'k jax ja tɨɨdak gui' nam bɨjɨk bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n.
66010008	Ba' gui' na bhammɨ dɨr bha tuñ a'gi'ñ jix dhaam, jup jiñ chɨtda ɨp gio: ―Taañmɨr gu u'uan na daa' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na mu kɨɨk oi'ñga'n bhaan, na maap dɨr suudai' chɨr tɨ kɨisap, ja'p jap tɨɨda' nam makia'.
66010009	Ba' aañ mu jimɨɨk bhai'p ba taan gu u'uan na daa', ba' gui'p jiñ chɨtda: ―Ya' dho, dai ji nap gu' bha jugia'. Joidham jix maikak ka' nap mui' ji jugia', ɨrban dɨr gum book ba' bhai' jim maimtuda'.
66010010	Ba' aañ bhai'p xi juu gu u'uan nat pai' dhuuk bhai' xiñ maa gu nobii'ñ gu Dios. Pui' dho joidham jix maikak ja'p na mɨɨbat na ñich mui' ji juu, nat pai' dhuuk ɨrban dɨr jum gaam ji guñ book nat ba' giilhim bhai' jiñ maimtuda.
66010011	Ba' gui' na bhammɨ dɨr bha tuñ a'gi'ñ jix dhaam jup jiñ chɨtda ɨp gio: ―Jum aa' nap giop ka tu a'gara' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, nap ja aagi'ñdha' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na tu' jax dhuñia' gatuuk. Bɨɨx kap jap aaya' na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, na gu' bɨɨx jum aa' nam pui' tu machia' na jɨ'k ja'tkam, sia nam jir jax chu'm, siam jir pa ja'k kam, piam siam jai' maakam tu ñiok, bɨɨx jap pui' tu ja a'gi'dha', sia gui' nam jir tɇ gɇ'gɇrkam.
66011001	Ba' mɨkkat maa'n xiñ maa mɨt gu jupaabdakar ja'p tu'm na tootkom, mi' dhɨr ba'p jiñ chɨtda am: ―Jupaabda' ap dhi' kɨ'n gu chiopga'n gu Dios gio gu sasoi' mɨmɨi'ñkar na bhaan tum makgɨrxi'ñ gu Dios, gio ba' nap ja ja'kɨlhdha' gu ja'tkam nam jɨ'k aix nam mi chu daan ɨrban dɨr.
66011002	Dai mu ja'p dɨɨrap dɨr gu chiop jap cham jupaaba'nda', na gu' dhi' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja a'm bipio' gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aañ jiñ bui. Na gu' dhi' ja'p jir jum duukam nam bɨɨx tu' pɨx ja ɨlhdha' gui' nam jɨ'k ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñdha' aañ jiñ bui baik oidha' daman taak juugɨt.
66011003	Ba' aañ gook mu ja jootsa' guñ chujuandam tuk nam jiñ a'mkam tu ja a'gidha' guñ ñi'ook bɨɨx gu ja'tkam baik oidha' daman taak juugɨt. Gampai' pɨx tui'ñgɨda' am, jix xaasak tɨ tɨi'chgɨda' am na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nam soi' pɨx jum ɨlhii'ñchu'nda'.
66011004	Gui' jɨ' gook tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios, dhi' pɨx pui' ja'k jum maaxi'ñ am gu gook oliibos na ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr tu't bhai' na pai' daa gu Dios, gio gu gook na bhaan jum tuttu gu kañdhiir.
66011005	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk mu ja joot gu Dios gu gook tujuandam tugi'ñ nam tu ja a'gi'ñpu' gu ja'tkam, cham jɨ'xdha' jax ja dooda mɨt gu ja'tkam sia kum tɨix ja bhaamki'ñ, na gu' bɨxchu'x bhai' nam pu tu duñia', ja chiichiñ am dɨr busaak gu tai. Ba' jai' dhɨt nam tɨix ja koodam, pu ja mɨi'ñ jamɨt.
66011006	Siax bhai' na mɨt pui' tu duu nat cham duu'n baik oidha' daman taak na mɨt jɨ'x juugɨt tu ja a'gi gu ja'tkam gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na jax ja'k tu duñia' gatuuk, gio na mɨt ɨ'ɨɨr jup duu gu suudai', gio ba' na mɨt pui' ja'k tu duu nam bɨxchu' bhaan bhai' jim tulhiiña' gu ja'tkam na mɨt jɨ'x juugɨt ɨlh.
66011007	Gu' ba' nat pai' dhuuk jum ai na jɨ'x juugɨt daaxix nam tu a'ga', na mɨt bɨɨx kap ba tɨɨmo nam tu a'gimɨk gu Dios ñio'ki'ñ, maa'n gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nax ɨɨbhidham tu'm mɨjɨ dɨr buusnɨk na pai' gɇ' tɨ dɨ' bhai' ji chu kokda ja bui, ja mai'chɨk pu ja koi.
66011008	Mi' pɨx ja'p bɨɨt am ba'bhak sanoop, mi' ɨrban gu gɇ' kiicham na Jerusaleen tɨ tɨɨ', na mɨt pai' gɨbiimɨk sissapa ɨp kuruus ta'm guch Xoi'kam jano' na mu xi oilhimɨk, mi' na pai' ja'p ji buusan na gook kɨ'n tɨ tɨɨ': Sodooma gio ba' Ejipto, nam gu' pui' ja'k jup tu jim gu mi' oi'ñkam Jerusaleen na jax gu Sodooma kam gio gu Ejipto kam.
66011009	Baik tanoolh daman taak mi' pu bɨɨt gu ja tutku' gu gook tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios. Bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam ja tɨɨ mɨt nam mi' pɨx ja'p ko'iix, sia gui' nam mɨk ja'k oi'dha', gio jai' gui' nam maakam tu ñiok. Bɨɨx kap dɨr na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n ja tɨɨ mɨt, ba' pu cham jaroi'm guguux na ja yaaspa', mi' pɨx xi ja nɨi'ñ am, nam gu' tu' pɨx ja ɨlhii'ñ.
66011010	Dai na mɨt joidham jix bhai' bhai' jim ɨlh bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam na mɨt ba ja tɨɨ na mɨt ba koi gui' jɨ' gook tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios, pɨx am tum a'onbagi'ñ am bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n gux dha'ram namkɨm, nam gu' pui' xim aa' na mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k joidham jix bhai' ba tu ja jimia', cham tu' bhaan kam tulhiiña' am, na mɨt gu' ba koi gui' nam pui' ja'k ka tu bua't.
66011011	Ba' mi' dhɨr nat xim ai gu baik tanoolh daman taak, gu Dios giop ba ja dudua'ñ gu gook tujuandam tugi'ñ, ba baapam jamɨt mi' dhɨr nam pai' ka bɨɨtɨt. Ba' giilhim bhai' ji chooto'n jamɨt bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam na mɨt ba ja tɨɨ gu gook ja'tkam na mɨt giop ba dudua nam ka ko'iix kat.
66011012	Ja'xpɨx bhammɨx dhaam dɨr mui' ba tum ñio gɇ' kɨ'n, jup ja tɨtda am gu gook tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios: ―Bhai' gor bi jiim. Ba' gu gook tujuandam gamai'p ji chɨɨtɨs jamɨt joidham tɨbaa'ñ cha'm na mɨt ba jii bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam buiñor gu Dios ja nɨi'ñchudat bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam jix ja bhaamki'ñ.
66011013	Ba' mi' dhɨr jix io'm bhai' ji gi'ndokɨ gu oi'ñga'n na mɨt jax pɨx bhammɨ ji bhiibhi'ñ gu gook tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios, ba' jɨ'kchi ia'rɨ gu ba'bhak na jɨ'k daaxix na ia'lhia' gui' gu tanoolh, gio gu ja'tkam xijum gook miil jup koi mɨt nat ja tɨim gu ba'bhak. Ba' gui' na mɨt jɨ'k bii, jix chotdonɨk ma tu daanɨ mɨt buiñor gu Dios nax dhaam jup tu'ii'.
66011014	Gook moo ba jim gu tulhiiñara', maa'n pɨx ba bii na pui' tum kuugalhdha'.
66011015	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk jumaip xi chu kuich gu nobii'ñ gu Dios nam ba' kɨ'n bar daipu' ka', mui' dhɨt bhai' ji chum ñio gɇ' kɨ'n bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam, jup kai'ch am: Dhi Dios jich Gɨ'kora' bɨɨma'n guch Xoi'kam, bɨɨx kap bar gɇ'gɇrkam am na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, ba' gammɨjɨ pu bar gɇ'gɇrkam ka' am sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt.
66011016	Ba' gu maa'n oo'm daman maakob gu ja'tkam nam jir jagɨ'gɨr pa', nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr daraa mi' na pai' daa gu Dios, na mɨt jax ja o'lhia kɨ'n guguu, nai' ji mumgia mɨt, dɨɨrap xi chu sissap gu ja moom, bhai' ji chu daanɨ mɨt buiñor,
66011017	jup kai'ch am: Taxchaab Dios jich Gɨ'kora' nap jix io'm jir gɇ'kam kat bɨxchu'x aichu'n nap pu tu duñia', gio nap bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch na chakui jai'ch kat dhi oi'ñga'n, nap gu' aap bɨɨx kap bar gɇ'kam ba' xib na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n gam sia nar pa ja'k.
66011018	Mui' jai' dhɨt gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aap jum bui, tɨix bhaak am nap bɨɨx kap bar gɇ'kam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n. Ku ba' gu' nap gu' ba ja tulhiiñchuda', ya' bar bhaan gu' nap pai' dhuuk ja aagi'ñdha' bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam nam tu' jax buimɨk nam duduakat ja tutku' bhaan, no'm jix kɨɨ'p jum duukam jup tu buimɨk piam ku gu'x buam jum duukam. Xib jap ba' ampɨx tu ja makia' gui' na tu' ja a'm bipio' gui' nam bɨjɨk jum a'mkam tu a'gimɨk gum ñi'ook, gio gui' nam jum a'mkam tu juanaimɨk, gam gui' na mɨt tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhak mi' pui' jii nap jax jix aa'. Gio gui' na mɨt jɨ'k cham tu' ka'm jum tɨɨ, pui'p jup ja makia' na tu' ja a'm jup bipio', siam chi moor jix chutumñigam piam siam cham tu' bia'. Sia ja makia' ap na tu' ja a'm bipio' gui' nam tu ko'ktulhdhimɨk bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n.
66011019	Ba' ja'xpɨx bhai' jim kupio' gu ki'ñgob bhai' na pai' tu chiopi' gu Dios. Ba' nañ mui' xi chɨ nɨi'ñ, bhɨjɨmmɨ pɨx daa ɨrban dɨr gux xidhuu kam kaaja. Ba' mi' dhɨr gɇ' bhai' ji chɨm tɨr, gio nat bhai' ji gi'ndokɨ gu oi'ñga'n, gam nat bhai' ji ii' gu chia.
66012001	Ba' mi' dhɨr maa'n bhammɨ ja'p bam maax jix dhaam gu ubii ji chɨ'kat maa'n gu jannulh na gɇ' tanoor, ja'p na jɨ'x tu tonni'ñ gu tanoolh, maa'n xi kɨɨs gu kuruun na mambhɨɨx daman gook bha daraa gu chiichia', amuub bɨtaa'n ja'p ba' daa gu masaa'n na pai' kɨɨk gu ubii.
66012002	Jir alhi'ch kɨɨkam ji gu' gu ubii, ba' mi' dhɨr gɇ' kɨ'n bhai' ji saraa nat bhai' jix chu ko'kor nat bam ai na pai' dhuuk tɨgia' gu alhii na bia'.
66012003	Ba' ja'xpɨx ja'p ja'k jup bam maax gu ja'ook, dai na giilhim ɨɨbhidham tu'm gu tukga'n, ja'p tu'm na tɨrook dai na gɇ' gio nax bɨ', xijum gook tu moom, mambhɨɨx ba' tu a'aa', ba' bɨɨx na jɨ'k moomoram jɨ'ma'n ja tuttutu' gu kukrun.
66012004	Mi' dhɨr ba' gu bhai'ñ kɨ'n ja gɨbio'rak xi ja ii'ñxich mui' gu chiichia' na bha ja'p daraa na jɨ'k pɨx aagix, mummu ja'k xi ja iabu oi'ñga'n bhaan. Mi' dhɨr ba' mui' ji ai mu ja'k na pai' gu ubii na kia'pɨx ba duduar alhii kɨ'n, na sap ba' mi' pu jugioka' gu maraa'n na jax maaxilhia'.
66012005	Gu alhii nat tɨɨ gu ubii, jir chio'ñ. Dhi' sap ba'r ja gɇ'kam tuk ka' gu ja'tkam bɨɨx na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, nax oo' kɨ'n ja sɨlhka'nda' kɨ'n gu baiñum oxia. Ba' moo jano' nat jax maaxir gu alhii mi' dhɨr pum bhɨɨk baasɨ'n ja'k jix dhaam buiñor gu Dios, nam bhammɨ ja'k gɇ'kam kɨ'n daasa'.
66012006	Dɨɨlh mi' pup bii gu ubii, dɨ'ɨɨ'n gu alhii. Ba' mai' ba mɨɨ mu ja'p gampɨx na pai' cham jaroi' oirɨ na ba' cham jaroi' jax dhooda', sɨlh pu bhɨi mummu maa'n kap na pai' tu aagi'ñ gu Dios na aaya', nat gu' pu pui' ja'k ba duu bɨɨpɨ' dɨr nam gu mi' oi'ñkam ka tu maakda' gu koi' na kɨ'n duaka' baik oi'dha' daman taak juugɨt.
66012007	Ba' gatuuk jup ma jɨgialhich bhammɨx dhaam, gu nobii'ñ gu Dios nar ja gɇ'kam tuk gu jai' noonbi'ñ na Migial tɨɨ', ma tu kokda ja bɨɨm gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ buiñor gu ja'ook na ja'p tu'm tu tuuku' na gu tɨrook. Gu ja'ook tɨix io'm tu kokda ja bɨɨm gu noonbi'ñ na ɨlhdhat na moo ja mai'chia' gɨt gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios.
66012008	Gu' ji nat gu' cham tu' jax ji dhuu, tu' pɨx dooda mɨt, ba' pu mai' ardi mɨt bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam.
66012009	Mu ja'k jamɨt xi ardi oi'ñga'n bhaan bɨnkam gu noonbi'ñ, ba' xib bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n oirɨt ja iatgi'ñ gu ja'tkam. Dhi' pɨx jir di' gu ko' na bɨjɨk dɨr pu jai'ch nat dɨr dhi oi'ñga'n jup jum duu, na gook kɨ'n tɨɨ': Ja'ook gio ba' Dhiabur.
66012010	Ba' mɨkkat bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam bhai' ba tum ñio gɇ' kɨ'n, jup tum kai'ch: ―Xib ba' ya' bam ai na pai' dhuuk saak jix ja joi'ndai gu Dios tu ja uañdha' gu ja ua'tulhdhara' gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n. Bɨɨx kap bar gɇ'kam ba' xib gu Dios ja bui gu ja'tkam, nat gu' guch Xoi'kam pui' ba tu kuugalh nat jax tɨɨdak mu joot mu oi'ñga'n bhaan, mai' ba ardi gu' gu ja'ook na ya' mɨmrat ka ja iattulhi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam, gammɨjɨ ya' kɨɨka' kia' na ja iattulhi'ñchu'nda' buiñor gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora'.
66012011	Xib na mɨt gu' mai' ba ardi, ba' ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k cham ka bhaai' ka' na jax ja iattulhdha' gu ja'ook dhich jaaduñ, nat gu' ba tu ja namkix gu ja ua'tulhdhara' guch Xoi'kam gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, jano' nat jaax gu ɨ'ra'n bhaan gu kuruus na ba' pu'ñi duuji bɨɨx dappaam tu ja uañdhix ka' gu ja ua'tulhdhara'. Ba' cham jax ka ja dooda' xib gu ja'ook, nam gu' dhi' ba kaichu' guch Xoi'kam. Pui' ku ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor, mi' dhɨr nai'p ji jii mɨt na mɨt tu ja a'gidham gu jai' gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios cham tu' bhaan ji chotdonɨk sia mɨt chi ja bhaamkidhak ja koi, nam gu' bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n bax biiñak buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
66012012	Ba' aapi'm na pim jɨ'k ya ja'p tu oi'dha'x dhaam, gɇ'kam kɨ'n japim jix bhai' pɨx bam taat ka' na mɨt ya' ba ai dhich jaaduñ na mɨt mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora' nam jich bɨɨm ba oi'ñka'. Dai aapi'm na pim jɨ'k mu ja'p jup tu'ii' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n dho gi gu' gɇ'kam kɨ'n jix buam jum aa'nda' ji, na gu'x io'm jam tulhiiñchuda' gu ja'ook bɨɨx aixim bhaan nat ya' dɨr mɨjɨ xi mɨɨ, sia aapi'm na pim jɨ'k mu ja'p oipo suudai' dhaam kaknub ta'm, gam na jam iatgidhai mu ja'k jam bhɨichdha' na pai'x io'm jum tulhiiña' dɨɨlh, na gu'x maat na bar mia'n nam pai' dhuuk daagɨi tulhiiñchuda'.
66012013	Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk mu ja'k xi ardi gu ja'ook na ja'p tu'm na tɨrook oi'ñga'n bhaan, mu ɇɇk bax mu'aam gu ubii gui' nat kia'pɨx tɨɨ gu alhii, na gu' giilhim jix bhaamtu'. Gu' ji nat gu' jimiññor gu ubii, gu ja'ook ba' gatuuk dɨr mui'p ji ardi.
66012014	Ba' gu Dios xi a'ngatuda' gu ubii ja'p tu'm na gu bha'aa' gu a'nga'n na sap ba' dɇ'ji nakga' gu ja'ook, gio na ba' jotmoda' aaya' mummu gampɨx nat pai' joot nam o'ñcho' baik oidha' daman taak juugɨt, na ba' cham mu'aa' gu ja'ook.
66012015	Ba' gu ja'ook chiñi'ram dɨr mui' xi nua gɇ' gu suudai' na sap ba' bi'ñña' gɨt gu ubii nax mu'aam,
66012016	gu' ji nat gu' gu dɨbɨɨr jotmoda' xim kupio' na mui' ba mɨlhiim gu suudai' mu na pai' gu ubii, mɨjɨ ja'k pɨx ji baap gu suudai' dɨbɨɨr bɨta', pɨx cham pai' matgir, pu cham jax dhooda.
66012017	Giilhim tɨix bhaam ji gu' gu ja'ook buiñor gu ubii nat cham jax dhooda. Ba' gatuuk na mɨt pai' xi mui'dha gu bipsalhi'ñ gu ubii, bhai' ji chu kokda ja bui. Gu bipsalhi'ñ gu ubii, dhi' pɨx kat jup jum kai'ch am gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios, gio nam gammɨjɨx biiñak buiñor.
66012018	Ba' gu ja'ook na ja'p tu'm na gu tɨrook, mi' pɨx ji kɨkbu ju'ñdharam gu gɇ' suudai'.
66013001	Ba' mɨkkat maa'n mɨjɨ dɨr ba ji buus suudai' ɨraab gui' nar nobii'ñ gu ja'ook, pui' ɨɨbhidham tu'm jup tu tuuku', xijum gook jup tu moom, mambhɨɨx ba' tu a'aa'. Ba' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n ka'm gu a'ga'n ja tuttutu' gu kukrun, bha moomoram ba' mui' bha ua'ñixchu' gu ñiiñio'k na jax ja'k cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios.
66013002	Gu tukga'n gui' jɨ' nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nat mɨjɨ dɨr ji buus suudai' ɨraab, ja'p tu'm na dɨ'nbalh, gu tootna'n ba' ja'p tu'm ɨp na gu booji gu tootna'n, gu chiñii'ñ ba' ja'p tu'm na gu mabii'ñ gu chiñii'ñ. Gu' ba' gu ja'ook gui' na ja'p tu'm jup tu tuuku' na gu tɨrook, gɇ'kam kɨ'n ba dai gui' jɨ' nat mɨjɨ dɨr buus suudai' ɨraab nar nobii'ñ, na sap ba' ja'xbui'p bar gɇ'kam ka' na dɨɨlh, gam na bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia'.
66013003	Gu' ji na gu' panaas ja'p tu'ii' na maa'n muukixchu' gu ma'oo'n gui' jɨ' nobii'ñ gu ja'ook, panaas kux io'm jix ko'ktolhdhix, cham jɨ'xdha' ka dodhia' kam tu'ii', gu' ji nat gu' mi' jotmoda' bhai' ji dhua cham jum ɨlhdham. Ba' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n na mɨt tɨɨ nat ba dua gu ma'oo'n gui' nar nobii'ñ gu ja'ook, joidham jix bhai'm ɨlhdhak mu ja'k ji kai mɨt.
66013004	Ba' dai nam ba tu daanda' buiñor gu ja'ook gui' na ja'p tu'm tu tuuku' na gu tɨrook dai na gɇ', nam gu' bɨɨx ba kaichu' gui' na mia'n jir nobii'ñ nat pu pu kai'ñkam gɇ'kam kɨ'n dai na ba' pu'ñi ja iatgidhai bɨɨx gu ja'tkam ja chiñia' nam tu dañia' buiñor. Tu daanda' am ba' gu ja'tkam buiñor gu ja'ook gio buiñor gu nobii'ñ jup xi kai'chɨt: ―¡Ja'p moo tu' sɨlhkam jir gɇ'kam ji dhi' nach jaroi' kaichgɨt ba tu daan buiñor! Cham jɨ'xdha' jaroi' jax dhooda' sia pɨk jax ka' gɨt, na gu' cham tu' jumaip jai'ch na ja'xbui'p jir gɇ'kam na dhi'.
66013005	Ba' gui' jɨ' nar nobii'ñ gu ja'ook jup ja tɨtda bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na sap dhi'r di' gu Dios, na gu' pu'ñi ja'k aagi'ñ dɨɨlh gu ja'ook. Ba' bɨɨx ja daam kɨɨkat gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n baik oidha' daman taak juugɨt. Jup tɨtda ɨp gu ja'ook na sap bɨɨx aixim ai'chuxdha' gu Dios na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ.
66013006	Ba' pui'p duu gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nat jax chia, jix bhaamut bhai' ji a'ga gu Dios, bɨɨx aixim ba ai'chuxi'ñ na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ ja bɨndat sia gu noonbi'ñ nam bhammɨ ja'p jup tu'ii'x dhaam.
66013007	Gio ba' nat bhai' ji ja tulhiiñchuda gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, nat gu' sia dhi' pu'ñi ja'k chia gu ja'ook na tu duñia'. Ba' jɨ'kchi ja koi nam jɨ'k kaichgɨt gu Dios, na gu'x aa' nam dai gui' kaichgɨda'. Bɨɨx ja daam kɨɨka' na jɨ'k ja'tkam, sia nam jir pa ja'k kam, piam siam jai' maakam tu ñiok.
66013008	Ba' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n gu ja'tkam ba tu daan am buiñor gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nat jɨ'k pu cham ja dai gu Dios jix io'm bɨjɨk dɨr na ba' moo dhi oi'ñga'n jup ba jai'chdhɨlhia', bhaan gu u'uan nam pai' daaxix nam jɨ'k bhammɨ aaya'x dhaam, nam pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', na pai' ja daasaim xib gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhim buiñor.
66013009	Gu jaroi' no'x aa' na bɨɨx jix mat ka' gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios, jum aa' na bɨɨx mo'ram baapsa' mi' na pai' ja'pnim kai'ch:
66013010	“Bɨɨx gui' nam jɨ'k daaxix nam ja da'ngɨi ja kuupa', pui' ja dooda' am, gio gui' nam jɨ'k jup daaxix nam tɇ'tɇb kukxir kɨ'n ja kooda', pui'm jup ja dooda', ba aagix am nam jaroi' pui' ja dooda'. Dhi' ba' bhaan matgilhia' na jaroi' moo tu' sɨlhkam bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n jix biiñak buiñor gu Dios, no'm moo pui' nam jax bax biiñak buiñor siam jax ja bua.”
66013011	Ba' ja'xpɨx jumai ja'p dɨr ja'k dɨbɨɨr bɨta' bhai'p ji buus gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook na pui' ɨɨbhidham tu'm ɨp gu tukga'n, gook tu a'aa' ja'p tu'm na gu kasnir gu a'ga'n, pui' ja'k tu ñiok na dɨɨlh gu ja'ook na ja'p tu'm tu tuuku' na gu tɨrook.
66013012	Ja'xbui' gɇ'kam kɨ'n jup daaxix na gu jumai nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nax xijum gook tu moom. Bɨɨx kap ja daam jup ba kɨɨk gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, ja chia nam sap tu daanda' buiñor gu jumai nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nax xijum gook tu moom, gui' nat kia'pɨx dua gu ma'oo'n na ka muukix kat maa'n, sia ku gu' cham jɨ'xdha' ka dodhia' kam tu't.
66013013	Gio na joidham jix bhai'm duukam xip tu bua ja nɨi'ñchudat bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam, tai bhammɨ dɨr ja'p jix dhaam bhai' ji ii'ñxichu'n.
66013014	Ba' na mɨt tɨɨ bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n na joidham bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia' nam tu' cham ɨlhii'ñ, bɨɨx jix bhai'm ɨlhdhak mu ja'k jup ji kai mɨt, nat gu' dhi' kɨ'n ba ja iatgi. Ba' mi' dhɨr dai nat ba ja chia nam sap jup duñia' gui' na pui'p tu'm ka' na gu jumai nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nax xijum gook tu moom, gui' na mɨt tɨi sɨi tɇb kuxiir kɨ'n, gu' ji nat gu' cham tu' muu.
66013015	Ba' na mɨt pai' dhuuk tɨɨmo na mɨt jup duu, gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook gui' nat tu chia nam jup duñia', xi dhua'ñ gup duñiixim na sap ba' dɨɨlh ba tu oirɨda' gio na tu ñiokda'. Ja chia ba' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam sap tu' ka'm nɨidhat tu daanda' buiñor gup duñiixim. Ba' gui' nam jɨ'k cham aa' nam tu dañia' buiñor, pu bɨɨx ja koi.
66013016	Gio nat ja chia nam sap jum matgilhdha' bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam ja kokobtai' am piam gu kɨɨ'n dɨr kam ja noonob am, na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nam buiñor jup tui'dhi' gu ja'ook. Bɨɨx jamɨt ba'm matgilh gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, pui' na jax gui' nam jir jix chutumñigam gio gui' na cham, sia gui' nam jir tujuandam gio gui' na jɨ'k cham, gam bɨɨx gu a'aalh nam kia'pɨx maaxilhim, gio gui' nam jix io'm bar jagɨ'gɨr.
66013017	Ba' pu cham bhaai' nam tu saba'da' gio nam tu ga'ra' gui' nam jɨ'k cham bha daaxdhix ja kokobtai' am gui' na bhaan jix maatɨ' nam buiñor jup tui'dhi' gu ja'ook piam na jɨ'k ja'kɨlhi'ñ bia', nam gu' ja o'bhagi'ñ.
66013018	Ya' ba' moox io'm matda' jum aa' gio na pim jix bhai' xim ga'ngada' na pim ba' machia' na jax chɨɨ' gui' na ɨɨbhidham tu'm bhaan dhi'ñi ja'kɨlhi'ñ na ya'ni daa: Xijum maa'n jix cha'tmam oo'm daman baik oo'm xijum maa'n (666). Dhi' pim ba' bhaan machia'. Ku gu' na jax chɨɨ'ka', jir pu chu'm ka' ji nam jax chɨɨ' gu ya ja'p kam ja'tkam.
66014001	Ba' gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, bhammɨ kɨɨk gɇ' oidha' ta'm na pai' Sion tɨ tɨɨ' ja bɨɨm xijum gook jix cha'tmam oo'm daman maakob miil (144,000) gu ja'tkam. Bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n bha ua'ñix ja kokobtai' am na jax chɨɨ' gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir gio na jax chɨɨ' gu Dios.
66014002	Ba' ja'xpɨx gɇ' kɨ'n bhai' ji chɨm tɨr bha ja'p jix dhaam, ja'p tum kai'ch na jax no' tɨroon gu duuk, piam pai' no' gɇ' mɨr gu suudai', gio ba' na jax jup tum kai'chdha' no'm pai' tu sab mui' dhɨt gu sasabdam kikchar kɨ'n.
66014003	Ba' gu mui' ja'tkam nam bhai' guguuk bɨɨma'n gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, laala'n am maa'n gu xibkam alabaa'n mi' ji gu'kat ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pai' daa gux io'm Gɇ'kam, nam pai' bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr daraa gu ja'tkam nam jir jagɨ'gɨr pa' gio gu maakob sasoi'. Ku gu' cham bhai' ji na jaroi' machia' dhi' dhi alabaa'n, daipu' gux xijum gook jix cha'tmam oo'm daman maakob miil na mɨt mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa' guch Xoi'kam nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan,
66014004	nam cham tu' bɨɨx aixim tu buimɨk na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, ni nam cham tu' mui'x bhai' ja tɨtdaimɨk ja bɨɨm boppimɨk gu u'uub, dai ji nam tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' jiimɨt na jax jix aa' gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir. Ja'p ji buus na mɨt jum makgɨrta buiñor gu Dios nat pai' dhuuk ja tulhiiñchudak ja koi gu ja'ook.
66014005	Cham pai' dhuuk tu' bhaan jum ua'tulhdhak jamɨt, ni na mɨt cham pai' dhuuk iatda' tu a'gak.
66014006	Ba' maa'n gu nobii'ñ gu Dios bhammɨ ja'p dɇdɇ' ɨrban gux dhaam, jir di' pɨx gui' na bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n tu ja a'gi'ñ gu ja'tkam gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñio'ki'ñ na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam. Bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam tu ja a'gi'ñ, siam jai' maakam tu ñiok, piam sia kum jir jax chu'm, gam sia kum jir pa ja'k kam.
66014007	Jup kai'ch gɇ' kɨ'n: ―Tu' ka'm japim nɨidhat gɇ'kamtu'nda' gu Dios, na gu'x io'm jir gɇ'kam. Xib ya' bam ai na pai' dhuuk saak ja aagi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam nam tu' jax buimɨk nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan. Dhi' pɨx jir di' gui' nat jup duu dhi oi'ñga'n gio dhix dhaam, gio gu suudai' na mu ja'p suusu'n mui' kap.
66014008	Gio ba' moo mi' dhɨr jumai bhai'p ji ñio gu nobii'ñ gu Dios, jup kai'ch ɨp: ―Xib dho gi ba' am xi ko'ya' am ji gu Babiloonia oi'ñkam, na mɨt pai' dhɨr pui' ja mamtux bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam jax ja'k gɇ'kam kɨ'n jum ua'tulhdha', gam nam jax ja'k ja daanda' gu didios jum tɨɨtgɨdam jup duñiixim nam jax ja'k tu jim dɨɨlh. Ja'p ji buus na mɨt ja i'iich gu biiñ nam kɨ'n jum ua'tulhdha' buiñor gu Dios.
66014009	Mi' dhɨr ba' moo jumai bhai'p ji ñio gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na ba' kɨ'n bar baikim ka', jup kai'ch ɨp gɇ' kɨ'n: ―Gu jaroi' no't tu daanɨ buiñor gu ja'ook na ja'p tu'm tu tuuku' na gu tɨrook, gio gup duñiixim na pui'p tu'm, gam no't jum matgilh bha kobtagi'ñ piam gu kɨɨ'n dɨr kam nobi'ram na bhaan jix maatɨ' na ba kaichu' gu ja'ook,
66014010	am tɨ'ñchoka' nax io'm tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios mu na pai' mɨim gu tai nax io'm jix choiñ ja nɨi'ñchudat bɨɨx na jɨ'k noonbi'ñ gio gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir, ja'p ji buusnia' na ja i'chdha' gui' nax io'm jix xibu' nax maimda'.
66014011	Mi'm ba' pu mɨɨjidha' gammɨjɨ sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt, na gu' cham pai' dhuuk tukia' gu tai, nam gu' gɇ'kam kɨ'n cham am bua no' mɨt jax dhuuk tu daanɨ buiñor gu ja'ook, gio gui' nar jup duñiixim na pui'p tu'm, gio no' mɨt jum matgilh na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nam gui' ba kaichu'.
66014012	Ba' gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, jum aa' nam nakga' siat pu'ñix io'm bhai' ji ja tulhiiñchuda gu ja'ook, dai nam mi' pui' xi chu kuugalhdhidha' pɨx na jax jix aa' gu Dios. Dhi' ba' bhaan ba matgilhia' nam sɨlhkam bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak buiñor guch Xoi'kam.
66014013	Mɨkkat ba' moo bhammɨx dhaam dɨr bhai' ba tuñ a'gi mɨt, jup jiñ chɨtda am: ―Ja'pni ja'k jap mi'p xi chu daasa' u'uan ta'm: “¡Ja'p moo joidham jix bhai' ba tu ja jimia' gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhai ko'ya' buiñor guch Xoi'kam!” Ba' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' jup kai'ch ɨp: “Jɇɇ' dho. Cham pai' dhuuk magooñi' ja a'm ka jimia', nam gu' cham pai' dhuuk ka tu juana', ni nam tu' bhaan kam tulhiiña', dai nam gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'. Dhi' ba'r ja mai'chɨk ka' nam jix bhai'm duukam jup tu buimɨi bhaankamu'n gu Dios.”
66014014	Ba' mi' dhɨr bɨɨx dhi' pui', maa'n gu maa'nkam bha ja'p daa joidham jix chua tɨbaa'ñ cha'm, kuruun maa'n xi kɨɨs nar jix uam totbikdam, gio ba' juus maa'n jup xi dhaa' joidham jix mu'uuk.
66014015	Ba' maadɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios bhɨjɨ dɨr buusnɨk na pai' tu chiopi' gu Dios jup tɨtda gɇ' kɨ'n gu maa'nkam na bhammɨ daa tɨbaa'ñ cha'm: ―Ba kabka ba' xib gu tiriik mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan. Bar am nap tɨ bhɨɨji kɨ'n dhim juus ba tu kaipga'. Bar bhaan gu' na pai' dhuuk tɨm bhɨɨ.
66014016	Ba' gui' na bhai' daa tɨbaa'ñ cha'm nat jax pui'p tɨ kai, ba tɨ bhɨim gu tiriik mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan. Bɨɨx kap tɨ bhɨɨ na jɨ'k kap tɨ ɨx.
66014017	Mɨkkat ba' moo jumai bhɨjɨ dɨr jup ji buus chiop gu nobii'ñ gu Dios, pui' juus jup xi dhaa'ñchu' joidham jix mu'uuk.
66014018	Gio ba' moo jumai bhai' dhɨr jup ji buus bhaan gu kubhioñkar na ja'p tu'm na sasoi' mɨmɨi'ñkar, na pui' ja'k gɇ'kam kɨ'n daaxix na mɨidha' sia tu' na pɨx. Ba'p tɨtda gɇ' kɨ'n gu jumai nobii'ñ gu Dios na ua' gu juus: ―Ba tɨ ɨ'kmɨra'p ba' xib gu uubas mu ja'p na tɨ ɨx bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n kɨ'n dhim juus nap daa'. Bar am gu' na pai' dhuuk jum u', na gu' bax bhai.
66014019	Ba' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios nat jax pui'p tɨ kai, xi mɨɨ nat tɨ ɨ'kim gu uubas mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan, bɨɨx ɨ'kɨk mu xi iicha bhaan gu gɇ' na bhaan jum bakɨ' gu barga'n gu uubas na mi ja'p kɨɨk nam ba' bakɨi'ñña'. Dhi' gu ja'tkam kat jup jum kai'ch nam pui' ji buan na gu uubas, ba' na pai' dhuuk jix io'm ja tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios, ja'p ji buusnia' na ba ja bakɨi'ñña'.
66014020	Ba' nat pai' dhuuk xim bakɨ' gu uubas nat mi' iicha gu nobii'ñ gu Dios gui' na bhaan jum bakɨ' na mu ja'p kɨɨk ju'ñdharan gu gɇ' kiicham, ɨ'ɨɨr pɨx bhai' ji mɨɨ gu barga'n, giilhim gɇ'p jum duu, bhammɨ ja'p xi juu ja chiichiñ am gu kakbai nam mi ja'p guguuk, gio nat mɨk ja'p juugɨt mɨɨ, chi jɨ'k baik simaan kɨ'n jum a'jɨ gu pui' nañ jimda'.
66015001	Gio ba' moop ja tɨɨ ñich xijum gook gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam pui' ja'k tu'm kɨ'n dalhxix bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n nam bɨɨx aixim bhaan ja tulhiiñchuda' gu ja'tkam bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n bhaankamu'n gu Dios, na ba' moo bar daipu' ka'.
66015002	Gu' ba' gu suudai' mi ja'p jup suu'n gɇ', joidham jix kɨɨ'x uañ, dai na bɨɨna' gui' na gɇ' mɨim ja'p na tai. Mi ja'p gai dhɨr dhi gɇ' suudai'm ba' guguuk jɨ'kchi gu ja'tkam ji chu daa'ngɨt gu ja kikchar. Jir di' am gui' na mɨt ma'iich gu ja'ook nax ɨɨbhidham tu'm tu tuuku', gio gup duñiixim na pui'p tu'm, na mɨt cham tu'm matgilh ja kokobtai' am, gio na mɨt cham tu daanɨ buiñor sia tɨi pup ja chiñiimɨ.
66015003	Ba' mi' ji gu'kat laala'n am maa'n gu alabaa'n gui' na jax chu'm laala'nda' bɨjɨk gu Moisees gui' na bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu Dios, gio na jax chu'm jup laala'nda' gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir jano' na ya' xi oilhimɨk, nap jum kai'ch: ¡Ja'p moo tu' sɨlhkam jix io'm jir gɇ'kam ap ji bak jich Gɨ'kora', gio nap bɨxchu'x aichu'n nap pu tu duñia' jix bhai'm duukam gio gɇ'gɇr jup jum duu'nkam! Bɨɨx kap jir gɇ'kam ap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, gio nap bɨɨx kap ja sɨlhka'n gu ja'tkam nap jax pɨx jix aa' aap dɨɨlh.
66015004	Bɨɨx pɨx gu ja'tkam tu' ka'm jum nɨidhat tu daan am aap jum bui Dios jich Gɨ'kora', na gu' dai aap nap jix io'm jix uañ kɨ'n kɨɨkat jix io'm jir gɇ'kam. Bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam tu' ka'm jum tɨɨgɨi tu dañia' am aap jum bui, nam gu' ba machia' nap aap joidham jir jix bhai'kam kat jix bhai' ja sɨlhka'n gui' nam bam kaichu'.
66015005	Ba' ja'xpɨx bhai' jim kupio' gu chiopga'n gu Dios na bhammɨ kɨɨk jix dhaam, bhai' na pai'x io'm jix chu xidhuu.
66015006	Ba' bhɨjɨ dɨr bhai' ji bubua mɨt xijum gook gu noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam pu chu'm kɨ'n dalhxix nam ja tulhiiñchuda' gu ja'tkam bɨɨx aixim bhaan bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n. Jix chooto tɨ tɨi'chu' am bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n, jix kɨkɨɨ' ji gu'x u'uañ gu ja jajannulh, gio nar jix dha'ram namkɨm, ko'kmarak bhibhispara' nar jix uam totbikdam jam bha ja'p jup xi chu buupratu' ja bhabhaastu am.
66015007	Ba' maadɨt gu maakob sasoi' nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr guguuk mi' na pai' daa gu Dios, jɨ'ma'n xi ja maa gu a'lhich jaja' nar jix uam totbikdam gux xijum gook noonbi'ñ gu Dios na mɨt bhɨjɨ dɨr ji bubua chiop. Dhi jaja' bhaan mi jim gui' na tu' kɨ'n jix io'm ja tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios na jaroi' gammɨjɨ pux jai'ch bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam nam cham tu' ka'm nɨi'ñ, na gu'x io'm jix bhaam ja bui.
66015008	Ba' ja'xpɨx mi' dhɨr bhai' ji bam gu kuubhɨx na pai' daa gu Dios, bhɨjɨmmɨ ja'k ji baa na pai' tu chiopi', bhɨjɨ jim tɨɨmo ɨrban dɨr. Ba' dhi' bhaan jix maatɨ' na chakui jaroi' bhaai' na mu bakia' na pai' tu chiopi' gu Dios, na mɨt gu' chakui tu tulhiiñchuda gux xijum gook noonbi'ñ. No' mɨt pui' ba tu kuugalh na ba' bax bhaai'n ka' nam mu baapkia'. Gu kuubhɨx dhi' pɨx pui' ja'k jum maaxi'ñ na jax ja'k jir gɇ'kam gu Dios.
66016001	Ba' ja'xpɨx gɇ' kɨ'n bhai' ji chum ñio bhɨjɨ dɨr na pai' tu chiopi' gu Dios, jup ja tɨtda gux xijum gook noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam jɨ'ma'n ja daada' gu jaja': ―Nua'pu' pim mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan dhi' na kɨ'n tu tulhiiñchu'n gu Dios na mi jim dhi jaja' ta'm na pim ja daada'.
66016002	Ba' maa'n bɨɨpɨ' mu jii mu oi'ñga'n bhaan nat ba nu'aam gui' na mi jim ja'aa ta'm. Ba' nat mu ɇɇk mi ja'p xeeñ ñua dɨbɨɨr ta'm. Bɨɨx gui' nam jɨ'k matgilhdhix ja kokobtai' am na bhaan jix maatɨ' nam kaichu' gu ja'ook na ɨɨbhidham tu'm gu tukga'n, gam nam tu' ka'm nɨidhat tu daan buiñor, sia gup duiñxim na pui'p tu'm, bhai' ji ja ai gui' na ja'p tu'm na biprɨ'x na giilhim jix ko'k.
66016003	Mi' dhɨr ba' moo jumai mɨjɨp ji dhuu gu nobii'ñ gu Dios ua'dat gu ja'aa nat ba nu'aam ɨp mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan gui' na mi jim. Ba' mu ɇɇk mi' xi ñua gɇ' suudai' chɨr. Ɨ'ɨɨr jup jum duu gu suudai' bɨɨx na jɨ'x juugɨt suu'n, ja'p tu'm na jax gu ɨ'ra'n gu jaroi' no' mɨt mua. Pu bɨɨx koi mɨt gu dudua kam nam mi' ka tu oipo nat pai' dhuuk ɨ'ɨɨr jup jum duu gu suudai'.
66016004	Mi' dhɨr ba' moo jumai mɨjɨp ji dhuu gu nobii'ñ gu Dios ua'dat gu ja'aa, baik ba' moo ba jim. Ba' mu ja'p xi ñua a'kkɨ'n na pai' mɨr gu suudai' gui' na mi jim ja'aa ta'm gio mu ja'p na jax jir biipiatam, ɨ'ɨɨr jup jum duu ɨp gu suudai'.
66016005	Ba'p kai'ch gu nobii'ñ gu Dios gui' na mu ja'p nuuka'n gu suudai': ―Aap dho gi ja maak ji Dios jich Gɨ'kora' nap jix uañ kɨ'n kɨɨk na tu' ja a'm bipio' dhi ja'tkam nam cham tu' ka'm jum nɨi'ñ aap nap bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch gio nap gammɨjɨ pu jai'ch ka' ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k,
66016006	na mɨt gu' dhi' gɇ'kam kɨ'n jum ua'tulh aap jum bui. Tɨɨ' na mɨt giilhim ja tulhiiñchudaimɨk ja koi gui' nam jum bui tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat gio gui' nam jum a'mkam tu a'gimɨk bɨjɨk gum ñi'ook. Xib jam ba' mi' xi aaya' nam i'ya' gu ɨ'ɨɨr nam ba' mi' xi machia' na jax tu tatda' gu pui' na mɨt jax ja dooda gui' nam jum kaichgɨt gio gui' nam jum a'mkam tu a'gat. Pui' dho tu'm ja a'm bipio'.
66016007	Gu' ba' bhai' dhɨr bhaan gu kubhioñkar na ja'p tu'm na sasoi' mɨmɨi'ñkar, bhai'p ji chum ñio, jup tum kai'ch: ―Pui' dho aapi' Dios jich Gɨ'kora' nap bɨxchu'x aichu'n nap pu tu duñia'. Maaxik dho ja maak ap na jax ja'k ja a'm bipio' dhi ja'tkam, nap gu'x maat na mɨt gɇ'kam kɨ'n cham am bua aap jum bui.
66016008	Ba' gu jumai nobii'ñ gu Dios mu jimɨɨk bhammɨ ja'k jup xi ñua bhaan gu tanoolh gui' na mi jim ja'aa ta'm na ua'. Ba' dhi' kɨ'n jix io'm jix choiñ bhai' ji chon gu tanoolh, ba ji ja mɨi'ñ gu ja'tkam.
66016009	Tɨi pup koi mɨt kɨ'n gu tanoolh nat ja a'm ton, na gu' giilhim jix choiñ, gu' ji na gu' ni jɨ'x ku mɨt iam soi' ba jim ɨlh buiñor gu Dios sia ku jax ja tulhiiñchu'n. Jano' mɨt dho ba' giilhim bhaak ji buiñor, bɨɨx aixim bhai' ji ai'chux jamɨt na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ. Cham pai' na mɨt iam soi'm ɨlhdhak ba tu daanɨ buiñor ku cham ka ja tulhiiñchu'nda' gɨt.
66016010	Ba' mɨkkat gu jumai nobii'ñ gu Dios mui'p ji jii, mi'p xi ñua gui' na mi jim ja'aa ta'm na pai' dhɨr jir gɇ'kam gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nax xijum gook tu moom, jix chukgam jup tum duu mi' na pai' daa. Ba' gu ja'tkam nam kaichu', giilhim pɨx sasrak bɨɨt am nam jum tulhiiñ,
66016011	na ja ɇɇ gui' na ja'p tu'm na biprɨ'x nax io'm jix ko'k. Gu' ji na gu' sia kum jax jum tulhiiñ, cham pai' iam soi' ba jim ɨlh jamɨt buiñor gu Dios, pui' nam jax jix buam ba tu bua na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, gio nam giilhim jix bhaamut bɨɨx aixim ai'chuxi'ñ gu Dios nax dhaam jup tu'ii'.
66016012	Ba' mi' dhɨr jumai mui'p ji jii gu nobii'ñ gu Dios ua'dat gu ja'aa, xijum maa'n ba' moo ba jim. Sɨlh jim mu gɇ' akkɨ'n na pai' Eupraates tɨ tɨɨ', na pai' gɇ' mɨr gu suudai'. Mu ɇɇk mi' xi ñua suudai' chɨr gui' na mi jim ja'aa ta'm. Ba' nai' pɨx ji gaa gu suudai', cham pai' ka mɨr, na ba'x bhaai'n ka' nam mu bubuakia' baasɨ'n dɨr ja'k gu gɇ'gɇrkam nam mu dɨr ja'k mu jiim xia'lhbui.
66016013	Ba' gu ja'ook na ja'p tu'm tu tuuku' na gu tɨrook dai na gɇ', gio gu nobii'ñ na pui' giilhim tu'm jup tu tuuku' nax xijum gook tu moom, gio ba' gui' na bhaankamu'n tu a'ga, bhɨjɨ dɨr ji bubua mɨt ja chiichiñ am gu cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda' ja'p tu'm na sosbha'n,
66016014	nam jir noonbi'ñ gu ja'ook, nam bɨxchu'x aichu'n nam pu tu duñia'. Ba' dhi' dhi cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda' mu ja'p ja joot gu ja'ook ja bui bɨɨx gu gɇ'gɇrkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam pui' ja'k ja jurtu'npo' nam bɨɨx maa'n ñi'ook jup dui tu kokda' buiñor gu Dios nax io'm jir gɇ'kam.
66016015	Ba' aapi'm jiñ jaaduñ na pim ba kaichu' guch Xoi'kam, cha'pim jax jum aa'nda' sia jax tum bua, na gu'p kai'ch guch Xoi'kam: “Ja'p moo joidham jix bhai' tu jimia' gu jaroi' no' gammɨjɨ pu tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aañ jiñ bui, ni na cham pai' dhuuk koosɨt daaka'. Na gu' no' cham tu'p jum buixdhat am ɨrdat daa, ja'p ji buusanda' nax dhaapkat oirɨda', ba' giilhim jix xi'ɨraa' nañ pai' dhuuk mu jimda'. Gu' cham ji no' gu' gammɨjɨ soi'm ɨlhii'ñ, ja'p ji buusanda' ji na tɨm tɨ'ii'ñka', ba' cham xi'ɨraam jum ɨlhdha' nañ pai' dhuuk mu aaya'. Nañ gu' aañ jotmoda' mi' pɨx ba kɨɨka' cham jum ɨlhdham, ja'p na jax gu ɨxkum no' pai' bax chɨ ɨɨxdham jax chu'm ba'k chɨr, na gu' jotmoda' pɨx mu jimɨi mi bakia', pu cham mat ka' gu kiokam na jax chu'm tukaa' mu jim.”
66016016	Ba' gu cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda' pui' ja'k ja jujurtuda mɨt bɨɨx na jɨ'k gu gɇ'gɇrkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam maa'n ñi'ook jup dui mummɨm jumpadat na pai' Armagedoon tɨ tɨɨ' gu ebreo ñi'ook kɨ'n, na gɇ'x gio'.
66016017	Mi' dhɨr ba' moo jumai mui'p ji jii gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na ba' moo bar daipu' ka'. Mu ja'p jup xi ñua gui' na mi jim ja'aa ta'm bhaan gu jɨbɨɨlh. Ba' bhɨjɨ dɨr chiop na pai' daa gu Dios bhai' ji chum ñio gɇ' kɨ'n, jup tum kai'ch: ―Xib dho gi gu' pu bɨɨx dappaam ba tum kuugalh ji.
66016018	Ba' mi' dhɨr bhai' ji chɨm bɨpgɨ bha ja'p jix dhaam, gio nat gɇ' kɨ'n bhai' ji chɨm tɨr, gam nat jix io'm bhai' ji gi'ndokɨ gu oi'ñga'n, na cham pai' dhuuk pu'ñi pɨk jix io'm joiñdhat.
66016019	Ba' mi gɇ' kiicham na pai' Babiloonia tɨ tɨɨ', baik kap bhai' ji jai gu dɨbɨɨr. Ba' pu bɨɨx nai' ji ia'rɨ gu ba'bhak, sia bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n na jax jir kikcham kat, nat gu' bɨɨx kap joi gu dɨbɨɨr, ba' mui' koi mɨt gu ja'tkam. Ba' gui' nam Babiloonia oi'ñkat, jix io'm ja tulhiiñchuda gu Dios, na gu' pu ja bi'chulhi'ñ na pu'ñi ja dooda' jax chu'm tanoolh, na mɨt gu' gɇ' bam ua'tulh buiñor, ja'p ji buus nat ja i'iich gu biiñ nam kɨ'n ko'ya'.
66016020	Sia bɨɨx pɨx cham pai' matgir gu a'lhich dɨppɨr na mu ja'p ka daraat suudai' ɨraab, gio gu oi'dha', nat gu'x io'm joi gu oi'ñga'n.
66016021	Gio ja'xpɨx jix dhaam dɨr bhai' ji ii' gu chia gɇ'gɇr, chi jɨ'k gook oo'm kiilos jix bɨɨpɨt bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n. Ba' gu ja'tkam giilhim jix bhaak am buiñor gu Dios, bɨɨx aixim ai'chuxi'ñ am na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, na gu' giilhim ja tulhiiñchu'n kɨ'n gu chia.
66017001	Ba' maadɨt gux xijum gook noonbi'ñ gu Dios nam ja daada' gu jaja', bha jimɨɨk jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Bhai' xi jim ya'ni ja'k nañ jum tɨɨ'ñchuda' nam jax ja'k tulhiiñchuda' gu ubii gui' nax io'm jir ganai' pɨx ka', na bɨɨx kap tu daam kɨɨka' na jɨ'k kap suusu'n gu suudai'.
66017002	Dhi' dhi ubii ja'p ji buusan na bɨɨx jix bhai' ja tɨtdat ja bɨɨm boppo gui' nam jir gɇ'gɇrkam mu ja'p na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, nam gu' pui' ja'k jup ba tu jim na jax gui', bɨɨx jai'p ba tu daan am ja bui gup duñiixim didios jum tɨɨtgɨdam, bɨɨx sia gui' nam jir ja'ppɨx ja'tkam ja'p ji buus nat ja i'iich gu biiñ na pui' ja'k tu bua.
66017003	Ba' nat gɇ'ñ a'm bam tajaa gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda', bañ baidhak gu nobii'ñ gu Dios mummu pai' maa'n kap gampɨx. Ba' mi' oirɨ maa'n gu ubii bhaan gu tu'x buadam jix bɨ' na ɨɨbhidham tu'm, jix xijum gook tu moom, mambhɨɨx ba' tu a'aa'. Bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x jir tukgaram bha ua'ñixchu' gu ñiiñio'k na jax ja'k cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios.
66017004	Gu ubii ba' joidham jix abhaar jup xi chɨ tɨi'chu', jix bɨ' kat jix muraa'nma' gu jannulhi'ñ, jix uam totbikdam kɨ'n bha ja'p jup xi oi'chdhix gio gu joodai gui' nax a'bhar totbik. Ba' maa'n ua' gu ja'aa na suu'ngɨm mi jim na jax ja'k jir tu'm dɨɨlh, pui' na jax nax io'm jir ganai' pɨx gam na jax ja'k cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, gio pui' na jax na mui' tu didiosi' jup duiñxim.
66017005	Gio ba' bha kobtagi'ñ bhai' xi chu ua'ñixchu' palhɨɨp na ja'p kai'ñkam jup jum kai'ch: “Mi gɇ' kiicham na pai' Babiloonia tɨ tɨɨ', ja'p ji buusan na dhi'r ja naan bɨɨx gu u'uub gui' nam jir ganai' pɨx, na gu' mi' dhɨr na mɨt pui' ja mamtux gu ja'tkam nam jix buam tu buada' na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, ja'p moo joidham.”
66017006	Gu' ji na gu'x maimtu' gu ubii kɨ'n gu ja ɨ'ɨɨr gui' nam tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor gu Dios gio gui' nam bhaankamu'n tu a'gat. Ba' aañ mi' pɨx pui' ba tu'ii',
66017007	ba' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios jup jiñ chɨtda: ―¿Jax kup ba' mi' pui' pup tu'ii'? Xib jañ jum aagi'ñdha' na tu' pui' ja'k jum maaxi'ñ dhi ubii gio dhi' na bhaan jim nax xijum gook tu moom, gio ba' na jax jir jum duukam kum ba' pui' tu'ii'.
66017008	Dhi' nax ɨɨbhidham tu'm nax xijum gook tu moom na bhaan jim dhi ubii, dhi' maadɨt jir di' gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook. Ku gu' cham tu' ya' ka oirɨ ji xib, dai bɨjɨk na jax ya' xi oilhimɨk, ku ba' gu' cham xiim gio ya'p aaya' ji, mu dɨr ja'k jimda' na pai' gɇ' tɨ dɨ' na cham pai' ju'. Daipu' pɨx ya' xi ɇɇji, nam gu' mi' dhɨr daagɨi mu ba bua' na pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'. Ba' gu ja'tkam gui' nat jɨ'k pu cham ja dai gu Dios bhaan gu u'uan mi' na pai' ja daasaim gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhim buiñor bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na ba' moo bap duñia' dhi oi'ñga'n, giilhim bhai' ji chotdonia' am nam ba tɨgia' na gio mi'p ba aaya' gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook, sia ku gu' xib cham pai' maatɨ'.
66017009	’Xib jap ba' moox io'm bɨɨx jum jur kɨ'n xiñ kaaya' nañ jum aagi'ñdha' na jax jir jum duukam gu pui' na jax ja'k tu'm gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook: Gux xijum gook moomo'n gui' nax ɨɨbhidham tu'm, jix xijum gook gu gɇ'gɇrkam kat jup jum kai'ch, gio ba' xijum gok kap ɨp na pai' jax tu daam kɨɨk gu ubii na bhai' daa bhaan gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook.
66017010	Ba' dhix xijum gook gɇ'gɇrkam, jix chamaam jamɨt jum gɇ'gɇrkamtak ba koi. Maa'n pɨx ya'r gɇ'kam xib, maa'n ba' moo chakuim gɇ'kamta. Ku ba' gu' no't ya' bam gɇ'kamta gu maa'n na ka bi'iix nam gɇ'kamta', cham tu' mɨk ya'r gɇ'kam ka' ji, alhio pɨx.
66017011	Ba' gu jumai gɇ'kam na mi' dhɨr bhai'p ji jai'chdhɨlhia', jir di' ka' gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nax xijum gook tu moom na bhaan daa dhi ubii, na gu' jano' gio ya'p ba aaya' na pu'ñi giop bam gɇ'kamta', sia ku gu' bɨjɨk pui'p jir gɇ'kam kat. Ku gu' maadɨt jir di' ka' ji gux xijum gook nam bɨɨpɨ' dɨr jum gɇ'gɇrkamta', daipu' maa'nnim pɨx bam gɇ'kamta', nam gu' mi' dhɨr daagɨi mu ba bua' na pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha'.
66017012	’Gu' ba' gu mambhɨɨx gu a'ga'n dhi' nar nobii'ñ gu ja'ook, mambhɨɨx gu gɇ'gɇrkam kat jup jum kai'ch, dai nam chakui jai'ch gu xib. Ku ba' gu' ka jai'chdhɨlhia' am ji dhi' dhi gɇ'gɇrkam, ku ba' gu' alhio pɨx ji nam maap jum gɇ'gɇrkamta' gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nañ aa' bɨɨpɨ'.
66017013	Ba' nam pai' dhuuk pu'ñi bam gɇ'gɇrkamta' gu mambhɨɨx nañ ja aa', maa'n ñi'ook jup dui gɇ'kam kɨ'n daasa' am mi' ja bui gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook nax xijum gook tu moom gui' na bhaan jim gu ubii.
66017014	Gio ba' nam palhbuidha' na tu kokda' buiñor guch Xoi'kam na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir. Gu' ji nam gu' cham jɨ'xkat jax dhooda', na gu' guch Xoi'kam na mu dɨr bhai'p ji chu kokda' ja bɨɨm gui' nam kaichu', pu maa'n na jax tu' pɨx dooda' gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook gio gu gɇ'gɇrkam nam kaichgɨda'. Na gu' guch Xoi'kam cham jɨ'xdhat jaroi' jax dhooda', na gu' gui'r ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' nam nai' ja'p jir gɇ'gɇrkam. Bɨɨx oi'ñdha' am jano' gui' na mɨt jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhak buiñor mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa'.
66017015	Gio ba' moo ja'pnip jiñ chɨtda gu nobii'ñ gu Dios: ―Ba' dhi suudai' na mui' kap suusu'n nap nɨi'ñ, na pai' jax tu daam kɨɨk dhi ubii nar ganai' pɨx, dhi' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam pui' ja'k jum maaxi'ñ, sia nam jir pa ja'k kam, sia gui' nam maakam tu ñiok, bɨɨx nam jɨ'k jai'ch ya' dhi oi'ñga'n.
66017016	Ba' gu mambhɨɨx gu gɇ'gɇrkam nam jai'chdhɨlhia' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n, gio gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook, bhai' ji bhaamkidha' am dhi ubii nar ganai' pɨx. Bɨɨx tu boosgidha' am gu tu' na bia', sia gu jajannulhi'ñ na tɨ tɨi'chgɨda'. Mi' dhɨr jam ba' bhai' ji jugia' gu tukga'n, ba' gu jɨ'x na bi'ya', mu xi mɨidha' am tai chɨr.
66017017	Ba' dɨɨlh gu Dios pui' ja'k ja jurtuda gu mambhɨɨx gɇ'gɇrkam ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n nam pu'ñi bɨɨx dhɨt maa'n ñi'ook jup dui gɇ'kam kɨ'n daasa' gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook ja bui, na jax dhui pɨx ba' gui' pui' tu kuugalhdha' nat jax ja'k tu dai dɨɨlh gu Dios na tum buimɨi tum kuugalhdha' ya' dhi oi'ñga'n.
66017018	Ba' dhi ubii nar ganai' pɨx nap ya' nɨi'ñ, dhi' pɨx pui' ja'k jum maaxi'ñ gu gɇ' kiicham mi' nam pai' mui' oi'dha' gu ja'tkam, na gu' gu mi' kam gu gɇ'kam, bɨɨx ja daam kɨɨk gu jai' gɇ'gɇrkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, sia gu ja'ppɨx ja'tkam. Pui' ja'k jam ba'p ba tu jim na jax gu mi' oi'ñkam gɇ' kiicham, na mɨt gu' pui' ba ja mamtux.
66018001	Ba' mi' dhɨr bɨɨx dhi' pui', maa'n gu nobii'ñ gu Dios bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam bhai' ba jurnim, na gɇ'kam kɨ'n daaxix, gɇ' tonnichu', bɨɨx kap tu maaxir na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n,
66018002	jup kai'chim gɇ' kɨ'n: ―Am xi koi mɨt ba' xib gu Babiloonia oi'ñkam. Bɨɨx pu ia'rɨ gu ja ba'bhak, jajo'k jam pɨx mi' ba oi'dha' nam pai' oi'ñkat, gam gu cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda', gio gu u'ji' gux bupuichɨk nam jax chu'm cham kɨkɨɨ' ja nɨi'ñ gu ja'tkam.
66018003	Nam gu' giilhim cham bhai' tu jimdat dhi' dhi ja'tkam, bɨɨx pui' ja mamtux jamɨt gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam jax ja'k jix io'm jum ua'tulhdha' nam ba' pui'p ba tu daanda' ja bui gu didios jup duñiixim, gam jai' bɨɨx aixim tu'm na cham kɨɨgalhi'ñ gu Dios, sia gui' nam bɨɨx kap jir gɇ'gɇrkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n. Ja'p ji buus na mɨt bha ja i'iich gu biiñ gui' na pui' ja'k tu bua nam ba' pu'ñi bɨɨx aixim bhai' ji chu duñia' na jax cham jir am. Bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam bɨxchu' tu ga'ra, jix chutumñigam jup jum duu mɨt, nam gu' mi' dhi gɇ' kiicham tu ja saba'nda' gu tu' nam mu tu ga'raidha'.
66018004	Ba' bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam jup tum kai'ch ɨp: ―Aapi'm na pim jɨ'k ba kaichu' gu Dios, ja'k japim jimia' mi' dhɨr dhi gɇ' kiicham na cham jam ia'ñdha' gu ja ua'tulhdhara' gu mi' oi'ñkam, gio na ba' cham jai' jam daam jimia' gu tulhiiñara' na pai' dhuuk ja a'm gɨxia'.
66018005	Na mɨt gu' dhi' giilhim gɇ' bam ua'tulh buiñor gu Dios, ja'p ji buusan nat yammɨ ba ai jix dhaam gu ja ua'tulhdhara' mi' nam pai' jumpadim. Ba' bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n nam jɨ'k mi' oi'dha' dhi gɇ' kiicham, ja bi'chulhi'ñ gu Dios nax io'm ja tulhiiñchuda'.
66018006	Xib na tu' jax tui'ka', aapi'm na pim jir tujuandam tugi'ñ, xi ja tulhiiñchuda' pim gu mi' oi'ñkam dhi gɇ' kiicham na jɨ'x ja a'm bipio' gu tulhiiñara' na mɨt gan ja iatgidhak buam ja mamtux gu ja'tkam, ja'p ji buusnia' na pim gookim bha ja i'chdha' gu biiñ gui' na giilhim jix xibu' nax maimda' na mɨt jax ja dooda dɨɨlh gu jai' ja'tkam.
66018007	Aañ pu jam tɨtda bhaankamu'n gu Dios na pim siamri xi ja tɨ'ñchoixdha' dhi' dhi ja'tkam na mɨt gɇ'kam kɨ'n cham am bua buiñor, giilhim gu' nam gɇ'gɇrkam jum taat ka' tu' na pɨx bhaan, gio ba' nam mui' tu bia'kat gux dha'ram namkɨm bhaan jum ua'tulhi'ñdha', jup kai'chdha' am ba': “Bɨɨx pɨx tu' ka'm jich ñɨi'ñ am gu ja'tkam dai aach nach jir ya' oi'ñkam Babiloonia, gu' chi nach gu'r jix chutumñigam. Bɨɨx tu bia' ich na tu'ch a'm jum aa', gio na joidham jix bhai' tuch jim. Ba' cham pai' dhuuk tu' bhaan jich chulhiiña' ich.”
66018008	Ku ba' gu' xib ya' bam ai ji na pai' dhuuk ja a'm jimia' gu tulhiiñara' nam tu' cham nɨɨrat. Bhiogi' ja a'm jimia', gio ba' muuki' ɨp. Dɨɨlh gu Dios nax io'm jir gɇ'kam pu'ñi ja'k ja tulhiiñchuda' dhi' dhi ja'tkam, mi' dhɨr ba' mu ja'k xi ja iabu' na pai' gɇ' mɨim gu tai, nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup mɨɨjidha'.
66018009	Ba' gui' nam jir gɇ'gɇrkam bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, nam jai' pui'x buam jup tu buimɨi nam jax ji ja nɨidhat dhi' dhi ja'tkam, joi'ndam ja tɨɨgɨi bhai' ji susuañia' am nam mu pɨx mɨɨjidha' tai chɨr gu Babiloonia oi'ñkam.
66018010	Ba' totdonɨi nam cham pui'p ja tulhiiñchuda' ja bɨndai, dɨlhkob ja'k xi gu'kia' am, ba'p kai'chdha' am mui' ji ja nɨidhat nam jum tulhiiñdha': ―Cham pum aagɨt japim na jax jup ba tu jam buidha' aapi'm Babiloonia oi'ñkam, na pim bɨɨx kap tu daam kɨɨkat na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, gu' ji nat gu' jotmoda' pɨx cham jum ɨlhdham ba jam tulhiiñchuda gu Dios na pim cham pum aa'.
66018011	Sia gui' nam bɨxchu' mi' ka tu ga'rat bɨɨx kap dɨr na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, bhai' ji susuañia' am nam joi'ndam ja nɨi'ñdha' nam jum tulhiiñdha' gu Babiloonia oi'ñkam, gam nam pui' xim aa'nda' na cham jaroi' ka jai'ch ka' na tu ja saba'da' gui' nam tu ga'ra nax dha'ram namɨɨk.
66018012	Pui' na jax gux uam totbikdam, gio ba' gux chua totbikdam, gam gu jai' na pui'x a'bhar jup totbik nax dha'ram jup namɨɨk. Gio pui' na jax gu jajannulh gui' na bɨɨx aixim tu'm na pui'x dha'ram jup namɨɨk, pui' na jax gui' nar jix chooto na joidham am totbikda', gio gux mumra'nma', gio ba' gux ñankabma', gam jai' bɨɨx aixim tu'm. Gio ba' pui' na jax gu bɨxchu' nam jup tu bua nar u'uux sobkoñxim na pui'x dha'ram jup namɨɨk, gio ba' gui' nar bapaiñum nax io'm jix kaapak, gio gui' nax mamoik pa'.
66018013	Gio ba' pui' na jax bɨɨx aixim gui' na joidham uub, pui' na jax gui' nam jum jurda' gu ja'tkam nam kɨ'n joidham uubka', gio ba' gui' nam kɨ'n tum kubhion, gam jai' bɨɨx aixim tu'm. Gio gu biiñ gui' nax dha'ram namɨɨk, gio pui' na jax gu tiriik gio gu ariin nar tum kua'dam, gio gu asait. Sia pui' na jax gu bɨɨx aixim tu'm gu sasoi', pui' na jax gu kakbai gam mamchus na bhaan tum bhii'mñor, gio ba' gu karretas, gio gam kakasnir, ganai' tujuandam nam tu ja juantu'nda' pui' cham ji ja namkidhat.
66018014	Ba'p kai'chdha' am ɨp tɨi mui' ji ja nɨidhat gu Babiloonia kam nam bam tulhiiñdha': ―¿Xib ba' jaroo ka tuch saba'da' dhi' nach tu' tu ga'ra? Na gu' dai aapi'm na pim jir jix chutumñigam kat gio na jam ko'raarot na pim tu bia'ka' gux dha'ram namkɨm. Xib ba' gu' cham jax kax bhaai' ji, na gu' mi' na pim pai' bam tulhiiñ xib, cham pai' dhuuk kam tutumñigamta' pim.
66018015	Ba' dhi' na mɨt jɨ'k mi' tu ga'raimɨk ja bui gu Babiloonia kam jum tutumñigamta, totdonɨi dɨlhkob ja'k xi gu'kia' am nam ba' cham pui'p ja tulhiiñchuda' ja bɨndai, tɨi joi'ndam ja nɨidhat xi suanda' am
66018016	jup ji kai'chɨt: ―¡Ja'p moo joi'ndam jup bua pim na pim jum tulhiiñ aapi'm na pim Babiloonia oi'ñkat! Cham pum aagɨt japim na jax jup ba tu jam buidha'. Bɨɨx tɨi tu daam kɨɨkat japim na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, gio na pim jir jix chutumñigam kat, jix a'bhar jix dha'ram namkɨm japim xi chɨ tɨ'ka' gu jajannulh na bɨɨx aixim tu'm kɨ'n mamxidhix, pui' na jax gux mumra'nma', gio gux ñankabma' na pɨx am oi'chdhix ka' kɨ'n gux uam totbikdam nax dha'ram namɨɨk, gam jai' gui' na bɨɨx aixim tu'm totbik.
66018017	Gu' ji na gu' na mɨt pai' dhuuk bhai' ji jam tulhiiñchuda, bɨɨx pu cham pai' matgir dhix dha'ram namkɨm na pim ka tu bia'kat, ni nat tu' kɨ'n jam palhbui. Sia mɨk ja'k xi guguu mɨt gui' nam gammɨjɨ mu ja'p oipo suudai' dhaam kaknub ta'm na mɨt pai' dhuuk bhai' ji ja tulhiiñchuda gu Babiloonia oi'ñkam, gui' na mɨt pui'p jum tutumñigamta nam mi'p tu ga'raimɨk gu boptop ganai' bɨɨx aixim tu'm ja bui.
66018018	Ba'p kai'ch am gɇ' kɨ'n nam xi ja nɨi'ñ na mu pɨx mɨɨjim tai chɨr: ―Dai dhi' nam jɨ'k mi' oi'ñkat Babiloonia nam bɨɨx kap tu daam kɨɨkat na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, gio nam dai dhi'r jix chutumñigam kat. Cham pai' dhuuk pu chu'm ka jai'chdhɨlhia' am chi ba' gu ja'tkam ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k.
66018019	Ba' bhai' xim buidhak ja moom am gu matai gɇ'gɇr kɨ'n bhai' ji sasra mɨt jix buam jum aagɨt nam joi'ndam ja nɨi'ñ gu Babiloonia oi'ñkam nam ja tulhiiñchu'n, jup xi kai'chɨt am: ―¡Ja'p moo siamrix ɨɨbhidham ja dooda mɨt dhi' nam Babiloonia oi'ñkat! Tɨi cham tu'r ja'ppɨx ja'tkam kat am. Mi' dhɨr gu' na chich jich chutumñigamta gui' ja bui, nach mi' ja ga'lhidhimɨk gu boptop ganai' bɨɨx aixim tu'm aach nach jɨ'k ja bia' gu kaknub, nam gu' dai dhi'x io'm jir jix chutumñigam kat. Gu' ji na mɨt gu' ya' jotmoda' cham pai' matgir, sia gu tu' nam bia'kat nax dha'ram namɨɨk.
66018020	Ba' bɨɨx aapi'm na pim jɨ'k bhammɨ ja'p jup tu'ii'x dhaam, jix bhai' pim jum taat ka', nat gu' ba ja tulhiiñchuda gu Dios gui' nam mi' oi'ñkat Babiloonia, nam giilhim jix buam tomaatɨt. Bɨɨx sia aapi'm jix bhai' pɨx jum taat ka' na pim tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor gu Dios na pim bhammɨ bap tu'ii'x dhaam, gio aapi'm na pim jɨ'k bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk guch Gɨ'kora' mu ja'p na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, na gu' xib ba ja tulhiiñchu'n gui' na mɨt jam tulhiiñchudak jam koi jano' na pim duduakat gu jam tutku' bhaan. Xib ba' ja a'm ba gɨi gui' na tu' ja a'm bipio'.
66018021	Ba' maa'n gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia', nat jax daa maa'n gu gɇ' komaarak jodai ja'p tu'm na jax gui' na kɨ'n jum tua' gu tiriik, mɨjɨmmɨ xi bua ɨrban gu gɇ' suudai', mi' dhɨr ba'p kai'ch: ―Ja'pni ji bubuakia' pim aapi'm na pim jɨ'k mi' oi'dha' na pai' Babiloonia tɨ tɨɨ' na pai' dhuuk jam kooda' gu Dios, ba' cham pai' dhuuk ka jam tɨgia' am gu ja'tkam.
66018022	Ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k cham pai' dhuuk ka jai'chdhɨlhia' am gu sasabdam nam bɨɨx aixim tu'm sasaasbikar kɨ'n tu sab mi' na pim pai' oi'dha' xib, gio nam cham pai' dhuuk mi' ka tu ga'ra' gux dha'ram namkɨm bɨɨx kap dɨr na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n. ¿Jaroo gip ka tu jam saba'da'? Sia gui' na pim bhaan tua' gu tiriik, cham pai' matgilhia', sia aapi'm na pim bɨɨx aixim tu'm ka'm tu juan, bɨɨx sia cham pai' matgilhia' pim.
66018023	Ampɨx ji chu jugia' mi' na pim pai' oi'dha', gampɨx jup tum duñia'. Tukaa' ja'k cham pai' ka mɨimda' gui' na kɨ'n jix chu maax ka', ni ku cham pai' dhuuk mi' pai' kar bhoo'n ka' na jax chum bua xib na gɇ' kɨ'n tum sabda' pai' no' mɨt bam tɨɨmo, na pimɨt gu' gɇ'kam kɨ'n cham am bua na pimɨt pui' ja mamtux gu ja'tkam bɨɨx na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam jax ja'k ja daanɨt gu cham kɨkɨɨ' i'ii'mda' nai' tu jiboiñdha'. Nai' xi ja jootsat japim gu jam tujuandam tuk bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam tu ga'rapu' gux dha'ram namkɨm.
66018024	Ba' pu'ñi ja'k ja dooda gu Dios gui' nam mi' oi'ñkat gɇ' kiicham na pai' Babiloonia tɨ tɨɨgich, nam gu' giilhim jix buam tomaatɨt. Tɨɨ' na mɨt ja tulhiiñchudaimɨk ja koi gui' nam bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk gu ñio'ki'ñ, gio jai' gui' nam buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat, gam jai' ja'ppɨx nam ja koodaimɨk bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n.
66019001	Ba' mi' dhɨr mui' dhɨt bhai' ji chum ñio gɇ' kɨ'n bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam, jup tum kai'ch: ¡Ja'p moor gɇ'kam ji dhi Dios jich Gɨ'kora'! Gammɨjɨch tu daanda' buiñor tu' ka'm nɨi'dhat, na gu'r gɇ'kam kat jir jix bhai'kam. Tɨɨ' nat jix bhai' duu nat tu ja uañ gu ja ua'tulhdhara' gu ja'tkam mu ja'p oi'ñga'n bhaan, pui' kuch ba' dai dhi' tu' ka'm nɨidhat gɇ'kamtu'nda' gammɨjɨ.
66019002	Na gu' dhi' nɨidhix kam ja tulhiiñchu'n gu ja'tkam nam jɨ'k kuiñcha bia', cham tu' na sia gui' nam jix bhai' tu jim. Pui' ba' nat jax ba ja dooda gui' nam mi' oi'ñkat gɇ' kiicham na pai' Babiloonia tɨ tɨɨgich, na mɨt gu' dhi' maaxik gɇ'kam kɨ'n cham am bua buiñor, na mɨt pui' ja mamtux bɨɨx gu ja'tkam na jɨ'k oi'ñga'n nam jax ja'k bɨɨx aixim tu buada' na tu'r ua'tulhdhara' buiñor gu Dios, gam nam tu daanda' ja bui gu didios jup duñiixim, gio na mɨt ja tulhiiñchudaimɨk ja koi gui' nam mu ja'p tɨi pup tu ja a'gidhimɨk gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios. Pui' kut ba' ja koi, na mɨt gu' gɇ' bam ua'tulh.
66019003	Mi' dhɨr ba' moop kai'ch am ɨp gio gu mui' nam bhammɨ dɨr bha ñiok jix dhaam: ―Gɇ'kamtu'nda' ich gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora', na gu'x io'm jir gɇ'kam, gio na bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia'. Jaiñ nat jax ja dooda gui' nam mu oi'ñkat gɇ' kiicham Babiloonia tɨ tɨɨgim. Dhi' gammɨjɨ mi' pup mɨɨjidha' am tai chɨr sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt.
66019004	Ba' gu maa'n oo'm daman maakob gu ja'tkam nam jir jagɨ'gɨr pa' nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr daraa mi' na pai' daa gu Dios, gio ba' gu maakob sasoi' nam bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr jup guguuk, na mɨt jax ja o'lhia kɨ'n guguu, nai' ji mumgia mɨt, dɨɨrap xi chu sissap gu ja moom, bhai' ji chu daanɨ mɨt buiñor gu Dios, jup kai'ch am: ―Jɇɇ', pui' dho. Bɨɨx dhɨt jach dho gɇ'kamtu'nda' dhi Dios jich Gɨ'kora' na ya' daa.
66019005	Ba' ja'xpɨx bhai' dhɨr bhai'p ji chum ñio sonpan na pai' daa gu Dios, jup tum kai'ch: Tu daanda' pim buiñor gu Dios bɨɨx aapi'm na pim jɨ'k mu ja'p oi'dha' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan na pim jir tɇ gɇ'gɇrkam, gio aapi'm na pim jir ja'ppɨx ja'tkam, sia aapi'm na pim tu' ka'm nɨidhat bhaankamu'n tu juan, na gu'x io'm jir gɇ'kam.
66019006	Mi' dhɨr ba' panaas ku mɨt mui' dhɨt bhai' ji ñio gu ja'tkam, pɨx jap tum kai'ch na jax pai' no' gɇ' mɨr gu suudai' na sasbakda', piam ja'p na jax chum kai'chdha' no' tɨm tɨroon, jup kai'ch am: Bɨɨx dhɨt jach tu' ka'm nɨidhat gɇ'kamtu'nda' guch Gɨ'kora', na gu'r gɇ'kam kat bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia'. Xib ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k bɨɨx kap sia bar gɇ'kam ka' na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n gam sia nar pa ja'k.
66019007	Joidham jach bɨɨx jich jujur kɨ'n jix bhai'ch chaatɨt buiñor gɇ'kamtu'nda'. Gio na gu' xib ya'r bhoo'n ka', bam ai gu' na pai' dhuuk jum tɨɨmo' dhi' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir. Ya' bap tu'ii' gui' na bɨɨma'n jum tɨɨmo',
66019008	ba tɨtɨi' mɨt gux chua jannulh na joidham jir jix kɨɨ' gio nar totbikdam. Gux chua jannulh, dhi' pɨx kat jup jum kai'ch na mɨt joidham jix bhai' tu jii na jax jix aa' gu Dios nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñ buiñor.
66019009	Ba' maadɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Ja'pnip mi'p xi chu daasa' u'uan ta'm: “¡Ja'p moo joidham jix bhai' tu ja jimia' gui' nam jɨ'k baidhix nam tu jugia' gu bhoo'n, nam gu' bɨɨx dhɨt bɨɨma'n jum tɨɨmo' dhi' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir! Ba' ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka' am.” Gio ba' moo ja'pnip xi chɨi: ―Dhi' nañ jɨ'k jax jum tɨtda, bhaankamu'n gu Dios jañ pui'm tɨtda, cham tu' aañ dɨɨlh. Sɨlhkam jup kai'ch gu dhi' pui' na jax kai'ch.
66019010	Ba' aañ na ñich jax jiñ o'lhia kɨ'n kɨkbo, ba ji chu daanɨ ñich buiñor gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na mi' tuñ a'gi'ñ, gu' ji na gu' gui'p jiñ chɨtda: ―Cha'p tu daanda' aañ jiñ bui, nañ gu' aañ pur cham tu'. Jir tujuandam tugi'ñ iñ pɨx gu Dios ja'p na jax aap jiñ jaduuñ gio gu jai' nam jɨ'k tu' ka'm nɨidhat mi' pui' ba jiim na jax chum a'ga gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam. Gui' ji Dios nap xi dhañia'. Na gu' bɨɨx nam jɨ'k bhaankamu'n tu a'ga gu Dios, bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ am na jax jum kai'ch gux bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook na bhaan tu a'ga guch Xoi'kam.
66019011	Ba' ja'xpɨx bhai' jim kupio' gux dhaam, ba' bhammɨ bam maax maa'n gu maa'nkam jix chua kabai cha'm, na ja'pni tɨɨ': Na pui' tu kuugalhdhidha' jax no't ba tɨi, gio na sɨlhkam jup kai'chdha'. Na gu' gui'x bhai' ja sɨlhka'n gu ja'tkam, gio na nɨidhix kam tulhiiñchuda' gu jaroi' no't tu' bhaan cham am bua buiñor. Piam no't jaroi' jax ba ji dhooda, tu kokda' ɨp buiñor.
66019012	Gu buupui'ñ gɇ'gɇr mɨmɨim ja'p na tai, gio na mui' ja tuttutu' gu kukrun. Ba' bha kobtagiñ maa'n bhai' xi ua'ñixchu' gu ñi'ook na pu cham jaroi' maat na jax kai'ñkam jup jum kai'ch, dai gui' dɨɨlh pɨx jix maat.
66019013	Ba' gu jannulh na tɨi'chu', ɨ'ɨɨr kɨ'n mamxidhix, jix chukuum jix bɨ'. Gio ba' moo ja'pni ja'k jup tɨɨ' dhi' jɨ' nax chua kabai cha'm jim: Gu ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios.
66019014	Mui' oi'ñchu' am ji gu' gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ gu Dios pui'x chooto kakbai cha'm ɨp, gio ba' nam jix chooto tɨtɨi'chu', jix kɨkɨɨ'x u'uañ gu ja jajannulh gio nar totbikdam.
66019015	Ba' maa'n chiñi'ram dɨr busaak gu tɇb kuxiir na bɨxxik dɨr jix mu'muk. Dhi' ba' kɨ'n tu kokda' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n ja bui gui' nam jix bhaamki'ñ. Mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k ba' bar ja gɇ'kam tuk ka' bɨɨx na jɨ'k ja'tkam, gio nax bhai' ja sɨlhka'nda' kɨ'n gu baiñum oxia'n, gio ba' na ja aagi'ñdha' bɨɨx nam jɨ'k tu' jax buimɨk nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan. Mi' dhɨr ba' dai na ba ja tulhiiñchuda' gui' nam jɨ'k cham mi' pui' jimia' na jax jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, ja'p ji buusnia' na jax gu uubas no't xi ba kɨi' tootna'n kɨ'n, gio ba' na bha ja i'chdha' gu biiñ gui' na giilhim jix xibu' gio nax maimda', na jax chu'm kɨ'n tu tulhiiñchu'n gu Gɇ'kam Dios na bɨxchu'x aichu'n na pu tu duñia'.
66019016	Ba' bha ja'p jannulhiram gio toonaram bhai' xi ua'ñixchu' na jax chɨɨ', jup jum kai'ch: Gu ja gɇ'kam tuk gui' nam bɨɨx kap jir gɇ'gɇrkam sia nar pa ja'k.
66019017	Ba' ja'xpɨx maadɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios bhammɨ ji kɨkbok bhaan gu tanoolh jup ja tɨtda bɨɨx gu u'ji' nam bha ja'p nɨnɨ'x dhaam: ―Bhai' gor sap jiim na pim tu jugia' gu koi' na tu jam makia' gu Dios.
66019018	Na gu' gɇ' jai'chdhɨlhia' gux kɨɨ' bakaax na pim tu jugia', nar ja tutku' gui' nam bɨɨx kap jir gɇ'gɇrkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, gio gu ja gɇ'gɇrkam tuk gu ja sandaarui'x chuk, gam jai' gui' nam jix o'jo' nam giilhim jix maatɨt tu kokda, gio gu ja tutku' gu ja'tkam gui' nam kakbai cha'm jiim gam gu ja bakxi' gu ja kakbai', gio ba' gu ja tutku' gui' nam jir tujuandam gio ba' gui' nam cham, gam gui' nam palhɨɨp gɇ'gɇrkam kɨ'n dalhxix, gio ba' gui' nam jir ja'ppɨx ja'tkam.
66019019	Ba' gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook na giilhim tu'm tu tuuku' gio nax xijum gook tu moom, ja bɨɨm gui' nam jir gɇ'gɇrkam bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, gio gu ja sandaarui'x chuk, maap bam jumaap jamɨt nam ba tu kokda' buiñor gui' nax chua kabai cha'm jim ja bɨɨm gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ.
66019020	Gu' ji nat gu' cham tu' ma'iich gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook, nat gu' tu' pɨx dooda gui' nax chua kabai cha'm jim. Ba' pu daa mɨt gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook bɨɨma'n gui' na bhaankamu'n ja iatgidhimɨk gu ja'tkam na bɨɨx aixim jix bhai'm duukam jup tu buimɨk ja nɨi'ñchudat nat bhaan pɨx ja iatgi nam ba' aaga' nam jum matgilhdha' ja kokobtai' am na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' nam ba kaichu' gu ja'ook, gio nam ba' tu dañia' buiñor gui' nar jup duiñxim na pui'p tu'm na gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook. Ba' ja u'uuk mummu xi ja iabu mɨt pui' dudua kam na pai' gɇ' mɨim gu tai, na giilhim jix mɨim nax io'm jix choiñ.
66019021	Gu jai' ba' nam kaichgɨt gam gu sandaarui'x chugi'ñ, ja koi dɨɨlh gui' nax chua kabai cha'm jim kɨ'n gu tɇb kuxiir na bɨxxik dɨr jix mu'muk na chiñi'ram dɨr busaak. Ba' bɨɨx gu u'ji' bhai' ji chu juu mɨt gu ja tutku', tu koi'mɨk am jum ju' mɨt.
66020001	Ba' mɨkkat maadɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios bhammɨ dɨr bhai' ba jurnim jix dhaam ji ua'dat gui' na kɨ'n jum kupio'k mu na pai' gɇ' tɨ dɨ' na cham pai' ju' gio maa'n gu baiñum tɨrbiñ sarbhak.
66020002	Ba' daagɨk xi buupra kɨ'n gu baiñum tɨrbiñ gux bhangɨm, nar di' pɨx gu ja'ook na ja'p tu'm tu tuuku' na gu tɨrook dai na gɇ', jir di' pɨx ɨp gu ko' gui' na bɨjɨk dɨr bax jai'ch, kuupa' ba' buuplhix kam mambhɨɨx jix cha'tmam oo'm (1000) oidha' juugɨt.
66020003	Ba' mi' dhɨr nat xi buuprak, kupio'kak mi' na pai' gɇ' tɨ dɨ' mɨjɨmmɨ xi bua, gio mi'p xi kuu gu ki'ñgob jix kabkam na ba' cham buusnɨi cham nai' ka ja iatgi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam. Mi' ba' na xim aaya' gu mambhɨɨx jix cha'tmam oo'm oidha', giop ka xi dho'ñcho' am gu ja'ook, dai na gu' alhio pɨx, cham tu' mɨk.
66020004	Ba' maa'n kap daraa am mui' gu ja'tkam bhaan gu a'toxkar nam jax chu'm bhaan daraaka' gui' nam jir gɇ'gɇrkam pa'. Pui' ja'k gɇ'gɇrkam kɨ'n dalhxix am nam ja aagi'ñdha' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam jax ja'k tui'ñgɨda' nax kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios nam jɨ'x juugɨt ya duduaka' dhi oi'ñga'n bhaan. Jir di' pɨx am gui' na mɨt ja tulhiiñchudaimɨk ja koi ja ɨ'kchulhdhak gu ja kuukxiopo jano' nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan, nam xi chuut nam gammɨjɨ pu kaichgɨda' guch Xoi'kam nam tɨi ja chian nam jum matgilhdha' ja kokobtai' am piam ja noonob am na bhaan jix maatɨ' ka' gɨt nam kaichu' gu ja'ook. Ba' cham tu'm matgilh jamɨt, gio na mɨt cham tu' tu daanɨ buiñor gu nobii'ñ gu ja'ook gio gup duiñxim na pui'p tu'm. Ba' duduadɨk baapmigɨk ba jii mɨt bhammɨ ja'k jix dhaam nam ba' gatuuk gio bhai'p jimɨi maap bar gɇ'gɇrkam ka' guch Xoi'kam ya' dhi oi'ñga'n ja bui gu ja'tkam mambhɨɨx jix cha'tmam oo'm oidha' juugɨt.
66020005	Ku gu' dai gui' ji nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam na mɨt ba' baapmigɨk jii bhammɨ ja'k buiñor. Ba' gui' nam cham tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ, cham tu' dudua mɨt, mi' pup ko'iix am, nat pai' xim ai gu mambhɨɨx jix cha'tmam oo'm oidha' na mɨt ba' duduadɨk bhai'p ji baapam. Gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, bɨɨpɨ' baapam jamɨt.
66020006	¡Ja'p moo joidham jix bhai' tu ja jimia' gui' nam jɨ'k bɨɨpɨ' duduadɨi baapmigia', cham tu' gatuuk no't bam ai gu mambhɨɨx jix cha'tmam oo'm oidha'! Nam gu' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', nam gu' bar maamra'n ka' gu Dios. Cham pai' dhuuk mu ja'k bhɨɨya' am nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha' gɨt, nam gu' bhammɨ ja'k bap tui'ka' buiñor, ja'p ji buusnia' nam bhammɨ tu juanda' na pai' tu chiopi' gu Dios gio guch Xoi'kam, nam gu' bɨɨma'n jir gɇ'gɇrkam ka' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam ja aagi'ñdha' gu jai' ja'tkam na jax ja'k jix aa' gu Dios nam tui'ñgɨda' mambhɨɨx jix cha'tmam oo'm oidha' juugɨt.
66020007	Mi' dhɨr ba' nat xim ai gu ja'kbui' mambhɨɨx jix cha'tmam oo'm oidha', giop xi dho'ñcho mɨt gu ja'ook na kuupkat.
66020008	Ba' giop xi mɨɨ bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nat giop ba ja iatgidham gu ja'tkam nam ba' pui' tu duñia' na jax ɨlhii'ñ. Bɨɨpɨ' bhai' ji ja iatgi gui' nam mur gɇ'gɇrkam na pai' gɇ'gɇr jir kikcham na Goog tɨ tɨɨ', gio ja'pni ja'k na pai' Magoog jup tɨ tɨɨ', nam pai' dhɨr bɨɨx ja daam kɨɨk gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n. Ba' bɨɨx maap ja jumaap gu sandaarui'x nam jɨ'k jai'ch na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, ja'p pɨx tu'ii' am na jax gu o'ya, pu cham jaroi' maat nam jɨ'k aix.
66020009	Mi' dhɨr ba' nai' ji jii mɨt bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n na mɨt ba ja gaagam gui' nam tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat mi' pui' jiim na jax jix aa' gu Dios nam ja kooda'. Ba' maa'n kap pɨx ji ja tɨɨ mɨt nam bɨɨx maap oi'dha' na pai' gɇ'r kiicham na gɇ'kam kɨ'n ja a'm tɨ nɨi'ñ gu Dios. Ba' nam pai' dhuuk bax ja koodam, tai bhammɨ dɨr bha jigɨɨsɨk jix dhaam ja a'm gɨi gu sandaarui'x, pu bɨɨx jaa mɨt.
66020010	Gu' ba' gu ja'ook nat ja iatgi, daagɨk mu xi bua mɨt na pai' gɇ' mɨim gu tai na giilhim jix io'm jix choiñ, mi' na mɨt pai' bua gu nobii'ñ gio gui' na bhaankamu'n tu a'gimɨk na pui'p ja iatgidhimɨk gu ja'tkam. Mi'm ba' pup jum tulhiiñdha' tai chɨr nam mɨɨjidha' gammɨjɨ sia na pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt.
66020011	Ba' nañ mui' xi chɨ nɨi'ñ bhammɨx dhaam, bhammɨ pɨx dhaa gui' nax io'm jir gɇ'kam jix chua atooxkor ta'm. Ba' gu oi'ñga'n gio gux dhaam na bha ja'p jix maax jotmoda' pɨx cham pai' matgir.
66020012	Ba' ja'xpɨx ja'pni bɨɨpɨ' dɨr na pai' daa gui' jɨ' gɇ'kam, mi' bam maax jamɨt gu ja i'ii'mda' bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam jɨ'k jai'ch kat na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n, sia gui' nam jir jix chutumñigam kat gam gui' nam jir gampai' tuutu'm kat. Ba' gu Dios xi ja chia gu noonbi'ñ nam xi chɨgia' gux kakbok u'uan na bhaan mi chu daaxix na mɨt jax chu jii gio nam tu' jax buimɨk bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n gu ja'tkam nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan. Mi' dhɨr ba' gu jumai u'uan jup xi chu chia nam xi chɨgia' nam bhaan daaxix nam jax chɨɨ' gui' nam jɨ'k jimia'x dhaam nam pai' gammɨjɨx jɨjɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', na mɨt tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhak buiñor guch Xoi'kam mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa'. Ba' gu Dios xi ja aagi'ñ bɨɨx gu ja'tkam nam tu' jax buimɨk bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n jano' nam duduakat gu ja tutku' bhaan, gio nam tu' bhaan kuiñcha bia' jai', mi' xi ñɨidhat gu u'uan na bhaan mi chu daaxix na mɨt jax chu jii.
66020013	Bɨɨx jamɨt sia baapmigɨk bhammɨ ai gui' na mɨt mu ja'p koi bhai'kok gɇ' suudai' chɨr, sia gui' nam jɨ'k mu ja'k jup tu't nam pai' aajidhat gui' nam ko'iidhat cham ji chɨ jɨɨ'ñdhai buiñor guch Xoi'kam. Xi ja aagi'ñ ɨp gu Dios na ja tulhiiñchuda', nam gu' gɇ'kam kɨ'n kuiñcha bia' na mɨt gu' cham mi' pui' jii na jax jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ.
66020014	Ba' dhi' jɨ' nam mu ja'k jup tu't nam pai' ja'k aajidhat gui' nam ko'iidhat cham ji chɨ jɨɨ'ñdhai buiñor guch Xoi'kam, mɨjɨmmɨ xi ja iabu mɨt na pai' gɇ' mɨim gu tai nax io'm jix choiñ, dai na mɨt xi ja aa'ñdhak nam tu' bhaan kuiñcha bia', mi' nam pai' gammɨjɨ mi' pup jum tulhiiñdha', ja'p ji buusnia' nam giop ba ko'ya'.
66020015	Bɨɨx jamɨt sia mu ja'k xi ja iabu gui' nam cham mi buan u'uan ta'm nam jax chɨɨ', mi' nam pai' buan gui' nam buiñor bap tui'ka' gu Dios jix jɨjɨkgɨm, na mɨt gu' buiñor tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhak guch Xoi'kam mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa'.
66021001	Ba' mi' dhɨr bɨɨx dhi' pui', ja'p ja'k jup bam maax gu xibkam oi'ñga'n gio gu xibkam jix dhaam, na gu' gu kɨlhii'ñga'n oi'ñga'n gio gux dhaam pai' nat ja'k jax jum duu, cham pai' ka matgir bɨnkam gui' na mix chu jai'ch kat bhaan.
66021002	Ba' ja'xpɨx bhammɨ dɨr jix dhaam buiñor gu Dios bhai' ba tɨmñim gu gɇ' kiicham na joidham tu tu'ii', jir di' pɨx gu xibkam Jerusaleen. Joidham jix chu abhaar ji gu', ja'p ji buusan na jax maa'n gu tɨyaa no't joidham jix chua ba tɨm tɨi' no't ba jim tɨɨmo bɨɨma'n gu chio'ñ.
66021003	Mi' dhɨr ba' gɇ' kɨ'n bhai' ji chum ñio bhai' dhɨr na pai' daa gu Dios, jup tum kai'ch: ―Xib ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ buiñor bap tui'ka' am gu Gɇ'kam Dios dhich jaaduñ nam ya' bap tu'ii', gio gu Dios mu dɨr bha ja'k gammɨjɨ ja bɨɨm jup tui'ka' ɨp, nam gu' bar maamra'n.
66021004	Cham pai' dhuuk tu' bhaan jix buam jum aagɨt ka suanda' am ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k, ni na cham pai' dhuuk ka ja aaya' gu jax chu'm ko'kdai', gio nam cham tu' bhaan jum tulhiiña', ni nam pai' dhuuk ka ko'ya', na gu' ya' cham tu' pui' kia' na jax mu ja'k nam pai'p tu't bɨɨpɨ' dɨr.
66021005	Ba' gux io'm Gɇ'kam na bhai' daa atooxkor ta'm jup kai'ch: ―Bɨɨx jañich ba tu pataasa, cham tu' pui' kia' na jax bɨɨpɨ' dɨr. Mi' dhɨr ba'p jiñ chɨtda aañ: ―Bɨɨx jap dhi' mi' xi dhaasa' nañ jax kai'ch, nañ gu' sɨlhkam jup kai'ch.
66021006	Gio ba' moo mi' dhɨr jup jiñ chɨtda ɨp gio: ―Bɨɨx jañich pui' ba tu kuugalh ba' xib na jax tu daaxix kat, aañ nañ bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch gio nañ ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ pu jai'ch ka' sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt. Ba' gu jaroi' no'x chanoom gu ii'mdagaram bhaan, aañi' dho makia' pui' pɨx gux kɨɨ' suudai' mi' dhɨr baxbhixim bibiatam na pai' cham ga'kɨ, na kɨ'n gammɨjɨx jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k, gio na kɨ'n cham pai' dhuuk ka tanoom ka'.
66021007	Dhi' jɨ' pu chu'm jañich ja iimchuda nañ ja makia' gui' nam jɨ'k gammɨjɨ pux biiñak ka' bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n aañ jiñ bui, sia kut tu'x buam jum duukam ja daam ba ji jii. Ba' gammɨjɨ ya'ñ bɨɨm bap tui'ka' am, nam gu' bar jiñ maamar ka', aañ pur ja Dios tuk ka' gammɨjɨ sia nar pai' dhuuk.
66021008	Dai gui' nam jɨ'k cham jum guguuxi'ñ nam tɨ jɨɨ'ñdha' aañ jiñ bui, sia kum tɨi ba kɇɇ guñ ñi'ook, cham tu' ja makia' iñ, sia gui' nam cham bɨɨx ja jujur kɨ'n jix biiñak ka' aañ jiñ bui sia kum tɨi ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ, ni sia gui' nam nai' pɨx jix chu bhaamki'ñdha', sia gui' nam jix buam tu bua, pui' na jax gui' nam ja koo'nda' gu ja'tkam, gio gui' nam jai' ja bia'kat gu u'uub ja bɨɨm boppda' nam cham maap tɨɨmoi'x, gio gui' nam jir u'uub no'm jai' ja bɨɨm boppo gu chichio'ñ, gio ba' gui' nam nai' tu jiboiñdha' na ja a'm jup tui'ñgɨda' gu cham kɨɨ' ii'mda', sia gui' nam ja bui tu daanda' bha ja'p ja tuttut gu didios jum tɨɨtgɨdam nam jir jup duñiixim, gio ba' gui' nam jix ia'tbi' na pu cham jir sɨlhkam ka' jax no'm kai'ch, gam sia gui' nam bɨɨx aixim tu bua na tu'r ua'tulhdhara'. Bɨɨx dhi' jɨ' nam pu'ñi ja'k jir tuutu'm gu ja'tkam, mu ja'k xi chu chiñia' iñ nam ja iabu' na pai' giilhim gɇ' mɨim gu tai gio nax io'm jix choiñ, mi'm ba' pup jum tulhiiñdha' nam mɨɨjidha' gammɨjɨ sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt, ja'p ji buusnia' nam giop ba ko'ya'.
66021009	Ba' maadɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios nam ja daada' gu jaja' na bhaan mi jimdat gui' nat kɨ'n ja tulhiiñchuda gu Dios gu ja'tkam, bha jimɨɨk jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Bhai' xi jim ya'ni ja'k nañ jum tɨ'ñchuda' gui' na bɨɨma'n jum tɨɨmo' gui' na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir.
66021010	Ba' nat gu' gɇ'ñ a'm bam tajaa gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda', mummu pai' chich ba ai gook dɨt gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na muñ bai'ñchu', maa'n kap gɇ' oidha' ta'm na mɨk ja'p jix chu maax. Ba' bhammɨx dhaam dɨr na pai'p tu'ii' gu Dios, bhai' ba tɨmñim gu gɇ' kiicham na joidham jix chu abhaar, jir di' pɨx gu xibkam kiicham na pai' Jerusaleen tɨ tɨɨ'.
66021011	Joidham gɇ' tum tanoor ji gu' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x jir kiicham, na gu' gɇ' tanoor gu Dios na bhai' daa, ja'p tu'm mɨim na jax chu'm totbikda' gu jodai gui' nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk gio na joidham ja'k dɨr jix chu maax.
66021012	Ba' bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr tɇ'kob kuup gu gɇ' kiicham, mambhɨɨx gok kap ba'r kiki'ñgob, bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n kap ba' bha ua'ñix nam jax chɨɨ' gu mambhɨɨx gook gu maamra'n gu Jakob.
66021013	Baik moo ja'pni xia'lhbui dhɨr ja'k bipio' gu kiki'ñgob, baik ba' moo ja'pni o'nsop dɨr ja'k, gio ba' moo ja'pni jurnip dɨr ja'k baik ɨp, gio ba' moo tai' dhɨr ja'k baik ɨp.
66021014	Ba' bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr daraa mambɨɨx gook gu joodai gɇ'gɇr na bhaan kɨɨk gui' na kɨ'n kuup bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr gu gɇ' kiicham. Bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n bhaan dhi joodai bha ua'ñix nam jax jup tɨɨ' gu mambhɨɨx gook gu noonbi'ñ guch Xoi'kam na ja'p ji buusan na gux kɨɨ' kasnir.
66021015	Ba' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios na mu ja'p jiñ bai'ñchu', maa'n ua' gu jupaabdakar nar jix uam totbikdam na kɨ'n jupaabda' na jɨ'x moor gɇ' gu gɇ' kiicham, gam gu kiki'ñgobga'n, gio ba' gui' na kɨ'n tu kuup bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr.
66021016	Ba' xi jupaabai, mambhɨɨx gook jix cha'tmam oo'm miil (12,000) kiloometros jir tɇb maap dɨr gu gɇ' kiicham, bɨɨx maakob kap dɨr jir maa'n na jɨ'xi'ñ, cham pai' maap dɨr jir tɇb. Gio na jɨ'x jir tɇ'tɇb gu ba'bhak, ja'kbui' ɨp mambhɨɨx gook jix cha'tmam oo'm miil kiloometros.
66021017	Mi' dhɨr ba' gui' na bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr kɨ'n kuup jup xi jupaabai, maa'n oo'm daman mambhɨɨx maakob obrasaa'n jir tɇ'kob. Pui' ja'k jupaabai nam jax ja'k tu jupaaba'n gu ja'tkam ya' kam dhi oi'ñga'n.
66021018	Gui' na bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr kɨ'n kuup gu gɇ' kiicham, jix a'bhar joodai kɨ'n bha bhi'ñbakchix na bɨɨx aixim tu'm totbik gio nax dha'ram namɨɨk, gu' ba' gu ba'bhak na ɨrban dɨr tuut, jix uam totbikdam nax dha'ram namɨɨk kɨ'n jup duñiix, na joidham ja'k dɨr jix chu maax.
66021019	Gu' ba' gu gɇ'gɇr joodai na bɨtaa'n dɨr daraa na bhaan kɨɨk gui' na kɨ'n tu kuup bɨɨx xikoolh dhɨr gu gɇ' kiicham, bɨɨx aixim tu'm totbikdam bha bhiibhi'spidhix. Maa'n gui' na bɨɨx aixim tu'm totbik bha bhi'spidhix, gu jumai ba' gui' nax chukuum jix chɨɨdo' totbik bhai'p bhi'spidhix, gio ba' moo gu jumai gui' nax io'm bɨɨx aixim tu'm totbik bha bhi'spidhix, gio gu jumai na ja'p iam jup daa, jix mondora' totbikdam bhai'p bhi'spidhix.
66021020	Gu' ba' gu jumai na ja'p ja'k jup daaxdhix, gui' na bɨɨx aixim tu'm totbikdam bha bhi'spidhix, gio ba' gu jumai na ja'p ja'k, jix chukuum jix bɨ' totbikdam bhai'p xi bhi'spidhix, gio ba' moo gu jumai na ja'p ja'k iam jup daa, jix uam totbikdam bhai'p bhi'spidhix, gio ba' gu jumai na ja'p ja'k, gui' nax mondora' kat jix chɨɨdo' totbik, gio ba' gu jumai na ja'p iam jup daa, gui' nax bɨ' kat jix uam totbik bhai'p bhi'spidhix, gio ba' moo gu jumai na ja'p ja'k jup daaxdhix, jix mondora' totbikdam bha bhi'spidhix, gu jumai ba' moo gui' nax bɨ' kat jix uam totbik, gio ba' moo gui' na ja'p dɨr ja'k jup daaxdhix, gui' nax muraa'nma' kat jix chɨɨdo' totbik bhai'p bhi'spidhix.
66021021	Gu' ba' gui' na kɨ'n jum kukpa' gu kiki'ñgob, jir joodai sobkoñxim gui' nax io'm jix kaapak gio nax a'bhar jix dha'ram namkɨm. Ba' gu komaarak boi na mu bhɨix ɨrban gu gɇ' kiicham, dai gux kɨɨga'n gux uam totbikdam kɨ'n jup duñiix nax io'm jix dha'ram namɨɨk, na gu' joidham ja'k dɨr jix chu maax.
66021022	Ba' bhai' dhi gɇ' kiicham, cham tu' ka jai'ch gu chiop na pai' dhɨr tum daan, na gu' ja'p ji buusan na gu Dios bɨɨma'n guch Xoi'kam bhai'r chiop, na gu' bhai'p tu'ii' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x jir kiicham.
66021023	Ba' cham tu' kam aa' gu tu' na tu tonni'ñ ka' bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x jir gɇ' kiicham, pui' na jax gu tanoolh gio gu masaa'n, na gu' gu Dios na bhai' daa joidham gɇ' tanoor, bɨɨx kap tu tonni'ñ na jɨ'x jir kiicham, gux chu maax jir di' guch Xoi'kam.
66021024	Joidham jix chu maax kɨr jam jup tui'ka' gu ja'tkam nam bhammɨ aaya' bɨɨx kap dɨr na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n bhai' dhi gɇ' kiicham. Gio gui' nam jir gɇ'gɇrkam kat bɨɨx kap na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n na mɨt mi' pui' jii na jax jix aa', tu' ka'm tɨɨgɨi xi chu makia' am gux dha'ram namkɨm gu Dios.
66021025	Cham pai' dhuuk jum kukpa' gu kiki'ñgob bhai' na pai' dhɨr mu tum bapkɨ mɨjɨ ja'k na pai'r kikcham, gammɨjɨ pu kukpio'kix ka', na gu' cham pai' dhuuk tukgia', gammɨjɨ pur tataab ka'.
66021026	Ba' bɨɨx na jɨ'k gu ja'tkam na mɨt tu' ka'm tɨɨ gu Dios, bhammɨ ɇɇji tu dañia' am buiñor, ja'p ji buusnia' nam tu makia' gux dha'ram namkɨm gio gu tu' na joidham jix a'bhar.
66021027	Bhai' cham tu' ka jai'ch ka' am gui' nam jix buam tomaat na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, ni sia gui' nam bɨxchu' bhaan jum ua'tulhi'ñdha' gam nam nai'x chu bhaamki'ñdha', gio gui' nam nai' pɨx tu iatgi'ñdha', dai ji gui' nam mi daaxix ka' nam jax chɨɨ' bhaan gu u'uan na pai' ja daasaim guch Xoi'kam gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhidhat mi' pui' jiim na jax jix aa' nam ba' bhai'p tui'ka'.
66022001	Ba' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k jup jiñ baidhak gu nobii'ñ gu Dios, maa'n kap jiñ aich na pai' gɇ' mɨr gu suudai' joidham jix kɨɨ', jir di' pɨx gui' na kɨ'n gammɨjɨx jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka' gu jaroi' no't xi ii. Joidham jix kɨɨ'x uañ ji gu', cham pai' palhɨɨp pɨx am jix ikoora', bhai' dhɨr ja'k bha mɨr na pai' daa gu Dios gio guch Xoi'kam dhi' na ja'p ji buusan na jax gux kɨɨ' kasnir.
66022002	Sɨlh mi' ɨrban gu gɇ' kiicham buusan gu ak na bhaan mɨr gux kɨɨ' suudai', bɨxxik dɨr juu'ñdharam gu ak ba ɨ'xchix gu bhaidha' na gammɨjɨ bhɇɇ nabap masaa'n. Dhi' kɨ'n sia gammɨjɨx jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka' gu jaroi' no't ba juu, gu jaaga'n ba'x bhaai' nam kɨ'n jum duduadhi'ñdha' no'm jix kako'k gu ja'tkam nam mu ja'p oi'dha' na jɨ'x jir oi'ñga'n.
66022003	Bhai' dhi gɇ' kiicham cham tu' ka jai'ch ka' gu tu' nam bhaan jum tulhiiña' gu ja'tkam no'm bhammɨ bap tu'ii', na gu' gu Dios gio guch Xoi'kam bhai'p tui'ka' ja bɨɨm na ja a'm tɨ nɨi'ñdha', dai ji nam jix bhai'm taatɨt tu daanda' buiñor.
66022004	Maaxik ba nɨi'ñdha' am gu' ja buupui kɨ'n na jax jir tu'm kam gui' na pui' tɨɨ' Dios, gio na bhai' ba ua'ñix ka' ja kokobtai' am na jax chɨɨ'.
66022005	Cham pai' dhuuk xia'lhidhat ka jurnidha' mi' dhɨr ja'p ja'k, gammɨjɨ pur tataab ka'. Gio na cham kam aa'nda' gu tu' nam kɨ'n tɨ bɨgii'ñka' piam gu tu' na tu tonni'ñka', pui' na jax gu tanoolh gio gu masaa'n, na gu' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' gɇ' mɨimda' na bhai'p tui'ka'. Bɨɨx kap tu tonni'ñka' gu' na jɨ'x jir kiicham, gui' ba' nam jɨ'k bhammɨ bap tui'ka', ja sɨlhka'nda' am gu ja'tkam na mummu ja'p tu oi'ñka' oi'ñga'n bhaan.
66022006	Ba' gu nobii'ñ gu Dios jup jiñ chɨtda ɨp gio: ―Bɨɨx na jɨ'k jax jum tɨtda gu Dios, sɨlhkam jup kai'ch, cham tu' na pɨx jap kai'ch, na gu' gu Dios jich Gɨ'kora' gammɨjɨ pui' tu kuugalhdhidha' jax no't ba tɨi. Jir di' pɨx gui' na ja tajaañi'ñka' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mdaga'n gui' nam jɨ'k bhaankamu'n ja aagi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam na jax tu duñia' gatuuk. Aañ ba' bhai'p xiñ joot nañ sap pu'ñi bɨɨx ja mattuda' gui' nam jɨ'k bhaankamu'n tu a'ga gu ñio'ki'ñ na jax tu duñia' jootom, na cham ka mɨɨkidha'.
66022007	Guch Xoi'kam jup kai'ch ɨp: ―Jootom jañ moo mui' ba jim. Ba' joidham jix bhai' tu jimia' gu jaroi' no' tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ na jax mi chu ua'ñix dhi u'uan ta'm nañ jax chu duñia' gatuuk, na gu' dai na pɨx bhaan ji bamgidha' na mi' pui' ba jimda' na jax jix aa' gu Dios.
66022008	Pu'ñi ja'k jañich tɨ kai gio na ñich tɨ tɨɨ aañ nañ Juan tɨɨ' nañ jax ba tu jam a'gi'ñ jiñ jaaduñ. Ba' nat pu'ñi tɨñ chɨ'ñchuda gu nobii'ñ gu Dios, jiñ o'lhia kɨ'n kɨkbok ba ji chu daanɨ ñich buiñor,
66022009	gu' ji nat gu' gui' puñ xoo'mchulh, jup jiñ chɨtda: ―Cha'p tu daanda' aañ jiñ bui, nañ gu' aañ jir ja'ppɨx tujuandam tugi'ñ gu Dios ja'p na jax aap gio gu jai' nam pui' bhaankamu'n jup tu a'ga, gam gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat buiñor guch Xoi'kam mi' pui' ba jiim na jax ya' tu ua'ñix dhi u'uan ta'm. Dai ji gu Dios buiñor nap tu daanda'.
66022010	Gio ba' moo ja'pnip jiñ chɨtda gu nobii'ñ gu Dios: ―Xib ba' moo dai nap bɨɨx kap ja aagi'ñdha' gu ja'tkam na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n dhi' na pich jɨ'k tu' tu ua'na dhi u'uan ta'm, nam ba' bɨɨx pui' ba tu machia' na tu' jax dhuñia' gu Dios, na gu' dhi' cham xiim pui' tu kuugalhdha'. Cham tu' nap dɨɨlh pɨx pui'x chu mat ka'.
66022011	Cham jax bua sia kum jai' cham aa' nam mi' pui' jimia'. No'm bɨɨx aixim jix buam tu bua na jax cham jir am, cha'p ja soo'mchulhi'ñka', sia gui' nam bɨɨx aixim tu'm bhaan tɨtɨɨ'ñcho nar jix buam jum duukam. Dai gui' nam jɨ'k tɨ jɨɨ'ñdhat mi' pui' ba jiim na jax jix aa' guch Gɨ'kora', nam jix bhai'm duukam bap tu bua na jax jix kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ, xi ja guguuxdha' ap nam jix io'm jix bhai'm duukam xip tu buada' bhaankamu'n gu Dios. Piam gu jaroi' no' bɨɨx juraa'n kɨ'n ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, pui'p jup xi guguuxdha' nax io'm mui' xix biiñak ka' buiñor gu Dios.
66022012	Ba'p kai'ch ɨp gio guch Xoi'kam: ―Cham xiim jañ mui' ba jim. Moo pim pɨx tɨ nɨɨrada'. Pu tu ua'da' iñ gui' nañ tu jam makia' nar jam mai'chɨk ka', na tu' jam a'm bipio'da' na pim tu' jax buimɨiñ a'mkam na pim duduakat gu jam tutku' bhaan.
66022013	Aañ bɨjɨk dɨr pux jai'ch, gio ya' dɨr ja'p ja'k gammɨjɨ pu jai'ch ka' iñ sia nar pai' dhuuk ka' gɨt.
66022014	Ba' joidham jix bhai' tu jimia' gu jaroi' no' cham tu' bɨɨx aixim ka tu bua na tu'r ua'tulhdhara', na ja'p ji buusanda' nax kɨɨ' tɨm tɨ'ii'ñka' gu jajannulhi'ñ, nam gu' dhi' ba' pɨx jix bhai' tɨɨdai mu baasa' bhai' dhɨr na pai' mu tum bapkɨ mɨjɨ ja'k gɇ' kiicham, ba' dai nam ba chiñia' na tu jugia' gu bhaidha' na mu kɨɨk ɨrban gu gɇ' kiicham na kɨ'n gammɨjɨx jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'.
66022015	Dai gui' nam bɨxchu' bhaan jix u'ua'tulhdhix ka'm mu dɨr ja'p pup bi'ya' dɨɨrap dɨr, pui' na jax gui' nam bɨɨx aixim tu buada' na jax cham kɨɨ' ka'm nɨi'ñ gu Dios, gio gui' nam giilhim nai' ja jiboiñdha' gu ja'tkam, gio ba' gui' nam jai'x bhai' ja tɨtdat gu u'uub ja bɨɨm boppoda', gio gui' nam jir u'uub no'm jai' ja bɨɨm boppo gu chichio'ñ, sia gui' nam ja koo'nda' gu ja'tkam, gio ba' gui' nam tu daanda' ja bui gup duiñxim didios, gam gui' nam jix ia'tbi' nam nai' pɨx tu iatgi'ñdha'.
66022016	’Aañi' Jesuus ya' dɨr mu joot jañich gui' nar nobii'ñ gu Dios mummu buiñor guñ chujuandam tuk Juan na ba' pui' tu mattuda' nañ jɨ'k jax tu duñia' jootom, na ba' mi' dhɨr gu Juan bɨɨx kap ba ja aagi'ñdha' gui' nam ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ aañ jiñ bui na jɨ'x oi'ñga'n nam ba' pui' tu machia'. Aañ pui' ji buusan na jax gu gɇ' chi'ɨɨ' gui' na katukgab bha tɨssa'n. Jir di' pɨx iñ gu boxii'ñ gu Dabii gui' na bɨjɨk jir gɇ'kam kat.
66022017	Gu' ba' gux Dhuudu' kam jix Uañ Ii'mda' gio gui' na ja'p ji buusan nar bɨnga'n guch Xoi'kam, jup kai'ch am ɨp: ―Jum nɨɨra ich nap jootom bhai' xi jimda' Jesuus jich Xoi'kam. Pu'ñi ɨp ba' gu jaroi' no' ba tɨ jɨɨgi'ñ buiñor guch Xoi'kam, no'x aa' na jimia' bhammɨ ja'k buiñor, jum aa' na tu' ka'm nɨidhat nɨɨrka', gio na xi bai'ñdha' na jotmoda' bha jimda'. Piam no' jaroi' maadɨt jix chanoom gu ii'mdagaram bhaan, guch Xoi'kam dho pui' pɨx toi'dha' gux kɨɨ' suudai' na kɨ'n cham pai' dhuuk ka tanoom ka' gio na kɨ'n gammɨjɨx jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka'.
66022018	Ja'pniñ ja'k ba' moop kai'ch bhaankamu'n gu Dios ja bui gui' nam jɨ'k jix aa' nam tu jiñkuidhai mi' pui' jimia' na jax ya' tu ua'ñix dhi u'uan ta'm: Na cham jir am no't jaroi' jai' mi'p baapai gu ñi'ook na dɨɨlh jax ɨlhii'ñ ya' na pai' tu daaxix dhix bhai'm kai'chdham ñi'ook, na gu'x io'm tulhiiñchuda' gu Dios mu na pai' ja tulhiiñchuda' gui' nam jɨ'k cham tu' ka'm tɨgia', pui' na jax ba tu ua'ñix dhi u'uan ta'm na mi chu a'ga na pai' ja'k ja tulhiiñchuda'.
66022019	Gu' ba' gu jaroi' no't jai' boosolh dhi ñio'ki'ñ gu Dios na jɨ'k ya' tu daaxix u'uan ta'm, piam ku ja'p xi dhuukat, gu Dios pui'p baabo' na mi' ka daaxix ka' na jax chɨɨ' bhaan gu u'uan na pai' ja daasaim gui' nam jɨ'k bhammɨ aaya' gɇ' kiicham, na pai' joidham jix chu abhaar, bhai' na pai' gammɨjɨx jɨkgɨm bap tui'ka', pui' na jax tu a'ga bhaan dhi u'uan. Ba' cham tu' ka jugia' gu bhaidha' na bhammɨ kɨɨk na kɨ'n gammɨjɨx bhai' ba tu tatda' ka' gɨt.
66022020	Ba'p kai'ch ɨp gio guch Xoi'kam: ―Jix io'm jootom mu jimda' iñ no' pimɨt xim jotma'n na pim bɨɨx kap ja aagi'ñdha' gu jai' ja'tkam dhi' na jɨ'k mi chu ua'ñix u'uan ta'm. Aañ ba'p tɨtda: ―Ea nach pui' tu duñia' nap jax kai'ch Jesuus jich Xoi'kam nap ba' moo jootom bha jimda'.
66022021	Ja'pniñ ba' pɨx jam tɨtdañ jaaduñ. Moo gɨt ba' gu Gɇ'kam jich Xoi'kam xi jam joi'ndat jam a'm tɨ nɨidhidhat jam palhbui'ñchu' tu' na pɨx bhaan bɨɨx jɨ'ma'n aapi'm.
